\"...and He Makes Witty Repartee\".Name: "...and He Makes Witty Repartee"
\"...and He Makes Witty Repartee\".Text:
Your Captain must already have "...He Rides Well..." attached to play this card.
React: Play when your Captain tacks to produce Influence. This card attaches to your Captain. Each time you inflict 3 or more hits with a Cannon Attack or Boarding attack, you inflict 2 extra Hits.
\"...and He Makes Witty Repartee\".Flavor Text: "In his youth, Gosse had every woman he met eatin' out of his hand."

\"...and One for All\".Name: "...and One for All"
\"...and One for All\".Text: React: Play when you suffer Hits during a Boarding Attack. You may tack or sink Crew other than your Crew in the Boarding Attack to absorb Hits.
\"...and One for All\".Flavor Text: "Sometimes, it's better to have friends than subordinates." - Philip Gosse

\"...He Rides Well...\".Name: "...He Rides Well..."
\"...He Rides Well...\".Text:
Your Captain must already have "He Fights Well..." attached to play this card.
React: Play when you tack your Captain to produce Adventuring. This card attaches to your Captain and gives a +1 to all his skills.
\"...He Rides Well...\".Flavor Text: "He knew horses, too, Gosse did. Once rode fifty miles at a full gallop... with a Castillian girl in his lap."

\"...No Barter...\".Name: "...No Barter..."
\"...No Barter...\".Text: You must have "No Banter..." in play to play this card. Until the end of the turn, players may not complete Adventures, or put Adventures into play.
\"...No Barter...\".Flavor Text: The scythe cut through blade and flesh alike. For the first time in his life, Berek felt fear gnawing at his heart.

\"...No Quarter!\".Name: "...No Quarter!"
\"...No Quarter!\".Text: You must have "...No Barter..." in play to play this card. Until the end of the turn, players may not tack Crew to absorb Hits.
\"...No Quarter!\".Flavor Text: Reis looked down as Berek toppled overboard and vanished beneath the foam. "No one steals from me, Sea Dog."

\"Again, Boys!\".Name: "Again, Boys!"
\"Again, Boys!\".Text: React: Play after you finish resolving a Cannon Attack. You may immediately conduct a new Cannon Attack.
\"Again, Boys!\".Flavor Text: "I don't care if they're red hot. I don't care if they're meltin' through the decks! Fire! Fire! Fire!"

\"All Hands on Deck!\".Name: "All Hands on Deck!"
\"All Hands on Deck!\".Text: Tack your Captain or one of your Crew with the First Mate trait to play this card. Show your hand to your opponents. If you do not have any Crew in your hand, you may go through your deck and discard pile and get one Crew aligned to your Captain's faction. Reveal the Crew to your opponents, and place it in your hand. Shuffle your Deck.
\"All Hands on Deck!\".Flavor Text: "I brought half a dozen Porté mages with me." Timothy grinned. "Think you can use them?"

\"Allow Me...\".Name: "Allow Me..."
\"Allow Me...\".Text:
You may only play this card if you have a Heroic Captain.
React: Play when another player is suffering Hits. They suffer 2 fewer Hits (minimum 0). This card attaches to one of your Heroic Crew. This Attachment gives a +1 Swashbuckling.

\"Arm Yourselves!\".Name: "Arm Yourselves!"
\"Arm Yourselves!\".Text: Tack your Captain or one of your Crew with the First Mate trait to play this card. Until the end of the turn, all of your Crew aligned to your Captain's faction inflict 2 extra Hits during Boarding Attacks.
\"Arm Yourselves!\".Flavor Text: "If you don't know how to use one of these, I suggest you leave now."

\"Beat You To It!\".Name: "Beat You To It!"
\"Beat You To It!\".Text: Target one of your opponent's uncompleted Adventures in play, if you have a copy of that Adventure in your hand. Attach your Adventure to the target's Sea. Discard the targeted Adventure.

\"Brace Yourselves!\".Name: "Brace Yourselves!"
\"Brace Yourselves!\".Text: Tack your Captain or one of your Crew with the First Mate trait to play this card. Until the end of the turn, whenever you are suffering hits, you suffer 2 fewer Hits (minimum 0).
\"Brace Yourselves!\".Flavor Text: "Aim low. They thrive on pain, but they can't close if their legs don't work." - Jorund Guttormson

\"Brother\" Mattias Brewer.Name: "Brother" Mattias Brewer
\"Brother\" Mattias Brewer.Text: Mattias gains +2 Adventuring when tacking to produce Adventuring to complete an Artifact Adventure.
\"Brother\" Mattias Brewer.Flavor Text: "As the First Book of the Prophet says, 'Beer is Good.' Well, it doesn't say that, but it really should. Perhaps the text can be amended..."

\"Butcher\" Pinchot.Name: "Butcher" Pinchot
\"Butcher\" Pinchot.Text:
Butcher does not count toward your crew maximum.
Act: Once per turn, you may tack Butcher to untack one of your crew with the No Attachments trait.
\"Butcher\" Pinchot.Flavor Text: "Give me a week in port, Reis; I'll find your Highland lass."

\"By the Gods...\".Name: "By the Gods..."
\"By the Gods...\".Text: This card enters play tacked. While this card is a Sea Attachment it is Unique and your Captain's Skills are reduced by 1 (min. 1). If you complete an Artifact Adventure while this card is untacked, this card becomes a Captain Attachment and attaches to your Captain. Your Captain gains +1 to all Skills.

\"Captain\".Name: "Captain"
\"Captain\".Trait: Sea Dogs Captain Attachment - Unique - Pet
\"Captain\".Text: React: Tack this card when you are paying an Adventuring cost to produce 3 Adventuring.
\"Captain\".Flavor Text: "You can't surrender to me; you have to surrender to the Captain..." - Jeremiah Berek

\"Cat's Claw\" Fornier.Name: "Cat's Claw" Fornier
\"Cat's Claw\" Fornier.Text: React: Discard Fornier when you are paying your Ship's Move Cost to attempt a Boarding. The cost to cancel that Boarding is increased by 2.
\"Cat's Claw\" Fornier.Flavor Text: There's a reason they lock him down there.

\"Cut a Path!\".Name: "Cut a Path!"
\"Cut a Path!\".Text: Tack your Captain or one of your Crew with the First Mate trait to play this card. All of your Crew aligned to your Captain's faction gain +2 Adventuring until the end of the turn.
\"Cut a Path!\".Flavor Text: "McCormick's been driving the men hard since that deal with Kheired-Din. Too hard." - Cosette

\"Cut the Ropes!\".Name: "Cut the Ropes!"
\"Cut the Ropes!\".Text: React: Play immediately after you suffer Hits during a Boarding. This Boarding is ended. The opposing Ship may tack 3 Swashbuckling to cancel this action.
\"Cut the Ropes!\".Flavor Text: "They're gettin' killed down there! Cut the ropes, lads, before it's too late!" - P. Cole

\"Don't Make Me Ask Again\".Name: "Don't Make Me Ask Again"
\"Don't Make Me Ask Again\".Text: You may only play this card if you have a Villainous Captain. Get up to 2 Illegal Adventures from your deck, show them to your opponents, and place them in your hand. Shuffle your deck.
\"Don't Make Me Ask Again\".Flavor Text: "I'm looking for the Highland woman. Don't make me ask again."

\"Don't Mess With Me, Boy!\".Name: "Don't Mess With Me, Boy!"
\"Don't Mess With Me, Boy!\".Text: Target one of your Crew. For each Eye, Face, Arm, or Leg card they have attached, the Crew gains +1 to each of their skills until the end of the turn.

\"Fire as She Passes!\".Name: "Fire as She Passes!"
\"Fire as She Passes!\".Text: React: Play when a Ship in this Sea has finished resolving a Cannon Attack against your Ship. Target that Ship to inflict a 6 Hit Cannon Attack on the target Ship.
\"Fire as She Passes!\".Flavor Text: "I love it when they scream." - Red Thorfild

\"Fire the Chase Guns!\".Name: "Fire the Chase Guns!"
\"Fire the Chase Guns!\".Text: React: Play after you finish resolving a Cannon Attack for which you produced 7 or more Cannon. You may immediately conduct a new Cannon attack.
\"Fire the Chase Guns!\".Flavor Text: Load them chase guns, boys! We snapped her mast and she ain't goin' nowhere.

\"Have at 'em Boys!\".Name: "Have at 'em Boys!"
\"Have at 'em Boys!\".Text: React: Sink this card and tack one of your Crew instead of performing a Boarding Attack. Until after the end of this Boarding, players may not play Action cards instead of performing a Boarding Attack.
\"Have at 'em Boys!\".Flavor Text: As Reis' frustrattion grew, so did the bloodshed.

\"He Fights Well...\".Name: "He Fights Well..."
\"He Fights Well...\".Text: React: Play when you tack your Captain to absorb Hits. This card attaches to your Captain. Your Captain gains +1 Swashbuckling and inflicts 1 extra Hit during Boarding Attacks.
\"He Fights Well...\".Flavor Text: "Gosse was quite the scrapper once. Could take out a whole barroom without breakin' a sweat."

\"Heave To!\".Name: "Heave To!"
\"Heave To!\".Text: Target an Ally in this Sea controlled by another player. Discard the target Ally. You may immediately put an Ally into play from your hand or hire a Crew, reducing that card's skill point cost by the cost of the targeted Ally.

\"I'll Be Taking That…\".Name: "I'll Be Taking That…"
\"I'll Be Taking That…\".Text: Target an Item card in play. Discard that card.
\"I'll Be Taking That…\".Flavor Text: "Looking for something? This is my cabin, so I can tell you where everything is." - Allende

\"I'm Not Left-Handed\".Name: "I'm Not Left-Handed"
\"I'm Not Left-Handed\".Text: React: Play before you play a Boarding Attack for one of your Crew. Draw 3 cards. If the other player in the Boarding has a "I'm Not Left-Handed" in play when you play this card, draw 2 extra cards (5 cards total). This card is not discarded until the end of this Boarding.

\"I've Seen Worse\".Name: "I've Seen Worse"
\"I've Seen Worse\".Text: React: Discard this card when this Crew tacks to produce skill points. The Crew produces 2 extra points of the skill.
\"I've Seen Worse\".Flavor Text: "The Fourth Switch is somewhere on this island. We're going to find it, hostile natives or no."

\"It Must Be Mine!\".Name: "It Must Be Mine!"
\"It Must Be Mine!\".Text: Act: Get an unaligned Captain card (from outside your deck) and put that Captain into play. Congratulations! You now have an additional Captain in play. You do not lose the game until all of your Captains have been sunk. This card remains in play. If this card is ever discarded or sunk, all of your Captains are sunk as well. You may not play this card unless you are the credited artist of this card, or your name appears in the credits section of the most current rulebook or rulesheet.

\"It's A Trap.\".Name: "It's A Trap."
\"It's A Trap.\".Text: React: Play when another player is performing an action to discard or sink one of your Sea Attachments. That action is canceled. Inflict 3 Hits on that player's Ship.
\"It's A Trap.\".Flavor Text: "Hey, I was going to share. Really!"

\"It's a Trap.\".Name: "It's a Trap."
\"It's a Trap.\".Text: React: Play when another player is performing an action to discard or sink one of your Sea Attachments. That action is canceled. Target and inflict 3 hits on that player's Ship.
\"It's a Trap.\".Flavor Text: "Hey, I was going to share. Really!"

\"Listen!\".Name: "Listen!"
\"Listen!\".Text: Target a Crew with more Attachments than their Captain. Sink that Crew.
\"Listen!\".Flavor Text: "Berek said te leave, an' we're leavin'!" Bonnie screamed. "Or else Reis paints his sails with our blood!"

\"Long Tall\" Harry.Name: "Long Tall" Harry
\"Long Tall\" Harry.Text: When Harry tacks to pay Sailing to attempt a Boarding, the cancel cost of the Boarding is increased by 2.
\"Long Tall\" Harry.Flavor Text: "It's Syrneth all right. I wonder what it would do if we nailed it to the crow's nest?"

\"Long Tall\" Harry - Exp..Name: "Long Tall" Harry - Exp.
\"Long Tall\" Harry - Exp..Text: React: Once per turn, sink up to three cards from your hand when your Ship attempts to start a Boarding; the cancel cost of the boarding is increased by 2 for each card sunk.
\"Long Tall\" Harry - Exp..Flavor Text: "I don't know how it works, but the horizon looks clear as a bell from here."

\"Look Lively, Men!\".Name: "Look Lively, Men!"
\"Look Lively, Men!\".Text: Tack your Captain or one of your Crew with the First Mate trait to play this card. All of your Crew aligned to your Captain's faction gain +1 influence until the end of the turn.
\"Look Lively, Men!\".Flavor Text: "Gentlemen, we are about to being an operation that will end this war once and for all. I trust you will perform accordingly." - Admiral Valoix

\"Lucky\" Vandrad Hallvardson.Name: "Lucky" Vandrad Hallvardson
\"Lucky\" Vandrad Hallvardson.Text: When Vandrad tacks to absorb Hits, he absorbs 2 extra Hits.
\"Lucky\" Vandrad Hallvardson.Flavor Text: He's never fallen from the rigging. Not once. Not ever.

\"Lyin'\" John Fox.Name: "Lyin'" John Fox
\"Lyin'\" John Fox.Text: React: Tack John immediately after completing a Goods Adventure. You may perform an additional action immediately after this one.
\"Lyin'\" John Fox.Flavor Text: "These ain't no dentist tools - these be arcane Syrneth artifacts or my name ain't John Wiggins."

\"Lyin'\" John Fox - Exp..Name: "Lyin'" John Fox - Exp.
\"Lyin'\" John Fox - Exp..Text: All of your completed Adventures which increase Influence provide one extra Influence.
\"Lyin'\" John Fox - Exp..Flavor Text: While his charm remained unchanged, something darker had crept into Fox's demeanor. His smile began to curdle around the edges, and tension seeped into his casual lies.

\"Magpie\" Muscov.Name: "Magpie" Muscov
\"Magpie\" Muscov.Text: When hiring this Crew, you may pay an additional 3 Influence to give him the trait: Pyeryem 1, +2 Adventuring and +2 Swashbuckling until the end of the game.
\"Magpie\" Muscov.Flavor Text: "The Society doesn't know he's on the payroll. We thought it best for all oncerned." - Cosette
\"Magpie\" Muscov.Changes on MRP: Affiliation/Nation modified;Text modified;Flavor text modified;Artist modified;

\"Man the Bilge Pumps!\".Name: "Man the Bilge Pumps!"
\"Man the Bilge Pumps!\".Text: React: Play immediately after you tack Crew to absorb Hits, except during Boarding. Untack one of your Crew which tacked to absorb Hits.
\"Man the Bilge Pumps!\".Flavor Text: "You don't think the sirens could slip through that hole, do you?"

\"Man the Tops!\".Name: "Man the Tops!"
\"Man the Tops!\".Text: Tack your Captain or one of your Crew with the First Mate trait to play this card. Until the end of the turn, all of your Crew aligned to your Captain's faction gain +2 Sailing, until the end of the turn.
\"Man the Tops!\".Flavor Text: McCormick lept aboard the Strange Skies, Maggie and Mumbeley Peg in tow. Kheired-Din smiled. "Man the tops!" he called. "We have everything we need here."

\"My Last Bit of Luck.\".Name: "My Last Bit of Luck."
\"My Last Bit of Luck.\".Text: React: Play when an opponent pays the Cancel cost of one of your Action Cards. Inflict 2 Hits to that player.
\"My Last Bit of Luck.\".Flavor Text: "I don't know where that figurehead came from or how I managed to cling to it for so long, but it kept me alive until the Brotherhood found me. My last bit of luck, I guess." - Jeremiah Berek

\"Niklaas Wynkoop\".Name: "Niklaas Wynkoop"
\"Niklaas Wynkoop\".Text: "Niklaas" gains +1 to all Skills while you are in a Sea that has another player's Port attached.
\"Niklaas Wynkoop\".Flavor Text: Yngvild knew of "Niklaas", a vesten mole among the Vendel merchant. If anyone knew where to find the traitor, it would be him.

\"No Banter...\".Name: "No Banter..."
\"No Banter...\".Text: Until the end of turn, other Captains produce 1 less Influence when they tack to produce Influence (minimum 0).
\"No Banter...\".Flavor Text: Berek held desperately to the scythe's handle. He just needed a few minutes until Bonnie could cut the lines...

\"No Survivors!\".Name: "No Survivors!"
\"No Survivors!\".Text: React: Play instead of performing a Boarding Attack. Tack your Captain to sink all Crew on board the two Ships involved in the Boarding with an Influence cost less than 3.

\"Pack 'em In!\".Name: "Pack 'em In!"
\"Pack 'em In!\".Text: This Crew counts one less toward your Ship's crew maximum (minimum 0).
\"Pack 'em In!\".Flavor Text: "Shut up an' move over! There's room fer ten more of ye in there!"

\"Pincushion\" Paolo.Name: "Pincushion" Paolo
\"Pincushion\" Paolo.Text: Item Crew Attachments being attached to Paolo with the word "Earring" in the title have their skill cost reduced by 4 (minimum 0).

\"Please, Take Your Time!\".Name: "Please, Take Your Time!"
\"Please, Take Your Time!\".Text: You may only play this card if you have a Heroic Captain. Target another player. That player may draw 1 card. Move your Ship to an adjacent Sea.
\"Please, Take Your Time!\".Flavor Text: "If you want to repair my ship, Gosse, the least I can do is let you rob me blind." - Allende

\"Prepare for Boarding!\".Name: "Prepare for Boarding!"
\"Prepare for Boarding!\".Text: React: Play instead of performing a Boarding Attack. For the remainder of the Boarding, all of your Boarding Attacks inflict 1 extra Hit.
\"Prepare for Boarding!\".Flavor Text: "Make fast yur souls, me boys! There be no turnin' back now!"

\"Prepare for the Worst!\".Name: "Prepare for the Worst!"
\"Prepare for the Worst!\".Text: Tack your Captain or one of your Crew with the First Mate trait to play this card. All of your Crew aligned to your Captain's faction gain +1 to their Swashbuckling until the end of the turn.
\"Prepare for the Worst!\".Flavor Text: Gosse turned to his Crew and pointed at the horrors before them. "The Knights understood what the Freighter was doing. Now you understand, as they do, as I do. Never forget it."

\"Ramming Speed!\".Name: "Ramming Speed!"
\"Ramming Speed!\".Text: Target a Ship. Inflict Hits equal to your Ship's Move Cost +4 on that Ship. Then you suffer Hits equal to the opposing Ship's Move Cost +1.
\"Ramming Speed!\".Flavor Text: "Damn the flames, and damn the water. If we're goin' down, we're takin' them with us."

\"Reis\".Name: "Reis"
\"Reis\".Text:
You may not have Riant Gaucher on board.
If you have 3 or more other Crimson Rogers Crew on board this Captain has the following abilities:
Act: Once per turn, sink one of your Crew to give this Captain +3 Influence.
Act: Once per turn, sink one of your Crimson Rogers Crew to target another Ship in this Sea. Target Ship suffers a Cannon Attack equal to the sunk Crew's Cannon skill.

\"Repel Boarders!\".Name: "Repel Boarders!"
\"Repel Boarders!\".Text: React: Play immediately after you suffer hits during a Boarding. Target the other Ship in the Boarding. This Boarding is ended.
\"Repel Boarders!\".Flavor Text: "Here they come!" Allende shouted. As the Montaigne crossed the breach, he could see the General on the far side - smiling at him.

\"Rigger\" Mortis.Name: "Rigger" Mortis
\"Rigger\" Mortis.Text: Act: Sink this Crew to move your Ship to an adjacent Sea.
\"Rigger\" Mortis.Flavor Text: He never moves, save only to bellow a warning. Necros found a perfect job for him.

\"Run 'em Down, Boys!\".Name: "Run 'em Down, Boys!"
\"Run 'em Down, Boys!\".Text:
You may only play this card if you have a Villainous Captain.
React: Play when another player discards a Crew from play to sink that Crew and attach this card to your captain.
React: When paying an influence cost, discard this card to produce 3 Influence if it was attached o your Captain.

\"Scorchmark\" Van Hoffman.Name: "Scorchmark" Van Hoffman
\"Scorchmark\" Van Hoffman.Text: React: Tack "Scorchmark" when he enters play to sink a Ship Attachment in this Sea.

\"She Canna Take It!\".Name: "She Canna Take It!"
\"She Canna Take It!\".Text: Target a Ship. Inflict Hits to the target equal to four times the number of Damage Attachments attached to that Ship.
\"She Canna Take It!\".Flavor Text: "Tell the captain his quarters aren't ready yet."

\"She'll Hold Together\".Name: "She'll Hold Together"
\"She'll Hold Together\".Text: React: Play when you tack your Captain or a Crew with the First Mate trait to absorb Hits. That Crew absorbs an additional amount of Hits equal to the number of Damage Attachments attached to your Ship.
\"She'll Hold Together\".Flavor Text: "'She'll hold together,' he says. 'We got plenty of time ta fix it later,' he says..."

\"She's Coming Apart!\".Name: "She's Coming Apart!"
\"She's Coming Apart!\".Text: Target a Ship. Until the end of the turn, that ship immediatly suffers 1 Hit each time it enters a Sea.
\"She's Coming Apart!\".Flavor Text: The Trade Sea was never the safest of waters and with the Vestenmannavnjar on the prowl, it's grown some nasty teeth.

\"Steel Tooth\" Bob.Name: "Steel Tooth" Bob
\"Steel Tooth\" Bob.Text:
When this Crew tacks to absorb Hits, he absorb 1 extra Hits.
React: When you are suffering Hits during a Boarding that have not come from another's player successful Boarding Attack, tack one of your completed Adventures to suffer 2 fewer Hits. You may only use this ability if this Crew is untacked.

\"Stroke, Stroke…\".Name: "Stroke, Stroke…"
\"Stroke, Stroke…\".Text: Untack one of your Rower Crews.
\"Stroke, Stroke…\".Flavor Text: The whip struck Fitzpatrick's back, earning another defiant grin. Someday Edahgo, he thought, yer gonna eat that lash.

\"Take It Like a Man!\".Name: "Take It Like a Man!"
\"Take It Like a Man!\".Text: React: Play when a player plays an Action card in reaction to suffering Hits. That card is canceled.
\"Take It Like a Man!\".Flavor Text: "Hans once took a volley twice that big and you don't see him crying! Of course, he never was that bright…" - Dupre

\"Take it Like a Man!\".Name: "Take it Like a Man!"
\"Take it Like a Man!\".Text: React: Play when a player plays an Action card in reaction to suffering Hits. That card is canceled.
\"Take it Like a Man!\".Flavor Text: "Hans once took a volley twice that big and you don't see him crying! Of course, he never was that bright…" - Dupre

\"Take No Prisoners!\".Name: "Take No Prisoners!"
\"Take No Prisoners!\".Text:
You must sink one of your Crew when you put Take No Prisoners! into play.
React: Tack Take No Prisoners and one of your Crimson Roger Crew instead of making a Boarding Attack. Target a Crew on the opposing Ship other than their Captain who has a Swashbuckling less than 3. Discard the target Crew.

\"Target Their Powder Room\".Name: "Target Their Powder Room"
\"Target Their Powder Room\".Text: React: Play when tacking a Crew with a Cannon skill greater than 3. That Crew produces 2 extra Cannon.

\"That Hurts!\".Name: "That Hurts!"
\"That Hurts!\".Text: React: Play when you are suffering Hits. Sink one of your Ship Attachments to absorb 5 Hits.
\"That Hurts!\".Flavor Text: "Well, at least our booty's safe. I... It hit where?!" - Blacktooth Bill

\"The Lightbringer is Ours!\".Name: "The Lightbringer is Ours!"
\"The Lightbringer is Ours!\".Text: Any player may sink this Chantey by producing 7  Influence as an Action. All Captains have the following ability: React: Once per turn, discard one of your Crew aligned to your Captain's faction when you are paying an  Influence cost to produce 2  Influence.
\"The Lightbringer is Ours!\".Flavor Text: "Captain?!" Cosette gasped. "You're not letting him TAKE her...?!"

\"There's More Where They Came From\".Name: "There's More Where They Came From"
\"There's More Where They Came From\".Text: React: Play when one of your Captive cards is discarded from your Ship or sunk to immediately put a Captive Crew into play. The Crew's cost is reduced by 3 (minimum 0).
\"There's More Where They Came From\".Flavor Text: "I never tire of hurting you.." - Edahgo

\"Therein Lies the Tale\".Name: "Therein Lies the Tale"
\"Therein Lies the Tale\".Text: React: Attach this card to your Captain when you complete an Adventure which increases Adventuring. This Attachment gives +1 Influence.
\"Therein Lies the Tale\".Flavor Text: "Arg! Ye shoulda seen the big one..."

\"Throw Me the Whip!\".Name: "Throw Me the Whip!"
\"Throw Me the Whip!\".Text: Attach one of your Item or Artifact Crew Attachments in play to a different Crew on board your Ship.

\"To the Cannons!\".Name: "To the Cannons!"
\"To the Cannons!\".Text: Tack your Captain or one of your Crew with the First Mate trait to play this card. All of your Crew aligned to your Captain's faction gain +1 to their Cannon skill until end of the turn.
\"To the Cannons!\".Flavor Text: "Oh no! Ruthless military efficiency..". - Mortimer Snuff

\"Walk the Plank!\".Name: "Walk the Plank!"
\"Walk the Plank!\".Text:
You may not play this card if you have a Heroic Captain.
React: Play when one of your actions is canceled. Discard one of your Crew cards that tacked to pay for the action to attach this card to your Captain. This Attachment gives +2 Influence.
\"Walk the Plank!\".Flavor Text: "My justice is absolute. Betray me and suffer the consequences." - The General

\"Warship to Port!\".Name: "Warship to Port!"
\"Warship to Port!\".Text: Target a Ship. Inflict 4 Hits to that Ship.
\"Warship to Port!\".Flavor Text: Simon the bosun said, "It could be worse." The man was a prophet.

\"We're Doomed!\".Name: "We're Doomed!"
\"We're Doomed!\".Text: React: Tack "We're Doomed!" when a Sea Attachment is inflicting Hits to a Ship. The Attachment inflicts 2 extra Hits.
\"We're Doomed!\".Flavor Text: "I didn't know Leviathans could fly…" - Mortimer Snuff

\"Will Do You No Good!\".Name: "Will Do You No Good!"
\"Will Do You No Good!\".Text: React: Play when a player performs a react. That react is canceled.
\"Will Do You No Good!\".Flavor Text: Not every piece of dracheneisen is proudly displayed. Some serve a far more covert purpose.

\"X\" Almost Marks the Spot.Name: "X" Almost Marks the Spot
\"X\" Almost Marks the Spot.Text: Target another player's non-Artifact Adventure. Move the Adventure to any other Sea.
\"X\" Almost Marks the Spot.Flavor Text: "Find out who took my Cross," Reis whispered. "Or I might get angry..."

\"You Won't be Needin' This!\".Name: "You Won't be Needin' This!"
\"You Won't be Needin' This!\".Text: Take any one Crew Attachment from your sunk pile, and put it on the top of your deck. Sink this card.
\"You Won't be Needin' This!\".Flavor Text: "Don't ya be lookin' at me that way. He ain't gonna be needin' it where he's goin'. Trust me lad, sooner or later, you'll be learnin' there ain't no place for honor on the Seven Seas."

12-Pound Cannon Volley.Name: 12-Pound Cannon Volley
12-Pound Cannon Volley.Text: Target a Ship in this Sea. You inflict a 7 Hit Cannon Attack on that Ship.
12-Pound Cannon Volley.Flavor Text: "Through the cannon's smoke, I saw their marines chanting and cheering our doom, making ready to board us at any moment."

16-Pound Cannon Volley.Name: 16-Pound Cannon Volley
16-Pound Cannon Volley.Text: Target a Ship in this Sea. You inflict an 11 Hit Cannon Attack on that Ship.
16-Pound Cannon Volley.Flavor Text: "Let her go down, lads! Swim for it!"

20-Pound Cannon Volley.Name: 20-Pound Cannon Volley
20-Pound Cannon Volley.Text: Target a Ship in this Sea. You inflict a 15 Hit Cannon Attack on that Ship.
20-Pound Cannon Volley.Flavor Text: The ship listed to starboard and I leapt for my life. "Better to chance the mermaids than burn alive," I thought. I was wrong.

7th Sea Eddy.Name: 7th Sea Eddy
7th Sea Eddy.Text: Target another Ship. Move that Ship to a Sea adjacent to its current Sea. Inflict 1 Hit on that Ship.
7th Sea Eddy.Flavor Text: "It leaks out sometimes - pieces of the 7th Sea. You can't control them, you can only hope to survive them." - Guy McCormick

A Better Offer.Name: A Better Offer
A Better Offer.Text:
Act: Target a Ship. If that Ship has more than one untacked Crew, that player must tack a Crew.
Act: Target another player's Crew in this Sea without any cards attached. If that Crew is not aligned to their Captain's faction, the target Crew is discarded. If the target Crew is not unaligned, than the cancel cost of this card is increased by 4.
A Better Offer.Flavor Text: "The time has finally come to settle old debts." - The Kire

A Blooded Coin.Name: A Blooded Coin
A Blooded Coin.Text: React: Tack this card when you are inflicting 4 or less Hits with a Cannon Attack. The player suffering the Hits may not play any cards in reaction to suffering these Hits.
A Blooded Coin.Flavor Text: Fired by a sniper from the Grâce, the coin allowed the General to penetrate the most heavily-guarded fortress in Théah.

A Coward Among Us.Name: A Coward Among Us
A Coward Among Us.Text:
You may not play this card if you have a Heroic Captain.
React: Play this card instead of conducting a Boarding Attack. Sink one of your untacked Crew, except Captain. Your next Boarding Attack in this Boarding inflicts 4 extra Hits.

A Final Test.Name: A Final Test
A Final Test.Text: React: Play when you are suffering Hits to reduce those Hits to 0. Until the end of the turn, any time you suffer Hits the amount of Hits suffered is increased by 3.
A Final Test.Flavor Text: "Let's finish this, you and I." - "Bloody" Bonnie McGee

A Friend in Need - Foil.Name: A Friend in Need - Foil
A Friend in Need - Foil.Text: React: Play this card when you are absorbing Hits from a Boarding Attack in which you pushed one of your Crew forward. Tack one of your Crew, except the one pushed forward to suffer 4 fewer Hits.
A Friend in Need - Foil.Flavor Text: "Ah, he woulda done the same fer me."

A Gallant Stand.Name: A Gallant Stand
A Gallant Stand.Flavor Text: "I assure you, gentlemen, you are not masters of the blade - no matter what that Ussuran vodka tells you."

A Hearty Individual.Name: A Hearty  Individual
A Hearty Individual.Text: +1 Swashbuckling. This Crew absorbs 2 extra Hits when tacking to absorb Hits.
A Hearty Individual.Flavor Text: Red cocked her head. "So what do you need from me?" "A second Ship," Gosse said "As large and powerful as you can find."

A Hero at Last.Name: A Hero at Last
A Hero at Last.Text: React: Play when one of your Heroic Crew tacks or sinks to absorb Hits. That Crew's Swashbuckling is increased by 2 until the end of the turn.
A Hero at Last.Flavor Text: "Time ta go, Andres me boy... Sorry ye can't come with me." - Mike Fitzpatrick

A Hero's Courage.Name: A Hero's Courage
A Hero's Courage.Text: React: Play when a Heroic Crew with a Swashbuckling greater than 4 tacks to absorb Hits from a Boarding Attack. Reduce the Hits inflicted to zero.
A Hero's Courage.Flavor Text: "Look out, Sir!" he shouted. The shot just missed me, but my first mate wasn't so lucky...

A Killer Revealed.Name: A Killer Revealed
A Killer Revealed.Text: Target another player's Ship with both a Heroic and Villainous Crew on Board. That Ship suffers 7 hits. Target Ship's player may cancel this Action by discarding a Villainous Crew.
A Killer Revealed.Flavor Text: Lyin' John waited until the dead of night to kill Nicole - only to find her ready at last to avenge her husband's murder.

A Little Broadside Help.Name: A Little Broadside Help
A Little Broadside Help.Text: React: Play when you are paying a Cannon cost. Tack one of your Ally cards in this Sea to produce 4 Cannon.
A Little Broadside Help.Flavor Text: "Did you think we were going to leave you behind?" - Cosette to Maggie Malone

A Little Financial Help.Name: A Little Financial Help
A Little Financial Help.Text: React: Play when you are paying an Influence cost. Tack one of your Ally cards in this Sea to produce 4 Influence.
A Little Financial Help.Flavor Text: "Would a thousand golden Senators be sufficient?"

A Little On-Shore Help.Name: A Little On-Shore Help
A Little On-Shore Help.Text: React: Play when you are paying Adventuring. Tack one of your Ally cards in this Sea to produce 4 Adventuring.
A Little On-Shore Help.Flavor Text: "The Corsair woman was here. Before my capture," Faust said. "She showed me a way to get to the basement." "What's in the basement?" Allende asked. Faust smiled. "You'll see."

A Little Sailing Help.Name: A Little Sailing Help
A Little Sailing Help.Text: React: Play when you are paying Sailing. Tack one of your Ally cards in this Sea to produce 4 Sailing.
A Little Sailing Help.Flavor Text: The tears gleamed in Celedoine's eyes as she whispered to the airy sprite. "Take us home to Avalon. Bonnie won't be coming back."

A Pirate's Reputation.Name: A Pirate's Reputation
A Pirate's Reputation.Text: React: Target an opposing player when you are paying the skill cost to put a Control card into play. This card produces skill points equal to the number of Crew cards plus cards with the Ally trait in the target's sunk pile.
A Pirate's Reputation.Flavor Text: A pirate's reputation can make or break him. Just ask Captain Reis

A Sailor's First Skill.Name: A Sailor's First Skill
A Sailor's First Skill.Text: This Crew's Boarding Attacks that finish with a Punch inflict 2 extra Hits.
A Sailor's First Skill.Flavor Text: "Wrap your fingers around a piece of steel, an' you can flatten 'em with one blow. Here, let me show you." - Thomas Metzger

A Sailor's Quarrel.Name: A Sailor's Quarrel
A Sailor's Quarrel.Text: You must tack one of your Crew with Swashbuckling greater than 2 to play this card. Target a Ship in this Sea. You inflict 2 Hits on that Ship.
A Sailor's Quarrel.Flavor Text: "Ya know, Casey, he looked smaller through the spyglass."

A Single Shot.Name: A Single Shot
A Single Shot.Text: You may not play this card if you have a Villainous or Heroic Captain. Discard one of your Attachments which increases Influence to attach this card to your Captain. This card gives +3 Influence and the Heroic Trait.
A Single Shot.Flavor Text: As the shot rang out, Orduño saw the air fill with the General's guilders. "I was mistaken," he said quietly. "He is a man of honor. Turn us around."

A Thousand Fires Alight.Name: A Thousand Fires Alight
A Thousand Fires Alight.Text: Your Captain gains +1 to all skills for each Control card you have in play. This bonus lasts until the end of this turn.
A Thousand Fires Alight.Flavor Text: With Orduño gone, Valoix was free to launch an attack on Gallegos peninsula - the heart of Castille's naval power.

Aaron Blackstone.Name: Aaron Blackstone
Aaron Blackstone.Text: Aaron may only use ships with no faction symbol. While you have three or more unaligned Crew on Board with a printed Influence cost greater than 2, all of your other Crew have +1 Adventuring.
Aaron Blackstone.Flavor Text: The Brotherhood had this stretch to themselves fer far too long.

Across the Mirror.Name: Across the Mirror
Across the Mirror.Flavor Text: "I ain't gonna lie ta ya. It's one long haul across the Mirror, boys. But once we gets to the other side, there's enough gold ta buy ya all crowns and women who will treat ya like kings!"

Adeeb Al-Amid.Name: Adeeb Al-Amid
Adeeb Al-Amid.Text: You must discard 1 card from your hand before Adeeb tacks to produce skill points, unless you have Edhago in play.
Adeeb Al-Amid.Flavor Text: Kheired-Din needed a historian so he enslaved the best he could find.

Advanced Gunnery.Name: Advanced Gunnery
Advanced Gunnery.Text:
A Crew may not have more than one copy of this card attached.
React: Tack this card when this Crew produces 4 or more Cannon to draw 1 card.
Advanced Gunnery.Flavor Text: You light them all at once, they all go off at once. Seems easy, doesn't it?"

Advanced Swordsmanship.Name: Advanced Swordsmanship
Advanced Swordsmanship.Flavor Text: "But two cuts is so boring, Felipe. Wouldn't three be more interesting..." SLASH! "...or four..." SLASH! "...or five..."

Advanced Topmanship.Name: Advanced Topmanship
Advanced Topmanship.Text:
A Crew may not have more than one copy of this card attached.
React: Discard this card when this Crew tacks to pay the Sailing cost to begin a Boarding or pay the Sailing cost of an action that will result in a Boarding. That Action may not be canceled with card effects.
Advanced Topmanship.Flavor Text: "This would be much easier if I had a tail."

Adventuring Galley.Name: Adventuring Galley
Adventuring Galley.Text:
Any player in this Sea may discard this card by producing 3 Swashbuckling or Cannon as an action.
Act: Tack this card to attach it to a Sea adjacent to this Sea.
Act: Tack this card to complete one of your Adventures in this Sea with an Adventuring cost of 3 or less.

Aether Compass.Name: Aether Compass
Aether Compass.Trait: Unique - 2 Seas Away - Artifact - Ship Attachment
Aether Compass.Text: Tack the Aether Compass when paying to discard or put into play a Control card. Aether Compass produces 3 points of the appropriate skill.
Aether Compass.Flavor Text: "At last, I've found the key." - Guy McCormick

Ahmed Khalid.Name: Ahmed Khalid
Ahmed Khalid.Text: React: Discard this Crew after you tack a Crew to produce Sailing to produce an additional 2 Sailing.
Ahmed Khalid.Flavor Text: "Ernesto freed me from that madman's hold. I'll follow him to the ends of Théah."
Ahmed Khalid.Errata: No is discarded after a Crew tacks to produce sailing, not while the Crew is tacking.
Ahmed Khalid.Changes on MRP: Trait modified;Text modified;Flavor text modified;Artist modified;

Aimon Riché du Pourisse.Name: Aimon Riché du Pourisse
Aimon Riché du Pourisse.Text: When Aimon tacks to absorb Hits, she absorbs 2 extra Hits, except during Boarding.
Aimon Riché du Pourisse.Flavor Text: "She's too small, mon General," the bosun explained. "Small and fast," the General nodded. "And that is exactly what we need to catch the Avalon dog."

Aindriu McKenna.Name: Aindriu McKenna
Aindriu McKenna.Text: If you have a Topman on board this Crew has +1 Cannon. This Crew may be chosen as a Starting Crew if you have a Rose and Cross Captain. If your Ship has a crew maximum less than 9, this Crew's Influence cost is reduced by 2 when you are choosing your Starting Crew.

Al-Katim.Name: Al-Katim
Al-Katim.Flavor Text: "I'll kill whoever you want, Captain. Just keep that monster away from me."

Aldana School.Name: Aldana School
Aldana School.Text: React: Tack Aldana School immediately before this Crew plays a card during a Boarding Attack. Draw three cards. Place one of these cards in your hand, then discard the others.
Aldana School.Flavor Text: "Don't join the dance until you know the song by heart."

Aldaron the Dark.Name: Aldaron the Dark
Aldaron the Dark.Text: React: When another player is about to play a Boarding Attack card to begin a Duel with one of your other Crew, you may replace the target Crew with this Crew in the Duel. You may use this ability only when this Crew is untacked, and only once per turn.
Aldaron the Dark.Flavor Text: "The Explorers must be protected from themselves."

Alec Mercer.Name: Alec Mercer
Alec Mercer.Text: This Crew is considered to have a Face Attachment. When this Crew is performing a Cannon Attack targeting a ship with more Crew than its printed Crew Maximum, the Cannon Attack inflicts 4 extra Hits.
Alec Mercer.Flavor Text: He's not as charming as some, but he has his own means of persuasion.

Aleen Van Ostrand.Name: Aleen Van Ostrand
Aleen Van Ostrand.Text: Attachment cards with the Item trait being attached to Aleen have their skill cost reduced by 2 (minimum 0).
Aleen Van Ostrand.Flavor Text: "The Vendel work hard, and because we succeed, our countrymen despise us. We're not greedy; we don't live for money. We simply believe that effort should be rewarded."

Alesio.Name: Alesio
Alesio.Text: Act: Tack to move one of your Sea Attachments to a Sea adjacent to its current location.
Alesio.Flavor Text: "They says a Fate Witch can smell a destined man a hundred miles away. Why else does ya think she stays so close to the Cap'n?"

Alesio's Fate.Name: Alesio's Fate
Alesio's Fate.Text: Act: Tack Alesio's Fate to target a Crew with more than 2 attachments. That Ship suffers 1 Hit for each Knack attached to the target Crew.
Alesio's Fate.Flavor Text: "You defied destiny's plan, you impudent girl. Now your precious captain will pay the price…"

Alesio's Sacrifice.Name: Alesio's Sacrifice
Alesio's Sacrifice.Text: React: Tack Alesio's Sacrifice after one of your Crew with an Influence cost greater than 3 is sunk. Place the Crew in your discard pile.
Alesio's Sacrifice.Flavor Text: The sky above was full of unknown stars. The water around the island was liquid silver. "Where am I?" she called, but in her heart she knew the answer.

Aleski Novgorov.Name: Aleski Novgorov
Aleski Novgorov.Text: Act: Once per turn discard a Pyeryem Knack attached to this Crew to search your deck for a Pyeryem 1 Knack that this Crew can attach. Attach that Knack to this Crew and shuffle your deck.
Aleski Novgorov.Flavor Text: “I know loyalties can be purchased, but for such a meager price?” - Julius Caligari

Alicia Soldano de Granjero.Name: Alicia Soldano de Granjero
Alicia Soldano de Granjero.Text: React: Tack when entering a Boarding. This Crew may use the following Ability until the end of the Boarding: React: Discard a card from your hand when you are tacking a Crew to absorb Hits to have that Crew absorbs 2 extra Hits. You may only use this ability once per tacking Crew.
Alicia Soldano de Granjero.Flavor Text: "Where is he, Margaretta? Where is my husband?"

Alison Fairlight.Name: Alison Fairlight
Alison Fairlight.Text: If this Crew has a number of attached Scry Knacks equal to or greater than her Influence, she may not attach further Scry Knacks.
Alison Fairlight.Flavor Text: "She steers the ship that way, perched atop the tiller. I don't know how she does it, but it gives the Captain the willies."

Alister McGurk.Name: Alister McGurk
Alister McGurk.Text: React: Tack Alister when you are paying the Sailing cost to begin a Boarding. Alister produces Sailing equal to your Ship's move cost.
Alister McGurk.Flavor Text: "McGurk! McGurk! It's Highland, ye wine-slurpin' chum monkey!"
Alister McGurk.Errata: Ability should read: "… to attempt a Boarding …" (ed: Can still be cancelled by paying your SMC).

Alix Brower.Name: Alix Brower
Alix Brower.Text: Discard Alix at the end of the Action phase if she is untacked.
Alix Brower.Flavor Text: "Strong-willed and easily bored, she does things her own way, or not at all." - Espera

All For One!.Name: All For One!
All For One!.Text: React: Play when you are suffering Hits during a Boarding Attack. Tack one of your Heroic Crew to absorb Hits equal to twice his or her Swashbuckling.
All For One!.Flavor Text: "I'd like to introduce you to a little friend of mine…"

Allende.Name: Allende
Allende.Text: While you have 3 or more other Brotherhood Crew on your Ship, you are always considered to be in the Sea with the lower completion cost when completing an Adventure.
Allende.Flavor Text: "Leadership is simply a glorified form of stubbornness. When you learn to endure the gravest misfortune, then you will know what it means to lead."
Allende.Errata: Secret society added. Flavor text modified

Allende - Foil.Name: Allende - Foil
Allende - Foil.Text: While you have three or more other Brotherhood Crew on your Ship, you are always considered to be in the Sea with the lower completion cost when completing an Adventure.
Allende - Foil.Flavor Text: "Just don't call him 'the Pirate King' and you'll get along just fine on this ship, lad."

Allende's Folly.Name: Allende's Folly
Allende's Folly.Text:
Act: Target a Ship in this Sea with a tacked Brotherhood Captain on Board. Inflict 4 Hits on that Ship.
Act: Tack one of your Crew to draw 1 card from your Deck.
Allende's Folly.Flavor Text: Chained in a tower on Caligari's Island, the former Pirate King now suffers the torments of the damned. It is only a matter of time before he breaks.

Allende's Rescue.Name: Allende's Rescue
Allende's Rescue.Text: React: Play when you are entering a Boarding. Tack one of your Crew aligned to your Captain's faction to untack your Captain if your Captain has the Heroic trait.
Allende's Rescue.Flavor Text: "The guards are coming!" Delaina cried as the chains shattered. Berek looked at Allende. "Do you know another way out of here?" "Na." The Pirate King pointed at the scarred man manacles to the far wall. "But he does."

Allied Warship.Name: Allied Warship
Allied Warship.Text:
Any player in this Sea may discard this card by producing 5 Swashbuckling or Cannon as an action.
Act: Tack this card to attach it to a Sea adjacent to this Sea.
Act: Tack this card and target an Ally or Prize card in this Sea. Sink that card.
Allied Warship.Flavor Text: "We need the General back here. Now."

Almost Missed.Name: Almost Missed
Almost Missed.Text: React: Play after you have resolved a Cannon Attack performed by one of your Gunner Crew. Target the Ship that was originally targeted by the attack and begin a Boarding with that Ship. This Boarding may not be canceled in any way. This Boarding ends after 4 rounds. You may play only one Almost Missed in reaction to a single Cannon Attack.
Almost Missed.Flavor Text: "The bad news is, we missed the masthead. The good news is, we hit the powder room."

Ambrogia School.Name: Ambrogia School
Ambrogia School.Text: React: Tack Ambrogia School to draw a card after this Crew plays a Boarding Attack.
Ambrogia School.Flavor Text: "In Montaigne, it's fiendish and dishonorable. Here, it's just business as usual."

Ambroise Praisse du Richetoisse.Name: Ambroise Praisse du Richetoisse
Ambroise Praisse du Richetoisse.Text: Ambroise has -1 Cannon for every Porté card you attach to him. You may not attach a Porté card to Ambroise if his Cannon is less than 1.
Ambroise Praisse du Richetoisse.Flavor Text: "He pulls a dozen men through at once. That can't be safe." - Gerard Rois et Reines

Ambush - Foil.Name: Ambush - Foil
Ambush - Foil.Text: React: Play when a Ship uses its Free Move to enter your Sea. Inflicts 2 Hits on the Ship.

Ambush Boarding.Name: Ambush Boarding
Ambush Boarding.Text: Target an opposing Ship in this Sea. Your Ship begins Boarding that Ship. This Boarding cannot be canceled without a card effect.
Ambush Boarding.Flavor Text: For some reason, the lookout ne'er saw 'em comin'. Don' ask me how they did it - them Avalons are tricky bastards.

Ambush From the Shadows.Name: Ambush From the Shadows
Ambush From the Shadows.Text: React: After you inflict Hits 4 or more Hits on another player's Ship in this Sea (but before that player begins suffering Hits), sink this card to discard 2 random cards from that player's hand.
Ambush From the Shadows.Flavor Text: Die Kreuzritter is always watching. No one escape their justice for long.

Amiral Alazais Valoix-Praisse III.Name: Amiral Alazais Valoix-Praisse III
Amiral Alazais Valoix-Praisse III.Text: React: Tack or sink one of your Ally cards in this Sea when you are absorbing Hits, except during Boarding. You suffer 3 fewer Hits if you have 3 or more other Montaigne Crew on board.
Amiral Alazais Valoix-Praisse III.Flavor Text: "I serve l'Empereur's pleasure. And right now, his pleasure is to destroy Castille."
Amiral Alazais Valoix-Praisse III.Errata: Now requires 3 Montaigne Crew to use his ability. Flavor text modified.

Amiral Alazais Valoix-Praisse III - Foil.Name: Amiral Alazais Valoix-Praisse III - Foil
Amiral Alazais Valoix-Praisse III - Foil.Text: React: Tack and/or sink one of your Allies in this Sea when you are absorbing Hits, except during Boarding. You suffer 3 fewer Hits.

Ancient Maps.Name: Ancient Maps
Ancient Maps.Trait: Unique - 3 Seas Away - Artifact - Captain Attachment
Ancient Maps.Text: Act: Tack the Maps to draw a card.
Ancient Maps.Flavor Text: "These maps are everything I could've hoped for and more. They tell me where to look for the keys to the Three Tests..." - Javier de Bejarano

Ancient Training Techniques.Name: Ancient Training Techniques
Ancient Training Techniques.Text: +2 Swashbuckling. This Crew inflicts 3 extra Hits during Boarding Attacks.
Ancient Training Techniques.Flavor Text: "We wait until the fight's over. The ones left alive - consider them trained." - The General

Andare de Castillo.Name: Andare de Castillo
Andare de Castillo.Text: Andare has +2 Influence and +1 Swashbuckling while you have one or more cards in play with the Oath trait.
Andare de Castillo.Flavor Text: "One final time, O Theus - guide my sword to keep San Cristobal Safe."

Andre Braudel.Name: Andre Braudel
Andre Braudel.Trait: Unique - Loyal - Heroic - First Mate - Swordsman +1
Andre Braudel.Text: React: When your Ship is suffering 7 or more Hits from a single action, reduce the Hits you are suffering by 4. You may only use this ability once each time you suffer Hits.
Andre Braudel.Flavor Text: "Just stay calm. Here's what we're gonna do…"

Andre Braudel - Exp..Name: Andre Braudel - Exp.
Andre Braudel - Exp..Trait: Experienced - Unique - First Mate - Heroic - Loyal - Swordsman +2
Andre Braudel - Exp..Text: Act: Tack Andre to suffer 2 fewer Hits from all cannon attacks (minimum 0) until the end of the turn.
Andre Braudel - Exp..Flavor Text: "Gosse doesn't want so many cannons showing on the Toro - so he asked me to dump them."

Andrei Levovich.Name: Andrei Levovich
Andrei Levovich.Text: React: Untack Andrei after another Ship begins a Boarding against your Ship and you do not cancel it.
Andrei Levovich.Flavor Text: Don't be talkin' about Matushka in the Mirror, boy. Andrei did. He was an Ussuran once. Now, we don't know what he is.

Andrei Levovich - Exp..Name: Andrei Levovich - Exp.
Andrei Levovich - Exp..Text: React: Once per turn, untack Andrei after you suffer and absorbed all of the Hits from a Cannon Attack.
Andrei Levovich - Exp..Flavor Text: "He tore it apart with his bare hands. While it was swallowing him." - Julius Caligari

Andres Donovich.Name: Andres Donovich
Andres Donovich.Text: Andres gains +1 to all of his skills for every Face, Eye, Hand, or Leg card currently attached to your Captain.
Andres Donovich.Flavor Text: "Kheired-Din is a messiah, here to usher in the New Age. I would die to see with his vision."

Andrew Littlejohn.Name: Andrew Littlejohn
Andrew Littlejohn.Text: When Andrew tacks to absorb Hits, he absorbs 2 extra Hits, except during Boarding.

Angelina Aldonez.Name: Angelina Aldonez
Angelina Aldonez.Text: If your Ship’s move cost is greater than 3, this Crew gains +1 Sailing and -2 Cannon (min 0). If your Ship’s move cost is less than 3, this Crew gains -1 to Sailing and Adventuring (min 0) and +1 Cannon.
Angelina Aldonez.Flavor Text: She was ready for anything. But when she found herself assigned to the Inquisition, she wondered what anything would be.

Angus McCloud.Name: Angus McCloud
Angus McCloud.Text: Angus' Boarding attacks inflict 3 extra Hits when the Ship opposing yours in the Boarding has a Villainous Captain.
Angus McCloud.Flavor Text: "McGee calls him 'Cousin Angus'. Then again, every Highlander I meet calls him Cousin Angus. Small island, I guess." - Lyin' John Fox

Angus McCloud - Exp..Name: Angus McCloud - Exp.
Angus McCloud - Exp..Text: React: Tack one of you Crew to untack Angus when your ship enters a Boarding that is not canceled. Angus may perform this reaction once per turn.
Angus McCloud - Exp..Flavor Text: "Actually, it's spelled McLe... ahh, never mind!"

Annie Rush.Name: Annie Rush
Annie Rush.Flavor Text: "Ex-barmaids like Annie are tougher than most sailors. Ever try cutting off a drunken Inishman?" - "Long Tall" Harry

Anointed by Theus.Name: Anointed by Theus
Anointed by Theus.Text: React: Tack this Crew when you are paying a cancel cost to reduce the cost by this Crew's  Influence cost (minimum 0).
Anointed by Theus.Flavor Text: "My Crew is sundered," Kheired-Din prayed, "and  I cannot proceed with so few remaining. What shall I do, O prophet?" Silence followed, then suddenly his eyes widened with understanding. "Yes... the Lightbringer..."

Another Betrayal.Name: Another Betrayal
Another Betrayal.Text: Act: Tack one of your Heroic Crew to target and inflict 4 Hits on a Ship in this Sea. The cancel cost of this card may not be paid if the target Ship has a Villainous Crew on board.
Another Betrayal.Flavor Text: "Where is she? What happened to her?" "Through that door," Mumblety-Peg gestured, "and all your questions will be answered."

Antonio Aldonez.Name: Antonio Aldonez
Antonio Aldonez.Flavor Text: "Really, Babette. I never met a woman so intent on looking at my face!"

Antonio Aldonez - Exp..Name: Antonio Aldonez - Exp.
Antonio Aldonez - Exp..Trait: Experienced - Unique - Loyal - First Mate - Heroic - Swordsman +1
Antonio Aldonez - Exp..Text: Act: Once per turn, discard a card from your hand to target another Ship in this Sea and begin a Boarding with that Ship. This Boarding may not be canceled (even with card effects). This Boarding ends after 3 rounds.

Archæologists.Name: Archæologists
Archæologists.Flavor Text: "Charles, Madeline, pay attention this time. We don't want another fiasco like that last one. It's a good thing for you two that Martin is so short, or we'd have been carrying him home in two parts."

Arciniega's Cordial.Name: Arciniega's Cordial
Arciniega's Cordial.Text:
You must have 2 or more untacked Invisible College Crew to attach this card.
Act: Tack this card to activate this ability. Until the end of the turn, this Crew inflicts 4 extra Hits during Boarding Attacks. Discard this card at the end of the turn.
React: Discard this card instead of performing a Boarding attack to target one of your Crew. Until the end of the turn, that Crew gains +2 Swashbuckling.

Arisent.Name: Arisent
Arisent.Trait: Frothing Sea Attachment - Unique - Control - Port
Arisent.Text: You must be in the Frothing Sea to play this card. Any player in the Frothing Sea may discard this card by tacking one of their Crew with Swashbuckling greater than 6 as an action. When you are in an adjacent Sea, and tacking to pay for a Control card, your Captain produces 3 extra skill points.
Arisent.Flavor Text: The heart of Montaigne's war against Castille.

Armed Brig.Name: Armed Brig
Armed Brig.Text:
Any player in this Sea may discard this card by paying 5 Swashbuckling or Cannon as an action.
Act: Tack this card to attach it to an adjacent Sea.
Act: Tack this card and target a Ship in this Sea to inflict a 4 Hit Cannon Attack on the target Ship.
Armed Brig.Flavor Text: The Montaigne navy emphasizes fast ships and quick strikes - devastatingly effective to those unprepared.

Armed Frigate.Name: Armed Frigate
Armed Frigate.Text:
Any player in this Sea may discard this card by paying 7 Swashbuckling or Cannon as an action.
Act: Tack this card to attach it to an adjacent Sea.
Act: Tack this card and target a Ship in this Sea to inflict a 5 Hit Cannon Attack on the target Ship.
Armed Frigate.Flavor Text: The Castillian Armada has lost its leader - but it still carries a fearsome punch.

Armed Sloop.Name: Armed Sloop
Armed Sloop.Text:
Any player in this Sea may discard this card by paying 3 Swashbuckling or Cannon as an action.
Act: Tack this card to attach it to an adjacent Sea.
Act: Tack this card to attach it to an adjacent Sea. Target a Ship in this Sea. Inflict a 3 Hit Cannon Attack on the target Ship.
Armed Sloop.Flavor Text: The Vendel Merchant Marines have found ways to hide their cannon. You never know the pigeon has fangs until you're right on top of it.

Arnlaug Rijs Bragison.Name: Arnlaug Rijs Bragison
Arnlaug Rijs Bragison.Text: React: Tack Arnlaug instead of performing a Boarding Attack. Discard the top card of your deck. If the Boarding Attack on the discard is a Thrust or Dagger, Arnlaug inflicts 3 Hits on the other Ship in the Boarding.

Artifact Cannon.Name: Artifact Cannon
Artifact Cannon.Trait: Unique - 3 Seas Away - Corsairs Ship Attachment - Artifact
Artifact Cannon.Text: Act: Tack this card and discard any number of cards from your hand to target another Ship in this Sea. You inflict a Cannon Attack on that Ship with Hits equal to twice the number of cards discarded.

Artifact Leg.Name: Artifact Leg
Artifact Leg.Text: React: Play when you suffer Hits. You suffer 2 fewer Hits, and this card attaches to your Captain. This Attachment has the Leg trait, and gives a +1 Influence. A Crew may not have more than one Leg Attachment.
Artifact Leg.Flavor Text: A wee bit higher, and I'd've lost something really valuable. Me money purse! Haarr haarr haarr!

Arturo Rodriguez.Name: Arturo Rodriguez
Arturo Rodriguez.Flavor Text: "Three shares? That's a lot of Guilders, Captain. Unfortunately for you, Guilders are not what I am interested in."

Asprey.Name: Asprey
Asprey.Text: React: Discard Asprey instead of performing a Boarding Attack. Inflict 3 Hits to the other Ship in the Boarding.
Asprey.Flavor Text: "Huh? Wh-what? What in the Creator's name... Arrggh! Get it off! Get it off!" Chimey always had that kind of effect on people.

At the Ready.Name: At the Ready
At the Ready.Text:
The other Ship in the Boarding may pay the cancel cost of this card.
React: Play when you are entering a Boarding. Untack one of your Ship or Crew Attachments.
At the Ready.Flavor Text: "Vigilance is the only certain path to success." - Kheired-Din

Augusto de Augustin.Name: Augusto de Augustin
Augusto de Augustin.Text: You may draw two cards immediately before Augusto starts a Boarding Attack.

Augusto Rodriguez.Name: Augusto Rodriguez
Augusto Rodriguez.Text: Any player in this Sea may sink Augusto by tacking 3 Swashbuckling as an action. The Influence costs of Crew Attachments you are putting into play are decreased by 2 while you are in this Sea.
Augusto Rodriguez.Flavor Text: "If you need it, he has it. Of course, the price fluctuates according to your need..." - J. Berek

Avalon Noble.Name: Avalon Noble
Avalon Noble.Flavor Text: "I need you to take this to the Empereur of Montaigne, and the Queen mustn't hear one word of it."

Avoid Fate.Name: Avoid Fate
Avoid Fate.Text: React: Tack Avoid Fate when suffering Hits. The number of Hits you are suffering is reduced by this Crew´s Fate.
Avoid Fate.Flavor Text: "Guess a kiss goodbye from Mom wasn´t such a bad idea" - Pasquale Villachonze

Awaiting the Signal.Name: Awaiting the Signal
Awaiting the Signal.Text:
You may only play this card if your Ship's Move Cost is currently less than its printed Move Cost.
React: Play this card before performing an action to move to an adjacent Sea.
Awaiting the Signal.Flavor Text: Orduño Watched as the Grace approached. "They are honorable foes," he muttered. " How can their captain betray them like this?"

Away Boarders!.Name: Away Boarders!
Away Boarders!.Text: React: Play immediately after you have completed a Boarding Attack. You may immediately conduct an additional Boarding Attack.
Away Boarders!.Flavor Text: "Now, me boys! Now! The time'll ne'er be better!"

Babette.Name: Babette
Babette.Text: When Babette's opponent in a Boarding Attack plays the final Boarding Attack card, she is sunk but all of the Hits are absorbed.
Babette.Flavor Text: "I'm going to cut that pretty face of yours right off your skull, Antonio."

Babette - Exp..Name: Babette - Exp.
Babette - Exp..Text: When Babette's opponent in a Boarding Attack plays the final Boarding Attack card, tack Babette to reduce the Hits inflicted by the Boarding Attack to 0.
Babette - Exp..Flavor Text: She's not all lace and frills anymore...

Back Alley Rum.Name: Back Alley Rum
Back Alley Rum.Trait: 2 Seas Away - Illegal - Goods - Crew Attachment
Back Alley Rum.Flavor Text: "Aye, it's a good vintage, me boys. Best rum I ever... that's not a rat tail in there, is it?"

Back It Up.Name: Back It Up
Back It Up.Text: React: Play when a player produces skill points (other than absorbing Hits) without tacking a Crew. That player suffers 3 Hits.
Back It Up.Flavor Text: "They only work when they have bullets in them." - Cosette

Backs to the Wall.Name: Backs to the Wall
Backs to the Wall.Text: React: Play immediately before the other player in a Boarding pushes a crew forward. If all of your Crew are tacked, the other player may choose to either end the Boarding, or allow you to untack 2 of your Crew of your choosing.
Backs to the Wall.Flavor Text: "Which one of you gets to meet Theus with me?"

Bad Luck.Name: Bad Luck
Bad Luck.Text: React: Play this card immediatly after you pay a cancel cost. Target the Ship controlled by the player who attempted the action. Inflict 1 Hit on that Ship. Only one Bad Luck may be played per action.
Bad Luck.Flavor Text: "The Captain and I had a drawing, Mr. Smitts. You won..." BLAM!

Bad Maps.Name: Bad Maps
Bad Maps.Text: React: Play when a player tacks a Crew to produce Adventuring. That Crew produces no Adventuring. That Crew's controller may pay 2 Sailing to prevent this effect.
Bad Maps.Flavor Text: After the third hole with no sign of the treasure Reis buried him alive with his own shovel.

Bad Powder.Name: Bad Powder
Bad Powder.Text: React: Play when a player tacks a Crew to produce Cannon. That Crew produces no Cannon. That Crew's controller may pay 2 Adventuring to prevent this effect.
Bad Powder.Flavor Text: As he stared at the ruined kegs, the Captain could only think of Simon the bosun's earlier words. "I hope the powder will be safe in this storm."

Bad Surgeon.Name: Bad Surgeon
Bad Surgeon.Text: You must discard one of your Ship or Captain Attachments to put this card into play. Any player in this Sea may, as an action, pay 3 Influence to discard Bad Surgeon. Crew on this ship absorb 1 less Hit (minimum 1) when tacking to absorb Hits.

Bad Weather.Name: Bad Weather
Bad Weather.Text: Any player may sink this Chantey by paying 6 Sailing as an Action. All Ship's Move Costs are increased by 2.
Bad Weather.Flavor Text: "Stow the sails, boys! That storm'll tear 'em ta shreds."

Barcino Fortress.Name: Barcino Fortress
Barcino Fortress.Cost: 6 Adv.; 2 in Frothing Sea and you have The River in play
Barcino Fortress.Flavor Text: "Orduño has broken our blockade, but we still hold the River... and we intend to keep it." - Amiral Valoix-Praisse

Bardo Murillo.Name: Bardo Murillo
Bardo Murillo.Text: React: Tack Bardo instead of performing a Boarding Attack to tack a non-Captain Crew on the other Ship.
Bardo Murillo.Flavor Text: "The mancatcher is painful, but considerably more humane. I have yet to lose a single opponent to its embrace."

Barnacle Pete.Name: Barnacle Pete
Barnacle Pete.Text: When you are paying the cost to put a Control cards into play, Pete has +2 to all of his skills.
Barnacle Pete.Flavor Text: "His mother called him 'The Thing That Should Not Be.' That explains a lot" - Bonnie McGee

Barnacles.Name: Barnacles
Barnacles.Text: Other players may not use the Free Move ability listed on their Ship cards for the remainder of the turn.
Barnacles.Flavor Text: "The big one looks like me wife..."

Barracuda.Name: Barracuda
Barracuda.Text: Any player may pay the cancel cost of this action. Target a Sea when you play this card. Until the end of the turn, each time a Crew in the target Sea tacks to absorb Hits, discard the top card of your deck. If the Boarding Attack on the discard is a Club, sink that Crew
Barracuda.Flavor Text: "You know, they can strip a cow in two minutes..." "Great! You don't happen to have one, do you?"

Barrels of Beer.Name: Barrels of Beer
Barrels of Beer.Trait: 1 Sea Away - Goods Adventure - Crew Attachment
Barrels of Beer.Flavor Text: "Yes, Sir. I was just gettin' to that, Sir."

Basic Swordsmanship.Name: Basic Swordsmanship
Basic Swordsmanship.Text: This card may not be attached to a Crew which has the Swordsman trait. This Crew gains the Swordsman +1 trait.
Basic Swordsmanship.Flavor Text: "Cut two this way and I'll let you use a real sword." - Felipe Jose de Granjero

Basil “Backlash” Hawkins.Name: Basil “Backlash” Hawkins
Basil “Backlash” Hawkins.Text: This Crew inflicts 2 hits on your Ship when he tacks to perform a Cannon Attack (suffer these hits before the Cannon hits are dealt).
Basil “Backlash” Hawkins.Flavor Text: “Trust me, you gotta watch them Villains... they’ll stab you in the back at the first opportunity...” - Duncan Bachenstein, Eisen Swordmaster

Battle for La Bucca.Name: Battle for La Bucca
Battle for La Bucca.Cost: Sink two of your untacked Crew
Battle for La Bucca.Text:
You must sink two of your untacked Crew to put this card into play, and may only play this card while your ship is in La Boca. Any player in this Sea may discard this card by sinking three of their untacked Crew as an Action. 
While in this Sea, Captains and Crew that share a Nation, Secret Society or Faction symbol with their Captain inflict one extra hit with Boarding Attacks and Cannon Attacks.
Battle for La Bucca.Flavor Text: “The Corsairs streamed onto the docks, led by their massive leader...” - Dana the Scribe, Tales of Theah
Battle for La Bucca.Errata: Flavor Text added from set spoilers sheet

Battle of San Felipe.Name: Battle of San Felipe
Battle of San Felipe.Flavor Text: Everyone thought Admiral Valoix would try to reestablish the Montaigne blockade. No one imagined he would strike at free Castille - no one except Orduño.

Becalmed.Name: Becalmed
Becalmed.Text: Target another Ship. That Ship may not move until after that player has passed as an action. You may immediately perform another action.
Becalmed.Flavor Text: The sun burned down on the immobile ship, as if to sear them into the deck.

Belaying Pin.Name: Belaying Pin
Belaying Pin.Text: This Crew's Boarding Attacks that finish with a Club inflict 2 extra Hits.
Belaying Pin.Flavor Text: "They never complain when I hit 'em, but they bellow like walruses when they wake up." - Bonnie McGee

Belinda Thackuray.Name: Belinda Thackuray
Belinda Thackuray.Text: This Crew may not attach Glamour Knacks while tacked.
Belinda Thackuray.Flavor Text: "Even the greatest sorcerers can have an off day."

Belit.Name: Belit
Belit.Text: React: Tack Belit instead of performing a Boarding Attack. Inflict 2 Hits on the other Ship in the Boarding.
Belit.Flavor Text: "She's really quite harmless. Except when she's not." - Melinda Gosse

Belladonna.Name: Belladonna
Belladonna.Text: This Crew may not attach Scry Knacks while tacked.
Belladonna.Flavor Text: “My thanks for the timely rescue. That fire was ruining my shoes.”

Below the Waterline.Name: Below the Waterline
Below the Waterline.Text: React: Play when you produce more than 3 Cannon for a Cannon Attack. The Ship targeted by the cannon attack has its move cost increased by 1 until the end of the turn.

Benjamen the Quick.Name: Benjamen the Quick
Benjamen the Quick.Text:
Your cost to complete Illegal Adventures is reduced by 1 (min 0) while this Crew is in play.
Any other player may discard this Crew by paying 6 Influence as an Action.
Benjamen the Quick.Flavor Text: “Benjamen the Scurvy Rat-Faced Traitor didn’t have quite the same ring to it.”

Benny Gimble.Name: Benny Gimble
Benny Gimble.Text: This Crew's Influence and Swashbuckling may not be increased. While this Crew is untacked, you suffer 1 fewer Hit from each Boarding Attack during a Boarding (minimum 0).
Benny Gimble.Flavor Text: "I heard his mother was a Sidhe," Harry whispered, "an' that he's got a donkey's tail hidden in his trousers."

Benny Gimble - Exp..Name: Benny Gimble - Exp.
Benny Gimble - Exp..Text: React: Discard an Attachment attached to Benny when you are suffering Hits to reduce the Hits suffered by 2.

Benoit \"The Buccaneer\" Racine.Name: Benoit "The Buccaneer" Racine
Benoit \"The Buccaneer\" Racine.Text:
The title of this card is "Buccaneer" for Experienced purposes.
React: Discard one of your Crew cards with the title "Buccaneer" when you are producing Adventuring to produce 3 Adventuring.
Benoit \"The Buccaneer\" Racine.Flavor Text: "Actually, I've never done any pirating in my life. Not until the Brotherhood found me."

Berek.Name: Berek
Berek.Text: When you are drawing cards at the end of the turn, you may draw an additional card if you have three or more other Sea Dog Crew on your Ship and none of your Crew were sunk this turn.
Berek.Flavor Text: "Never been done, eh? We'll have to see about that."

Berek - Foil.Name: Berek - Foil
Berek - Foil.Text: When you are drawing cards at the end of the turn, you may draw an additional card if you have three or more other Sea Dog Crew on your Ship and none of your Crew were sunk this turn.
Berek - Foil.Flavor Text: "Never been done, eh? We'll have to see about that."

Berek's Already Done That.Name: Berek's Already Done That
Berek's Already Done That.Text: Target and discard one non-Artifact Adventure that hasn't been completed. This card's cost is reduced by 2 if you have a Sea Dog Captain.
Berek's Already Done That.Flavor Text: "Aye, he seduced the Queen of the Sidhe too. An' if ye believe that, I'll tell ye another…" - Bonnie McGee

Berek's Pistols.Name: Berek's Pistols
Berek's Pistols.Trait: Brotherhood Captain Attachment - Unique - Signature Item
Berek's Pistols.Text:
Act: Sink this card to untack your Captain.
Act: Tack this card to target one of your other Brotherhood Crew to give that Crew +2 to all of that Crew's skills that are greater than 1.
React: Tack this card when you are paying an Adventuring cost for an action to play, discard or sink a Control card to give your Captain +4 Adventuring until after the action.

Berek’s Boys.Name: Berek’s Boys
Berek’s Boys.Text: This Crew gains +1 Swashbuckling during a boarding if Berek is your Captain.

Berserker School.Name: Berserker School
Berserker School.Text: A Crew may not have more than one copy of this card attached. +1 Swashbuckling. If a Crew is not pushed forward to fight this Crew when this Crew starts a Boarding Attack, this Crew inflicts 4 extra Hits.
Berserker School.Flavor Text: No one's gotten close enough to ask him its name.

Berserkers.Name: Berserkers
Berserkers.Text: React: Tack and sink the Berserkers instead of performing a Boarding Attack. If you are the Attacker, the Defender suffers 4 Hits.
Berserkers.Flavor Text: For some reason. Ernesto did not trust them enough to free them during his escape.

Best Served Cold....Name: Best Served Cold...
Best Served Cold....Text: React: Play before you push a Crew forward for a Boarding Attack. Get a Crew from your sunk pile and push that Crew forward, untacked. If not already sunk, sink this Crew when the Boarding ends.

Bethesda Quinn.Name: Bethesda Quinn
Bethesda Quinn.Text: Bethesda does not tack after conducting a Boarding Attack where a Crew with an Influence cost less than 3 was sunk.
Bethesda Quinn.Flavor Text: "The more they ogle, the easier it is to cut them to pieces."

Betrayal.Name: Betrayal
Betrayal.Text: React: Play when you suffer Hits. Redirect those Hits to any other Ship of your choice.
Betrayal.Flavor Text: Not all betrayals are planned. Some are just convenient.

Betrayal - Foil.Name: Betrayal - Foil
Betrayal - Foil.Text: React: Target a Ship when you suffer Hits Redirect those Hits to the target Ship.
Betrayal - Foil.Flavor Text: Not all betrayals are planned. Some are just convenient.

Better Off Chum.Name: Better Off Chum
Better Off Chum.Text: Act: Target a Ship in this Sea to inflict a 7 Hit Cannon Attack on that Ship. The target may cancel this attack by sinking one of their Crew.
Better Off Chum.Flavor Text: Ships sink, navies rise and fall. In the end, only the sharks endure.

Between Heaven and Earth.Name: Between Heaven and Earth
Between Heaven and Earth.Text: This Crew counts one less against your Crew Maximum.
Between Heaven and Earth.Flavor Text: "Send me up a bottle o' wine, an' I'd call this paradise."

Big Target.Name: Big Target
Big Target.Text: React: Play when you are tacking a Crew to produce Cannon for a Cannon Attack. If the Ship targeted by the Cannon Attack has a crew maximum greater than 9, then your Crew produces 3 extra Cannon.
Big Target.Flavor Text: "Gosh, I don't know... the big one, I guess."

Billy \"Bilge Rat\" Bones.Name: Billy "Bilge Rat" Bones
Billy \"Bilge Rat\" Bones.Text: Billy does not count toward your crew maximum. Sink all Billy Bones cards attached to your Ship when this card enters play. You may put this card into play at no cost if you have one or more Billy Bones cards attached to your ship.

Billy Bones.Name: Billy Bones
Billy Bones.Text: Billy counts as one Crew against the crew maximum of the Ship he's attached to. Any player in the same Sea may tack 2 Swashbuckling as an action to sink Billy.
Billy Bones.Flavor Text: Hiding deep in the shadows of the hold, Billy sneaks whatever food he can, waiting for the day he finds the man who took his life away.

Bite the Bullet.Name: Bite the Bullet
Bite the Bullet.Text: React: Tack this card when you are suffering Hits to absorb 1 Hit, or 2 Hits if you have a Heroic Captain.
Bite the Bullet.Flavor Text: "I'm going to take the arm now, señor. Your job is to stay alive." - Luis de Rioja

Bjorn Brind.Name: Bjorn Brind
Bjorn Brind.Text: React: Tack Bjorn immediately after you complete a Goods Adventure to draw a card.
Bjorn Brind.Flavor Text: "He's still got contacts from his days as a prisoner. We couldn't have taken la Bucca without him." - Allende

Bjørnsson's Horn.Name: Bjørnsson's Horn
Bjørnsson's Horn.Trait: Unique - 3 Seas Away - Artifact - Captain Attachment
Bjørnsson's Horn.Text: React: Tack your Captain and discard the Horn instead of performing a Boarding Attack. Untack all of your Crew (including your Captain).

Black Heart.Name: Black Heart
Black Heart.Text: You may only play this card if you have a Villainous Captain. Sink one of your crew, then draw four cards.
Black Heart.Flavor Text: "Thanks for your help, boys. You men may fire at will." - Reis

Black Heart of the Sea.Name: Black Heart of the Sea
Black Heart of the Sea.Trait: Black Freighter Captain Attachment - Unique - Item
Black Heart of the Sea.Text: Act: Tack this card to untack one of your Skeletal Crew. Discard that Crew at the end of this turn.
Black Heart of the Sea.Flavor Text: Necros held his hand out, displaying the putrid organ for all to see. As they watched in horror, it began to pulse...
Black Heart of the Sea.Errata: Texte modified from Act: Tack this card to untack one of your Skeletal Crew. Discard the Crew at the end of the turn. to Act: Tack this card to untack one of your Skeletal Crew. Discard that Crew at the end of this turn.

Black Siren.Name: Black Siren
Black Siren.Trait: Black Freighter Captain Attachment - Unique - Patron
Black Siren.Text: To bring this card into play, another player must have 1 or more Crew in their sunk pile. Any player in the Trade Sea may sink this card by paying 5 Swashbuckling as an action. Other players must pay 1 extra Influence when hiring Crew.

Black Stone Veteran.Name: Black Stone Veteran
Black Stone Veteran.Cost: 7 Adv.; 0 if you and another player have resolved a Duel during this turn.
Black Stone Veteran.Text: +1 Swashbuckling. This Crew gains the trait: Swordsman +2 (or gains +2 to their Swordsman bonus if the Crew already has the Swordsman trait).
Black Stone Veteran.Flavor Text: When the Rose and Cross must kill someone, they draw stones from a lot. Whoever draws the valck stone must perform an act of evil to help the greater good.

Blacktooth Bill.Name: Blacktooth Bill
Blacktooth Bill.Flavor Text: "I can takes ya wherever ya wants to go. Jus' give me th' gold and we'll be on our way."

Blasted Bulkhead.Name: Blasted Bulkhead
Blasted Bulkhead.Text: React: Play this card when you are suffering Hits. Attach this card to your Ship as a Damage Attachment  to absorb 3 Hits. This card counts as 1 Crew toward your Crew maximum. You may sink this Attachment by tacking 2 Swashbuckling as an action. You may not sink or discard this card with other card effects.
Blasted Bulkhead.Errata: Text modified: you have to attach this card to prevent Hits. If you can't attch this card, you can't prevent Hits.

Blink Attack.Name: Blink Attack
Blink Attack.Cost: Tack one of your Sorcerers with Porté of 1 or more
Blink Attack.Trait: 1 Sea Away - Crew Attachment - Porté 1 Knack
Blink Attack.Text: Act: Tack this Crew to target another player's untacked, non-Captain Crew. Play a card out of your hand as a Boarding Attack to begin a Duel between this Crew and the target Crew.
Blink Attack.Flavor Text: San Cristobal had defenders. Valoix was ready

Blockade.Name: Blockade
Blockade.Text:
Any player in this sea may discard Blockade by tacking 6 Cannon or Swashbuckling as an action.
Act: Target a Ship in this Sea. That Ship's controller must either pay 3 influence or Blockade inflicts 4 Hits on that player's Ship.

Blocked Passages.Name: Blocked Passages
Blocked Passages.Text: React: Play this card when you are suffering Hits. Attach this card to your Ship as a Damage Attachment to absorb 4 Hits. While this card is attached you must tack 1 non-Captain Crew immediately after the untack phase. You may sink this Attachment by paying 3 Swashbuckling as an Action. You may not sink or discard this card with other card effects.
Blocked Passages.Flavor Text: "Maybe we can crawl in through the bilge holes."

Blood Enemies.Name: Blood Enemies
Blood Enemies.Text: Any player may sink this Chantey by discarding a Crew from play as an action. All Captains are considered to have the following ability: Act: Discard one of your Crew from play and target a Ship in this Sea to produce a Cannon Attack that inflicts Hits equal to the printed Cannon Skill of the discarded Crew to the targeted Ship.
Blood Enemies.Flavor Text: The Sea Lion charged headlong towards its prey, prepared to finish the Revensj once and for all.

Bloody Bonnie McGee.Name: Bloody Bonnie McGee
Bloody Bonnie McGee.Trait: Unique - Loyal - Heroic - First Mate - Swordsman +2
Bloody Bonnie McGee.Text: React: Tack Bonnie immediately after you perform a Cannon Attack. You may begin a Boarding with the Ship that was targeted by the Cannon Attack, paying all costs.
Bloody Bonnie McGee.Flavor Text: "It's not a skirt! It's a kilt, ya dumb... oh, just hand me me cudgel and I'll explain the difference."
Bloody Bonnie McGee.Errata: Ability should read: "… You may attempt a Boarding …" (ed: Can still be cancelled by paying your SMC).

Bloody Fight.Name: Bloody Fight
Bloody Fight.Text: React: Play when the other player in a Boarding plays a card instead of performing a Boarding Attack. That Player must tack or discard one of their non-Captain crew. You may not play another "Bloody Fight" during this round of the Boarding.
Bloody Fight.Flavor Text: The Montaigne assaults were unrelenting, but the Castillians wouldn't surrender without a fight.

Blows Up In Your Face.Name: Blows Up In Your Face
Blows Up In Your Face.Text: React: Play when a player tacks an Attachment and is inflicting Hits on you. Reduce the Hits inflicted to zero. Target and discard that Attachment and all cards attached to that Crew with the same title.

Boarded by Raiders.Name: Boarded by Raiders
Boarded by Raiders.Text: Any Crew pushed forward for a Boarding Attack, if the Crew inflicts hits, the Crew infliects 2 extra hits.
Boarded by Raiders.Flavor Text: Yngvild told her men there was an alternative to meaningless blood and death.
Boarded by Raiders.Errata: Text changed from All players have the following ability: React: When you are pushing a Crew forward for a Boarding Attack, tack that Crew. If that Crew inflict Hits during the Boarding Attack, they inflicts 2 extra Hits. to current text on final version

Boarded by Skeletons.Name: Boarded by Skeletons
Boarded by Skeletons.Text: Target a Ship in the Trade Sea. Inflict 3 Hits on that Ship.
Boarded by Skeletons.Flavor Text: When told of the attack, Captain Gosse's cheeful face grew serious. "Set sail for the Trade Sea," he ordered, "I have a bad feeling about this."

Boatload of Jennys.Name: Boatload of Jennys
Boatload of Jennys.Trait: 1 Sea Away - Illegal - Goods - Crew Attachment
Boatload of Jennys.Flavor Text: "The General would kill us if he knew what we were doing. But somebody has to keep up morale."

Bolts of Fine Cloth.Name: Bolts of Fine Cloth
Bolts of Fine Cloth.Trait: 1 Sea Away - Goods Adventure - Crew Attachment
Bolts of Fine Cloth.Flavor Text: "Finer cloth you'll never see, m'lady. I had it shipped in from Cathay just this week, and my supplies are running short already."

Bones of Our Ancestors.Name: Bones of Our Ancestors
Bones of Our Ancestors.Text:
