You may tack one of your Lærdom Sorcerers when attaching this card to your Captain to reduce the Influence cost of this card to 0.
React: Tack this card when you inflict Hits on another Ship in this Sea. That Ship suffers 3 additional Hits.
Bones of Our Ancestors.Flavor Text: "They walk among us and very soon, you shall feel their wrath." - Red Thorfild

Bonnie's Knives.Name: Bonnie's Knives
Bonnie's Knives.Trait: Sea Dog Captain Attachment - Unique - Signature Item
Bonnie's Knives.Text:
Act: Sink this card to untack your Captain.
Act: Tack this card to target one of your other Sea Dog Crew to give that Crew +2 to all of that Crew's skills that are greater than 1.
React: Tack this card when you are paying a Swashbuckling cost for an action to play, discard or sink a Control card to give your Captain +4 Swashbuckling until after the action.

Botas Rojas.Name: Botas Rojas
Botas Rojas.Text: When Botas tacks to absorb Hits, he absorbs 2 extra Hits.
Botas Rojas.Flavor Text: "Don't scream on the way down; it's unmanly."

Braiding the Strands.Name: Braiding the Strands
Braiding the Strands.Text: Act: Tack this card and target a player with a Ship in this Sea. Look at the top card of the target player's deck. You may place that card in that player's discard pile or return the card to the top of that player's deck.
Braiding the Strands.Flavor Text: "Your threads and my threads, sad sister. Your loss and my loss. One and the same, now and forever."

Braving the Nor'wester.Name: Braving the Nor'wester
Braving the Nor'wester.Flavor Text: "Hold fast boys! If the whales can take it, so can we."

Brawny Rowers.Name: Brawny Rowers
Brawny Rowers.Text: When Brawny Rowers tack to absorb Hits, they absorb 1 extra Hit.
Brawny Rowers.Flavor Text: "It's a good thing they can't see how close those cannon shells are coming." - Rognvald Brandson

Brenden Stafford.Name: Brenden Stafford
Brenden Stafford.Text: Tack this card when you bring an Ally card into play. Reduce it's cost by 3 (min. 1)
Brenden Stafford.Flavor Text: "If Kheired-Din backed off after seeing Maggie's tatoos, then perhaps we have some bargaining power after all."

Brennan.Name: Brennan
Brennan.Text: Act: Tack Brennan and discard a card from your hand to draw a card.
Brennan.Flavor Text: "Brennan is always prepared for every situation... as if he'd been planning for years." - Guy McCormick

Brian Skar.Name: Brian Skar
Brian Skar.Text:
If any other Ship has more Loyal Crew on board than you have on your Ship, this Crew gains +1 Swashbuckling.
React: After you have reversed a Boarding Attack from your hand, discard the top card of your deck. The Boarding Attack is now considered the same as the discarded card.
Brian Skar.Flavor Text: Brian blames the Vestenmanjavenar for his parents’ death. He is unpredictable, and will have vengeance even if it means killing his own brother.

Brilliant Disguise.Name: Brilliant Disguise
Brilliant Disguise.Text:
If you attach this card to a Los Vagos Crew you may draw a card after you attach this card.
React: Sink this card when you or one of your cards is being targeted with a Duel, to cancel that Duel.
Brilliant Disguise.Flavor Text: "No one believes that El Vago could possibly be a woman. Why should we dissuade them?" - Maria Soledad Rivera y Aldana

Broken Compass Inn.Name: Broken Compass Inn
Broken Compass Inn.Text:
Any player in this Sea may sink the Inn by tacking 3 Adventuring as an action.
React: Tack when you are in this Sea and paying an Influence cost to produce 1 Influence.
Broken Compass Inn.Flavor Text: "The ship went down and e'ery man did drown and die." "Well, if ya all died then it must be true!"

Broken Mast.Name: Broken Mast
Broken Mast.Text: React: Play this card when you are suffering Hits. Attach this card to your Ship as a Damage Attachment  to absorb 5 Hits. While this card is attached to your Ship all of your Crew have -2 Sailing (minimum 0). You may sink this Attachment by tacking 4 Swashbuckling as an action. You may not sink or discard this card with other card effects.
Broken Mast.Errata: Text modified: you have to attach this card to prevent Hits. If you can't attch this card, you can't prevent Hits.

Broken Shackles.Name: Broken Shackles
Broken Shackles.Text: Any player may sink this Chantey by paying 5 Swashbuckling as an action. All Captains have the following ability: Act: Tack one of your Crew. Starting with yourself and continuing clockwise, each player's Ship suffers a number of Hits equal to the number of Crew they have on board.

Brotherhood Pride.Name: Brotherhood Pride
Brotherhood Pride.Text: One of your Brotherhood Crew gains +2 Cannon until the end of the turn. That Crew gains +2 extra Cannon if there is a Montaigne Ship in play (+4 total).
Brotherhood Pride.Flavor Text: "A fine wine before battle always tastes better, eh Allende?"

Brothers in Arms - Foil.Name: Brothers in Arms - Foil
Brothers in Arms - Foil.Text: React: Play when you are hiring a Loyal Crew from your Captain's faction to produce 3 Influence.
Brothers in Arms - Foil.Flavor Text: "Oh no… wait, everything's okay. Maybe my luck's in for a change…" - Mortimer Snuff

Brutes.Name: Brutes
Brutes.Text: When the Brutes tack to absorb Hits, they absorb 2 extra Hits.

Buccaneers.Name: Buccaneers
Buccaneers.Flavor Text: "Oh blast. There goes two months wages. Hey, Cap'n, ya looking for a rigger?"

Bully Boys.Name: Bully Boys
Bully Boys.Text: When Bully Boys tack to absorb Hits, they absorb 2 extra Hits.
Bully Boys.Flavor Text: "Not today, ya scurvy scum! Not today or any other day!"

Bum Rush.Name: Bum Rush
Bum Rush.Text: React: Tack one of your First Mate Crew and produce any amount of Swashbuckling to play this card instead of performing a Boarding Attack. Target the other Ship in the Boarding. Inflict an amount of hits on the other Ship in the Boarding equal to the amount of Swashbuckling produced.

Buried Treasure.Name: Buried Treasure
Buried Treasure.Text: Act: Target a card in your sunk pile (other than another Buried Treasure card) and take that card into your hand then sink this card.
Buried Treasure.Flavor Text: “Since when did ‘X’ ever mark the spot?” - Berek

Burke.Name: Burke
Burke.Text: Burke has -2 Swashbuckling (minimum 1) while performing a Boarding Attack if the opposing Captain is Heroic.
Burke.Flavor Text: "Once, I was a member of the King's Men. It came to light that I'd been seeing the Captain's daughter in secret. Now, monsieur, I can never go home."

Burn Their Sails.Name: Burn Their Sails
Burn Their Sails.Text: Target another Ship. Reduce that Ship's total Sailing by 10 (minimum 0) for purposes of determining initiative during the next turn.
Burn Their Sails.Flavor Text: "You have spent years strangling my nation, señores. It is only fitting that you remain now that the tables have turned." - Manuel Dejavez

But Not in Vain.Name: But Not in Vain
But Not in Vain.Text: React: Play immediately after you sink one of your Crew to absorb Hits during a Boarding. If you have no other Crew with a higher Influence cost, the Boading is ended.
But Not in Vain.Flavor Text: As Willy fell sprawling to the doc, the Discovery pulled slowly away. "Leave him!" McCormick snapped at the crew. "He's gone."

Butcher Pinchot - Exp..Name: Butcher Pinchot - Exp.
Butcher Pinchot - Exp..Text:
"Butcher" does not count toward your Crew Maximum.
React: Tack "Butcher" when another Ship in this Sea is suffering Hits. That Ship suffers 2 additional Hits.
Butcher Pinchot - Exp..Flavor Text: "Did you say the man's name was Fox? Where might I find him?  "

Cafe of Broken Dreams.Name: Cafe of Broken Dreams
Cafe of Broken Dreams.Text:
Any player in this Sea may discard this card by discarding one of their Crew as an action.
Act: Name one skill and tack this card. All Crew in this Sea have that skill reduced by 1 until the end of the turn (minimum 0, minimum 1 for Swashbuckling).
Cafe of Broken Dreams.Flavor Text: "Let's go someplace more cheerful, like the Castillian front, or Kheired-Din's hold."

Caligari's Doom.Name: Caligari's Doom
Caligari's Doom.Text: Any player may sink this Chantey by either tacking a Holy Crew or paying 6 Sailing as an action. Ships may not move to, through, or from the Forbidden Sea.
Caligari's Doom.Flavor Text: Panic set in as the screaming populace tried vainly to flee the city. In less than an hour, Caligari's island vanished beneath the waves.

Caligari's Island.Name: Caligari's Island
Caligari's Island.Trait: Forbidden Sea Attachment - Unique - Control - Port
Caligari's Island.Text: You must be in the Forbidden Sea to play this card. Any player in the Forbidden Sea may discard this card by tacking one of their Crew with Influence greater than 6 as an action. When you are in an adjacent Sea, and tacking to pay for a Control card, your Captain produces 3 extra skill points.
Caligari's Island.Flavor Text: It looked so peaceful in the days before the end.
Caligari's Island.Errata: Is now discarded by tacking a Crew with an Influence skill greater than 6, not Swashbuckling Skill. Flavor tex modified.

Call to Arms.Name: Call to Arms
Call to Arms.Text: React: Play immediately after an opponent begins a Boarding with your Ship that is not canceled. Untack one of your non-Captain Crew with the Swordsman or First Mate trait.
Call to Arms.Flavor Text: "The Montaigne have shelled the harbor and are sending marines to shore! If we don't defend ourselves, they'll burn Avila to the ground!"

Call to Duty.Name: Call to Duty
Call to Duty.Text: React: Play this card when you are producing Swashbuckling. Tack one of your Crew to produce Swashbuckling equal to that Crew's Adventuring plus Swashbuckling.
Call to Duty.Flavor Text: "Find out anything you can about Kheired-Din, Jacob. We've just made a deal and I want to know if he keeps his word."

Called Away.Name: Called Away
Called Away.Text:
Act: Target one of your non-Captain Crew in play. Place that Crew in your hand. Discard any cards attached to that Crew.
Act: Target a tacked Crew with the No Attachments trait in this Sea. Pay 3 Influence to return the target Crew to their owner's hand.
Called Away.Flavor Text: "Farewell, Amiral." leBeux waved his hand. "I wish I could say it's been a pleasure."

Calling in Favors - Foil.Name: Calling in Favors - Foil
Calling in Favors - Foil.Text: React: Play this card and discard two cards from your hand when you are paying an Influence cost to produce 2 Influence.
Calling in Favors - Foil.Flavor Text: "Let them take it. We could never have repaired the Ship if Gosse hadn't come along. For that, I'm willing to give up a little swag." - Allende

Calm Before the Storm.Name: Calm Before the Storm
Calm Before the Storm.Text: Target a player who has three or more Adventures in the same Sea that are not completed. That player suffers 1 Hit, and all of those Adventures are discarded.
Calm Before the Storm.Flavor Text: "Don't worry 'bout them clouds on the horizon. We've got plenty of time."

Caltrops.Name: Caltrops
Caltrops.Text: React: Tack before an opponent is about to play a Boarding Attack from their hand. Name either Club, Dagger, Punch, Slash or Thrust. That Crew's controller may not play any more Boarding Attack until after the end of the current round. You may tack a Rilasciare Crew instead of paying a this card's skill cost. You may not play this card during a Duel. You may not play this card in reaction to the first Boarding Attack played by a Crew.

Canister Shot.Name: Canister Shot
Canister Shot.Text: React: Play instead of performing a Boarding Attack. You inflict a Cannon Attack on that Ship with Hits equal to the number of untacked Crew on your Ship with a Cannon skill greater than zero.
Canister Shot.Flavor Text: "They rip ye to pieces before ye take two steps. The gulls'll eat well tonight."

Cannons of La Bucca.Name: Cannons of La Bucca
Cannons of La Bucca.Text:
Any player in this Sea may sink Cannons of La Bucca by tacking 9 Cannon as an action.
Act: Tack Cannons of la Bucca and target a Ship in this Sea. Inflict a 6 hit Cannon Attack on that Ship.
Cannons of La Bucca.Flavor Text: They sink any ship that comes within a mile.

Captain Allende.Name: Captain Allende
Captain Allende.Text: While you have 3 or more other Brotherhood Crew on your Ship, your Adventures require 2 fewer Adventuring to Complete.
Captain Allende.Flavor Text: "Just don't call him 'the Pirate King' and you'll get along just fine on this ship, lad."

Captain Bonnie McGee.Name: Captain Bonnie McGee
Captain Bonnie McGee.Text: You may not have Bloody Bonnie McGee on board. While you have 3 or more other Sea Dog Crew on your Ship and there is a Villainous Captain in play, your Sea Dog Crew have +1 to all skills that are above 0.

Captain Bonnie McGee - Foil.Name: Captain Bonnie McGee - Foil
Captain Bonnie McGee - Foil.Text: You may not have Bloody Bonnie Maggie on board. While you have 3 or more Sea Dog Crew on your Ship and there is a Villainous Captain in play, your Sea Dog Crew have +1 to all skills that are above 0.

Captain Cosette.Name: Captain Cosette
Captain Cosette.Text:
You may not have Cosette on board.
Act: Once per turn, if you have 3 or more other Explorers Crew on board, you may look at the top five cards of your deck. You may reveal one Adventure card or Explorer Crew card from those cards, then place it in your hand. Discard the remaining cards.
Captain Cosette.Errata: Comment to allow the sort procedure to group all the fixed captains of this extension - not game related

Captain Flanagan.Name: Captain Flanagan
Captain Flanagan.Text: While you have 3 or more other Explorer Crew on board, your completed Adventures that provides an Influence bonus provide 1 extra Influence and your Captain has the following ability: React: Tack one of your Ally cards in this Sea when you are paying an Adventuring Cost to produce 2 Adventuring.
Captain Flanagan.Flavor Text: "Something lies out beyond the Midnight Archipelago. I intend to be the first one to find it."

Captain Ivanovitch.Name: Captain Ivanovitch
Captain Ivanovitch.Text: When this Captain tacks to produce Influence to hire an Ussuran Crew, this Captain produces 2 additional Influence. While you have 4 or more Unaligned or Ussuran Crew on board with an Influence Cost of 3 or more, your Unaligned Crew and Ussuran Crew absorb 1 additional hit when tacking or sinking to absorb hits (+2 total if Unaligned and Ussuran).

Captain Jorund Guttormson.Name: Captain Jorund Guttormson
Captain Jorund Guttormson.Text:
You may not have Jorund Guttormson on Board.
Act: Once per turn, if you have 3 or more other non-Loyal Vesten Crew on board, pay any amount of Influence to target a Ship in this Sea. Target Ship suffers Hits equal to the half amount of Influence Produced (rounded down).

Captain Margaretta Orduño.Name: Captain Margaretta Orduño
Captain Margaretta Orduño.Text:
You may not have Margaretta Orduño on Board.
Act: Tack to target one of your Swordsman Crew.  If you have three or more other Castillian Crew on board you Ship, target a Ship in this sea who must target one of their Crew. Play a card from your hand as a Boarding Attack to begin a Duel between your Swordsman and the target Crew.

Captain McGee.Name: Captain McGee
Captain McGee.Text:
You may not have Bloody Bonnie McGee on board. McGee may only use Ships with no Faction symbol.
React: Once per turn, after another player's Villainous Crew has been sunk from play,untack McGee if you have 3 or more unaligned Crew with a printed Influence cost greater than 2.
Captain McGee.Artist: Travis Moore and Dærick W. Gröss

Captain Melinda Gosse.Name: Captain Melinda Gosse
Captain Melinda Gosse.Text:
You may not have Melinda Gosse on Board.
React: Tack this Captain when you are entering a Boarding. If you have 3 or more other Gosse Crew on board, you may untack two other Heroic Gosse Crew.
Captain Melinda Gosse.Flavor Text: "I hope I can pilot El Toro half as well as Poppa would."
Captain Melinda Gosse.Errata: Comment to allow the sort procedure to group all the fixed captains of this extension - not game related

Captain Necros.Name: Captain Necros
Captain Necros.Trait: Start: The Mirror - Villainous - Fear 1 - Swordsman +2
Captain Necros.Text:
You may only Hire Black Freighter Crew cards.
Act: Once per turn, while you have 2 or more other non-Skeletal Crew on your Ship, you may Hire one Skeletal Crew by discarding cards from your hand equal to the Crew's Influence cost.
Captain Necros.Flavor Text: "I summon the power of Legion himself against you…"

Captain Necros - Foil.Name: Captain Necros - Foil
Captain Necros - Foil.Trait: Start: The Mirror - Villainous - Fear 1 - Swordsman +2
Captain Necros - Foil.Text:
You  may only hire Crew cards with the Black Freighter faction symbol.
Act: Once per turn, while you have 2 or more other non-Skeletal crew on your ship you may hire a Skeletal Crew by discarding cards from your hand equal to the Crew's Influence cost.

Captain Red.Name: Captain Red
Captain Red.Text: You may not have Red the Adventurer on board. While you have 4 or more other Gosse crew on board, this Captain has the following ability: React: When you are tacking one of your Gosse Crew to produce Adventuring for a skill cost or any other skill for a cancel cost, tack an Attachment attached to the tacking Gosse Crew to produce one extra point of that skill (or two extra points if the Attachment is titled “Red”).

Captain Reis.Name: Captain Reis
Captain Reis.Text: While you have 3 or more other Crimson Roger Crew on your ship, your Cannon costs to play, cancel, discard, or sink a card are reduced by 3 (minimum 1).

Captain Reis - Foil.Name: Captain Reis - Foil
Captain Reis - Foil.Text: While you have 3 or more Crimson Roger Crew on your ship, your Cannon costs to play, cancel, discard, or sink a card are reduced by 3 (minimum 1).

Captain Roberts.Name: Captain Roberts
Captain Roberts.Trait: Start: Trade Sea - Legendary Captain - Heroic - Swordsman +2
Captain Roberts.Text: While you have 4 or more Crew on board with an Influence cost of 3 or more, your Topman Crew gain +1 Sailing, your Gunner Crew gain +1 Cannon, and your Swordsman Crew inflict one extra hit during Boarding Attacks.

Captain Upham.Name: Captain Upham
Captain Upham.Trait: Start: The Mirror - Villainous - Fear 1 - Swordsman +2
Captain Upham.Text:
When you hire non-Black Freigther Crew, the Influence cost of that Crew is increased by 3 (and may not be reduced).
React: After you have played a card with the Monster trait or put a card into play with the Monster or Skeletal trait, you may draw one card from your deck. You may only use this ability if you have 3 or more other non-Skeletal Black Freighter Crew on board and only once per card being played or entering play.

Captain's Quarters.Name: Captain's Quarters
Captain's Quarters.Text: Act: Discard Captain's Quarters to draw two cards.
Captain's Quarters.Flavor Text: "Wha'ever we took from that Montaigne palace, it's go' the General spittin' cannonshot. I hope Allende knows wha' 'e's doin'." - Reggie Wilcox

Captive Thugs.Name: Captive Thugs
Captive Thugs.Flavor Text: Those the Corairs captured in their raids were forced to row. The strong ones lasted almost a year.
Captive Thugs.Errata: Sailing skill raised from 2 to 3. Flavor text modified.

Captured!.Name: Captured!
Captured!.Text: Target a player with 1 or more untacked Captive Crew on their Ship. Target player must tack one of their Captive Crew.
Captured!.Flavor Text: "Keep them in the hold. If the Castillians catch us, we may need hostages." - Invar Andersson

Cargo Hook.Name: Cargo Hook
Cargo Hook.Text: This Crew's Boarding Attacks that finish with a Slash inflict 2 extra Hits.
Cargo Hook.Flavor Text: "You and yer fancy fencin' school can say hello to St. Rose fer me."

Carleon.Name: Carleon
Carleon.Trait: Trade Sea Attachment - Unique - Control - Port
Carleon.Text: You must be in the Trade Sea to play this card. Any player in the Trade Sea may discard Carleon by tacking one of their Crew with Cannon greater than 6, as an action. When you are in an adjacent Sea, and tacking to pay for a Control card, your Captain produces 3 extra skill points.
Carleon.Flavor Text: The capital of Avalon, a faerie tale come to life.

Carlos Altenar.Name: Carlos Altenar
Carlos Altenar.Flavor Text: Carlos never liked Avalons. Or Castillians. Or Montaignes. Or Ussurans...

Carlos Altenar - Exp..Name: Carlos Altenar - Exp.
Carlos Altenar - Exp..Text: Act: Once per turn, sink one of your Holy Crew to untack your Captain.
Carlos Altenar - Exp..Flavor Text: "Margaretta is too good to turn on you Inquisition scum. I'm not."

Carmilla Bernoulli.Name: Carmilla Bernoulli
Carmilla Bernoulli.Text: This Crew is considered to have a Face Attachment. Heroic Crew fighting against this Crew and inflicting Hits during a Boarding Attack have the Hits they inflict reduced to 0.
Carmilla Bernoulli.Flavor Text: "They say Reis uses Glamour magic. I'm here to learn if it's true."

Carousing.Name: Carousing
Carousing.Text: React: Play when you are paying a skill cost. Discard one card from your hand to produce 1 point of Cannon, Sailing, Adventuring, Influence, or Swashbuckling.
Carousing.Flavor Text: Ain't nothin' like a little rest an' recuperation to put a man's head on straight.

Casks of Fine Wine.Name: Casks of Fine Wine
Casks of Fine Wine.Trait: 1 Sea Away - Goods Adventure - Crew Attachment
Casks of Fine Wine.Flavor Text: "Blimey, Mitchell! This is the best wine we've ever guarded."

Castille Gunpowder.Name: Castille Gunpowder
Castille Gunpowder.Text: React: Play when paying Cannon to produce +3 Cannon.
Castille Gunpowder.Flavor Text: "Measured and mixed exactly, my friend. There will be a small fee for... transportation across the Castille blockade, of course."

Castille Pride.Name: Castille Pride
Castille Pride.Text: One of your Castille Crew gains Sailing equal to your Ship's move cost until the end of the turn. That Crew gains additional Sailing equal to your Ship's move cost if there is an Explorer Ship in play (total equal to twice your move cost).
Castille Pride.Flavor Text: "The world must learn that though we are bloodied, we can never be beaten." - Enrique Orduño

Castillian Gunpowder.Name: Castillian Gunpowder
Castillian Gunpowder.Text: React: Play when tacking a Crew to produce Cannon. That Crew produces 3 extra Cannon.
Castillian Gunpowder.Flavor Text: "Measured and mixed exactly, my friend. There will be a small fee for... transportation across the Castille blockade, of course."

Castillian Merchant Ship.Name: Castillian Merchant Ship
Castillian Merchant Ship.Flavor Text: "Let's have us a toast in memory of them fine men... and the fine wine they left behind!"

Castillian Navy.Name: Castillian Navy
Castillian Navy.Text:
You must be in la Boca to play this card. Any player in la Boca may discard this card by tacking 14 Sailing as an action. While Castillian Navy is in play, you have +10 Sailing for determining Initiative.
Act: Tack to get a Control card from your deck, show it to your opponents, and put it in your hand. Shuffle your deck.

Castillian Swordmaster.Name: Castillian Swordmaster
Castillian Swordmaster.Text: +1 Swashbuckling. This crew inflicts 2 extra Hits during Boarding Attacks.
Castillian Swordmaster.Flavor Text: "No! No! Stop! If you cannot master the song, you will never master the blade. Begin again!"

Cat O' Nine Tails.Name: Cat O' Nine Tails
Cat O' Nine Tails.Text: React: Tack Cat O' Nine Tails when another of your Crew is tacking to produce skill points. That Crew produces 3 extra skill points, and then the Crew is discarded. Only one Cat O'Nine Tails can be used per Crew that tacks.
Cat O' Nine Tails.Flavor Text: "I don't think you men are trying very hard." - Riant Gaucher
Cat O' Nine Tails.Errata: Text added: 'Only one Cat O'Nine Tails can be used per Crew that tacks.'

Cathwulf Vogt.Name: Cathwulf Vogt
Cathwulf Vogt.Text: React: Tack Cathwulf instead of performing a Boarding Attack to inflict 3 Hits on the other Ship in the Boarding.
Cathwulf Vogt.Flavor Text: "Kirk mathematicians are the best in the world. Would you like a practical demonstration?"

Cathwulf Vogt - Exp..Name: Cathwulf Vogt - Exp.
Cathwulf Vogt - Exp..Text: Attachments which increase Cathwulf's Cannon skill each provide an addtional +1 Cannon.
Cathwulf Vogt - Exp..Flavor Text: "It's perfectly simple, you illiterate swine! You just have to take the arc of the parabola into account while adjusting the coefficient for wind resistance!"

Celedoine.Name: Celedoine
Celedoine.Text: When Celedoine tacks to produce Influence, you may discard a card from your hand to produce 2 extra Influence.
Celedoine.Flavor Text: There are so many stories about Celedoine and Berek...and in Avalon, they just may all be true.

Celedoine - Exp..Name: Celedoine - Exp.
Celedoine - Exp..Trait: Experienced - Unique - Loyal - First Mate - Glamour 2
Celedoine - Exp..Text: React: Tack Celedoine when you are suffering hits. Reduce the Hits suffered to 0.
Celedoine - Exp..Flavor Text: "The isle of the Grey Queen off the port bow. Are you sure you want to do this, Captain?"

Chain Shot.Name: Chain Shot
Chain Shot.Text: React: Play when you perform a Cannon attack. Hits suffered from this Cannon Attack are absorbed by tacking (and sinking) Sailing instead of Swashbuckling. Crew with 0 Sailing may be sunk to absorb 1 Hit.
Chain Shot.Flavor Text: He fell to the decks, screaming a prayer to the Prophets to protect him.

Challenge to a Duel.Name: Challenge to a Duel
Challenge to a Duel.Text: Target one of your Crew and one untacked Crew with two or more Attachments (except a Captain) on another Ship. Play a card from your hand as a Boarding Attack to begin a Duel between the two Crew.

Charge.Name: Charge
Charge.Text:
You may not play this card unless your Captain has at least 2 completed Adventures attached.
React: Play this card instead of performing a Boarding Attack. Sink one of your Crew with an Influence cost greater than 2, to inflict 3 Hits on the other Ship in the Boarding.

Charter.Name: Charter
Charter.Trait: Explorer Captain Attachment - Unique - Letter of Marque
Charter.Text: You may not put this card into play unless you have 3 completed Adventures in play. All completed Adventures you have in play that provide skill bonuses give an additional +1 to the appropriate Skill.

Cheap Barrels.Name: Cheap Barrels
Cheap Barrels.Text: Target a Ship. Until the endof the turn, all Crew on that Ship have -1 Adventuring (minimum 0).
Cheap Barrels.Flavor Text: "There ain't no such thing as bargains. Only suckers." - Lyin' John Fox

Cheap Cannons.Name: Cheap Cannons
Cheap Cannons.Text: Discard this card when this Crew is producing Cannon. This Crew produces 3 extra Cannon.
Cheap Cannons.Flavor Text: "Yeah, the barrels disintegrate when you fires'em. But have you seen what shredded cannon barrel can do to a hull?" - "Lyin'" John Fox

Cheap Cutlass.Name: Cheap Cutlass
Cheap Cutlass.Text: Discard Cheap Cutlass when this Crew inflicts Hits with a Boarding Attack. This Crew inflicts 2 extra Hits.
Cheap Cutlass.Flavor Text: "You ever see what rust can do to a gut wound?"

Cheap Gunpowder.Name: Cheap Gunpowder
Cheap Gunpowder.Text: React: Play when tacking a Crew to produce Cannon for an action. That Crew produces 2 extra Cannon. immediatly after the resolution of the action, your Ship suffers 2 Hits.
Cheap Gunpowder.Flavor Text: "Ye bought it from Fox, didn' ye?"

Cheap Sails.Name: Cheap Sails
Cheap Sails.Text: React: Discard this card when you are paying a Sailing cost to produce Sailing equal to your Ship's Move Cost.

Cheap Tools.Name: Cheap Tools
Cheap Tools.Text: Discard Cheap Tools when this Crew tacks to pay an Adventuring cost. The Crew produces 3 extra Adventuring.
Cheap Tools.Flavor Text: "Our navigator stuck himself with one. His arm swelled up like an Eisen sausage."

Choose Your Battles.Name: Choose Your Battles
Choose Your Battles.Cost: 4 Adv.; 2 if you have a Rilasciare Crew on board.
Choose Your Battles.Text:
React: Discard this card when you are paying the Influence cost of a Rilasciare Crew to produce 3 Influence.
React: Tack this card when you or one of your cards is being targeted with a Duel. The player starting the Duel must pay 3 Swashbuckling or the Duel is canceled.

Christophé du Fae.Name: Christophé du Fae
Christophé du Fae.Text: This Crew may not be in your starting Crew You must have 2 or more Sophia's Daughters Crew aboard your Ship to bring this Crew into play.
Christophé du Fae.Flavor Text: He's a Son of Lugh, with Sidhe blood in his veins. He can do more than just outrun the horse; he can pick it up and throw it if the mood takes him.

Cities of Gold.Name: Cities of Gold
Cities of Gold.Cost: 4 Adv.; 3 if you have 4 or more Crew aligned to your Captain's faction on board
Cities of Gold.Text: Act: Tack this card and a Crew aligned to your Captain's faction to hire a Crew from your hand, discard pile or draw deck. That Crew's Influence cost is reduced by 3 until the Crew enters play if that Crew shares a Nationality, Secret Society or Faction Symbol with your Captain.

Claw of Thalusai.Name: Claw of Thalusai
Claw of Thalusai.Text: React: Play when you are suffering Hits. Attach this card to one of your Crew to suffer 3 fewer Hits. This card has the Hand Attachment. A Crew may not have more than 1 Hand Attachment. Whenever this Crew tacks to absorb Hits, this Crew absorbs 2 extra Hits.

Cleaners.Name: Cleaners
Cleaners.Text:
Any player may sink this card by paying 6 Adventuring as an action. Control cards may not be discarded or sunk from this Sea. Control cards may not be attached to this Sea.
Act: Tack this card to attach it to an adjacent Sea.
Act: Discard a card from your hand to target a Ship in this Sea which has more Crew on board than their printed Crew Maximum. Inflict 3 Hits on the target Ship.
Cleaners.Flavor Text: "Just make sure the crabs don't find him."

Clear Skies.Name: Clear Skies
Clear Skies.Text: Target all Lærdom cards in play. Tack those cards.
Clear Skies.Flavor Text: Sometimes, the day stays nice, no matter what the Vesetenmannavnjar want.

Clear the Decks.Name: Clear the Decks
Clear the Decks.Text: React: Play immediately before you push a Crew forward for a Boarding Attack. Discard all cards in play which were used instead of performing a Boarding Attack.
Clear the Decks.Flavor Text: "You lubbers ever play ninepins? Its easy...let me show you..."

Close Range Cannon Volley.Name: Close Range Cannon Volley
Close Range Cannon Volley.Text: Target another Ship in this Sea. Pay 2 Cannon and 2 Sailing to produce a Cannon Attack which inflicts 5 Hits on that Ship.
Close Range Cannon Volley.Flavor Text: "Say that again, fellas - the part about me mother..."

Cluttered Ship.Name: Cluttered Ship
Cluttered Ship.Text: Act: Target a Ship Attachment attached to another Ship in this Sea. Attach this card to that Attachment. Until the end of the game, target Ship Attachment counts as 1 additional Crew against that Ship's Crew Maximum regardless of other card effects. That Ship Attachment's controller may sink that Ship Attachment and this card as an action if that Attachment is not a Damage Attachment.
Cluttered Ship.Flavor Text: "Nonsense! I see a piece of empty deck right there!"

Coastal Patrols.Name: Coastal Patrols
Coastal Patrols.Text:
You must be in the Frothing Sea to play this card. Any player in the Frothing Sea may discard this card by tacking 14 Swashbuckling as an action.
React: Tack this card when you suffer hits. You suffer 4 fewer Hits.
Act: Tack to get a Control card from your deck, show it to your opponents, and put it in your hand. Shuffle your deck.

Common Pier.Name: Common Pier
Common Pier.Text:
Any player in this Sea may sink Common Pier by tacking 4 Cannon as an action.
Act: Tack Common Pier and target an opposing Ship in this Sea if your Ship is in this Sea. Your Ship begins a Boarding with that Ship. This Boarding cannot be canceled without a card effect.
Common Pier.Flavor Text: "Didn't ye dogs hear? There's a toll if ye want te get back to yer ship tonight…"

Comte Robert Méchant.Name: Comte Robert Méchant
Comte Robert Méchant.Trait: Start: The Mirror - Villainous - Fear 1 - Swordsman +2
Comte Robert Méchant.Text:
You may only hire Crew which have the Black Freighter faction symbol.
React: Tack one of your Skeletal Crew when you are hiring another Skeletal Crew to produce Influence equal to the tack Crew's Swashbuckling skill. You may only use this ability if you have 3 or more other non-Skeletal Black Freighter Crew on board your Ship.
Comte Robert Méchant.Errata: Comment to allow the sort procedure to group all the fixed captains of this extension - not game related

Confusion.Name: Confusion
Confusion.Text: React: Discard Confusion immediately after a player pays their Ship's Move Cost. Reduce the Sailing that player produced by one. That player may continue to produce Sailing. If the cost of the action is not paid, it is canceled.

Confusion on Deck.Name: Confusion on Deck
Confusion on Deck.Text: React: Play when your opponent in a Boarding uses a card instead of performing a Boarding Attack. Cancel the effects of that card.
Confusion on Deck.Flavor Text: You can be as dashing as you want, it doesn't matter if you stab the wrong target.

Connor Lynch.Name: Connor Lynch
Connor Lynch.Flavor Text: "Sooner or later, I'm going to hit you. Better get me before I do - one tap is all I need."

Connor Lynch - Exp..Name: Connor Lynch - Exp.
Connor Lynch - Exp..Text: During a Boarding, Connor has a bonus to his Swashbuckling equal to the number of Crew on the other Ship with an Influence cost less than 3.
Connor Lynch - Exp..Flavor Text: "Highlanders have been killin boogey men a long time before Necros an' his Freighter came along."

Constitution.Name: Constitution
Constitution.Trait: Brotherhood Captain Attachment - Unique - Letter of Marque
Constitution.Text:
You must tack two of your Brotherhood Crew to put this card into play.
React: Tack the Constitution when you are paying an Influence cost for hiring a Brotherhood Crew to produce 2 Influence.
Constitution.Flavor Text: "So I swear," he whispered, cut his hand, and let his blood drip into the cup. Then, he signed his name with his blood and the blood of his new brothers.

Cool Castillian Blood.Name: Cool Castillian Blood
Cool Castillian Blood.Text:
The cost to play this card is reduced to zero if you have a Castillian Captain.
React: Discard Cool Castillian Blood when one of your Action cards has been canceled. The canceled card is put into your hand.

Corazón del Castille.Name: Corazón del Castille
Corazón del Castille.Text:
React: Tack before performing an action, to move to an adjacent Sea.
React: Tack when you are paying the Sailing cost to begin a Boarding to produce 5 sailing.

Corazón del Castille - Foil.Name: Corazón del Castille - Foil
Corazón del Castille - Foil.Text:
React: Tack before performing an action, to move to an adjacent Sea.
React: Tack when you are paying the Sailing cost to begin a Boarding to produce 5 sailing.

Cornelius van Brock.Name: Cornelius van Brock
Cornelius van Brock.Text: Cornelius is considered to have 2 Leg Attachments.
Cornelius van Brock.Flavor Text: "Keep him up there until he spots the Sead Dogs. It's not like he can run away." - Riant Gaucher

Corsair Pride.Name: Corsair Pride
Corsair Pride.Text: One of your Corsairs Crew gains +2 Adventuring until the end of the turn. That Crew gains +2 extra Adventuring if there is a Gosse Ship in play (+4 total).
Corsair Pride.Flavor Text: "Even an old man like Gosse still has a head to turn - so I can cut it off." - Dalia

Corsairs Figurehead.Name: Corsairs Figurehead
Corsairs Figurehead.Text: Act: Tack the Figurehead while you have 3 or more completed Adventures in play to look at the top card of your deck. You may put it back on top of your deck or discard it.

Corsairs Figurehead - Foil.Name: Corsairs Figurehead - Foil
Corsairs Figurehead - Foil.Text: Act: Tack the Figurehead while you have 3 or more completed Adventures in play to look at the top card of your deck. You may put it back on top of your deck or discard it.

Cosette.Name: Cosette
Cosette.Text: Cosette has a +1 to all skills while you have an uncompleted Artifact Adventure in play.
Cosette.Flavor Text: Don't know why such a pretty face would be wastin' her time on a sailin' ship, and e'ery time someone ask, she just walks away.

Cossette's Mutiny.Name: Cossette's Mutiny
Cossette's Mutiny.Text: All Captains have the following ability: Act: Once per turn, target a Ship to inflict Hits equal to the number of Crew on Board with a different Faction symbol than their Captain.
Cossette's Mutiny.Flavor Text: "You're not letting him take Maggie," Cosette snarled. "We'll kill you first." The Crew nodded in silent assent and drew their weapons.

Courage and Honor.Name: Courage and Honor
Courage and Honor.Text: React: Play when you tack one of your Heroic Crew to produce skill points. That Crew produces 3 extra skill points.
Courage and Honor.Flavor Text: “They have vowed to defend Avalon at all costs and to the end. Avalon Forever!” - Mike the Magnificent, Avalon Loyalist

Courtly Manner.Name: Courtly Manner
Courtly Manner.Text: React: Play this card when you are paying an Influence cost to produce one Influence.
Courtly Manner.Flavor Text: "If the Queen sees a bumpkin, she treats you like a bumpkin. If she sees a lord, she treats you like a lord."

Crackers on Demand.Name: Crackers on Demand
Crackers on Demand.Text: Target and untack any Pet card in play.
Crackers on Demand.Flavor Text: "How did you get blackmailed by a parrot?!"

Crashing Seas.Name: Crashing Seas
Crashing Seas.Flavor Text: "One minute he was there, standin' next to me. The next, Mother Ocean had him, and all I could do was thank her for not takin' me with him."

Crescent Courtesans.Name: Crescent Courtesans
Crescent Courtesans.Text: Your non-Captive Corsairs Crew have their Influence costs reduced by 1 (min 1).
Crescent Courtesans.Flavor Text: “Not all captives end up on the oars.” - Gustolph Hirsch

Crescent Fire.Name: Crescent Fire
Crescent Fire.Text: React: Play when you tack a Crew to produce Cannon. That Crew produces 4 extra Cannon.
Crescent Fire.Flavor Text: "The Vodacce import it from the forbidden lands and sell it like gold. Of course, Reis never has a problem getting hold of it." - Allende
Crescent Fire.Changes on MRP: Cost; sepcial cost/Cancel cost modified;Boarding Attack modified;Text modified;

Crescent Treasures.Name: Crescent Treasures
Crescent Treasures.Text:
You must be in the Forbidden Sea to play this card. Any player in the Forbidden Sea may discard this card by tacking 14 Influence as an action. While this card is in play, your Crew absorb 1 extra Hit when they tack to absorb Hits.
Act: Tack to get a Control card from your deck, show it to your opponents, and put it in your hand. Shuffle your deck.

Crimson Roger Pride.Name: Crimson Roger Pride
Crimson Roger Pride.Text: One of your Crimson Roger Crew gains +2 Adventuring until the end of the turn. That Crew gains +2 extra Adventuring if there is a Sea Dog Ship in play (+4 total).
Crimson Roger Pride.Flavor Text: "It's time we taught Jeremiah Berek a lesson. No one steals my property." - Reis

Cross of Virtue.Name: Cross of Virtue
Cross of Virtue.Text: This Crew gains +1 Cannon, +1 Sailing, +2 Adventuring, +2 Influence, +1 Swashbuckling.
Cross of Virtue.Flavor Text: "Captain Orduño, you have allowed a sacred religious treasure to fall into the hands of the Crimson Rogers. Do not fail me again." - Esteban Verdugo

Crossbow Bolt.Name: Crossbow Bolt
Crossbow Bolt.Text: React: Play when you send one of your untacked Crew out to fight against an opponent's Crew that has been pushed forward to start a Boarding Attack. Tack the opposing Crew.
Crossbow Bolt.Flavor Text: Inil gasped as he saw the prisoners quietly making their way across deck - then took careful aim at the Inishman in the rear.

Crossfire.Name: Crossfire
Crossfire.Flavor Text: As the cannons opened fire on the Castillian ship, Allende couldn't help but smile. El Vago had come through again.

Crossing Swords.Name: Crossing Swords
Crossing Swords.Text: Act: Target a Ship in this Sea. Play this card to begin a Boarding with that Ship that may be canceled by the target Ship sinking one of their untacked Crew and cannot be canceled in any other way. This Boarding ends after 3 rounds.
Crossing Swords.Flavor Text: "No one ruins my party, monsieur. Not even you."

Crossing the T.Name: Crossing the T
Crossing the T.Text: Target another Ship in this sea. Tack 6 or more Cannon and 3 or more Sailing to produce a Cannon Attack on that Ship which inflicts 1 Hit for each Cannon and Sailing produced.
Crossing the T.Flavor Text: We moved in front of them, so our sides were facin' their bow. Then the Captain cried for us to open fire on those poor, helpless bastards.

Crucible of Faith.Name: Crucible of Faith
Crucible of Faith.Text: Any player may tack a Villainous Crew, as an action, to sink this Chantey. All Captains have the following ability: React: Tack one of your Crew with the Holy trait when you are suffering Hits to reduce the Hits to 0.
Crucible of Faith.Flavor Text: The flames lept higher as the Montaigne cannonfire continued. "Theus keep me safe," the priest prayed.

Crystal Earring.Name: Crystal Earring
Crystal Earring.Flavor Text: "I don't know how it works, but  I've never fallen once while wearing it. Plus it's shiny."

Cursed Cutlass.Name: Cursed Cutlass
Cursed Cutlass.Cost: 3 Adv.; 2 if you have a Villainous Captain
Cursed Cutlass.Text: +1 Swashbuckling. This Crew inflicts 1 extra Hit during Boarding Attacks.
Cursed Cutlass.Flavor Text: It caused its owner no end of trouble... until he died. Ever since, his luck's been great.

Customs Check.Name: Customs Check
Customs Check.Text: Target an Illegal card. Discard that card.
Customs Check.Flavor Text: "I made a vow to the Queen that I'd stop this infernal smuggling no matter what, and your paltry bribe isn't near enough to make me go back on my word to her Majesty. Now let's see what's in that crate."

Cutlass.Name: Cutlass
Cutlass.Text: This Crew inflicts 2 extra hits during Boarding attacks.
Cutlass.Flavor Text: "Why use your bard hands when Theus gave us steel?"
Cutlass.Errata: Cost reduced from 6 Adv. To 4 Adv.
Cutlass.Changes on MRP: Cost; sepcial cost/Cancel cost modified;Flavor text modified;

Cutlass of Command.Name: Cutlass of Command
Cutlass of Command.Trait: Unique - 3 Seas Away - Artifact - Captain Attachment
Cutlass of Command.Flavor Text: Somehow, the cutlass just seemed "realer" than everything else. It's silly, I know, but I can't explain it and other way.

Cutthroats.Name: Cutthroats
Cutthroats.Text: When this Crew sinks to absorb Hits, it absorbs 5 extra Hits.
Cutthroats.Flavor Text: "Look on the bright side - ye got a great story to tell yer missus!"

Dalia.Name: Dalia
Dalia.Text: Draw one card immediately after Dalia plays a Slash attack during a Boarding Attack.
Dalia.Flavor Text: "He was so busy ogling her, he didn't notice the daggers in her hands until they slid into his stomach." - Espera

Dalia - Exp..Name: Dalia - Exp.
Dalia - Exp..Text: Immediately after Dalia plays a Boarding Attack, you may sink one of your Crew to draw a card.

Dalia and Ernesto.Name: Dalia and Ernesto
Dalia and Ernesto.Text: Act: Tack your Captain to play this card. You may immediatly hire one Crew with the Loyal trait that is not aligned to your Captain's faction. Sink this card.
Dalia and Ernesto.Flavor Text: He drew her close, but she softly pulled away. "You are a strange, foolish man," she smiled, not unkindly, "and saving my life isn't the same as winning my heart."

Damsel in Distress.Name: Damsel in Distress
Damsel in Distress.Text: React: Return this card to your hand when this Crew is producing Skill points to increase the Skill points produced by 2.
Damsel in Distress.Flavor Text: "Please, not the rope," Rosamonde pleaded. "As you wish, princess,' the executionner sneered and produced a very large axe...

Danger on the High Seas.Name: Danger on the High Seas
Danger on the High Seas.Text: Target your Ship and one other Ship. Inflict Hits to the other player's Ship equal to that Ship's move cost. Then, inflict Hits to your Ship equal to your Ship's move cost.

Dangerous Cargo.Name: Dangerous Cargo
Dangerous Cargo.Trait: 1 Sea Away - Illegal - Goods - Crew Attachment
Dangerous Cargo.Flavor Text: "We gots him from an Ussuran. Gentlest thing I ever seen. Say, is that blood on its…" CRUNCH!

Daniel.Name: Daniel
Daniel.Flavor Text: "He's never been off the island before. Gosse didn't want him to go, but he snuck aboard anyway. So we had him run ammo for us - and cut me open if he isn't a natural at it." - Andre Braudel

Daring Fools.Name: Daring Fools
Daring Fools.Text: Act: Tack and sink the Daring Fools to draw 2 cards from your deck. You may only use this ability if you have no cards in your hand.
Daring Fools.Flavor Text: "Between them, they've lost six toes pulling that stunt." - Nicole Cowbey

Dark Dreams.Name: Dark Dreams
Dark Dreams.Text: React: Play when you are paying an Adventuring cost. Discard 2 cards from your hand to produce 2 Adventuring.
Dark Dreams.Flavor Text: The Three came again that night, repeating their endless mantra. Alesio wondered if she might get mad before they stopped.

Dark Past.Name: Dark Past
Dark Past.Text: Target a Crew in this Sea. That Crew gains the Villainous trait until the end of the turn. The target's player may sink one of their Crew to cancel this Action.
Dark Past.Flavor Text: "I saw you!" Nicole hissed in the dying light of the cabin. "I watched from the door while you shot my husband in cold blood!"

Dark Temptations.Name: Dark Temptations
Dark Temptations.Text: You must have a Villainous Captain to play this card. Target a non-Heroic Crew, except Captains. That Crew is Villainous until the end of the turn.
Dark Temptations.Flavor Text: Trust me, wee lad. It's the end that justifies the means. Stick close ta me and I'll show ya exactly what I mean.

Dashing Blade.Name: Dashing Blade
Dashing Blade.Text:
You must tack one of your Swordsman Crew to put this card into play.
React: Tack this card instead of perfomring a Boarding Attack to inflict 3 Hits on the other Ship in the Boarding.
Dashing Blade.Flavor Text: With Orduño, condemned and his wife a near-prisoner, it falls to others to carry on their cause.

Dashing Duel.Name: Dashing Duel
Dashing Duel.Text: Target one of your Heroic Crew, and one untacked Crew with two or more Attachments (except a Captain) on another ship. Draw 1 card. Play a card from your hand as a Boarding Attack to begin a Duel between the two Crew.
Dashing Duel.Flavor Text: "Stick to cannons, you Vaticine swine. The delicacies of fencing don't suit you." - Gerard Rois et Reines

Daylen's Cordial.Name: Daylen's Cordial
Daylen's Cordial.Text:
You must have 2 or more untacked Invisible College Crew to attach this card.
Act: Tack this card to activate this ability. Until the end of the turn, this Crew absorbs additionnal Hits equal to their Adventuring Skill when they tack or sink to absorb Hits. discard this card at the end of the turn.
Daylen's Cordial.Flavor Text: "Care for a quick game of cards?"

Dead Man's Cave.Name: Dead Man's Cave
Dead Man's Cave.Trait: 2 Seas Away - Prize - Unique - Captain Attachment
Dead Man's Cave.Text: The Adventuring and Influence costs of all of your Item Crew Attachments and the Adventuring costs of all of your uncompleted Item Adventures are reduced by 2 (minimum 1).

Dead Men Tell No Tales.Name: Dead Men Tell No Tales
Dead Men Tell No Tales.Text: Target a Ship. That Ship suffers 1 Hit for every two Crew cards in that player's sunk pile.
Dead Men Tell No Tales.Flavor Text: Does I needs to explain this one to ya, lad, or can ya figures it out all by yurself?

Death From Above.Name: Death From Above
Death From Above.Text: React: Play instead of a Boarding Attack. Tack you Captain to inflict Hits equal to his or her Swashbuckling.
Death From Above.Flavor Text: He jumped from the rigging with a cry on his lips and murder in his eyes...

Death Stare.Name: Death Stare
Death Stare.Text: React: Target one of your Crew with Fear of 1 or more instead of performing a Boarding Attack. All of your Crew inflict extra Hits equal to the targeted Crew's Fear level during Boarding Attacks. In addition, your Crew with the Fear trait inflict an additional number of Hits during Boarding Attacks equal to their Fear level. These effects last until the end of the Boarding.

Deception and Illusion.Name: Deception and Illusion
Deception and Illusion.Text: Tack when you are paying a Swashbuckling cost to produce Swashbuckling equal to this crew’s Glamour.
Deception and Illusion.Flavor Text: “Are you sure you’re ready for me?” - Celedoine

Deck Cannons.Name: Deck Cannons
Deck Cannons.Text:
This card comes into play tacked. This card does not untack during the untack phase.
Act: Tack to target a Ship in this Sea. Inflict 3 Hits on the target Ship.
Act: Once per turn, tack one of your Crew to untack this card.
Deck Cannons.Flavor Text: "Small they be, but they clear the decks like a broom."

Deck Hands.Name: Deck Hands
Deck Hands.Text: When hiring Deck Hands, you may discard a card from your hand to reduce Deck Hands' Influence cost to 0.

Decks Awash.Name: Decks Awash
Decks Awash.Text: Target an Attachment on a Crew card that has more than two Attachments. That Attachment is discarded.
Decks Awash.Flavor Text: "Hold on, lads!" Mother Ocean's comin' to take back her own!"

Decks Running Red.Name: Decks Running Red
Decks Running Red.Text: Target a Villainous Crew, except Captains. Inflict Hits on the target's Ship equal to the target's Swashbuckling.
Decks Running Red.Flavor Text: "I couldn't stop 'em. They went for each other's throats and before I could even move, there was blood everywhere!"

Defense of the Motherland.Name: Defense of the Motherland
Defense of the Motherland.Text: While this card is a Sea Attachment it is Unique and your Captain's Influence is reduced by 1 (min. 0). When another Ship enters this Sea, this card becomes a Captain Attachment, attaches to your Captain, and gives a +2 Swashbuckling.

Delaina Darling.Name: Delaina Darling
Delaina Darling.Text: While Delaina is in play, other players may not play cards with the same title as the top card of their discard pile.
Delaina Darling.Flavor Text: "She remembers everything she sees, and she sees more than you can believe." - Allende

Delaina Darling - Exp..Name: Delaina Darling - Exp.
Delaina Darling - Exp..Text: The Adventuring cost to play your Action cards is reduced by 2 (minimum 1).
Delaina Darling - Exp..Flavor Text: All it takes to be a good spy is a watchful eye and a mind for details.

Demon Eyes.Name: Demon Eyes
Demon Eyes.Text: React: When a Crew tacks to absorb Hits inflicted by this Crew during a Boarding Attack, tack this card to reduce the number of Hits absorbed by that Crew to 0.
Demon Eyes.Flavor Text: Syrneth technology is closer to Legion than you suspect.
Demon Eyes.Changes on MRP: Trait modified;Text modified;Flavor text modified;Artist modified;

Denny La Bree.Name: Denny La Bree
Denny La Bree.Flavor Text: "Bad food, no sleep, worms, rats, scurvy, sea monsters, smelly bunkmates. Heh. Still beats a cold cell back on the island any day of the week."

Denny La Bree - Exp..Name: Denny La Bree - Exp.
Denny La Bree - Exp..Text: React: Tack this Crew when one of your Crew is tacking to produce Cannon. That Crew produces extra Cannon equal to this Crew's Sailing skill.
Denny La Bree - Exp..Flavor Text: His eyes betray the horror that has engulfed him. Some things, it seems, are worse than la Bucca.

Der Kire.Name: Der Kire
Der Kire.Trait: Start: Trade Sea - Heroic - Holy - Swordsman +2
Der Kire.Text: You may not have The Kire on board. Der Kire may only use unaligned Ships. While you have 4 or more unaligned Crew with a printed Influence cost greater than 2 on board, Der Kire inflicts 4 extra Hits during Boarding Attacks.

Derwyddon's Schemes.Name: Derwyddon's Schemes
Derwyddon's Schemes.Text: Target a Patron or Letter of Marque. That card is discarded.
Derwyddon's Schemes.Flavor Text: He can see the future and the past but he cannot see himself in either. A fact that will curse Avalon...soon.

Desperate Move.Name: Desperate Move
Desperate Move.Text: React: Play before you play a Boarding Attack. Draw two cards.
Desperate Move.Flavor Text: "A gun... please let me find a gun..."

Desperate Wages.Name: Desperate Wages
Desperate Wages.Text: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. If one of those card is a Crew, you may Hire the Crew, paying all costs.
Desperate Wages.Flavor Text: "All right! Take it, take it all! Just please come with me."

Destiny and Loyalty.Name: Destiny and Loyalty
Destiny and Loyalty.Text:
You may not play this card if you have a Villainous Captain.
React: Play when your Captain tacks to produce skill points. Your Captain produces extra skill points equal to the number of Loyal Crew you have on Board.
Destiny and Loyalty.Flavor Text: "Guttormson tracks us like a dog, hunting the Revensj for his Vendel masters. In three days, we'll learn who his truly the hunter, and who is the prey."

Destiny's Touch.Name: Destiny's Touch
Destiny's Touch.Text:
You may only play this card if all of your Crew are tacked.
React: Play this card and discard one Crew card from your hand when suffering Hits. Reduce the Hits suffered to 0.
Destiny's Touch.Flavor Text: Maggie skittered backward, limbs flailing wildly - then Kheired-Din caught sight of her bare feet. "The mark of the lightbringer!"

Devotion to the Cause.Name: Devotion to the Cause
Devotion to the Cause.Text: React: Play when you are paying the Influence cost for a Crew with a Secret Society symbol or Nation symbol. You may tack another Crew with the same symbol to produce an amount of Influence equal to the tacked Crew's Influence plus 3.
Devotion to the Cause.Flavor Text: Some are gone, but they will never be forgotten.

Diablo Tiburon.Name: Diablo Tiburon
Diablo Tiburon.Text:
This action may not be canceled if the target has any Damage Attachments attached. 
Act: Target a Ship in play. Target Ship suffers a number of hits equal to twice that Ship’s Move Cost. Inflict 4 extra hits if target Ship has at least one Damage Attachment attached.
Diablo Tiburon.Flavor Text: It knew just where and when to strike. The frigate didn’t stand a chance.

Die Kreuzritter Acolyte.Name: Die Kreuzritter Acolyte
Die Kreuzritter Acolyte.Text:
+2 Adventuring and +1 Swashbuckling.
React: Discard this card when you are paying the Influence cost to hire a Kreuzritter Crew to produce 3 Influence.

Die Kreuzritter Membership.Name: Die Kreuzritter Membership
Die Kreuzritter Membership.Text:
This Captain gains the Die Kreuzritter affiliation.
React: Tack this card when you are paying an Influence cost to produce 3 Influence. You may only use this ability while you have 3 or more other Die Kreuzritter Crew on board.

Die Seevogel.Name: Die Seevogel
Die Seevogel.Text:
Act: Tack Die Seevogel and one of your Crew to untack another one of your non-Captain Crew.
React: Tack before performing an action, to move to an adjacent Sea.

Dieter von Glowen.Name: Dieter von Glowen
Dieter von Glowen.Text:
When this Crew tacks or sinks to absorb Hits, he absorbs one extra Hit.
React: Tack and sink this Crew when you are suffering Hits during a boarding to reduce the Hits suffered to 0.
Dieter von Glowen.Flavor Text: A dracheneisen breastplate keeps him safe from any blow. Without it, he would have perished long ago.

Dietrich Sword.Name: Dietrich Sword
Dietrich Sword.Text:
The cost of this card is reduced by 3 if being attached to a Rose and Cross Crew (minimum 0).
React: Tack when this Crew inflicts Hits with a Boarding Attack to target a non-Captain Crew on the opposing Ship. This Crew inflicts additional Hits equal to the printed Swashbuckling of the target Crew.
Dietrich Sword.Flavor Text: Only the best Knights may wield them, but they serve their owners well.

Dimitri \"the Bear\" Romanovski.Name: Dimitri "the Bear" Romanovski
Dimitri \"the Bear\" Romanovski.Text:
If this Crew inflicts Hits during a Duel, he inflicts 4 extra Hits.
React: When this Crew is tacking to absorb Hhits you may tack any number of Pyeryem knacks attached to this Crew to have this Crew absorb an additional amount of Hits equal to double the number of Pyeryem Knacks tacked.
Dimitri \"the Bear\" Romanovski.Flavor Text: "Why can't the rest of the world be like Ussura?"

Diplomatic Envoy.Name: Diplomatic Envoy
Diplomatic Envoy.Text: You may only play this card if you have a Heroic Captain. Name a Sea to attach this card to another's player Ship. This card counts as 2 Crew against the crew maximum of the Ship it is attached to. The Captain of that Ship gains +1 Influence while this card is attached. This card is sunk when that Ship enters the named Sea.

Direct Hit!.Name: Direct Hit!
Direct Hit!.Text: React: Play when tacking a Crew with a Cannon skill greater that 6. That Crew produces 3 extra Cannon.
Direct Hit!.Flavor Text: "As the flames leapt up into the night, I thought surely that I'd wandered into the very mouth of the Abyss. By morning, I knew I was right."

Dirk.Name: Dirk
Dirk.Text: This Crew inflicts 1 extra Hit during Boarding Attacks.
Dirk.Flavor Text: "Ye don't want that little girls knife. Here, lemme get ye a real knife..." - Angus McCloud

Disarmed!.Name: Disarmed!
Disarmed!.Text: React: Play immediately before one of your Crew with a Swashbuckling greater than 2 starts a Boarding Attack. Your opponent must discard two cards from his or her hand. You may only play one Disarmed per Boarding Attack.
Disarmed!.Flavor Text: "Let's see how brave you are without...this!"

Disguised Ship.Name: Disguised Ship
Disguised Ship.Text: For the remainder of the turn, other players may not perform actions which react to your Ship entering their Sea.
Disguised Ship.Flavor Text: "Ringer Gutwold taught me this - change the plaque, change the sails, and ye got a whole new ship."

Dispatching The Scum.Name: Dispatching The Scum
Dispatching The Scum.Text: React: Play when one of your Swordsman Crew inflicts Hits during a Boarding Attack. Your Crew inflicts Hits equal to your Crew's Swashbuckling, but cannot receive any bonuses. The opposing player may not tack Crew to absorb these Hits.
Dispatching The Scum.Flavor Text: "Never call me a pirate! I am a Castillian; that is all you need to know."

Disregard.Name: Disregard
Disregard.Text: Target one Sea Attachment in this Sea. Discard that Sea Attachment. This card's cost is reduced to zero if you have a Corsairs Captain.
Disregard.Flavor Text: "t is not a monster. It is a distraction. Throw it overboard and keep rowing." - Kheired-Din

Diving Apparatus.Name: Diving Apparatus
Diving Apparatus.Text:
+2 Adventuring.
Act: Tack this card to target an Item or Artifact Adventure in this Sea. The Adventuring cost of that Adventure is reduced by 3 (minimum 0) until the end of the turn.
React: Tack this card after one of your Attachments has been sunk by another player's card effect to return that card to your hand.

Divvying the Plunder.Name: Divvying the Plunder
Divvying the Plunder.Text: React: Play after completing an Adventure. You may perform another action immediately after this one.
Divvying the Plunder.Flavor Text: Two years of rats, disease, leeches, and worms is what ya lived through boys. Now it's time to get yur reward.

Dockside Raid.Name: Dockside Raid
Dockside Raid.Text: Target a Captain. Tack and Sink one of your Crew with an Influence cost of 3 or more to reduce all of the target Captain's skills by 2 (minimum 1) until the end of the turn.
Dockside Raid.Flavor Text: The Brotherhood scaled the side of the Roost like rats. The Castillian sailors aboard had no chance to sound the alarm.

Doing Time.Name: Doing Time
Doing Time.Text: This Crew gains +1 to all skills.
Doing Time.Flavor Text: "I learned all kinds of things when I was on the street," Delaina told Faust. He grinned. "Then why did you get caught?"

Domingo.Name: Domingo
Domingo.Flavor Text: "This ought to give 'em a bellyful, eh, me beauty?"

Domingo Gunner.Name: Domingo Gunner
Domingo Gunner.Flavor Text: "This ought to give 'em a bellyful, eh, me beauty?"

Domingo Marten de Avila.Name: Domingo Marten de Avila
Domingo Marten de Avila.Text: Domingo has +2 Sailing if his Captain is Castillian.
Domingo Marten de Avila.Flavor Text: "It's the Avalons! Sink the dogs below the waves! For Castille! For Castille!"

Don Deanna.Name: Don Deanna
Don Deanna.Text: You may draw one card immediately before Don Deanna starts a Boarding Attack.
Don Deanna.Flavor Text: "Let's try this once again, only without the groveling."

Don Deanna - Exp..Name: Don Deanna - Exp.
Don Deanna - Exp..Text: Increase your hand size by 1 while your Ship is involved in a Boarding.
Don Deanna - Exp..Flavor Text: Some souls are simply too wicked to die.

Don Julio del Bejarano de Castillo.Name: Don Julio del Bejarano de Castillo
Don Julio del Bejarano de Castillo.Text:
Any player in this Sea may tack and discard a Holy Crew as an action to discard this card.
React: Tack after a Holy Crew in this or an adjacent Sea to produce skill points to reduce the skill points produced to 0.
React: Discard one of your non-Captain Rose and Cross Crew when you are suffering Hits in this or an adjacent Sea to reduce the Hits to 0.

Doña Arantxa Grijalva.Name: Doña Arantxa Grijalva
Doña Arantxa Grijalva.Text: React: Once per turn, you may discard 2 cards from your hand when suffering Hits to reduce the Hits suffered by 3 (minimum 0). You may only use this ability if this Crew is untacked and you are suffering 4 or more Hits.

Doña Lucia del Torres.Name: Doña Lucia del Torres
Doña Lucia del Torres.Text: If any other Ship in this Sea has one or more Castillian or Montaigne Crew on board, this Crew has +2 to all of her skills.
Doña Lucia del Torres.Flavor Text: "I know the true name of your Captain Allende - and I love him just as much as I did when he sat on the throne of Castille."

Donna.Name: Donna
Donna.Text: You may draw one card immediately before Donna starts a Boarding Attack.
Donna.Flavor Text: "Someone once asked him if he had a girlfriend named 'Ed'. Donna killed him, too."

Donna - Exp..Name: Donna - Exp.
Donna - Exp..Text: Act: Once per turn you may discard 1 card from your hand and target another Ship in this Sea to begin a Boarding with that Ship. The player controlling the Ship targeted by the Boarding may cancel this action by paying  their Ship's move cost in Sailing.

Donovan School.Name: Donovan School
Donovan School.Text: React: Tack Donovan School to draw two cards after this Crew plays a Slash Boarding Attack.
Donovan School.Flavor Text: "Antiquated? Maybe. But who's the one walking away from this?"

Dorf Klinderhoff.Name: Dorf Klinderhoff
Dorf Klinderhoff.Text: Dorf does not count toward your crew maximum.
Dorf Klinderhoff.Flavor Text: "I said 'Keep 'er still!' How do you expect me to get anything done here while.. Blast it! Keep 'er still!"

Dorf Klinderhoff - Exp..Name: Dorf Klinderhoff - Exp.
Dorf Klinderhoff - Exp..Text:
Dorf does not count against your Crew maximum.
Act: Tack Dorf to sink a Damage Attachment attached to your Ship (ignoring the card effects restrictions).
Dorf Klinderhoff - Exp..Flavor Text: "I'd welcome the Rogers at this point. Anything beats waiting and wondering."

Double the Rum Ration.Name: Double the Rum Ration
Double the Rum Ration.Text: Each of your Crew, except your Captain, gains +1 Swashbuckling and loses 1 from each of their other four skills (minimum 0) until the end of the turn.
Double the Rum Ration.Flavor Text: "Tonight, we're ALL gonna get stupid drunk!"

Down to the Nub.Name: Down to the Nub
Down to the Nub.Text: React: Play when you are discarding or sinking a Cheap Attachment. The Cheap Attachment remains attached.
Down to the Nub.Flavor Text: "Don't laugh. It'll still cut you in half."

Down with l'Empereur.Name: Down with l'Empereur
Down with l'Empereur.Cost: 6 Adv.; 4 in Frothing  Sea or if you have a Rilasciare Crew on board
Down with l'Empereur.Trait: 2 Seas Away - Oath - Unique - Crew Attachment
Down with l'Empereur.Text:
+1 Swashbuckling.
Act: Tack this card to target and sink a Patron or Letter of Marque card in this Sea.
Act: Tack and sink this card to target and sink any non-Control Sea Attachment in this Sea.
Down with l'Empereur.Flavor Text: "Flee, your Majesty! I cannot stop them all."

Dr. Carel Voorhees.Name: Dr. Carel Voorhees
Dr. Carel Voorhees.Text: The title of this card is "Archæologists" for Experienced purposes. All of your other Crew cards with the title "Archæologists" have +2 Sailing and +1 Adventuring.
Dr. Carel Voorhees.Flavor Text: "I need a volunteer to take this to Castille."

Dread.Name: Dread
Dread.Trait: First Mate - Loyal - Unique - Villainous - Swordsman +2
Dread.Text: When this Crew is attempting to reverse Boarding Attacks, you may consider each card’s Boarding Attack box to act as an additional (ie. third) Boarding Defence box.
Dread.Flavor Text: The Black Freighter sailed with Upham as captain now. His mission was vengeance against the living.

Dredging the Trade River.Name: Dredging the Trade River
Dredging the Trade River.Flavor Text: "What does Sieger want with dirt, anyway?"

Dregs and Thugs.Name: Dregs and Thugs
Dregs and Thugs.Text:
When Dreg and Thugs tack to absorb Hits, they absorb 2 extra Hits.
React: Once per turn, discard a card from your hand when you are suffering Hits to reduce the Hits suffered by 2.

Drop a Boarding Net.Name: Drop a Boarding Net
Drop a Boarding Net.Text: React: Instead of performing a Boarding Attack, target one Crew on the other Ship in the Boarding. Tack that Crew.
Drop a Boarding Net.Flavor Text: "Throw it around him, then haul him in like a load of fish. No need to get bloody." - Philip Gosse

Drusilla Gallegos de Aldana.Name: Drusilla Gallegos de Aldana
Drusilla Gallegos de Aldana.Text:
React: Tack and discard this card after another player has untacked a non-Captain Crew during the Actions phase to discard the untacked Crew.
React: Tack or discard this card after another player has untacked one of their Crew to inflict 4 Hits on that player's Ship.
Drusilla Gallegos de Aldana.Flavor Text: "I know certain saboteurs in the shipyards who can make your job much easier."

Dry Docks.Name: Dry Docks
Dry Docks.Text: React: Tack this card while your Ship is this Sea and you are paying to discard or sink a Damage Attachment. Dry Docks produces 5 points toward discarding or sinking the Damage Attachment.
Dry Docks.Flavor Text: "She'll be ready, Bonnie. One way or another."

Dryope Vestini.Name: Dryope Vestini
Dryope Vestini.Text: This Crew may not attach Fate Knacks while tacked.
Dryope Vestini.Flavor Text: The strands are interconnected. Pulling on one can have devstating, unforeseen repercussions. Dryope never understood that until the night her husband hanged himself.

Duel with a Castillian.Name: Duel with a Castillian
Duel with a Castillian.Text: +1 Swashbuckling. This Crew inflicts 3 extra Hits during Boarding Attacks.
Duel with a Castillian.Flavor Text: "An astounding move, isn't it? Come quietly to the brig, and I might consent to teach it to you" - Margaretta Orduño

Dunti.Name: Dunti
Dunti.Text: When Dunti inflicts Hits with a Boarding Attack, you may discard 2 cards from your hand to inflict 3 extra Hits, once per Boarding Attack.
Dunti.Flavor Text: "They say that one day he just left his monastery and became a pirate. What an odd bird." - Espera

Dunti - Exp..Name: Dunti - Exp.
Dunti - Exp..Text:
If Ernesto Castillus is your Captain, Dunti has the trait: First Mate.
React: Tack and sink one of your Crew aligned to your Captain's faction when a player plays an Action card as a React to Suffering Hits. That Action card is canceled.
Dunti - Exp..Flavor Text: "My destiny never lay with 'Din. It lay with Espera."

Dupre & Hans.Name: Dupre & Hans
Dupre & Hans.Text: When Dupre & Hans tack to absorb Hits from a Cannon Attack, they absorb 1 extra Hit.
Dupre & Hans.Flavor Text: "This one doesn't like us, Hans." "Perhaps he'll find the sharks more agreeable."

Dupre & Hans - Exp..Name: Dupre & Hans - Exp.
Dupre & Hans - Exp..Text: React: Once per turn, immediately after all of the Hits inflicted by this Crew during a Boarding Attack are absorbed, discard a card from your hand to inflict 2 Hits on the other Ship in the Boarding.
Dupre & Hans - Exp..Flavor Text: "Gotcha!" Dupre snagged his friend's wrist as Hans plummeted helplessly to the street below.
Dupre & Hans - Exp..Errata: In the name, and changed to "&". Trait Heroic added.

Dupre and Hans - Exp..Name: Dupre and Hans - Exp.
Dupre and Hans - Exp..Text: React: Once per turn, immediately after all of the Hits inflicted by Dupre and Hans during a Boarding Attack are absorbed, discard a card from your hand to inflict 2 Hits on the other Ship in the Boarding.
Dupre and Hans - Exp..Flavor Text: "Gotcha!" Dupre snagged his friend's wrist as Hans plummeted helplessly towards the street below.

Dust of Irritation.Name: Dust of Irritation
Dust of Irritation.Text: Act: Tack this card to target a Crew in this Sea and draw a card. Until the end of the turn, when target Crew tacks to produce Skill points they produce 3 fewer points of the skill (minimum 0). Discard this card at the end of the turn.

Dust of Petrification.Name: Dust of Petrification
Dust of Petrification.Text: Act: Tack this card to target a Crew in this Sea and draw a card. Until the end of the turn, target Crew tacks absorbs 3 extra Hits when tacking to absorb Hits. Discard this card at the end of the turn.
Dust of Petrification.Flavor Text: "It hardens the skin. You might as well try to kill a granite boulder."

Dust to Dust.Name: Dust to Dust
Dust to Dust.Text: React: Play when you are inflicting exactly 4 Hits to inflict 2 extra Hits.
Dust to Dust.Flavor Text: The map ignited in Necro's hand. "I can't have you following this to the Spear, my old friend. Thomas was the first victim, but he won't be the last…"

Edahgo.Name: Edahgo
Edahgo.Text: While Edahgo is on your Ship, your Captive Crews have a +1 to all skills.
Edahgo.Flavor Text: Hate personified. Spite on legs. Kheired-Din's taskmaster rules through fear and pain, the only emotions he understands.

Edahgo - Exp..Name: Edahgo - Exp.
Edahgo - Exp..Trait: Experienced - Unique - Loyal - First Mate - Villainous
Edahgo - Exp..Text: Act: Once per turn, sink one of your Captive Crew to give all of your Captive Crews +2 to each of their skills which are currently greater than zero, until the end of the turn.
Edahgo - Exp..Flavor Text: He never speaks of the burns Espera gave him - or the way they were inflicted.
Edahgo - Exp..Errata: Now affects skills greater than 0, not greater than 1.

Edouard du Chevalier.Name: Edouard du Chevalier
Edouard du Chevalier.Text:
The title of this card is "Montaigne Musketeers" for Experienced purposes.
React: Tack or sink one of your Crew cards with the title "Montaigne Musketeers" when you are suffering Hits to absorb 4 Hits.
Edouard du Chevalier.Flavor Text: He serves two orders... and prays he never has to choose between them.

Egil Bergljot Larrson.Name: Egil Bergljot Larrson
Egil Bergljot Larrson.Text: When Egil is producing Cannon, you may pay your Ship's move cost in Sailing to produce 3 extra Cannon.
Egil Bergljot Larrson.Flavor Text: He's the voice of an angry ship. Even in the fiercest storms, his howls still rise above the din.

Eisen Alliance.Name: Eisen Alliance
Eisen Alliance.Text:
You may only play this card while your Ship is in the Frothing Sea. You must discard 3 Item Attachments to put this card into play. Your Captain is considered to have the Eisen symbol. Any player may discard this card as an Action by discarding 3 of their completed Adventures while in this Sea.
Act: Tack this card to search your deck for an Adventure whose cost is reduced while you have The River in play. Put that card into your hand then shuffle your deck.

Eisen Cannon Balls.Name: Eisen Cannon Balls
Eisen Cannon Balls.Cost: 6 Adv.; 2 in the Mirror and you have The River in play
Eisen Cannon Balls.Flavor Text: They could put a hole in El Morro itself.

Eisen Cannons.Name: Eisen Cannons
Eisen Cannons.Flavor Text: "She aint' made o' that Eisen steel, but she's Eisen design from stem to stern and that's good enough for me."

Eisen Dreizack.Name: Eisen Dreizack
Eisen Dreizack.Text:
Your Crew produce 3 extra Swashbuckling when tacking to produce Swashbuckling in order to discard or sink a Damage attachment attached to this Ship.
React: Tack before performing an action, to move to an adjacent Sea.

Eisen Driezack.Name: Eisen Driezack
Eisen Driezack.Text:
Your Crew produce 3 extra Swashbuckling when tacking to produce Swashbuckling to discard or sink a Damage attachment attached to this Ship.
React: Tack before performing an action, to move to an adjacent Sea.

Eisen Mercs.Name: Eisen Mercs
Eisen Mercs.Text: Eisen Mercs inflict 2 extra Hits during Boarding Attacks for each other Crew you have on Board with the title "Eisen Mercs".
Eisen Mercs.Flavor Text: Veterans of the War of the Cross. Olafssdottir and her Crew hold few terrors for men such as these.

Eisen Steel.Name: Eisen Steel
Eisen Steel.Cost: 6 Adv.; 2 in the Mirror and you have The River in play

Eisenfaust School.Name: Eisenfaust School
Eisenfaust School.Text: React: Tack Eisenfaust School to draw two cards after this Crew plays a Punch Boarding Attack.
Eisenfaust School.Flavor Text: "Hard and relentless, like the land which created it."

EJ Tojo.Name: EJ Tojo
EJ Tojo.Text: This Crew may not be pushed forward to fight in a Boarding Attack if your Captain is villainous.
EJ Tojo.Flavor Text: "El Vago wishes to have a word with this 'Espera'. I volunteered to find him."

El Esoque Occulto.Name: El Esoque Occulto
El Esoque Occulto.Text:
React: Play after you have inflicted 4 or more hits with a Los Vagos Crew during a Boarding. After all of the hits are absorbed, the Los Vagos Crew inflicts an additional 2 Hits. You may not play another version of this card for this effect during this Boarding Attack.
React: Play this card as a normal Boarding Attack. This Crew inflicts 2 extra Hits with this Boarding Attack. If you play the final card in the Boarding Attack and inflict Hits you may return this card to your hand after all of the hits have been suffered.

El Fuego Negro.Name: El Fuego Negro
El Fuego Negro.Text:
Act: Once per turn, discard 2 cards from your hand to begin a boarding with a Ship in this Sea, instead of paying your Ship's Move Cost.
React: Tack before performing an Action, to move to an adjacent Sea.

El Puñal Occulto School.Name: El Puñal Occulto School
El Puñal Occulto School.Text:
The cost of this Attachment is reduced by 3 if being attached to a Los Vagos Crew. Your Boarding Attack that ends with a Dagger inflicts 2 extra Hits.
React: Tack this card when this Crew plays a Dagger Boarding Attack; you may change that attack to a Thrust or Club.

El Toro Rojo.Name: El Toro Rojo
El Toro Rojo.Text:
Act: Tack to search your deack for a Chantey card, show it to your opponent(s), and place it in your hand. Shuffle your deck.
React: Tack before performing an action, to move to an adjacent Sea.

El Vago.Name: El Vago
El Vago.Text:
You must be in la Boca and have a Brotherhood Captain to play this card.
Act: Target a Ship in this Sea and tack El Vago to inflict 2 Hits on that Ship.
Act: Tack El Vago to attach him to a different Sea.

Elena Agnelli.Name: Elena Agnelli
Elena Agnelli.Text: If Elena is discarded or sunk, you must discard another of your non-Captain Crew.
Elena Agnelli.Flavor Text: "For the right price, I can help you, Captain Reis. Whom exactly do you wish to find?"

Ellena Hawksflight.Name: Ellena Hawksflight
Ellena Hawksflight.Text:
The title of this card is "Vestenmannavnjar Archers" for Experienced purposes.
Act: Tack this Crew or one of your cards with the title "Vestenmannavnjar Archers" to target a Ship in this Sea. Inflict a 4 Hit Cannon Attack on the target Ship.
Ellena Hawksflight.Flavor Text: "Ragnarok wasn't supposed to look like this."

Emily de Gallegos.Name: Emily de Gallegos
Emily de Gallegos.Text: React: Instead of performing a Boarding Attack, tack Emily to tack all non-Captain Crew on board the Ships in  the Boarding with a printed Influence cost less than 2.
Emily de Gallegos.Flavor Text: "I married a Castillian, renounced my heritage, and tried to be a good Vaticine. But if you want trouble, I'll show you what I learned before Theus saved me."

Encoding Device.Name: Encoding Device
Encoding Device.Text:
The cost of this card is reduced by 3 if being attached to a Invisible College Crew.
React: After you have taken an action, discard 3 cards from your hand and tack this card to take an additional action.
Encoding Device.Flavor Text: "No, no, it's just a music box. How could a music box create secrets message."

Endings and Beginnings.Name: Endings and Beginnings
Endings and Beginnings.Text:
React: Play instead of performing a Boarding Attack. Tack a Crew to target a Crew Attachment on a tacked Crew on the opposing player's Ship. Discard the target Crew Attachment (you may not discard a Captain Attachment, but you may discard a Crew Attachment on a Captain).
React: Play after you have canceled a boarding Attempt by paying your Ship's Move Cost to move your Ship to an adajcent Sea.
Endings and Beginnings.Flavor Text: "Build a new life, Melinda. Be happy. He'd want that. His task is over now. I'll see you again when mine is."

Enrique Orduño.Name: Enrique Orduño
Enrique Orduño.Text: While you have three or more other Castillian Crew on your ship, all of your Boarding Attacks inflict 1 extra Hit.
Enrique Orduño.Flavor Text: The Castillians say that the man with many enemies and no allies is the most dangerous man.

Enrique Orduño - Foil.Name: Enrique Orduño - Foil
Enrique Orduño - Foil.Text: While you have three or more other Castillian Crew on your ship, all of your Boarding Attacks inflict 1 extra Hit.
Enrique Orduño - Foil.Flavor Text: The Castillians say that the man with many enemies and no allies is the most dangerous man.

Entertainers.Name: Entertainers
Entertainers.Text: React: When you are paying a cost to cancel an action, tack the Entertainers to produce 3 skill points toward the cancel cost.
Entertainers.Flavor Text: "Just keep playing. Eventually they'll all pass out."

Entwining Kelp.Name: Entwining Kelp
Entwining Kelp.Text: React: Play when a Ship tacks to use its "Free Move" ability. The "Free Move" is canceled.
Entwining Kelp.Flavor Text: "Cut their anchor loose," Espera called. "We don't want them following us once we're free."

Eric Skaarsgaard.Name: Eric Skaarsgaard
Eric Skaarsgaard.Text:
This Crew inflicts one extra hit during Boarding Attacks.
React: When this Crew is reversing a Boarding Attack, discard a card with the Weather trait from your hand. The Boarding Attack is reversed with the Boarding Attack of the Weather card, and this Crew gains +1 Swashbuckling until the end of the Boarding Attack.
Eric Skaarsgaard.Flavor Text: Eric couldn’t save his parents, but he has vowed to save his brother from his blood thirsty vendetta.

Erich Carlberg.Name: Erich Carlberg
Erich Carlberg.Text: Your Crew with the title "Eisen Mercs" absorb 2 extra Hits when tacking to absorb Hits.
Erich Carlberg.Flavor Text: "My men are beyond reproach and obey me as they would their father. We have signed a contract, Herr Guttormson, and will honor it unto death."

Erik the Bold.Name: Erik the Bold
Erik the Bold.Text: React: Play when you have just completed an Adventure for which you paid the reduced cost. If this Crew tacked to produce Adventuring for that reduced cost, you may untack him.
