Erik the Bold.Flavor Text: "The name? I had it tattoed on my arse after getting drunk one night. It seemed pretty funny at the time."

Ernesto Castillus.Name: Ernesto Castillus
Ernesto Castillus.Text:
You may not have Espera on board. Your Captive Crew do not have the No Attachments trait.
Act: Once per turn, if you have 3 or more other Captive Corsair Crew on your Ship, move your Ship to an adjacent Sea.
Ernesto Castillus.Errata: Comment to allow the sort procedure to group all the fixed captains of this extension - not game related

Ernesto's Power.Name: Ernesto's Power
Ernesto's Power.Text:
If "Ernesto Castillius" is your Captain, you may attach this card to your Captain (at no cost) when starting Crew are revealed. This Captain is considered a Sorcerer.
Act: Sink a Sorcery Knack and discard another card (both from your hand) to target a Ship in this Sea. Inflict 2 Hits on the target Ship. You may not use this ability while this Captain is tacked.

Errant Match.Name: Errant Match
Errant Match.Text:
React: Play after another player has absorbed Hits. Target and discard one Ship Attachment on that player's Ship.
React: Play when another player is untacking a Crew. That Crew remains tacked. When playing this effect, you may tack one or more of your completed Adventures to increase the cancel cost of this card by the number of completed Adventures tacked.

Escorting the MacDuff.Name: Escorting the MacDuff
Escorting the MacDuff.Flavor Text: "I've urgent business in Vendel, and Queen Elaine has assured me that you can keep quiet about it." - High King James MacDuff II

Espera.Name: Espera
Espera.Text: When you are putting Espera into play from your hand, his Influence cost is zero if you have Dalia on your Ship.
Espera.Flavor Text: He guides the Strange Skies on her course, chained to the wheel like a dog. But Dalia's dancing keeps him captive as no shackle can.

Eternal Desire.Name: Eternal Desire
Eternal Desire.Text: All Captains have the following ability: React: Discard a card from your hand when paying your Ship's Move Cost to produce 1 Sailing.
Eternal Desire.Flavor Text: "How could you have loved a woman so cruel?" Ernesto smiled sadly. "I looked past her cruelty to the loneliness which caused it."

Evangeline Rois et Reines du Rogné.Name: Evangeline Rois et Reines du Rogné
Evangeline Rois et Reines du Rogné.Text: Ports you are attaching to this Sea have their skill costs reduced by 2. Your Rose and Cross Crew with an Influence cost greater than 3, have +1 Influence while this card is in play.

Evasive Course.Name: Evasive Course
Evasive Course.Text: React: Play when you suffer Hits from a Cannon Attack. Reduce the Hits suffered by 5.
Evasive Course.Flavor Text: "There! That's our way out, lads! Between 'em!" - J. Berek

Expeditious Retreat.Name: Expeditious Retreat
Expeditious Retreat.Text:
React: Play this card to reverse a Club, Slash or Dagger Boarding Attack. This Boarding Attack is considered resolved, with neither Crew inflicting Hits. Tack both Crew involved in the Boarding Attack.
React: When a Ship moves into your Sea using it's "Free Move" ability, move your Ship to an adjacent Sea. The cost of this card is raised by your Ship's Move Cost for this ability unless you have a Los Vagos Captain.
Expeditious Retreat.Flavor Text: "Where's Berek? Celedoine wants a word with him..."

Experience Has Its Rewards.Name: Experience Has Its Rewards
Experience Has Its Rewards.Text: React: Play when you are pushing an Experienced Crew forward to perform a Boarding Attack. Discard all of the cards in your hand to draw 7 cards from your deck.
Experience Has Its Rewards.Flavor Text: Torvo's sword flicked out of the sheath like a razor. "Ah, new practice targets."

Experience is the Best Teacher.Name: Experience is the Best Teacher
Experience is the Best Teacher.Text: React: Play when you are tacking a Crew to pay a cost and that Crew has one or more completed Adventures attached. The Crew produces 1 extra point of the skill. That Crew produces 1 additional point (2 total) if you have a Brotherhood Captain.
Experience is the Best Teacher.Flavor Text: "Ye big lummox! I've seen scarier pussy cats! Show me what yer made of, or there'll be squid fer dinner tonight!"

Explorer Pride.Name: Explorer Pride
Explorer Pride.Text: One of your Explorer Crew gains +1 Cannon and +1 Swashbuckling until the end of the turn. That Crew gains +1 extra Cannon and +1 extra Swashbuckling if there is a Castille Ship in play (+2 total each).
Explorer Pride.Flavor Text: "McCormick's quest drives us, but a good fight still makes life worth living." - Maggie Malone

Extra Watch.Name: Extra Watch
Extra Watch.Flavor Text: Delaina watched as the men swarmed up to the crows' nests. "But Captain," she asked, "what are we looking for?" "I don't know," Allende replied, "but you'll know it when you see it."

Eye of Sky and Sea.Name: Eye of Sky and Sea
Eye of Sky and Sea.Text: React: Tack this Crew when a Crew in this sea tacks to produce Cannon. That Crew produces no Cannon.
Eye of Sky and Sea.Flavor Text: "Don't look too deep : you could fall in and never come out." - Celedoine

Eye of the Storm.Name: Eye of the Storm
Eye of the Storm.Trait: Unique - 2 Seas Away - Artifact - Captain Attachment
Eye of the Storm.Text: Reduce your Ship's move cost by 1 (minimum 1).

Eyepatch.Name: Eyepatch
Eyepatch.Text: React: Play when you suffer Hits. Attach this card to one of your Crew to suffer 1 fewer hit. This Attachment had the Eye trait. A Crew may not have more than one Eye Attachment.
Eyepatch.Flavor Text: "Ya keep starin' yu'll see one in the mirror for the rest of yur life!"
Eyepatch.Errata: Text modified: you have to attach this card to prevent Hits. If you can't attch this card, you can't prevent Hits.

Eyes of Reason.Name: Eyes of Reason
Eyes of Reason.Text: React: Tack the Eye of Reason and target a Crew on another player's Ship instead of performing a Boarding Attack. All Attachments on the target are tacked. The attachments are considered to be blank until after the boarding ends.
Eyes of Reason.Flavor Text: "The eye can locate the Spear, Gosse. All you need to do is find it." - Maximillian.

Faerie Path.Name: Faerie Path
Faerie Path.Cost: Tack one of your Sorcerers with Glamour 1 or more.
Faerie Path.Trait: 1 Sea Away - Crew Attachment - Glamour 1 Knack
Faerie Path.Text: Act: Tack this card to target another Ship. The target Ship's player must move their Ship to an adjacent Sea (without cost).
Faerie Path.Flavor Text: "The Sidhe are watching," Celedoine murmured. "They don't want us to lose our way..."
Faerie Path.Errata: Precision: the opponent's Ship moves without cost
Faerie Path.Changes on MRP: Cost; sepcial cost/Cancel cost modified;Text modified;Flavor text modified;Artist modified;

Fair Skies.Name: Fair Skies
Fair Skies.Text: Target a Sea. During the Draw Cards Phase this turn, any player in target Sea may draw 2 extra cards from their deck.
Fair Skies.Flavor Text: "...and I hates me the days off..." - Grousin' George

Fair Warning.Name: Fair Warning
Fair Warning.Text:
The skill costs to discard or sink your Ally cards are increased by 1.
React: Discard Fair Warning when a player takes an Action that results in one of your Ally cards being discarded. That Action is cancelled.
Fair Warning.Flavor Text: "It's from Faust. 'Revolt aboard Strange Skies. Trail lost. Proceeding to final switch.'"

Fair Weather Friend - Foil.Name: Fair Weather Friend - Foil
Fair Weather Friend - Foil.Text:
Immediately after players reveal their starting Crews, choose and sink up to 6 of the cards in your deck.
React: Tack before performing an action, to move to an adjacent Sea.

Faisal.Name: Faisal
Faisal.Text: You must push Faisal forward to conduct your first Boarding Attack of each Boarding you are in, even if he is tacked.
Faisal.Flavor Text: "Today I fight. Tommorrow I die. The day after that, I join the Prophet."

False Colors.Name: False Colors
False Colors.Text: Act: Tack your Ship and one of your Ally Attachments to play this card. Move your Ship to that Ally's Sea, and move that Ally to the Sea your Ship occupied at the start of this action.
False Colors.Flavor Text: "A single flag can deceive an entire fleet." - Jeremiah Berek.

Fancy Dans.Name: Fancy Dans
Fancy Dans.Flavor Text: "After you, Alfonse!" "Oh no! After you, I insist!"

Fancy Footwork.Name: Fancy Footwork
Fancy Footwork.Text: +2 Swashbuckling. This Crew inflicts 2 extra Hits during Boarding Attacks.
Fancy Footwork.Flavor Text: He danced madly across the deck, thrusting the blade in time with his feet. By the time he reached the tiller, they no longer pursued him.

Fancy Swordplay.Name: Fancy Swordplay
Fancy Swordplay.Text: React: Play immediately before one of your Swordsman Crew is about to play a Boarding Attack card from your hand. Draw 3 cards.
Fancy Swordplay.Flavor Text: "Why should I parry such a clumsy thrust when the chair can do it for me?"
Fancy Swordplay.Errata: Now allows to draw 3 cards instead of 2.

Fate's Binding.Name: Fate's Binding
Fate's Binding.Text: React: Tack this card after you have moved into a Sea to immediately hire a Crew from your hand. Reduce the Crew's Influence cost by this Crew's Fate.
Fate's Binding.Flavor Text: "You'll find him," Lucrezia hissed through the gateway. "You'll find him and bring him back." "No!" Alesio struggled as she felt the threads beginning to warp. "You can't bring back the dead! You'll destroy us all!"

Fate's Blessing.Name: Fate's Blessing
Fate's Blessing.Text: React: Tack Fate's Blessing when you are suffering Hits during a Boarding. You suffer 2 fewer Hits.
Fate's Blessing.Flavor Text: Pasquale felt the strands stretch as he turned to the Montaigne Swordsman. "Now I'm ready, Signore."

Fate's Revenge.Name: Fate's Revenge
Fate's Revenge.Text: React: Tack your Captain when you are entering a Boarding as the Defender to untack all of your non-Captain Crew. The attacker may also untack all of their non-Captain Crew.
Fate's Revenge.Flavor Text: Lucrezia landed like a cat on the nearest witch. "Not today, my darling," she hissed. "These Brotherhood poppets have things to do..."

Fate's Web.Name: Fate's Web
Fate's Web.Text: You must tack one of your Crew with Fate of 1 or more to play this card. Attach this card to an uncompleted Adventure of another player. All hits inflicted by that player are reduced by 2 (min.0) until that Adventure is completed, discarded, or sunk. Discard this card when that adventure is completed.

Fateful Block.Name: Fateful Block
Fateful Block.Text: React: Play immediately after you play a Boarding Attack card from your hand during a Duel. If your Crew has the Swordsman trait, you may draw a number of cards from your deck equal to 2 plus your Crew's Swordsman bonus. If your opponent's Crew has the Swordsman trait as well, they may draw a number of cards from their deck equal to their Crew's Swordsman bonus.
Fateful Block.Flavor Text: "What's the matter? I thought yer wee blade could cut through anything…"

Fateful Duel.Name: Fateful Duel
Fateful Duel.Text: React: Play after you have played the final Boarding Attack during a Duel where both you and the opposing player had Ships in this Sea. Attach this card to this Sea. Sink this card at the beginning of the next turn.

Favor for a Noble.Name: Favor for a Noble
Favor for a Noble.Flavor Text: You can repay the Church, senor, simply by allowing the General to surrender his crew to you. The Eisen scum has already agreed to betray them..."

Faye Duinsinan.Name: Faye Duinsinan
Faye Duinsinan.Text: React:  Tack Faye when one of your crew is targeted by a card which begins a Duel. Cancel that action.
Faye Duinsinan.Flavor Text: "Alas, poor Stewart.  I knew him... right before I cut off his lying head."

Fear and Fire.Name: Fear and Fire
Fear and Fire.Text:
You must be in the Trade Sea to play this card.Any player in this Sea may discard this card by producing 12 Cannon as an action. Card effects which discard or sink Sea Attachments may not target this card.
Act: Tack this card to get a Control card from your deck, show it to your opponents and put it in your hand. Shuffle your deck.

Feathertuft.Name: Feathertuft
Feathertuft.Text: This Crew may not attach Pyeryem Knacks while tacked.
Feathertuft.Flavor Text: He had a real name once, but he forgot it when Matushka left him trapped in an owl's shape. He doesn't miss it much.

Feed the Hunger.Name: Feed the Hunger
Feed the Hunger.Cost: Tack and sink one of your Crew, if you have a Villainous Captain
Feed the Hunger.Text: +1 Swashbuckling. This Crew inflicts 2 extra Hits during Boarding Attacks.
Feed the Hunger.Flavor Text: The undead aren't choosy. If they have no living victims, they'll turn on their own...

Feeny Bonegnawer.Name: Feeny Bonegnawer
Feeny Bonegnawer.Text:
The title of this card is "Undead Boarders" for Experienced purposes. This Crew may tack to absorb Hits.
React: Tack one of your Crew with the title "Undead Boarders" when you are suffering Hits, to absorb 3 Hits.

Felipe Jose de Granjero.Name: Felipe Jose de Granjero
Felipe Jose de Granjero.Text: React: Tack and sink Felipe when you are suffering Hits and you have Margaretta Orduño in play. All of the Hits are absorbed. You may not put another copy of Felipe into play this game.
Felipe Jose de Granjero.Flavor Text: "If I were the captain, I'd keep a close eye on any fellow who's teaching my wife how to use a sword."

Felipe Jose de Granjero - Exp..Name: Felipe Jose de Granjero - Exp.
Felipe Jose de Granjero - Exp..Text: Act: Discard Felipe to target a Ship two or more Seas away. Move that Ship 1 Sea towards your Ship.
Felipe Jose de Granjero - Exp..Flavor Text: Margaretta asked him to deliver a message to the one man who could save her husband.

Felix \"Des Yeux\".Name: Felix "Des Yeux"
Felix \"Des Yeux\".Text: Felix gains +1 Cannon for every Adventure attached to him which increases his Swashbucking.
Felix \"Des Yeux\".Flavor Text: "Give me a sextant and a barrel of gunpowder and I'll sink any ship I can see."
Felix \"Des Yeux\".Errata: Name changed from 'Felix l'Aigle' to 'Felix Des Yeux". However, it's still the same card for multiplicity.

Felix \"l'Aigle\".Name: Felix "l'Aigle"
Felix \"l'Aigle\".Text: Felix gains +1 Cannon for every Adventure attached to him which increases his Swashbucking.
Felix \"l'Aigle\".Flavor Text: "Give me a sextant and a barrel of gunpowder and I'll sink any ship I can see."

Felix Guy-Daniel.Name: Felix Guy-Daniel
Felix Guy-Daniel.Text:
React: Once per turn, when this Crew is inflicting Hits with a Boarding Attack, you may sink one of your other Crew to have this Crew inflicts 3 extra Hits.
React: After you have attached a Porté Knack to this Crew, you may immediately take another action to attach another Porté Knack to this Crew. You may perform this ability any number of times per turn.
Felix Guy-Daniel.Flavor Text: Porté and betrayal… Felix has mastered both.

Fid Blue-Eye.Name: Fid Blue-Eye
Fid Blue-Eye.Text: Fid gains +2 to all skills if he has an Eye Attachment.
Fid Blue-Eye.Flavor Text: The knife he carries once took out his eye. It grew back, different than it was before. Late at night, he wonders what would happen if he put the other eye out with it.

Fierbas Desaix du Paix.Name: Fierbas Desaix du Paix
Fierbas Desaix du Paix.Text: When Fierbas tacks to produce Cannon, you may discard a card from your hand to produce 2 extra Cannon.
Fierbas Desaix du Paix.Flavor Text: "Fierbas!" I shouted. "We're out of shot!" I heard a rip and a scream, then he shouted back. "Not anymore, my friend!"

Fierbas Desaix du Paix - Exp..Name: Fierbas Desaix du Paix - Exp.
Fierbas Desaix du Paix - Exp..Text: Act: Target an Attachment attached to another player's Captain or Ship. Tack Fierbas to discard that card. The controller of that card may cancel this action by paying 3 Swashbuckling.
Fierbas Desaix du Paix - Exp..Flavor Text: "I came to fight Castille, not bomb churches. Perhaps my decision to leave the General was premature."

Figaro \"Lightfinger\" Falisci.Name: Figaro "Lightfinger" Falisci
Figaro \"Lightfinger\" Falisci.Text: React: Target another player's non-Captain Crew in this Sea when you are tacking this Crew to produce Influence. This Crew produces an additional amount of Influence equal to the targeted Crew's Influence. You may only use this ability once per turn.
Figaro \"Lightfinger\" Falisci.Flavor Text: "Don't worry, my darling. I paid for it."

Fine Boots.Name: Fine Boots
Fine Boots.Text: +1 Influence. A Crew may not have more than one Leg Attachment.
Fine Boots.Flavor Text: "They look better on her than the Montaigne sissy she took them from."

Fine Galley.Name: Fine Galley
Fine Galley.Text:
Fine Galley counts as one Crew toward you crew maximum.
React: Tack Fine Galley when a Crew tacks for a skill. That Crew produces 1 extra point of the skill.
Fine Galley.Flavor Text: Nothing raises a crew's spirits like a good hot meal.

Fine Rigging.Name: Fine Rigging
Fine Rigging.Flavor Text: "Scrub it up right, boys. We want to look our best when we send 'em back to the bottom where they belong." - Berek

Fine Rope and Tackle.Name: Fine Rope and Tackle
Fine Rope and Tackle.Flavor Text: "It's a fishing line. For catching pirates." - The General

Fire and Steel.Name: Fire and Steel
Fire and Steel.Text: You may only play this card if you have a Vesten Captain. Target and sink an uncompleted Adventure in this Sea.
Fire and Steel.Flavor Text: "I wonder if they can use their gold to pay off the sharks… " - Red Thorfild

Fire Ships.Name: Fire Ships
Fire Ships.Text: Act: Pay any amount of Adventuring (minimum 1) to play this card. Target a Ship in this or an adjacent Sea. The target Ship suffers a number of Hits equal to the amount of Adventuring produced. If you have a Captain with the name "Berek" in the title, this card's cancel cost is increased by 2.
Fire Ships.Flavor Text: "There's nothing more distracting than a blazing sloop."

First Mate's Duel.Name: First Mate's Duel
First Mate's Duel.Text: Target another player's Ship in this Sea. That player must target one of his or her Crew. Target one of your Crew and play a card from your hand to begin a Duel between both of the targeted Crew. The Crew playing the final Boarding Attack in the Duel inflicts 4 extra Hits.
First Mate's Duel.Flavor Text: "Is McCormick here," Cosette hissed, "or do you do all his fighting for him now?"

First Mate's Watch.Name: First Mate's Watch
First Mate's Watch.Text: Untack one of your First Mates.
First Mate's Watch.Flavor Text: "Pretty quiet by and large. The blood washed right off."

First Tide.Name: First Tide
First Tide.Text: Any player may sink this Chantey by sinking three cards from their hand as an Action. Crew with the Topman trait have +3 Sailing.
First Tide.Flavor Text: " I'm sailin' few Carleon at first tide.  If any o' you ain't there - if any o' you don't wanna follow me to the end o' this -  I understand." - Bonnie McGee

Flashing Swords Inn.Name: Flashing Swords Inn
Flashing Swords Inn.Text:
Any player in this Sea may sink the Inn by tacking 3 Swashbuckling as an action.
Act: Tack the Inn to target a Heroic Crew in this Sea. Tack that Crew.

Flee Your Enemies.Name: Flee Your Enemies
Flee Your Enemies.Text: React: Play after you have absorbed all of the Hits inflicted by an opponnent's Cannon Attack. Move your Ship up to two Seas towards the Mirror or the Trade Sea (moving through each Sea one at a time).
Flee Your Enemies.Flavor Text: As daring as they are, the Sea Dogs aren't above cutting and running if the odds turn against them.

Flogging.Name: Flogging
Flogging.Text: You may only play this card if you have a Villainous Captain. Tack one of your Crew, then draw two cards.
Flogging.Flavor Text: "I ain't punishin' ya for your mistake, lad. Just makin' sure ya ne'er do it again."

Flogging - BS.Name: Flogging - BS
Flogging - BS.Text: You may only play this card if you have a Villainous Captain. Tack one of your Crew, then draw two cards.
Flogging - BS.Flavor Text: "I still ain't punishin' ya for your mistake, lad. Just makin' sure ya ne'er do it again."
Flogging - BS.Errata: Boarding Attack, Flavor Text and art modified.

Flying the Jolly Roger.Name: Flying the Jolly Roger
Flying the Jolly Roger.Cost: 4 Adv.; 2 if you have a card with the Jolly Roger trait on board
Flying the Jolly Roger.Trait: 2 Seas Aways - Illegal - Unique - Ship Attachment
Flying the Jolly Roger.Text: The Adventuring costs of your uncompleted Adventures are reduced by 1 (min 0, or min 1 if the Adventure increases the Cannon Skill).
Flying the Jolly Roger.Flavor Text: With Allende’s return the Brotherhood embraced their trade with renewed vigor.
Flying the Jolly Roger.Errata: Added " or min 1 if the Adventure increases the Cannon Skill"

Fool's Errand.Name: Fool's Errand
Fool's Errand.Text: Any player in this Sea may sink Fool's Errand by tacking one of their Crew as an action. Heroic Captains may not tack to produce Cannon or Adventuring while this card is in play.
Fool's Errand.Flavor Text: "It may be a fool's errand, Mabela, but if we can't find the Eye, then Necros had already won." - Philip Gosse

Foolish Bet.Name: Foolish Bet
Foolish Bet.Text: React: Play when you send one of your own untacked Crew out to fight against an opponent's Crew that has been pushed forward to start a Boarding Attack. Hits inflicted by either Crew in this Boarding Attack may not be absorbed by tacking Crew.
Foolish Bet.Flavor Text: "One year aboard the Discovery if he loses..."

For the Greater Good.Name: For the Greater Good
For the Greater Good.Text: Target one of your Loyal Crew with the No Attachments trait. Target Crew gains +2 swashbuckling and +1 to each of their other skills until the end of the turn. Discard that Crew at the end of the Untack Phase this turn.
For the Greater Good.Flavor Text: Jacob's eyes widened at the sight of the final switch. "Theus preserve us...!"

Forbidden Delicacies.Name: Forbidden Delicacies
Forbidden Delicacies.Trait: 1 Sea Away - Goods Adventure - Crew Attachment
Forbidden Delicacies.Flavor Text: "Yurgh! I can see why they're forbidden."

Forbidden Sea.Name: Forbidden Sea
Forbidden Sea.Flavor Text: "...surrounds Vodacce and is called so because of the Church's sanction. No Théan may sail too far in those waters lest he fall into the treacherous hands of the Crescent Empire." - The Explorer's Society Guide to Théah

Forbidden Sea - Foil.Name: Forbidden Sea - Foil
Forbidden Sea - Foil.Flavor Text: "...surrounds Vodacce and is called so because of the Church's sanction. No Théan may sail too far in those waters lest he fall into the treacherous hands of the Crescent Empire." - The Explorer's Society Guide to Théah

Fortunado.Name: Fortunado
Fortunado.Text:
The title of this card is "Daring Fools" for Experienced purposes.
React: Tack this Crew when you are entering a Boarding to untack all of your Crew cards with the title "Daring Fools," then untack this Crew.
Fortunado.Flavor Text: "Just make sure he lands on someone soft."

Foul Weather Ahead.Name: Foul Weather Ahead
Foul Weather Ahead.Text: Target a Sea. Until the end of the turn, Ships suffering Hits in that Sea, suffer 2 extra Hits.
Foul Weather Ahead.Flavor Text: "I wouldn't want to be on the ocean tonight for all the wine in Vodacce."

Foul Weather Jack.Name: Foul Weather Jack
Foul Weather Jack.Text: You must discard the top card of your deck each time you shuffle your deck. Sink Jack if the Boarding Attack on the discard is a Slash.
Foul Weather Jack.Flavor Text: "Had a parrot once. Lost 'im. Had me a cat, too. Had me a dog. Had me a rat. Had me a wife... you don't wanna hear about her."

Foul Weather Jack - Exp..Name: Foul Weather Jack - Exp.
Foul Weather Jack - Exp..Text: You must discard the top card of your deck when Jack tacks to produce Cannon. If the Boarding Attack on the discard is a Slash, Jack produces 2 less Cannon (minimum 0).

Foul Weather Jack's Map, Part I.Name: Foul Weather Jack's Map, Part I
Foul Weather Jack's Map, Part I.Cost: 5 Adv. minus 1 for each "Foul Weather Jack's Map" adventure you have completed and in play.
Foul Weather Jack's Map, Part I.Trait: 1 Sea Away - Item - Unique - Captain Attachment
Foul Weather Jack's Map, Part I.Text: React: Tack this card when you are paying a Cannon cost to produce 1 Cannon for each completed Foul Weather Jack's Map Adventure you have in play.
Foul Weather Jack's Map, Part I.Changes on MRP: Cost; sepcial cost/Cancel cost modified;Trait modified;Text modified;Flavor text modified;Artist modified;

Foul Weather Jack's Map, Part II.Name: Foul Weather Jack's Map, Part II
Foul Weather Jack's Map, Part II.Cost: 5 Adv. minus 1 for each "Foul Weather Jack's Map" adventure you have completed and in play.
Foul Weather Jack's Map, Part II.Trait: 1 Sea Away - Item - Unique - Captain Attachment
Foul Weather Jack's Map, Part II.Text: React: Tack this card when you are paying an Influence cost to produce 1 Influence for each completed Foul Weather Jack's Map Adventure you have in play.
Foul Weather Jack's Map, Part II.Changes on MRP: Cost; sepcial cost/Cancel cost modified;Trait modified;Text modified;Flavor text modified;Artist modified;

Foul Weather Jack's Map, Part III.Name: Foul Weather Jack's Map, Part III
Foul Weather Jack's Map, Part III.Cost: 3 Adv. minus 1 for each "Foul Weather Jack's Map" adventure you have completed and in play.
Foul Weather Jack's Map, Part III.Trait: 2 Seas Away - Item - Unique - Captain Attachment
Foul Weather Jack's Map, Part III.Text: React: Tack this card when you are paying a Sailing cost to produce 1 Sailing for each completed Foul Weather Jack's Map Adventure you have in play.
Foul Weather Jack's Map, Part III.Changes on MRP: Cost; sepcial cost/Cancel cost modified;Trait modified;Text modified;Flavor text modified;Artist modified;

Foul Weather Jack's Map, Part IV.Name: Foul Weather Jack's Map, Part IV
Foul Weather Jack's Map, Part IV.Cost: 3 Adv. minus 1 for each "Foul Weather Jack's Map" adventure you have completed and in play.
Foul Weather Jack's Map, Part IV.Trait: 2 Seas Away - Item - Unique - Captain Attachment
Foul Weather Jack's Map, Part IV.Text: React: Tack this card when you are paying a Swashbuckling cost to produce 1 Swashbuckling for each completed Foul Weather Jack's Map Adventure you have in play.
Foul Weather Jack's Map, Part IV.Changes on MRP: Cost; sepcial cost/Cancel cost modified;Trait modified;Text modified;Flavor text modified;Artist modified;

Francisco Garcia del Torres.Name: Francisco Garcia del Torres
Francisco Garcia del Torres.Text: React: When this Crew inflicts hits during a Boarding Attack, discard any number of cards from your hand to inflict one extra hit for each card discarded.
Francisco Garcia del Torres.Flavor Text: “I’m not Torvo’s equal, but I can handle myself.”

Franco Vesefe.Name: Franco Vesefe
Franco Vesefe.Text: Your Captain has +1 Adventuring and +1 Influence while Franco is on board your Ship.

François Gaulle dul Motte.Name: François Gaulle dul Motte
François Gaulle dul Motte.Flavor Text: "At the end of the day, I do what any good Montaigne would do: salute smartly and defend my honor."

Franzini's Lost Notebooks.Name: Franzini's Lost Notebooks
Franzini's Lost Notebooks.Flavor Text: She painted to ease her loneliness, but she invented to ease her guilt.

Free Men Can Do Anything.Name: Free Men Can Do Anything
Free Men Can Do Anything.Text: React: Play this card when you are paying a skill cost. This card produces 1 point of that skill.
Free Men Can Do Anything.Flavor Text: "We're free men now, and free men can do anything. I only wish we could have saved more." - Ernesto Castillus

Freedom's Key.Name: Freedom's Key
Freedom's Key.Text:
Up to 2 Captive Crew on your ship do not count against your Crew Maximum.
React: Tack before performing an action, to move to an adjacent Sea.

Freeing Felipe.Name: Freeing Felipe
Freeing Felipe.Cost: 3 points of each skill (this adventure may not be completed in any way other than paying the skill costs).
Freeing Felipe.Text: You need to control only any four Seas tat the end of the turn to win the game.
Freeing Felipe.Flavor Text: "Good King Sandoval wishes to explore the western seas. He won't mind if I pick up an old friend along the way." - Margaretta Orduno

Fresh Fruit.Name: Fresh Fruit
Fresh Fruit.Text: React: Play when you are producing Adventuring. Tack one of your Crew to produce Adventuring equal to the Crew's Adventuring plus Swashbuckling.
Fresh Fruit.Flavor Text: "We didn't come here to pick bananas." - Guy McCormick

Fresh Powder.Name: Fresh Powder
Fresh Powder.Flavor Text: "Let's give the Hanged Man a proper welcome." - The General

Fresh Water.Name: Fresh Water
Fresh Water.Text: Your cost to complete Adventures is reduced by 1 (minimum 1) until the end of the turn.
Fresh Water.Flavor Text: The lucky Explorers got to forage for supplies. McCormick sent the rest to find the Switch...

Freya Danya Gydasdottir.Name: Freya Danya Gydasdottir
Freya Danya Gydasdottir.Text: Act: Once per turn, name one of the five skills. Until the end of the turn, all of your Crew aligned to your Captain's faction have a +1 bonus to the named Skill.
Freya Danya Gydasdottir.Flavor Text: "It never ends, Yngvild. Blood begets blood and we'll all drown in it before you see any real justice."

Frieda Kesler.Name: Frieda Kesler
Frieda Kesler.Text: This Crew's Boarding Attacks that finish with a Punch inflict 2 extra Hits.
Frieda Kesler.Flavor Text: "Call him the General or call him Von Stutten. He is still my lord, no matter what his title."
Frieda Kesler.Changes on MRP: Affiliation/Nation modified;Text modified;Flavor text modified;Artist modified;

Friendly Winds.Name: Friendly Winds
Friendly Winds.Text: Target an Ally card. Attach it to a Sea adjacent to its current Sea.
Friendly Winds.Flavor Text: "If only I have a monkey butler..."

From Stem to Gudgeon.Name: From Stem to Gudgeon
From Stem to Gudgeon.Text: React: Play instead of performing a Boarding Attack. Until the end of this Boarding, Boarding Attacks by either player inflict 2 extra Hits.
From Stem to Gudgeon.Flavor Text: Reis shouted a curse and cut through the main mast. All McGee could do was jump out of the way and look for a safe place to dive overboard.

Frothing Sea.Name: Frothing Sea
Frothing Sea.Flavor Text: "...off the coast of Montaigne. The General sits there and waits for unwary and foolish." - The Explorer's Society Guide to Théah

Frothing Sea - Foil.Name: Frothing Sea - Foil
Frothing Sea - Foil.Flavor Text: "...off the coast of Montaigne. The General sits there and waits for unwary and foolish." - The Explorer's Society Guide to Théah

Frozen Sails.Name: Frozen Sails
Frozen Sails.Text: Target a Ship. That Ship must tack a Topman or suffer 4 Hits.
Frozen Sails.Flavor Text: "Inis is growing stronger, Captain. In time, her power may rival yours." - Red Thorfild

Fugitives.Name: Fugitives
Fugitives.Text:
Act: Target and sink a Membership card in play.
Act: Target another player's unaligned Ship. Move that Ship one Sea away from your Ship.
Act: Target faction-aligned Crew is considered to have no factionnal alignement and is considered Unaligned until the end or the turn.
Fugitives.Flavor Text: Ysabette rescued Rosamonde from the headsman's axe. As pirates and daughter of l'Empereur, they became a grave threat to the new Montaigne government.

Fury of the Storm.Name: Fury of the Storm
Fury of the Storm.Text: Act: Target a Ship in this or an adjacent Sea. Discard any number of Weather cards from your hand (you may discard 0) to inflict hits on the target ship equal to 5 plus twice the number of cards discarded. This card may not be canceled if you have at least one Laerdom Sorcerer on board your Ship.
Fury of the Storm.Flavor Text: The true fury of the Vesten lies not in the storm, but in their hearts.

Fyddych O'Bannon.Name: Fyddych O'Bannon
Fyddych O'Bannon.Flavor Text: The son of a Castillian noblewoman and Mad Jack O'Bannon, Fyddych is a bright young sailor. But like his father, trouble follows wherever he goes.

Fyodor Zastienchivy.Name: Fyodor Zastienchivy
Fyodor Zastienchivy.Text: React: Tack when one of your Crew with the No Attachments trait is sunk. That Crew is put in your discard pile.
Fyodor Zastienchivy.Flavor Text: "Saved me life he did by liftin' that cannon. Ne'er met a man with such strength, or a bigger heart."

Fyodor Zastienchivy - Exp..Name: Fyodor Zastienchivy - Exp.
Fyodor Zastienchivy - Exp..Text: Act: Once per turn, discard one card with the word "Prayer" in the title from your hand to untack Fyodor.
Fyodor Zastienchivy - Exp..Flavor Text: "Theus' hand plucked us from the Hanged Man, my brothers. Now we must pluck Allende from whatever Abyss he has been cast into."

Galafré Flaubert du Doré.Name: Galafré Flaubert du Doré
Galafré Flaubert du Doré.Text: When Galafré tacks to absorb Hits, he absorbs 1 extra Hit.
Galafré Flaubert du Doré.Flavor Text: "But you have only a single scar," Babette said. "Jean-Claude has four." Galafré looked at the departing ship and nodded. "Then I shall go and earn five more."

Galleon of the Treasure Fleet.Name: Galleon of the Treasure Fleet
Galleon of the Treasure Fleet.Text: Any player in this Sea may sink the Galleon by tacking 4 Influence as an action. When you are paying an Influence cost while in this Sea, you may tack 3 Cannon to produce 1 Influence.
Galleon of the Treasure Fleet.Flavor Text: "There be good pickin's in these waters, men. Mayhaps we'll stay awhile."

Galley Captives.Name: Galley Captives
Galley Captives.Text: Galley Captives may only be placed on a Corsairs Ship.
Galley Captives.Flavor Text: "Pull, you worthless dogs! Or maybe I'm being too gentle with you…" - Edahgo

Gambling House.Name: Gambling House
Gambling House.Text: React: Play when you are paying an Influence cost. Discard the top card on your deck to produce Influence depending on the Boarding Attack on the discard: Club = 1, Dagger = 2, Punch = 3, Thrust = 5. If the Boarding Attack on the discard is a Slash, Gambling House produces 0 Influence and you suffer 1 Hit.

Garrote.Name: Garrote
Garrote.Text:
The cost of this card is reduced by 3 if being attached to a Rilasciare Crew.
Act: Tack this card to target and sink a Henchman card in this Sea.
Act: Tack the attached Crew and sink this card to target a Crew in this Sea with an Influence cost of less than 3. Discard the target Crew.
Garrote.Flavor Text: Ugly deals demands a ugly weapon.

Gaspar.Name: Gaspar
Gaspar.Text: Gaspar is considered to have a Leg Attachment. Your Fine Galleys provide 2 extra skill points instead of 1.
Gaspar.Flavor Text: "A well-fed crew is a happy crew."

Gaspar - Exp..Name: Gaspar - Exp.
Gaspar - Exp..Text:
Gaspar is considered to have a Leg attachment. Your Fine Galleys provide 2 extra skill points instead of 1.
Act: Tack Gaspar to get a Fine Galley from your deck and attach it to your Ship (without cost). Shuffle your deck.
Gaspar - Exp..Flavor Text: "Monsieur Gosse is still not eating. Is the pheasant perhaps too tough?"

Gearalt Gilbertine.Name: Gearalt Gilbertine
Gearalt Gilbertine.Text: The cost to hire this Crew is reduced by 1 for each Crew in this Sea controlled by another player with an Influence cost less than 3 (minimum 0). This Crew inflicts 3 extra Hits during Boarding Attacks (and Duels) if the other Ship in the Boarding has 3 or more Crew with an Influence cost less than 3.

Gem of Warning.Name: Gem of Warning
Gem of Warning.Trait: Unique - 1 Sea Away - Artifact - Captain Attachment
Gem of Warning.Text: React: When one of your Sea Attachment cards is being discarded or sunk, discard this card instead.
Gem of Warning.Flavor Text: L'Empereur left his new admiral with a gift

Geno.Name: Geno
Geno.Text: When Geno tacks to produce Cannon for a Cannon Attack targeting a Ship with a higher crew maximum, his attack inflicts 2 extra hits
Geno.Flavor Text: "He mans the cannons on la Bucca. As long as he's there, the Brotherhood is safe." - Allende

Gentleman's Agreement - Foil.Name: Gentleman's Agreement - Foil
Gentleman's Agreement - Foil.Text:
You may only play this card if you have a Heroic Captain.
React: Play when you are hiring a Heroic Crew to produce 2 Influence.
Gentleman's Agreement - Foil.Flavor Text: "I promise you riches beyond your dreams, and I always keep my promises." - Philip Gosse

Gentlemen's Club.Name: Gentlemen's Club
Gentlemen's Club.Text: All Captains have the following ability: Act: Tack a Crew with one or more Memberships to tack all non-Captain Crew in this Sea with one or more of the same Memberships.

Gerald Höhne.Name: Gerald Höhne
Gerald Höhne.Text: Act: Sink one of your Crew to give Gerald a +3 Swashbuckling until the end of the turn. You may perform this action once per turn.
Gerald Höhne.Flavor Text: "Be careful, lad. Round here, folks who don't prove useful wind up Gerald's dinner." - Paul du Paix

Gerald Höhne - Exp..Name: Gerald Höhne - Exp.
Gerald Höhne - Exp..Text: React: Once per turn you may sink one of your Crew immediatly before you push Gerald forward for a Boarding Attack to give Gerald +3 Swashbuckling until the end of the Boarding.
Gerald Höhne - Exp..Flavor Text: Every six months, a homicidal rage claims him. Reis find it handy for keeping the men in line.

Gerard Rois et Reines.Name: Gerard Rois et Reines
Gerard Rois et Reines.Trait: Unique - Loyal - Heroic - First Mate - Swordsman +2
Gerard Rois et Reines.Text: When Montaigne Crew on this Ship are tacking to absorb Hits, they absorb 1 extra hit.
Gerard Rois et Reines.Flavor Text: For five generations, every first-born has been a musketeer. Gerard will be the last.

Gerard Rois et Reines - Exp..Name: Gerard Rois et Reines - Exp.
Gerard Rois et Reines - Exp..Trait: Experienced - Unique - Loyal - Heroic - First Mate - Swordsman +3
Gerard Rois et Reines - Exp..Text: While this Crew is untacked, your Montaigne Crew that sink to absorb Hits absorb an additional amount of Hits equal to half of their printed Influence cost (rounded up).
Gerard Rois et Reines - Exp..Flavor Text: "Your days of burning peasants at the stake are over, mon ami."

Gespucci Bernoulli.Name: Gespucci Bernoulli
Gespucci Bernoulli.Text:
Any player in this Sea may sink this card by producing 4 Swashbuckling as an Action.
Act: Tack this card to attach it to a Sea adjacent to this Sea.
Act: Tack this card to inflict 3 hits on a Ship in this Sea. The target may pay its Ship move Cost and move to an adjacent Sea to cancel this Action.
Gespucci Bernoulli.Flavor Text: "My cousin Caligari has Allende. I know where..."

Get To It!.Name: Get To It!
Get To It!.Text: React: Tack this card when one of your other Crew tacks to produce skill points. That Crew produces extra skill points equal to this Crew's Fear level.
Get To It!.Flavor Text: "Do you want to know what the cards say? You won't like it."

Ghouls Sneak On Board.Name: Ghouls Sneak On Board
Ghouls Sneak On Board.Text: Target a Ship in play. Inflict 1 Hit on the target for every completed Adventure on the target Ship.
Ghouls Sneak On Board.Flavor Text: "I was just saying how we could use a little excitement." - Simon the bosun

Gilles Allais du Crieux.Name: Gilles Allais du Crieux
Gilles Allais du Crieux.Flavor Text: The one the Avalons called "Snowbeard" died as he had lived - bloody and mean.

Gilles Allais du Crieux - Exp..Name: Gilles Allais du Crieux - Exp.
Gilles Allais du Crieux - Exp..Flavor Text: "The sharks took it all - all save the white hair that he hated so much. Legion, it seems, has a proper sense of irony." - Don Deanna

Gillian the Razor.Name: Gillian the Razor
Gillian the Razor.Text: Gillian's Influence cost is 5 as a starting Crew if you have another Topman in your starting Crew. You must tack 2 extra Influence to hire Gillian if you have another Topman in play.
Gillian the Razor.Flavor Text: She cut her husband into fishbait during his weekly shave. If I were you, I'd grow a beard

Gina \"the Jackal\".Name: Gina "the Jackal"
Gina \"the Jackal\".Text: Act: Once per turn, target an Item Attachment on one of your Crew. Attach the Item to another of your Crew.
Gina \"the Jackal\".Flavor Text: "Grab my hand! Theus, I hope you're not as heavy as you look!"

Gino Napoli.Name: Gino Napoli
Gino Napoli.Text: When Gino tacks to produce Adventuring, you may tack another one of your Crew to produce 2 extra Adventuring.
Gino Napoli.Flavor Text: "I get a lot of money to dig holes; it's Reis's business what he puts in them."

Giovanni Villanova.Name: Giovanni Villanova
Giovanni Villanova.Text: Any player may sink Villanova by tacking 4 Influence as an action. All of your Villainous Crew inflict 1 extra Hit during boarding attacks.
Giovanni Villanova.Flavor Text: "He's been an annoyance long enough. Eliminate him for me, and I'll forget your sister's indiscretion."

Glamour Knowledge.Name: Glamour Knowledge
Glamour Knowledge.Flavor Text: "There's a reason the oldest stories are the greatest stories: they contain the secrets of the universe." - Jillson Brown

Glimpse of the Skein.Name: Glimpse of the Skein
Glimpse of the Skein.Flavor Text: Sometimes, a Fate Witch sees not just single strands, but the entire webwork. Some are enlightened by the experience. Others are not so lucky.

Gold Coins.Name: Gold Coins
Gold Coins.Cost: Discard a card from your hand.
Gold Coins.Text: React: Discard this card when you are paying an Influence cost to produce 2 Influence.
Gold Coins.Flavor Text: "So much fuss over such tiny lumps of metal."
Gold Coins.Changes on MRP: Cost; sepcial cost/Cancel cost modified;Text modified;Flavor text modified;Artist modified;

Gold Earring.Name: Gold Earring
Gold Earring.Flavor Text: "It's me first. Looks good, don't it?"

Gold Only Buys Obedience.Name: Gold Only Buys Obedience
Gold Only Buys Obedience.Text: React: Play when you purchase a Crew from your Captain's faction. That Crew's cost is reduced by 2 (minimum 0).
Gold Only Buys Obedience.Flavor Text: "Put your revenge away for a while, McGee. Serve with me and I promise you, together we'll find that black-hearted bastard and give him what he deserves." - J. Berek

Good King Sandoval.Name: Good King Sandoval
Good King Sandoval.Text: React: Tack King Sandoval when you are paying an Influence cost to put a Castille Crew into play. King Sandoval produces 2 Influence.
Good King Sandoval.Flavor Text: "I never wanted to be King," Sandoval said. El Vago bowed. "That is a perfect place to start, your majesty."

Good Shot!.Name: Good Shot!
Good Shot!.Text: React: Play when you tack a Crew to produce Cannon. The Crew produces 1 extra Cannon.
Good Shot!.Flavor Text: "I said 'Fire a shot across her bow!'" "I guess I'm just not trained to miss, sir."

Good Use of Space.Name: Good Use of Space
Good Use of Space.Text: When this card enters play, target one of your Ship Attachments. While this card is in play, that Attachment counts one less toward your Ships crew maximum (minimum 0).
Good Use of Space.Flavor Text: "Um, sir? I can't feel my legs."

Gosse Figurehead.Name: Gosse Figurehead
Gosse Figurehead.Text: While you have 3 or more completed Adventures in play, you have +10 Sailing for the purposes of determining Initiative.

Gosse Figurehead - Foil.Name: Gosse Figurehead - Foil
Gosse Figurehead - Foil.Text: While you have 3 or more completed Adventures in play, you have +10 Sailing for the purposes of determining Initiative.

Gosse Pride.Name: Gosse Pride
Gosse Pride.Text: One of your Gosse Crew gains +2 Influence until the end of the turn. That Crew gains +2 extra Influence if there is a Corsairs Ship in play (+4 total).
Gosse Pride.Flavor Text: "Do they always dive for cover like that, Uncle Philip?" - Thomas Gosse

Gosse's Folly.Name: Gosse's Folly
Gosse's Folly.Text:
Act: Target a Ship in this Sea with a tacked Gosse Captain on Board. Inflict 4 hits on that Ship.
Act: Tack one of your Crew to draw 1 card from your Deck.
Gosse's Folly.Flavor Text: Dalia wrapped her arms around her master's shoulders. "Kheired-Din seeks an island which - if you were to seize it - would give you the power to torment Gosse for all eternity..."

Gosse's Rapier.Name: Gosse's Rapier
Gosse's Rapier.Trait: Gosse Captain Attachment - Unique - Signature Item
Gosse's Rapier.Text:
Act: Sink this card to untack your Captain.
Act: Tack this card to target one of your other Gosse Crew to give that Crew +2 to all of that Crew's skills that are greater than 1.
React: Tack this card when you are paying an Influence cost for an action to play, discard or sink a Control card to give your Captain +4 Influence until after the action.

Graham Hapworth.Name: Graham Hapworth
Graham Hapworth.Text: Graham has -1 Influence for every Glamour card you attach to him. You may not attach a Glamour card to Graham if his Influence is less than 1.

Graham MacLennan.Name: Graham MacLennan
Graham MacLennan.Text:
If you have a Gunner and a Topman Crew on board, this Crew has +1 Swashbuckling.
React: When one of your other Crew is being sunk, discard 2 cards from your hand to have that Crew discarded instead. You may only use this ability while this Crew is untacked.

Grandmother Ussura.Name: Grandmother Ussura
Grandmother Ussura.Cost: Tack one of your Sorcerers with Pyeryem of 1 or more
Grandmother Ussura.Trait: 1 Sea Away - Crew Attachment - Pyeryem 1 Knack
Grandmother Ussura.Text: React: Tack this card when this Crew tacks to absorb Hits during a Boarding. The other player in the Boarding must sink 2 cards from their hand.
Grandmother Ussura.Flavor Text: "What a clever boy. I'll keep an eye on you…"

Grape Shot.Name: Grape Shot
Grape Shot.Text: React: Play when you perform a Cannon Attack. Hits suffered from this Cannon Attack are absorbed by tacking (and sinking) Cannon instead of Swashbuckling. Crew with 0 Cannon may be sunk to absorb 1 Hit.
Grape Shot.Flavor Text: They fell, a dozen of them, as the shot ripped through their muscles and bone like paper.

Grappling Cannon.Name: Grappling Cannon
Grappling Cannon.Text: React: Tack this card when you are paying the Sailing cost to begin a Boarding to produce Sailing equal to your Ship's move cost.
Grappling Cannon.Flavor Text: "Where do you think you're going, my pretties?" - Domingo

Grappling Gun.Name: Grappling Gun
Grappling Gun.Text: React: Tack Grappling Gun when you enter a Boarding to untack this Crew.
Grappling Gun.Flavor Text: "Let's go for a swim, shall we? On second thought, why don't you go without me."

Grappling Hooks.Name: Grappling Hooks
Grappling Hooks.Text: React: Play when you are paying the Sailing cost to begin a Boarding. Grappling Hooks produces 3 Sailing.
Grappling Hooks.Flavor Text: Reginald looked up from the flaming deck and saw the hooks sink deep into the ship's rails. "It's only a matter o' time now," he whispered and touched the Prophet's Cross about his neck.

Grenade.Name: Grenade
Grenade.Text: React: Discard this Attachment instead of performing a Boarding Attack. The opposing player in the Boarding suffers 4 Hits, then you suffer 1 Hit.
Grenade.Flavor Text: "How far can you run in ten seconds?"

Grendel Thorton.Name: Grendel Thorton
Grendel Thorton.Text:
When this Crew sinks to absorb Hits he absorbs 2 extra Hits.
Act: Discard this Crew to search your deck for a card with the Port trait, reveal it to the other players and place it in your hand. Shuffle your deck.
Grendel Thorton.Flavor Text: "My dear signore, why on Théah would the Brotherhood be here on your island? After all, it's not as if you have anything we want…"

Grenouille du Grâce.Name: Grenouille du Grâce
Grenouille du Grâce.Text:
React: Tack before performing an action, to move to an adjacent Sea.
React: Tack when paying an Influence cost to produce 1 Influence.

Grenouille du Grâce - Foil.Name: Grenouille du Grâce - Foil
Grenouille du Grâce - Foil.Text:
React: Tack before performing an action, to move to an adjacent Sea.
React: Tack when paying an Influence cost to produce 1 Influence.

Grigorii Popovich.Name: Grigorii Popovich
Grigorii Popovich.Text:
When Grigori tacks to absorb Hits, he absorbs 2 extra Hits.
React: Tack Grigori when you are entering a Boarding as the Attacker to inflict 2 Hits on the other Ship in the Boarding.
Grigorii Popovich.Flavor Text: The Gaius was... less than pleased with my recent activities. A long sea journey seemed the prudent course of action."

Grimey Stubbs.Name: Grimey Stubbs
Grimey Stubbs.Text: After Grimey tacks to produce Cannon, discard the top card of your deck. If the Boarding Attack on the discard is a Thrust, Grimey is sunk.
Grimey Stubbs.Flavor Text: "Whoops, almost dropped me match in the keg. Maybe I oughtta move it out of the way... nah."

Gris Hallisdottir.Name: Gris Hallisdottir
Gris Hallisdottir.Flavor Text: "Yngvild saved me from the brink of despair. If she wants my magic, it's hers to take."

Gris Hallisdottir - Exp..Name: Gris Hallisdottir - Exp.
Gris Hallisdottir - Exp..Text: React: Discard Gris when a player attempts a Boarding with your Ship, to cancel that Boarding attempt.
Gris Hallisdottir - Exp..Flavor Text: Her powers grow with each passing day. I time, they may even surpass Yngvild's.

Grousin' George.Name: Grousin' George
Grousin' George.Text: George may not be placed on a Heroic Captain's Ship.
Grousin' George.Flavor Text: "I hates me the rats, and I hates me the food and I hates me the bosun and I hates me the..."

Grutch.Name: Grutch
Grutch.Text: When hiring Grutch, you may pay an additional 3 Influence to give him +3 Cannon and the trait Gunner until the end of the game.
Grutch.Flavor Text: "When he runs out of cannonballs, he uses the twenty-pounder as a club. It can become quite unpleasant." - Julius Caligari

Guerilla Tactics.Name: Guerilla Tactics
Guerilla Tactics.Text:
The cost of this card is reduced to 0 if you have 3 or more Rilasciare Crew on board.
Act: Target and sink a Chantey in play.
Act: Target a player with 6 or more cards in their hand. Target player's Ship suffers 1 Hits.
Act: Target a Chantey in play and the player that owns that Chantey. That player's Ship suffers 1 Hit.
Guerilla Tactics.Flavor Text: "They'll NEVER think to look in the sewers..."

Guilders Say More Than Words.Name: Guilders Say More Than Words
Guilders Say More Than Words.Text: Players may not play Action cards.
Guilders Say More Than Words.Flavor Text: "I don't give a siren's flipper what 'ambeeaunts' is, it'll cost ya six hundred."

Guillaume Windchaser.Name: Guillaume Windchaser
Guillaume Windchaser.Text: If Allende is your Captain, this crew has the Brotherhood faction symbol.
Guillaume Windchaser.Flavor Text: “I’ve smuggled peasants through these waters for years. I’ll do the same for nobles that deserve saving.”

Gullbait Friedrich.Name: Gullbait Friedrich
Gullbait Friedrich.Text: When hiring Friedrich, you may pay an additional 3 Influence to give him the trait: Fear 1 and +3 Swashbuckling until the end of the game.

Gunnery at its Finest.Name: Gunnery at its Finest
Gunnery at its Finest.Text: React: Play when tacking a Gunner to produce Cannon. That Crew produces 2 extra Cannon.
Gunnery at its Finest.Flavor Text: "No, no no! Yer doin' it all wrong! Ye want te see the panic in their eyes before ye fire!"

Guns Blazing.Name: Guns Blazing
Guns Blazing.Text: React: Play when you start a Boarding that is not cancelled. Target the other Ship. You inflict 5 Hits on that Ship.
Guns Blazing.Flavor Text: "Somebody tells Captain Reis: Gerald's having one of his fits again." - Julius Caligari

Gus Heimfather.Name: Gus Heimfather
Gus Heimfather.Text: React: After you have absorbed all of the Hits from a Cannon Attack inflicted by another player, this Crew gains a bonus to his Cannon skill until the end of the turn equal to the number of Crew that were sunk to absorb those Hits. You may use this ability once per turn.

Gustolph Hirsch.Name: Gustolph Hirsch
Gustolph Hirsch.Text:
Gustolph inflicts 1 extra hit during Boarding Atacks.
React: Tack Gustolph to untack one of your Captive or Rower cards.

Gustolph Hirsch - Exp..Name: Gustolph Hirsch - Exp.
Gustolph Hirsch - Exp..Text:
When Gustolph tacks to produce Influence to hire a Captive Crew, he produces 3 extra Influence.
React: Tack Gustolph immediately after you tack a Captive Crew to untack that Crew.
Gustolph Hirsch - Exp..Flavor Text: "Come now, effendi! Surely slaves such as these can fetch more than a measly thousand dinars?"

Guy McCormick.Name: Guy McCormick
Guy McCormick.Text: Act: Once per turn, while you have three or more other Explorer Crew on your Ship, you may get an Item Adventure or Artifact Adventure from your deck, show it to your opponents, and put it in your hand. Shuffle your deck.

Guy McCormick - Foil.Name: Guy McCormick - Foil
Guy McCormick - Foil.Text: Act: Once per turn, while you have three or more other Explorer Crew on your Ship, you may get an Item Adventure or Artifact Adventure from your deck, show it to your opponents, and put it in your hand. Shuffle your deck.

Gwendolyn Buckminster.Name: Gwendolyn Buckminster
Gwendolyn Buckminster.Flavor Text: "Just think of them as a gigantic pair of pants."

Gytha Ives.Name: Gytha Ives
Gytha Ives.Flavor Text: "She gnaws on that necklace at night like a pacifier." - Riant Gaucher

Halverd Solness.Name: Halverd Solness
Halverd Solness.Text: This Crew may not attach Lærdom Knacks while tacked.
Halverd Solness.Flavor Text: He once burned a ship down trying that stunt. Lærdom isn't for amateurs.

Hamish.Name: Hamish
Hamish.Text: React: Instead of performing a Boarding Attack, tack Hamish to inflict 5 Hits on the other Ship in the Boarding. Then you suffer 3 Hits. Hamish cannot tack or sink to absorb these 3 Hits.
Hamish.Flavor Text: "He's more beast than man. When loosed, he always kills as many of my own crew as the enemy." - Kheired-Din

Hamish - Exp..Name: Hamish - Exp.
Hamish - Exp..Text: If Hamish inflicts Hits during a Boarding Attack, sink all Crew on either Ship involved in the Boarding with an Influence cost less than 2.
Hamish - Exp..Flavor Text: Espera drugged him before the escape. When he awoke, his rage consumed the surviving captives.

Hammocks.Name: Hammocks
Hammocks.Text: This Ship's crew maximum is increased by 2
Hammocks.Flavor Text: "I can't sleep here! What if we get in a fight?" The bosun smiled. "You'll be the first to know."

Hand of the Sirens.Name: Hand of the Sirens
Hand of the Sirens.Text:
Crew can't have more than on Hand attachment.
React: Tack this card instead of performing a Boarding Attack. Target one Item attachment on the opposing Ship and discard it. The opposing player may cancel this action by tacking 4 Swashbuckling.

Handsome Scar.Name: Handsome Scar
Handsome Scar.Text: React: Play when you suffer Hits during a Boarding. Attach this card to one of your Crew to suffer 3 fewer hits. This Attachment has the Face trait. A Crew may not have more than one Face Attachment.
Handsome Scar.Flavor Text: "Wait 'till ya see the one I have in mind for you."
Handsome Scar.Errata: Text modified: you have to attach this card to prevent Hits. If you can't attch this card, you can't prevent Hits.

Hard Tack.Name: Hard Tack
Hard Tack.Text: Discard one of your completed Adventures to move your Ship to an adjacent Sea.
Hard Tack.Flavor Text: "... And I hates me the weevils..." - Grousin' George

Harness the Darkness.Name: Harness the Darkness
Harness the Darkness.Cost: Tack one of your Sorcerers with Nacht of 1 or more
Harness the Darkness.Trait: 1 Sea Away - Nacht 1 Knack - Crew Attachment
Harness the Darkness.Text: React: Tack the attached Crew instead of performing a Boarding Attack to target the opposing Ship. Inflict hits to the target Ship equal to the attached Crew’s Swashbuckling. You may discard a Nacht Knack from your hand to increase the hits inflicted by 3.

Harpoon.Name: Harpoon
Harpoon.Text: This Crew's Boarding Attacks that finish with a Thrust inflict 2 extra Hits.
Harpoon.Flavor Text: "Back to the bottom with ye, ye grinnin' sardine!" - Bonnie McGee

Harsh Light of Reality.Name: Harsh Light of Reality
Harsh Light of Reality.Text: Target all Glamour cards in play. Tack those cards.
Harsh Light of Reality.Flavor Text: "Look at it! It's huge and menacing! It... hey, dont't shine that over here, you'll ruin the effect."

Hassad the Enforcer - Foil.Name: Hassad the Enforcer - Foil
Hassad the Enforcer - Foil.Text: When your unaligned Crew sink to absorb Hits, they absorb 1 extra Hit.
Hassad the Enforcer - Foil.Flavor Text: "Stay alive, damn you, or I'll kill you myself!"

Haunted by the Past.Name: Haunted by the Past
Haunted by the Past.Text:
You may only play this card if you have a Vesten Captain.
React: Play when you are inflicting Hits. You inflict 1 extra Hit.
Haunted by the Past.Flavor Text: Every night, she sees her father lying dead from a Vendel blade. And every night his pale corpse tells her the same thing - "Make them bleed."

Hauptmann von Lichen.Name: Hauptmann von Lichen
Hauptmann von Lichen.Text: Act: Tack this Crew to target a Ship Attachment on another Ship in this Sea. Discard this Crew and the target Attachment.
Hauptmann von Lichen.Flavor Text: "In Eisen, we make do with what we have, and so shall you!"
Hauptmann von Lichen.Changes on MRP: Affiliation/Nation modified;Text modified;Flavor text modified;Artist modified;

He's Mine.Name: He's Mine
He's Mine.Text: React: Play before one of your Crew plays their first Boarding Attack card during a Boarding Attack or Duel. Tack that Crew to target another one of your Crew (tacked or untacked) that takes the tacked Crew's place in the Boarding Attack or Duel.
He's Mine.Flavor Text: "Hello my darling," the thing with Amanda's face crooned. "We've waited so long for you..."

Headed Out.Name: Headed Out
Headed Out.Text: Target one Crew on a Ship that is of a different faction than that Ship's Captain. Discard that Crew.
Headed Out.Flavor Text: "West of Avalon." Cosette pointed at the map. "That's our last sign of civilized land. Call McCormick your captain or get off at Carleon: those are your only choices."

Headhunters.Name: Headhunters
Headhunters.Text: React: Play immediately after another player completes an Adventure. Inflict 4 Hits on that player's Ship. You may only play one "Headhunters" per completion of an Adventure.

Hector Beauchamp du Charouse.Name: Hector Beauchamp du Charouse
Hector Beauchamp du Charouse.Flavor Text: "Kheired-Din kept me alive, and he didn't make me row. It seems strange, because I have Porté and the Corsairs hate sorcerers. But he said he needed me. He wanted me to tell the world what I had seen…"

Heinrich Logan.Name: Heinrich Logan
Heinrich Logan.Text: Heinrich has +3 Cannon if another Ship in this Sea has a Sorcerer on Board.

Helpful Advice.Name: Helpful Advice
Helpful Advice.Text: You may only play this card if you have a Heroic Captain. Target another player. The next time that player pays a Sailing cost, this card produces 4 Sailing for that player, then attaches to one of your Crew, giving +2 Adventuring.
Helpful Advice.Flavor Text: "If we can rig sails on the masthead, we'll reach the site by nightfall." - Maggie Malone

Henderson.Name: Henderson
Henderson.Text: React: Tack Henderson when one of your Crew tacks to absorb Hits during Boarding. That Crew absorbs 6 extra Hits.
Henderson.Flavor Text: "Back to the Uncharted Course, my good man. I fear we've worn out our welcome here."

Henderson - Exp..Name: Henderson - Exp.
Henderson - Exp..Trait: Experienced - Unique - Loyal - First Mate - Heroic
Henderson - Exp..Text:
When this Crew tacks or sinks to absorb Hits during a Boarding, he absorbs 3 extra Hits.
React: Once per turn, immediately before one of your Crew enters a Boarding Attack or Duel, replace that Crew with this Crew.

Henry the Clockmaker.Name: Henry the Clockmaker
Henry the Clockmaker.Text: When hiring Henry you may pay 4 Adventuring to reduce Henry's Influence cost to 0.
Henry the Clockmaker.Flavor Text: "I don't know where the nickname came from. I can barely tell time."

Here There Be Monsters.Name: Here There Be Monsters
Here There Be Monsters.Text:
Any player in this Sea may sink Here There Be Monsters by tacking 4 Cannon as an action.
Act: Tack Here There Be Monsters and target a Ship in this Sea to inflict 3 Hits on that Ship.
Here There Be Monsters.Flavor Text: "Ya caught somethin' big there, lad. What might it... Sweet St. Rogers, cut the nets!!!"

Herje (Ruin).Name: Herje (Ruin)
Herje (Ruin).Text: Act: Discard Herje and target a Sea Attachment in this Sea. Discard that Sea Attachment.
Herje (Ruin).Flavor Text: I've seen it tear mountains down

Hernando Ochoa.Name: Hernando Ochoa
Hernando Ochoa.Text: Hernando does not untack during the Untack phase. You may discard a card from your hand to untack Hernando during the Draw phase.
Hernando Ochoa.Flavor Text: "No, my child, I'm not all right. But seeing the world again is worth it."

Heroic Stand.Name: Heroic Stand
Heroic Stand.Text: React: Play when your opponent in a Boarding pushes a Crew forward to start a Boarding Attack. Push one of your tacked Heroic Crew forward to fight against theirs.
Heroic Stand.Flavor Text: Sean threw himself at the boarding Montaigne, buying Alesio a few precious seconds.

Herrmann Stumpf.Name: Herrmann Stumpf
Herrmann Stumpf.Text:
All of your other Kreuzritter Crew have +1 Influence and inflict 1 extra Hit during Boarding Attacks while this Crew is in play.
Act: Once per turn, target a Villainous non-Captain Crew in this Sea. Push one of your other Kreuzritter Crew forward (tacked or untacked) and play a Boarding Atatck from your hand to begin a Duel between your Crew and the target Crew.

Hidden Compartment.Name: Hidden Compartment
Hidden Compartment.Text:
React: Tack this card when you are producing Adventuring for an Illegal Adventure to produce 4 Adventuring.
React: Tack this card before you perform an action to discard a non-Captain Crew on board your Ship.
Hidden Compartment.Flavor Text: "Daddy used to keep snacks in here. I have a somewhat less frivolous use for it."

Hidden Crew.Name: Hidden Crew
Hidden Crew.Text: React: Play immediately after an opponent begins a Boarding with your Ship that you do not cancel. Immediately hire one Crew from your hand. Reduce the Crew's cost by 3 (minimum 0)
Hidden Crew.Flavor Text: "Philip isn't alone, you abominations! Philip's never alone!" - Martin Tytus

Hidden Fate Heritage.Name: Hidden Fate Heritage
Hidden Fate Heritage.Cost: 5 Adv.; 3 in Forbidden Sea or if you have a Fate Sorcerer on Board
Hidden Fate Heritage.Text: You may not attach this card to a Crew with the Fate trait. This Crew has the trait Fate 1.
Hidden Fate Heritage.Flavor Text: Her mother kept them hidden from her until she was sure the blood ran true.

Hidden Glamour Heritage.Name: Hidden Glamour Heritage
Hidden Glamour Heritage.Cost: 5 Adv.;3 in Frothing Sea or if you have a Glamour Sorcerer on Board
Hidden Glamour Heritage.Text: You may not attach this card to a Crew with the Glamour trait. This Crew has the trait Glamour 1.
Hidden Glamour Heritage.Flavor Text: "This manling has the gift, yes? Perhaps we'll make it stronger for him."

Hidden Knife.Name: Hidden Knife
Hidden Knife.Text: This Crew inflicts 2 extra Hits during Boarding Attacks.
Hidden Knife.Flavor Text: "A flick of his wrists, and I suddenly found myself facing a man armed with two knives. It was right then that I remembered a pressing engagement I had elsewhere." - Grimey Stubbs
Hidden Knife.Errata: Cost reduced from 6 Swa. To 4 Swa.

Hidden Lærdom Heritage.Name: Hidden Lærdom Heritage
Hidden Lærdom Heritage.Cost: 5 Adv.;3 in Trade Sea or if you have a Lærdom Sorcerer on Board
Hidden Lærdom Heritage.Text: You may not attach this card to a Crew with the Lærdom trait. This Crew has the trait Lærdom 1.
Hidden Lærdom Heritage.Flavor Text: "It's just a birthmark. It has nothing do with Vesten Magic - does it?"

Hidden Porté Heritage.Name: Hidden Porté Heritage
Hidden Porté Heritage.Cost: 5 Adv.;3 in La Boca or if you have a Porté Sorcerer on Board
Hidden Porté Heritage.Text: You may not attach this card to a Crew with the Porté trait. This Crew has the trait Porté 1.
Hidden Porté Heritage.Flavor Text: No one knew who the peasant boy's father was, but after his hands turned red, they could do plenty of guesses.

Hidden Powder Stash.Name: Hidden Powder Stash
Hidden Powder Stash.Text: React: Instead of performing a Boarding Attack, tack this card and 1 of your Crew with Cannon skill greater than one. Inflict Hits on the other Ship in the Boarding equal to that Crew's Cannon skill.

Hidden Pyeryem Heritage.Name: Hidden Pyeryem Heritage
Hidden Pyeryem Heritage.Cost: 5 Adv.;3 in the Mirror or if you have a Pyeryem Sorcerer on Board
Hidden Pyeryem Heritage.Text: You may not attach this card to a Crew with the Pyeryem trait. This Crew has the trait Pyeryem 1.
Hidden Pyeryem Heritage.Flavor Text: Gregor should really have been more surprised when the owl started talking to him.

Hidden Rum.Name: Hidden Rum
Hidden Rum.Text: React: Play this card when you are paying a cancel cost to produce 4 points toward the cancel cost.
Hidden Rum.Flavor Text: "And the Prophet went forth, and he did share of the fermented brew, and when he was done, he said 'Take this gift and hide it, lest thine enemies enjoy the source of thy drunkeness." Mattias Brewer

Hidden Talents.Name: Hidden Talents
Hidden Talents.Text: All Captains have +1 to each of their skills.
Hidden Talents.Flavor Text: " I see Kheired-Din has put a bounty on my head. What makes you think you can collect it?" - Ernesto Castillus

Hiding in the Reefs.Name: Hiding in the Reefs
Hiding in the Reefs.Text: React: Play when an opponent begins Boarding your Ship. That Ship suffers 3 Hits. The Boarding is canceled.
Hiding in the Reefs.Flavor Text: "Didn't you hear me, mister? I said 'Follow them.'" I nodded and plotted the course. Death was better than disobeying the Captain's commands.

High King Asbjornsson.Name: High King Asbjornsson
High King Asbjornsson.Text: All Captains have +3  Influence while in their Starting Sea.
High King Asbjornsson.Flavor Text: The King looked up as Olafsdottir approached. "The  Island," he said and smiled. " It holds the key to your revenge."

High Morale.Name: High Morale
High Morale.Text: React: Discard High Morale when you are absorbing Hits to suffer 3 fewer Hits. If your Ship's crew maximum is less than 9, you suffer 6 fewer Hits, instead.

High Seas Boarding.Name: High Seas Boarding
High Seas Boarding.Text: Target an opposing Ship in this Sea. Your Ship begins Boarding that Ship. All of your Boarding Attacks during this Boarding inflict 1 extra Hit.

High Seas Cannoning.Name: High Seas Cannoning
High Seas Cannoning.Flavor Text: Forged with bravery and quenched in blood, the crews know their jobs like no others.

Hildegunn.Name: Hildegunn
Hildegunn.Text: While you have at least one Crew with the title "Valkyries" on board your Ship, each of your Valkyries gains +1 Swashbuckling.
Hildegunn.Flavor Text: "It doesn't matter how mortal you are, if they think you're a creature of myth, they'll never dare strike you."

Hired Saboteurs.Name: Hired Saboteurs
Hired Saboteurs.Text: Target a Ship with more than 2 Ship Attachments. Target Ship's controller must discard one of their Ship Attachments.
Hired Saboteurs.Flavor Text: "No, no! Short chopping motions! You're never going to be a world-class saboteur with a technique like that!"

Hired Swordsman.Name: Hired Swordsman
Hired Swordsman.Text: React: Play when an opponent begins Boarding your Ship. You may conduct the first Boarding Attack.
Hired Swordsman.Flavor Text: "Nothin' worse than runnin' into a Swordsman when yur tryin' to engage in a little honest piracy." - Grimey Stubbs

Hit to the Captain's Quarters.Name: Hit to the Captain's Quarters
Hit to the Captain's Quarters.Text: React: Play this card when you are suffering Hits. Attach this card to your Ship as a Damage Attachment to absorb 5 Hits. While this card is attached you may not untack your Captain during the untack phase and your Captain has -2 to all Skills (minimum 1). You may sink this Attachment by paying 4 Swashbuckling as an Action. You may not sink or discard this card with other card effects.

Hit to the Deck.Name: Hit to the Deck
Hit to the Deck.Text: React: Play this card when you are suffering Hits. Attach this card to your Ship as a Damage Attachment to absorb 4 Hits. While this card is attached you may not bring Crew cards into play. You may sink this Attachment by paying 4 Swashbuckling as an Action. You may not sink or discard this card with other card effects.

Hit to the Galley.Name: Hit to the Galley
Hit to the Galley.Text: React: Play this card when you are suffering Hits. Attach this card to your Ship as a Damage Attachment to absorb 5 Hits. While this card is attached you must discard a card from your hand to play an Action card. You may sink this Attachment by paying 4 Swashbuckling as an Action. You may not sink or discard this card with other card effects.
Hit to the Galley.Flavor Text: "Tell ze Captain that his souffle has collapsed."

Hit to the Main Mast.Name: Hit to the Main Mast
Hit to the Main Mast.Text: React: Play this card when you are suffering Hits. Attach this card to your Ship as a Damage Attachment to absorb 5 Hits. While this card is attached you may not use your "Free Move" and you are considered to have 10 less Sailing for Iitiative. You may sink this Attachment by paying 4 Swashbuckling as an Action. You may not sink or discard this card with other card effects.

Hit to the Powder Room.Name: Hit to the Powder Room
Hit to the Powder Room.Text: React: Play this card when you are suffering Hits. Attach this card to your Ship as a Damage Attachment to absorb 6 Hits. While this card is attached your hand size is reduced by 3 (minimum 0). You may sink this Attachment by paying 4 Swashbuckling as an Action. You may not sink or discard this card with other card effects.

Hold Your Ground.Name: Hold Your Ground
Hold Your Ground.Text:
The other Ship in the Boarding may pay the cancel cost of this card.
React: Play instead of performing a Boarding Attack. Until the end of the Boarding , Boarding Attacks inflict 1 fewer Hit (minimum 0).
Hold Your Ground.Flavor Text: "Ye want this Ship? All ye gotta do is get by ME."

Hole in the Hull.Name: Hole in the Hull
Hole in the Hull.Text: Target a Ship. That Ship suffer 1 Hit.
Hole in the Hull.Flavor Text: The gunners heard the creaking, looked up, and before they could do anything they were knee deep in water.

Holy Vision.Name: Holy Vision
Holy Vision.Text: Act: Tack one of your Holy Crew and discard two cards from your hand to draw two cards.
Holy Vision.Flavor Text: Kheired-Din saw angels. They guided him on his path and showed him visions of the new world to come. Whether they came from Theus or Legion, not even he could say.

Homeward Arrow - Foil.Name: Homeward Arrow - Foil
Homeward Arrow - Foil.Text:
Act: Tack one of your Crew to move to an adjacent Sea.
React: Tack before performing an action, to move to an adjacent Sea.

Honorable Surrender.Name: Honorable Surrender
Honorable Surrender.Text: React: Play this card when you sink or discard an opponent's card with the Control or Ally trait to untack one of your Heroic Crew.  The owner of that card may place it in their hand.
Honorable Surrender.Flavor Text: The robbery served as a quiet reminder that Gosse was still the gentleman pirate. The nightmares would return soon enough.

Hook.Name: Hook
Hook.Text: React: Play when you suffer Hits. You suffer 2 fewer Hits, and this card attaches to one of your Crew. This Attachment has the Hand trait. A Crew may not have more than one Hand Attachment.
Hook.Flavor Text: "He's a great fighter...I just wish he wouldn't eat with it."

Hoskuld Hardrada.Name: Hoskuld Hardrada
Hoskuld Hardrada.Text: Act: Discard a Weather card from your hand to give Hoskuld +2 Swashbuckling for the remainder of the turn.

Hoskuld Hardrada - Exp..Name: Hoskuld Hardrada - Exp.
Hoskuld Hardrada - Exp..Text: Act: Once per turn, you may discard one Weather card from your hand to give Hoskuld +1 to all skills for the remainder of the turn.
Hoskuld Hardrada - Exp..Flavor Text: In the heart of battle, the crew looks to Hoskuld.

Host (Harvest).Name: Host (Harvest)
Host (Harvest).Text: Your hand size is increased by 1.
Host (Harvest).Flavor Text: Starve the Vesten out and they turn to their magic. But starve the Vendel out and they learn that you can't eat gold.

Hostile Harbor.Name: Hostile Harbor
Hostile Harbor.Text: Any player in this Sea may sink this card by tacking 4 Influence as an action. Other players draw 2 fewer cards during the Draw phase (minimum 1) if their Ship is in this Sea.
Hostile Harbor.Flavor Text: San Augustin's in Montaigne hands now - and by Theus, they mean to keep it.

Howls of Vengence.Name: Howls of Vengence
Howls of Vengence.Text: React: Instead of performing a Boarding Attack, pay 1 Swashbuckling to tack this card. Your hand size is increased by one while your Ship is in a Boarding and this card is tacked.
Howls of Vengence.Flavor Text: "Would it help if I said I'm sorry?"

Hull Rot Bill.Name: Hull Rot Bill
Hull Rot Bill.Text: Act: Target and discard one Ship Attachment attached to your Ship to give Bill +1 Adventuring or +1 Influence until the end of the turn.
Hull Rot Bill.Flavor Text: "I don't understand the noises he makes either, but I'm pretty sure he's not choking." - Red the Adventurer

I Fights Better Drunk.Name: I Fights Better Drunk
I Fights Better Drunk.Text: React: Play instead of conducting a Boarding Attack. Target one of your Crew, who gains +2 Swashbuckling until the end of the Boarding.
I Fights Better Drunk.Flavor Text: "It deadens the pain, don't ya know!"

I Told You Not to Trust Him.Name: I Told You Not to Trust Him
I Told You Not to Trust Him.Text: Target a Villainous Crew, except Captains, with two or more Attachments. That Crew is discarded.
I Told You Not to Trust Him.Flavor Text: "You're a cold-hearted bastard, Reis!" "Not as cold as you're about to be, Mister Clemmens."

Ian O'Toole.Name: Ian O'Toole
Ian O'Toole.Text: When this Crew produces Swashbuckling to sink or discard a Damage Attachment, he produces additional Swashbuckling equal to his Influence.
Ian O'Toole.Flavor Text: "The O'Tooles are more than happy to assist our Vendel allies. When the time comes, we know that they'll return the favor."

Ice Storm.Name: Ice Storm
Ice Storm.Text: Tack one of your Crew with Lærdom to target a Ship in this Sea. Inflict 2 Hits on that Ship, or Inflict 4 Hits if the target Ship is in the Trade Sea.
Ice Storm.Flavor Text: As the Vesten regrouped, Yngvild sent a warning to the Vendel - a warning wrapped in bitter cold…

Iken of Venderheim.Name: Iken of Venderheim
Iken of Venderheim.Flavor Text: "I live so far north of here, it's south."

Iken of Venderheim - Exp..Name: Iken of Venderheim - Exp.
Iken of Venderheim - Exp..Text: You may sink Iken when he inflicts Hits with a Boarding Attack to inflict 5 extra Hits.
Iken of Venderheim - Exp..Flavor Text: "Shall I show you Valhalla, Yngvild? Shall I show you the torments that await?"

Ill-Fated Journey - Foil.Name: Ill-Fated Journey - Foil
Ill-Fated Journey - Foil.Text: You must tack one of your Crew with a Fate of 1 or more to put this card into play. When the next Ship enters this Sea, Ill-Fated Journey inflicts 5 Hits on that Ship, then sinks.
Ill-Fated Journey - Foil.Flavor Text: Vodacce is a nation full of black cats - extremely dangerous unless all of the cats belong to you.

Ilya \"Gadalka\" Letinovich.Name: Ilya "Gadalka" Letinovich
Ilya \"Gadalka\" Letinovich.Flavor Text: "A fox can see twice as well as any man. A pity the species could never develop proper cannons."

Imprisonment in El Morro.Name: Imprisonment in El Morro
Imprisonment in El Morro.Text: Any player may sink this Chantey by producing 6 Swashbuckling as an Action. Crew with the Gunner trait produce 2 extra Cannon when tacking to produce Cannon.
Imprisonment in El Morro.Flavor Text: Trapped within the impenetrable fortress walls, beyond hope of rescue or redemption, Enrique Orduño waits for the  Inquistion to burn him.

Imshi.Name: Imshi
Imshi.Text: React: Tack Imshi when you tack the Artifact Cannon. Imshi adds his Cannon skill to the Hits inflicted by the Artifact Cannon.
Imshi.Flavor Text: He keeps Kheired-Din's precious cannon working - and the crew hates him all the more for it.

Imshi - Exp..Name: Imshi - Exp.
Imshi - Exp..Text: Act: Tack Imshi to target an uncompleted Artifact Adventure. The cost to complete that Artifact Adventure is reduced by 4 until the end of the turn (minimum 1).
Imshi - Exp..Flavor Text: "Fear not, Master. With the Prophet' blessing, we will destroy those who defied your will."

In the Dark of the Night - Foil.Name: In the Dark of the Night - Foil
In the Dark of the Night - Foil.Text: Target a player. That player draws 2 fewer cards during the Draw phase this turn (minimum 1).
In the Dark of the Night - Foil.Flavor Text: "…and I hates me the night watch…" - Grousin' George

In the Nick of Time.Name: In the Nick of Time
In the Nick of Time.Text:
React: Play when another player begins a Boarding with your Ship that is not canceled. The Boarding ends after three rounds.
React: Play when another player is targeting your Ship with a Cannon Attack that is inflicting 6 or more Hits. This Cannon Attack is canceled. That player may cancel this effect by producing 3 Cannon.
In the Nick of Time.Flavor Text: "Sorry to dash, but I'm meeting my sister and she'll just lose her head if I'm late." - Ysabette du Montaigne

Indisposed - Foil.Name: Indisposed - Foil
Indisposed - Foil.Text: Target a Captain who has more than one Attachment. Tack that Captain.
Indisposed - Foil.Flavor Text: "Troubles, like a midnight kiss, are easily forgotten." - Leila

Infection.Name: Infection
Infection.Text: Target a Crew with a Face, Eye, Leg, or Hand Attachment. Tack that Crew.
Infection.Flavor Text: "It can't be the leg. Nothing so valuable can hurt so much."

Inga Danziger.Name: Inga Danziger
Inga Danziger.Text: This Crew has +1 Adventuring for each Nacht Knack attached.
Inga Danziger.Flavor Text: "Stand behind me, mein kind. Nothing will hurt you this night."

Ingeborg Davinsonn.Name: Ingeborg Davinsonn
Ingeborg Davinsonn.Text:
If your Captain is Heroic, this Crew has the Heroic trait. If your Captain is Villainous, this Crew has the Villainous trait.
React: Once per turn when you are inflicting Hits with this Crew during a Duel, you may target and tack a Crew on the opposing Crew's Ship with a Swashbuckling less than 3.

Inil.Name: Inil
Inil.Text: React: Tack Inil when the other player in a Boarding performs an action instead of performing a Boarding Attack. Cancel the effects of that action.
Inil.Flavor Text: The men consider him a sorcerer for what he can do with his crossbow... maybe he is.

Inil - Exp..Name: Inil - Exp.
Inil - Exp..Text: React: Discard a Crew card from your hand when the other player in a Boarding performs an action instead of performing a Boarding Attack to cancel the action.
Inil - Exp..Flavor Text: "Did I ever tell you how to navigate with a crossbow?"

Innocent Bystander.Name: Innocent Bystander
Innocent Bystander.Text: React: Play this card when you are sinking a Crew to absorb Hits. If your Captain is untacked, the Crew absorbs 3 extra Hits.
Innocent Bystander.Flavor Text: "I'm always so disappointed by incompetence in my adversaries..." - Reis

Inquisition Witch Hunt.Name: Inquisition Witch Hunt
Inquisition Witch Hunt.Text: Target and tack all Sorcery Knacks and non-Captain Sorcerers in play.

Inquisitor Bascalle.Name: Inquisitor Bascalle
Inquisitor Bascalle.Text: Act: Tack Bascalle and sink one of your non-Loyal Crew. All of your Castillian Crew gain +1 to all of their skills until the end of your next action.
