Inquisitor Bascalle.Flavor Text: "The General will signal you with a single shot, Orduño. Then you may board at leisure and do what you will to the crew."

Inquisitor Bascalle - Exp..Name: Inquisitor Bascalle - Exp.
Inquisitor Bascalle - Exp..Trait: Experienced - Unique - Loyal - First Mate - Holy - Villainous
Inquisitor Bascalle - Exp..Text: Act: Tack Bascalle to give all of your other Holy Crew in play +2 to all of their skills that are greater than 0, until the end of the turn.
Inquisitor Bascalle - Exp..Flavor Text: "I applaud the condemnation of your heretical husband, Senora Orduño. Of course, I should stay on board... to ensure your deeds remain pious."

Inquisitor Carlino.Name: Inquisitor Carlino
Inquisitor Carlino.Text: All Crew aboard Ships in this Sea that do not have a Holy Crew on board have one fewer Influence (minimum zero).
Inquisitor Carlino.Flavor Text: "Find Orduño, Carlino. Find him and ensure that he faces Theus' justice." - Cardinal Esteban Verdugo

Inquisitor Figueroa.Name: Inquisitor Figueroa
Inquisitor Figueroa.Trait: Start: Forbidden Sea - Villainous - Holy - Swordsman +2
Inquisitor Figueroa.Text:
While you have 4 or more other Castillian Crew on board you may use the following abilities: React: Once per turn, tack one of your Holy Crew when another player in this Sea plays an Action card as an action. That player must tack or sink one of their Crew or the action is cancelled.
Act: Once per turn, target Crew gains the Villainous trait until the end of the turn.

Into the Fog.Name: Into the Fog
Into the Fog.Text: React: Play when you are suffering Hits. Reduce the Hits suffered to zero. This card may not be played during a Boarding.
Into the Fog.Flavor Text: The Montaigne gunners looked for a target, but could find none. Hidden by the mist, Orduño's fleet grew closer...

Into The Fray.Name: Into The Fray
Into The Fray.Text: React: Play instead of performing a Boarding Attack. Until the end of this Boarding, all of your Boarding Attacks which inflict 3 or more Hits inflict 2 extra Hits.
Into The Fray.Flavor Text: "Hesitatin' is the best way to wind up siren lunch, lad."

Into the Shadows.Name: Into the Shadows
Into the Shadows.Text:
Act: Return this card and this Crew to your hand (you may not use this ability on your Captain).
React: Tack this card after this Crew tacks to absorb Hits from a Boarding Attack to reduce the remainder of the Hits to zero. Use this ability ony when abworbing Hits from a Boarding Attack (or Duel) in which this Crew fought.
Into the Shadows.Flavor Text: "You'll never see them - not until it's too late…"

Into the Tower.Name: Into the Tower
Into the Tower.Text: All Captains are considered to have the following ability: Act: Once per turn, tack your Captain to search your deck for a card with the Oath trait. Show it to your opponent(s) and place it in your hand.
Into the Tower.Flavor Text: Berek bounded up the stairs two at a time. They had less than five minutes before the guards realized who they were…

Invar Andersson.Name: Invar Andersson
Invar Andersson.Flavor Text: He works all night long, he fights with a stout heart, and whenever he's done with the day's work, he looks to the north, sighs to himself and whispers "I'm coming home, Anna. Soon as I can."

Invisible College Membership.Name: Invisible College Membership
Invisible College Membership.Text: This Captain gains the Invisible College affiliation. While you have 3 or more other Invisible College Crew on board your hand size is increased by 2.
Invisible College Membership.Flavor Text: "I fear the Inquisition of ten selects our members for us. Fugitives make eager candidates."

Iron Mask.Name: Iron Mask
Iron Mask.Text: React: Play when you suffer Hits. Attach this card to one of your Villainous Crew without a Face attachment to absorb 2 Hits. This card has the Face trait, and gives the attached Crew the trait Fear 1. If the Crew already has the Fear trait, that Crew gains +1 to their Fear. A Crew may not have more than one Face attachment.
Iron Mask.Flavor Text: "I'm sure he's got the face of an angel in there.

Isabeau Dubois du Arrent.Name: Isabeau Dubois du Arrent
Isabeau Dubois du Arrent.Text: Act: Tack to inflict 1 Hit on an opposing Ship in your Sea.
Isabeau Dubois du Arrent.Flavor Text: "Hold still," she wispered high in the rigging. "Hold still or I might hit that lovely gentleman behind you."

Isabeau Dubois du Arrent - Exp..Name: Isabeau Dubois du Arrent - Exp.
Isabeau Dubois du Arrent - Exp..Text: React: Once per turn, discard a card from your hand instead of performing a Boarding Attack to inflict 2 Hits on the other Ship in the Boarding.
Isabeau Dubois du Arrent - Exp..Flavor Text: "The General asked me if I thought I could fire a blooded coin over a four story building. Isn't that the oddest question you've ever heard?"

It Doesn't Matter.Name: It Doesn't Matter
It Doesn't Matter.Text: React: Play when a Boarding ends. The players involved with that Boarding must discard their hands and draw 7 new cards.
It Doesn't Matter.Flavor Text: "Castillians... Montaigne... it doesn't matter. They all die just the same." - Timothy le Beau

It's Who You Know.Name: It's Who You Know
It's Who You Know.Text: React: Play when you purchase a Crew Attachment to reduce the Attachment's cost by 2.
It's Who You Know.Flavor Text: "I do believe we have something in common, Frederic," he said and revealed the symbol inked into his palm. Frederic nodded. "Indeed, we do, my brother. Indeed, we do."

Ivorn Quicksilver.Name: Ivorn Quicksilver
Ivorn Quicksilver.Text:
Cards with the title “Master of the Tops” being attached to this Crew have their costs reduced to zero. 
React: Once per turn, when you are paying Sailing, discard a number of cards from your hand equal to your Ship’s Move Cost to produce Sailing equal to your Ship’s Move Cost.
Ivorn Quicksilver.Flavor Text: “There’s nothin’ to be afraid of in the tops... except fallin’ to yer death.”

Ivory Spyglass.Name: Ivory Spyglass
Ivory Spyglass.Trait: Unique - 2 Seas Away - Artifact - Captain Attachment
Ivory Spyglass.Text: Your Hand Size is increased by 2 while the Spyglass is attached to your Captain.
Ivory Spyglass.Flavor Text: Not only did the spyglass show its owner the future - it showed him several likely futures.

Ivory Totem.Name: Ivory Totem
Ivory Totem.Text: Tack one of your Crew with Lærdom to target a Crew with a faction symbol. If that Crew's Captain does not have the same faction symbol as the target, the target is discarded.
Ivory Totem.Flavor Text: "Oh, I can find Jorund…" - Gris Hallisdottir

J.P. Wardbraddon.Name: J.P. Wardbraddon
J.P. Wardbraddon.Text: When hiring J.P., you may pay an additional 3 Influence to give him the trait Glamour 1 and +3 Influence until the end of the game.
J.P. Wardbraddon.Flavor Text: "He's angry. Stay away from him when he's angry." - "Long Tall" Harry.

Jack Tars.Name: Jack Tars
Jack Tars.Text: Jack Tars have +2 Swahbuckling during a Boarding with a Ship that you have targeted with a Cannon Attack this turn.
Jack Tars.Flavor Text: "No sir, Cap'n Berek, sir. No Problem. Just a wee storm, that's all. Remember when Harry o'er there got himself struck by lightnin'? Now that was a storm!"

Jack-of-All-Trades.Name: Jack-of-All-Trades
Jack-of-All-Trades.Flavor Text: "He cooks, he cleans, he breaks skulls. If he had a pretty face, I'd marry him."

Jacklyn the Black - Foil.Name: Jacklyn the Black - Foil
Jacklyn the Black - Foil.Text: Once per Boarding, if you are the defender, you may push Jacklyn forward for a Boarding Attack when she is tacked.
Jacklyn the Black - Foil.Flavor Text: She protects her ship like a lioness protects her cubs.

Jacob Faust.Name: Jacob Faust
Jacob Faust.Text: Once per turn, when your Ship enters a Sea containing one of your Artifact Adventures, you may immediately perform and action to complete it.
Jacob Faust.Flavor Text: "He's seen horrors no man should have to see, and his face only shows the half of it."

Jacob Faust - Exp..Name: Jacob Faust - Exp.
Jacob Faust - Exp..Text: Act: Target one of your Adventures in an adjacent Sea and discard Jacob to move your Ship to that Sea. The Adventuring cost to complete the target Adventure is reduced by 4 (minimum 0) until the end of the turn.
Jacob Faust - Exp..Flavor Text: "Poking around in the Prince's basement? We have a tower cell for spies like you."

Jacques and the Kire.Name: Jacques and the Kire
Jacques and the Kire.Text: Any player may sink this Chantey by tacking a Crew with an Influence cost greater than 5, as an Action. All Crew enter play tacked unless the hiring player discards a card from their hand.
Jacques and the Kire.Flavor Text: "It's good to see you, old friend. I have some news regarding your father... and the order he served."

Jacques Renault.Name: Jacques Renault
Jacques Renault.Text: React: Tack Jaques when one of your other Crew inflicts Hits with a Boarding Attack. That Crew inflicts 2 extra Hits.

Jacques Renault - Exp..Name: Jacques Renault - Exp.
Jacques Renault - Exp..Trait: Experienced - Unique - First Mate - Holy - Heroic - Swordsman +2
Jacques Renault - Exp..Text: Act: Tack this Crew to target another player's Villainous, non-Captain Crew in this Sea. Play a card from your hand as a Boarding Attack to begin a Duel between this Crew and the target Crew.
Jacques Renault - Exp..Flavor Text: "Just like old times, eh my friend?"

Jaimé Espejo.Name: Jaimé Espejo
Jaimé Espejo.Text: React: Tack Jaimé after you have completed a Boarding with another player. The other player must discard his hand and draw 7 new cards.
Jaimé Espejo.Flavor Text: "NO LIFEBOATS!!! NO ONE LEAVES THIS SHIP ALIVE!!!    "

James Stiller.Name: James Stiller
James Stiller.Text: When hiring James, you may pay an additional 3 Influence to give him the trait: Swordsman +2 and +1 Swashbuckling until the end of the game.

Jamie Sices du Sices.Name: Jamie Sices du Sices
Jamie Sices du Sices.Text: React: Tack and sink Jaime when you are being targeted with an Action that will begin a Boarding with your Ship to cancel that Action. The player that attempted the Action must sink two cards from their hand.

Jasmina the Assassin.Name: Jasmina the Assassin
Jasmina the Assassin.Text: This Crew may not attach any cards other than Nacht or Swordsman Knacks. React: When this Crew reverses a Boarding Attack from an opposing Crew, either tack this Crew or discard a Nacht Knack attached to this Crew to tack the opposing Crew.
Jasmina the Assassin.Flavor Text: Kheired-Din knew her faith was strong, but he didn’t realize her enemies were not his own.

Jason the Troubadour.Name: Jason the Troubadour
Jason the Troubadour.Text:
The title of this card is "Entertainers" for Experienced purposes.
React: Tack or disacrd one of your Crew cards with the title "Entertainers" when you are paying a cancel cost to produce 4 points towards the cancel cost.
Jason the Troubadour.Flavor Text: "If you like, I can arrange for a private performance…"

Javier de Bejarano.Name: Javier de Bejarano
Javier de Bejarano.Text: React: Tack when a player is taking a card from their discard or sunk pile. The card is sent to their sunk pile.
Javier de Bejarano.Flavor Text: "At last, immortality is nearly within my grasp. I know the secret of the First Test, and the other two shall soon follow."

Javier de Bejarano - Exp..Name: Javier de Bejarano - Exp.
Javier de Bejarano - Exp..Text: Act: Once per turn, you may sink one of your Crew to untack Javier

Javier's Mistake.Name: Javier's Mistake
Javier's Mistake.Text:
You may only play this card if you have a Villainous Captain.
React: Sink a Crew aligned to your Captain's Faction when you are paying an Adventuring cost to produce 3 Adventuring.
Javier's Mistake.Flavor Text: "Yes," Reis nodded, looking at the Key. "That is a brilliant plan, Javier." Without warning, he rammed his scythe into the young man's chest. "And now that I have it, I don't need you."

Jean-Marie Rois et Reines.Name: Jean-Marie Rois et Reines
Jean-Marie Rois et Reines.Text: React: Discard Jean Marie when a player performs an action which discards or sinks one of their own Crew. The other effects of that action are negated.
Jean-Marie Rois et Reines.Flavor Text: "I am a gentlemen and not given to wasteful slaughter - so give me one reason why I should spare your black heart."

Jean-Paul.Name: Jean-Paul
Jean-Paul.Flavor Text: Once upon a time, I was a Swordsman. Then I was a drunken failure. Fyodor made me a Swordsman once more, and for that, I owe him my life.

Jelena.Name: Jelena
Jelena.Text: All completed Adventures attached to Jelena that provide skill bonuses provide an additional +1 to the appropriate skill.

Jemy.Name: Jemy
Jemy.Text: Jemy may not start a Boarding Attack. Jemy has +1 Swashbuckling when defending against a Boarding Attack.
Jemy.Flavor Text: "He hasn't said a word since we found him, but Jemy's as strong as three men. The mangy cur just refuses to fight." - Riant Gaucher

Jemy - Exp..Name: Jemy - Exp.
Jemy - Exp..Text: Jemy inflicts 3 fewer hits during Boarding Attacks (minimum 0)
Jemy - Exp..Flavor Text: Rumor spread through the ship that Gaucher had drawn Jemy's name before Smitt's - ant that Riant didn't believe the Hulking topsman could be killed.

Jenny House.Name: Jenny House
Jenny House.Text:
Any player in this Sea may sink Jenny House by tacking 3 Swashbuckling as an action.
Act: Tack Jenny House and target a Crew, except Captain, in this Sea. Pay 1 Influence to tack that Crew.
Jenny House.Flavor Text: "Don't expect me to sympathize when you wake up with your wallet missing." - Tom Toblin

Jens Bjørn.Name: Jens Bjørn
Jens Bjørn.Flavor Text: "This is no place for a lady at this time of night, ma'am. There are all sorts of unsavory characters about. Me, f'r instance."

Jensson Cloudmaster.Name: Jensson Cloudmaster
Jensson Cloudmaster.Text: Act: Discard a card from your hand with the Weather trait to target a Ship in this Sea. Increase or decrease that Ship's Move Cost by 1 (minimum 1) until the end of the turn. Any player may tack one of their Crew with the Lærdom trait to cancel this action.

Jeremiah Berek.Name: Jeremiah Berek
Jeremiah Berek.Text: React: When you are suffering Hits, tack one of your completed Adventures to reduce the Hits suffered by 1 (minimum 0) if you have 3 or more other Brotherhood Crew on your Ship.
Jeremiah Berek.Flavor Text: "My luck's run out, but I've more than luck to depend on."
Jeremiah Berek.Errata: Comment to allow the sort procedure to group all the fixed captains of this extension - not game related

Jibril Al-Khadeem.Name: Jibril Al-Khadeem
Jibril Al-Khadeem.Text: Act: Once per turn, discard one of your Captive Crew to give both your Captain and this Crew +3 Influence until the end of the turn.
Jibril Al-Khadeem.Flavor Text: "Tell Kheired-Din I will wait no longer. He isn't the only one interested in slaves."

Jillison Brown.Name: Jillison Brown
Jillison Brown.Text: React: Tack this Crew when you are paying the cancel cost of an action to produce 3 points toward its cost.
Jillison Brown.Flavor Text: Jillison is here to watch, listen and remember, so that others will not forget.
Jillison Brown.Errata: You cannot use Slip of the Tongue, Sabotaged Sails and such when Jillison Brown uses its ability to produce points toward a cancel cost.

Jimmy Bass.Name: Jimmy Bass
Jimmy Bass.Text: Jimmy produces 2 extra Cannon when you are targeting a Ship with a Cannon Attack that you have performed a Boarding with this turn.
Jimmy Bass.Flavor Text: The hook took hold on the ship just next to Jimmy's head. He tilted the cannon fifteen degrees and let the Brotherhood scum taste Avalon shot first-hand.

Jimmy Bass - Exp..Name: Jimmy Bass - Exp.
Jimmy Bass - Exp..Trait: Experienced - Unique - Loyal - Gunner - First Mate
Jimmy Bass - Exp..Text: When your Sea Dogs Crew tack to produce Cannon, they produce an additional amount of Cannon equal to the number of completed Adventures they have attached.
Jimmy Bass - Exp..Flavor Text: "It's a high-pitched whistle. Only Dogs can hear it, heh-heh."

Joaquin Orduño.Name: Joaquin Orduño
Joaquin Orduño.Text: React: When you are paying an Influence Cost you may tack one of your completed Adventures to produce 1 Influence. You may only use this ability if you have 3 or more other Brotherhood Crew on board.
Joaquin Orduño.Flavor Text: The family black sheep, a smuggler, pirate and scoundrel. If only they knew his true allegiance.

Joern Keitelsson.Name: Joern Keitelsson
Joern Keitelsson.Text: While Joern is aboard your Ship, your hand size is increased by 1.
Joern Keitelsson.Flavor Text: I shoved the knife deep into the Vestenmannavnjar's stomach. He didn't even blink. Just smiled. "My turn," he said and raised his sword...

Joern Keitelsson - Exp..Name: Joern Keitelsson - Exp.
Joern Keitelsson - Exp..Trait: Experienced - Unique - Loyal - First Mate - Swordsman +2
Joern Keitelsson - Exp..Text: Your hand size is increased by 2.
Joern Keitelsson - Exp..Flavor Text: "Sea Dogs... McGee... The Black Dawn... The Hurricane... do any of these names ring a bell? Or shall we have to poke at the other shoulder?"

Johnny Terwilliger.Name: Johnny Terwilliger
Johnny Terwilliger.Text: Other players may not play or perform Reacts in reaction to suffering the Hits inflicted by a Cannon Attack performed by this Crew.
Johnny Terwilliger.Flavor Text: "Ya melted the bloomin' barrel! Where'd the captain buy this piecea junk?!"

Jolly Roger of the Brotherhood of the Co.Name: Jolly Roger of the Brotherhood of the Coast
Jolly Roger of the Brotherhood of the Co.Trait: Brotherhood Ship Attachment - Unique - Item - Jolly Roger
Jolly Roger of the Brotherhood of the Co.Text: React: Tack after one of your Brotherhood Crew has been sunk when absorbing Hits inflicted by another player, to target and untack another of your non-Captain Brotherhood Crew. You may only use this ability if you have 3 or more Brotherhood Crew on board.

Joris Hartig.Name: Joris Hartig
Joris Hartig.Text: Joris produces 2 extra Influence when paying Influence to hire an Unaligned Crew.
Joris Hartig.Flavor Text: "I find Guttormson excreble, but it takes a butcher to destroy a butcher. Better Olafsdottir lying dead than some poor merchant and his family."

Jorund Guttormson.Name: Jorund Guttormson
Jorund Guttormson.Text: Any player may produce 6 Influence as an action to target and discard Jorund.
Jorund Guttormson.Flavor Text: The Vendel placed him on board with a sack of gold and a single command - "Betray Yngvild Olafssdottir."

Jorund's Betrayal.Name: Jorund's Betrayal
Jorund's Betrayal.Text: React: Play when a player completes a non-Artifact Adventure. The Adventure is discarded without benefit. If the player completing the Adventure has a Villainous Crew in play, except Captain, Jorund's Betrayal target that player's Ship and inflicts 3 Hits
Jorund's Betrayal.Flavor Text: "I'm sorry, captain," Jorund shrugged as he fired into Hoskul'd Shoulder. " They just pay better."

Jorund's Warning.Name: Jorund's Warning
Jorund's Warning.Text: All Captains have the following ability: Act: Tack one of your completed Adventures and a Port in this Sea to untack one of your non-Captain Crew.
Jorund's Warning.Flavor Text: "She has drawn upon some form of Vesten Magic, Master Mokk. She's more powerful than she's ever been." "Jorund, she's a little girl, and you let her beats us."

Joseph Dunn.Name: Joseph Dunn
Joseph Dunn.Text: When Joseph tacks to absorb Hits, except during Boarding, you may discard one card from your hand to absorb 3 extra Hits. You may only use this ability once each time you suffer Hits.
Joseph Dunn.Flavor Text: "Don't worry, me beauty. I'll soon have you all patched up."

Joseph Gallegos de Avila.Name: Joseph Gallegos de Avila
Joseph Gallegos de Avila.Text: Act: Tack a card attached to this Crew with the word "Musket" in the title to inflict 2 Hits on another Ship in this Sea.
Joseph Gallegos de Avila.Flavor Text: "We have been fighting to keep this land for a thousand years. What loyalty or devotion can match that?"
Joseph Gallegos de Avila.Errata: Secret Society added. Flavor text modified.
Joseph Gallegos de Avila.Changes on MRP: Affiliation/Nation modified;Text modified;Flavor text modified;Artist modified;

Josephina Culpepper.Name: Josephina Culpepper
Josephina Culpepper.Flavor Text: "They told me that Reis wanted Mc Gee's head on a plate. I signed on with him the next day."

Josette Quadros.Name: Josette Quadros
Josette Quadros.Text: Your Captain absorbs 1 extra Hit when tacking to absorb Hits.
Josette Quadros.Flavor Text: "Though I did not wish it, Theus has taken me from the front and placed me on board ship. I shall endeavor to perform His will from here."

Julia.Name: Julia
Julia.Flavor Text: "The Guild taught me everything I know. Now I'm going to teach you…"

Julie Betts.Name: Julie Betts
Julie Betts.Text: This Crew has -3 Influence (min 0) when another Ship is in this Sea.
Julie Betts.Flavor Text: “The fairer sex is not necessarily the frailer, monsieur.”

Juliet Jones.Name: Juliet Jones
Juliet Jones.Text: Your Captain has +1 Sailing while this Crew is on Board.
Juliet Jones.Flavor Text: "A ship's sail is a living thing. You must watch it carefully, sense its moods and dispositions. It will turn on you when angry - but treat it properly, and it will lay the seven seas at your feet."

Julius Caligari.Name: Julius Caligari
Julius Caligari.Flavor Text: "My brother? For that price, I'd sell him, my father, my mother and my sister." "Done and done."

Julius Caligari - Exp..Name: Julius Caligari - Exp.
Julius Caligari - Exp..Text:
This Crew is considered to have an Eye Attachment.
Act: Once per turn, you may discard an Attachment card attached to this Crew to target a Ship in this Sea. Inflict 2 Hits on the target Ship.

June the Fair.Name: June the Fair
June the Fair.Text: This Crew’s Influence cost is reduced by 2 if you have a Crew with the Glamour trait on board your ship. If any player has 'Queen of the Sidhe' in play, this card has the Explorers faction symbol. While this Crew has 4 or more Sorcery Knacks attached, she gains +1 to all skills and +1 to her Glamour.
June the Fair.Flavor Text: “Rumour has it she’s a full blooded Sidhe... An’ no one knows what powers she has. Most are afraid to find out.”

Kalem the Believer.Name: Kalem the Believer
Kalem the Believer.Text:
This card does not untack during the Untack phase.
React: Tack Kalem when you are paying an Influence cost to produce 3 Influence.
React: Untack Kalem when another player's Crew is sunk.

Karolan's Drum.Name: Karolan's Drum
Karolan's Drum.Text:
The cost of this card is reduced by 3 if being attached to a Sophia's Daughter Crew (minimum 0).
React: Tack this card after another player's Crew has been untacked during the Actions Phase to untack any one of your Crew.
Karolan's Drum.Flavor Text: An ancient artifact from the the days of Avalon mythology. Sophia's Daughters have put it to good use.

Kedish the Crescent.Name: Kedish the Crescent
Kedish the Crescent.Text: When Kedish tacks to produce Cannon, you may tack 1 Influence to produce 2 extra Cannon.

Keel of Rowan Wood.Name: Keel of Rowan Wood
Keel of Rowan Wood.Flavor Text: "I don' care what the Cap'n did to get it, that Sidhe wood smells... like blood."

Keep a Sharp Lookout!.Name: Keep a Sharp Lookout!
Keep a Sharp Lookout!.Text: React: Play if one of your Adventures or Attachment cards is being sunk or discarded from play by another player’s Action or Action card. If the card is being discarded, you may shuffle it back into your deck instead. If it is being sunk, you may discard it instead. Sink this card.
Keep a Sharp Lookout!.Flavor Text: “Don’t know what the captain’s worried about. Been quiet all night.” - Simon the Bosun

Keith Braveman.Name: Keith Braveman
Keith Braveman.Text: When this Crew tacks to absorb hits, he absorbs one extra hit. While you have at least one non-Captain Swordsman on board, this Crew gains +1 Sailing.
Keith Braveman.Flavor Text: “Chase the Explorers west and pinch everything of value they’ve found? Haha... sounds like fun to me!”

Kerry Delancy.Name: Kerry Delancy
Kerry Delancy.Text: React: Once per turn, before you perform an Action, sink any number of cards from your hand to target one of this Crew's Skills. Until the end of the turn, this Crew has a bonus to the targeted Skill equal to the number of cards sunk.
Kerry Delancy.Flavor Text: "Biggest mistake of their lives, letting the General get away. Would that I were with him now."

Ketty Tappan.Name: Ketty Tappan
Ketty Tappan.Text: Act: Tack this Crew to attach one of your Ally Attachments in play to this Sea.
Ketty Tappan.Flavor Text: "Best ship's wheel I've ever made. 500 Guilders and it's yours."

Kheired-Din.Name: Kheired-Din
Kheired-Din.Trait: Start: Forbidden Sea - Villainous - Holy - Swordsman +2
Kheired-Din.Text: Once per turn while you have three or more other Corsairs on your Ship and you are suffering Hits, Kheired-Din absorbs Hits equal to his Swashbuckling (without tacking or sinking).

Kheired-Din - Foil.Name: Kheired-Din - Foil
Kheired-Din - Foil.Trait: Start: Forbidden Sea - Villainous - Holy - Swordsman +2
Kheired-Din - Foil.Text: Once per turn while you have three or more other Corsairs on your Ship and you are suffering Hits, Kheired-Din absorbs Hits equal to his Swashbuckling (without tacking or sinking).

Kheired-Din, the Reborn.Name: Kheired-Din, the Reborn
Kheired-Din, the Reborn.Trait: Start: Forbidden Sea - Villainous - Holy - Swordsman +2
Kheired-Din, the Reborn.Text:
While you have 4 or more other Corsair Crew on board you may use the following abilities: React: Once per turn, sink one of your Corsair Crew to untack this Captain.
React: Once per turn, instead of performing a Boarding Attack, tack and sink one of your Corsair Crew to untack this Captain.
Kheired-Din, the Reborn.Flavor Text: He survived Cabora, and now plots a destiny of his own choosing.

Kheired-Din's Fortitude.Name: Kheired-Din's Fortitude
Kheired-Din's Fortitude.Text:
You may only attach this card to your Captain when starting Crew are chosen, at the cost of 1 Starting Wealth, and only if they have the name “Din” in their title.
React: When you sink the attached Crew, instead discard all your cards from play except Captain and Ship. Untack both, and return your Ship to your starting Sea. You may hire one Crew from your hand at zero cost. The current Action is considered resolved, and play continues with the next player.

Kheired-Din's Scimitar.Name: Kheired-Din's Scimitar
Kheired-Din's Scimitar.Trait: Corsair Captain Attachment - Unique - Signature Item
Kheired-Din's Scimitar.Text:
Act: Sink this card to untack your Captain.
Act: Tack this card to target one of your other Corsair Crew to give that Crew +2 to all of that Crew's skills that are greater than 1.
React: Tack this card when you are paying a Cannon cost for an action to play, discard or sink a Control card to give your Captain +4 Cannon until after the action.

Kheired-Din's Secret.Name: Kheired-Din's Secret
Kheired-Din's Secret.Text: Act: Tack Kheired-Din's Secret to move your Ship to any Sea. You suffer 5 Hits.
Kheired-Din's Secret.Flavor Text: It came out of the mist like silent thunder. The crew barely had time to recognize it before the Corsairs were upon them.

King Before Captain.Name: King Before Captain
King Before Captain.Text: Target a Crew (except a Captain) with more than two completed Adventures attached which provide a bonus to the same skill. Discard all cards attached to the Crew.
King Before Captain.Flavor Text: As he watched Michel disembarrk, the General's fists clenched in frustration. Some things, it seemed, were more important than gold.

Kirsten Blumfeld.Name: Kirsten Blumfeld
Kirsten Blumfeld.Text: Reduce the Influence cost of Kirsten to 2 if you have a completed Artifact Adventure in play.
Kirsten Blumfeld.Flavor Text: "Just because I'm Eisen doesn't mean I don't have style."

Kirsten Blumfeld - Exp..Name: Kirsten Blumfeld - Exp.
Kirsten Blumfeld - Exp..Text: React: Tack Kirsten when you are completing an Artifact Adventure to name one of the Seas. The Adventure may be completed as if it were in the named Sea.
Kirsten Blumfeld - Exp..Flavor Text: "I know you love your wife, McCormick. The question is, how far are you willing to go to find her?"

Kirstov Throat-Mangler.Name: Kirstov Throat-Mangler
Kirstov Throat-Mangler.Text: The title of this card is "Captive Thugs" for Experienced purposes. All of your other Crew cards with the title "Captive Thugs" have +2 Sailing and +1 Cannon.
Kirstov Throat-Mangler.Flavor Text: Trust me. It's not just a nickname.

Kiss of Death.Name: Kiss of Death
Kiss of Death.Text: Act: Tack your Black Freighter Captain and Black Freighter Ship to play this card. Get a non-Loyal Crew from your deck which does not have the Black Freighter faction symbol and hire the Crew. Attach this card to the hired Crew. This card gives the Crew the Black Freighter faction symbol and the Loyal trait. Shuffle your deck. If this card is discarded or sunk, immediately discard this Crew.
Kiss of Death.Flavor Text: The dark embrace promised everlasting damnation...
Kiss of Death.Changes on MRP: Faction modified;Text modified;Flavor text modified;Artist modified;

Kitka Maritova.Name: Kitka Maritova
Kitka Maritova.Text: Act: Tack to discard an Ally card attached to this Sea.
Kitka Maritova.Flavor Text: "Do not depend upon animals to protect you from me. My ties to them extend far deeper than yours."

Kitka Moritova.Name: Kitka Moritova
Kitka Moritova.Text: Act: Tack to discard an Ally card attached to this Sea.
Kitka Moritova.Flavor Text: "Do not depend upon animals to protect you from me. My ties to them extend far deeper than yours."
Kitka Moritova.Errata: Typo: Kitka Moritova instead of Kitka Maritova

Kjøtt (Flesh).Name: Kjøtt (Flesh)
Kjøtt (Flesh).Trait: Vesten Captain Attachment - Unique - Letter of Marque
Kjøtt (Flesh).Text: You must have two or more Loyal Vesten Crew on your Ship to put Kjøtt into play. While Kjøtt is attached to your Captain, all of your Vesten Crew absorb 1 extra Hit when they tack to absorb Hits.

Know Your Opponent.Name: Know Your Opponent
Know Your Opponent.Text: React: Play when you reverse a Boarding Attack during a Boarding Attack or Duel. If your Crew has more Swordsman Knacks attached than the other Crew or a higher Swashbuckling than the other Crew, the bottom Boarding Box may not be used to reverse your Boarding Attack.
Know Your Opponent.Flavor Text: "How swiftly the student becomes the master!"

Kodiak Bear.Name: Kodiak Bear
Kodiak Bear.Text: This Crew absorbs 2 extra Hits when tacking or sinking to absorb Hits.
Kodiak Bear.Flavor Text: Terror of the north, the bear's mighty strength can shrug off any blow.

Korintine Nicolovich.Name: Korintine Nicolovich
Korintine Nicolovich.Text: React: When Korintine is about to be sunk, discard the top card of your deck. If the Boarding Attack on the discard is a Dagger, then Korintine is placed on the top of your deck instead of in the sunk pile.
Korintine Nicolovich.Flavor Text: "I'll take the Ussuran. He's unarmed.. Oh no." - Llew Babel's last words

Korintine Nicolovich - Exp..Name: Korintine Nicolovich - Exp.
Korintine Nicolovich - Exp..Trait: Experienced - Unique - Loyal - First Mate - Pyeryem 2
Korintine Nicolovich - Exp..Text: When Korintine is Experienced or Hired you may search your deck and discard pile for an Attachment card that is a Pyeryem Knack, attach it to Korintine and then shuffle your deck.
Korintine Nicolovich - Exp..Flavor Text: "Please to show me Miss Malone, NOW!"

Kristin Abjornsdottir.Name: Kristin Abjornsdottir
Kristin Abjornsdottir.Text: For each additional point of Lærdom that this Crew has beyond 1, she gains +1 Adventuring and +1 Influence.
Kristin Abjornsdottir.Flavor Text: "Guns are noisy, smelly and unreliable. True marksmen still use the bow."

Kurt Weinberg.Name: Kurt Weinberg
Kurt Weinberg.Text:
When this Crew tacks or sinks to absorb Hits he absorbs 1 extra Hit.
Act: If this Crew does not have a card with the title: "Cutlass" attached, attach a "Cutlass" to this Crew from your hand without cost.
Kurt Weinberg.Flavor Text: "Eisen won't remain divided forever. When it rises again, it will need allies, and we could do a lot worse than the Sea Dogs."
Kurt Weinberg.Errata: Nation and Secret Society added. Flavor text modified.
Kurt Weinberg.Changes on MRP: Affiliation/Nation modified;Text modified;Flavor text modified;Artist modified;

La Boca.Name: La Boca
La Boca.Flavor Text: "...is the gulf just south of Castille. It is also the home of the Brotherhood of the Coast and their Pirate King." - The Explorer's Society Guide to Théah

La Boca - Foil.Name: La Boca - Foil
La Boca - Foil.Flavor Text: "...is the gulf just south of Castille. It is also the home of the Brotherhood of the Coast and their Pirate King." - The Explorer's Society Guide to Théah

La Bucca Defenses.Name: La Bucca Defenses
La Bucca Defenses.Text:
You may only play this card if you have a Brotherhood Captain. As an action, any player in this Sea may tack this card by paying 3 Influence.
Act: You may tack this card to target a Ship in this Sea. Inflict a 5 Hit Cannon Attack on that Ship.
La Bucca Defenses.Flavor Text: The former prison has more than ships defending it.

La Venganza.Name: La Venganza
La Venganza.Text:
React: When you are attaching a Ship Attachment to this Ship discard a card from your hand to reduce the skill cost by 3 (minimum 0). You may only use this ability if your Captain and this Ship are untacked.
React: Tack before performing an action, to move to an adjacent Sea.

Lady Katerina.Name: Lady Katerina
Lady Katerina.Text: +1 Swashbuckling. This Crew inflicts 1 extra Hit during Boarding Attacks.
Lady Katerina.Flavor Text: "Take this to the general Montegue. And don't let anyone see you leave."

Lady's Kiss.Name: Lady's Kiss
Lady's Kiss.Text: Target one of your Heroic Crew. That Crew gains +2 to all skills until the end of the turn.
Lady's Kiss.Flavor Text: "You can't fool me, 'Tom,'" Berek smiled. "And I need a lady's kiss before I face that monster."

Lakov.Name: Lakov
Lakov.Text: Act: Tack this Crew to activate this ability. Until the end of the turn, Sorcery Knacks in the same Sea as this Crew that Inflict, increase, reduce, or absorb Hits may not be used while in the same Sea as this Crew.
Lakov.Flavor Text: "Die Kreuzritter calls him a 'Night,' one of their own lost to the Dark Paths. They never speak of him without a shudder."

Land Lubber.Name: Land Lubber
Land Lubber.Text: React: Play when a player Hires a Crew with Cannon of 0 and Sailing of 0. Pay an amount of Adventuring equal to the Influence cost of the Crew to target and discard that Crew.
Land Lubber.Flavor Text: "Sheep... shank...??? What does livestock have to do with it?"

Last Ditch Cannon Attack.Name: Last Ditch Cannon Attack
Last Ditch Cannon Attack.Text: Act: Sink one of your non-Captain Gunner Crew and target a Ship in this Sea to produce a Cannon Attack equal to the sunk Crew's printed Cannon skill. If your Captain has a Cannon skill greater than 5 and you have a smaller printed Crew Maximum than the target Ship, the cost to play this card is reduced by 3 (minimum 0).
Last Ditch Cannon Attack.Flavor Text: "Nobody could make the last shot count like Allende." - Sean McCorley

Last Second Cannon Volley.Name: Last Second Cannon Volley
Last Second Cannon Volley.Text: React: Play when an opponent begins Boarding your Ship. You inflict a 3 Hit Cannon Attack on their Ship. The Boarding is canceled.
Last Second Cannon Volley.Flavor Text: The master gunner threw down his arm. "Now!" he shouted. Our guns belched doom that night.

Last Second Escape!.Name: Last Second Escape!
Last Second Escape!.Text:
React: Play when a Cannon Attack is inflicting Hits on your Ship. Target the Ship of the player producing the Cannon Attack. Cancel the Cannon Attack, then move your Ship to an adjacent Sea.
React: Target a Ship that is starting a Boarding with your Ship. The Boarding attempt is canceled. Move your Ship to an adjacent Sea.
Last Second Escape!.Flavor Text: "Victory belongs to the swift - for ships as well as men."
Last Second Escape!.Errata: You now target the Ship of the player who made the Cannon Attack, not the Cannon Attack. Flavor text modified.

Launching the Falcon's Roost.Name: Launching the Falcon's Roost
Launching the Falcon's Roost.Text: Move your Ship to your Captain's Starting Sea. Sink this card.
Launching the Falcon's Roost.Flavor Text: Delaina smiled from the crowd as the merchant broke the bottle on the ship's prow. "Yes. That will do nicely, I think."

Lazare Tourvile.Name: Lazare Tourvile
Lazare Tourvile.Text: This Crew may not attach Porté Knacks while tacked.
Lazare Tourvile.Flavor Text: He never quite mastered the art of Porté. It's works, but it's messy.

le Beau's Compass.Name: le Beau's Compass
le Beau's Compass.Trait: Crew Attachment - Unique - Item - Porté 1 Knack
le Beau's Compass.Text: Act: Tack and sink this card to target an Adventure in your Discard or Sunk Pile. Put that Adventure into play as if it were played normally.
le Beau's Compass.Flavor Text: "He left it on the General's ship when he disembarked. Do you think he'll return to claim it?"

Le Petit Esprit.Name: Le Petit Esprit
Le Petit Esprit.Text:
React: Tack after you have completed an Adventure to untack one of your Crew that produce Adventuring to complete that Adventure.
React: Tack before performing an action, to move to an adjacent Sea.
Le Petit Esprit.Artist: Travis Moore and Dærick W. Gröss

Le Prédateur des Mers.Name: Le Prédateur des Mers
Le Prédateur des Mers.Text:
Act: Tack this card to attach one or more of your Ally cards in play to this Sea.
React: Tack before performing an action, to move to an adjacent Sea.

Le Prédateur des Mers - Foil.Name: Le Prédateur des Mers - Foil
Le Prédateur des Mers - Foil.Text:
Act: Tack this card to attach one or more of your Allies in play to this Sea.
React: Tack before performing an action, to move to an adjacent Sea.

Leaping From Rooftops.Name: Leaping From Rooftops
Leaping From Rooftops.Text:
Act: Move your Ship to an adjacent Sea. You may immediatly perform an action that completes an Adventure in that Sea. The cost of this card is reduced by the number of Los Vagos Crew you have on board (min. 0).
Act: Target an Adventure in an adjacent Sea. with only an Adventuring cost. Tack any number of Los Vagos Crew to produce Adventuring to complete the target adventure (the Adventure is considered to be completed in the Sea which it was placed).

Learning the Controls.Name: Learning the Controls
Learning the Controls.Text: +4 Sailing and this Crew gains the Topman trait. You may not attach this card to your Captain.
Learning the Controls.Flavor Text: "Look, I don't care if you built the damn thing, we're going to skid straight into that reef!"

Leegstra School.Name: Leegstra School
Leegstra School.Flavor Text: "The Vesten may be ignorant and backwards, but they can take a gunshot like it was a little girl's kiss."
Leegstra School.Errata: Typo: Leegstra School is not a Crew Attachment, just an Attachment.

Leila.Name: Leila
Leila.Text: When Leila tacks to produce Influence when you are hiring a Crew, she produces 2 extra Influence.
Leila.Flavor Text: "It's two years on ship, certainly, but it's two years with her." - Jacques Renault

Lemons.Name: Lemons
Lemons.Text: React: Play immediately after you have completed an Adventure. Untack one of your Crew which tacked to pay the Adventuring cost of that Adventure.
Lemons.Flavor Text: "...and I hates me the scurvy…" - Grousin' George

Leonard Pinkerton.Name: Leonard Pinkerton
Leonard Pinkerton.Text: When Leonard tacks to absorb Hits during a Boarding, he absorbs 2 extra Hits.
Leonard Pinkerton.Flavor Text: "I know the crew thinks I'm lucky, Captain, but do I have to play during the battles too?"

Letter of Marque.Name: Letter of Marque
Letter of Marque.Trait: Sea Dogs Captain Attachment - Unique - Letter of Marque
Letter of Marque.Text:
You must discard two cards from your hand to put this card into play.
Act: Tack the Letter of Marque to draw a card.
Letter of Marque.Flavor Text: "Received it from the Queen herself, he did. Seen it wit' me own two eyes. Why, it was a sight worth seein' a hundred times."

Leviathan Bone.Name: Leviathan Bone
Leviathan Bone.Text: React: Play when you suffer Hits. You suffer 2 fewer Hits, and this card attaches to your Captain. This Attachment has the Hand trait, and gives a +1 Swashbuckling. This Crew inflicts 2 extra Hits during Boarding Attacks. A Crew may not have more than one Hand Attachment.
Leviathan Bone.Changes on MRP: Cost; sepcial cost/Cancel cost modified;Boarding Attack modified;Text modified;

Li'l Jim.Name: Li'l Jim
Li'l Jim.Flavor Text: He signed on the ship as a swabber, but when we got into the thick of it, we learned he could do much more than just push a mop.

Li'l Jim - Exp..Name: Li'l Jim - Exp.
Li'l Jim - Exp..Text: Li'l Jim's Boarding Attacks that finish with a Club inflict 2 extra Hits.
Li'l Jim - Exp..Flavor Text: "We rescued him from the hold of a Corsair galley. The mop? Let me tell you about the Mop..." - Rami the Victorious

Lice.Name: Lice
Lice.Text:
Act: Target another Ship in a Sea with a Port attached. All Crew on that Ship have their Influence reduced by one until the end of the turn (minimum 0).
React: Tack one of your Pet cards when another player tacks a Crew to produce Influence. That Crew produces 3 less Influence (minimum 0).
Lice.Flavor Text: "Yer gonna give that monkey a disease!"

Lieutenant Novak.Name: Lieutenant Novak
Lieutenant Novak.Text: Act: Sink Lieutenant Novak when there are no other Ships in this Sea. Until the end of the turn, you may not perform, or be targeted by, Cannon Attacks or Boarding attempts. You may not put another copy of Lt. Novak into play this game.
Lieutenant Novak.Flavor Text: "I am an Eisen, Colonel. Do not question my honor or my resolve."

Life Raft.Name: Life Raft
Life Raft.Text:
Act: Search your discard pile for a Crew card. Place that Crew card in your hand.
React: Play when one of your Crew is being discarded. Place that Crew card in your hand, instead of your discard pile.
React: Play after another player performs an action (not a React) to discard one of your Crew. That Crew remains on board your Ship, tacked. Sink all cards attached to this Crew. Sink this card.

Lightening the Load.Name: Lightening the Load
Lightening the Load.Text: You may only play this card if you have a Villainous Captain. Discard one of your Crew (except a Captain) from play to move your Ship to an adjacent Sea.
Lightening the Load.Flavor Text: Kheired-Din was impassive. "Throw them overboard. Perhaps Theus can teach them the benefits of obedience."

Lightning Flash.Name: Lightning Flash
Lightning Flash.Text: Target and sink a Crew with an Influence cost less than 3. The cost to play this card is reduced by 2 (min. 1) if the targeted Crew is in the Trade Sea or the Frothing Sea.
Lightning Flash.Flavor Text: The skoeren howled and the sky answered.

Line and Winch.Name: Line and Winch
Line and Winch.Text: React: Play when you are paying Sailing cost of an Action that begins a Boarding to produce 4 Sailing.
Line and Winch.Flavor Text: "He can reel in a brigantine like a load of mackerel." - Arturo Rodriguez

Listing Peter.Name: Listing Peter
Listing Peter.Trait: Unique - Loyal - Skeletal - Villainous - No Attachments
Listing Peter.Text:
This Crew does not count against your Crew maximum.
React: Tack this Crew when you are playing a Damage Attachment to absorb Hits. That Damage Attachment absorbs 3 extra Hits.
Listing Peter.Flavor Text: Just don't call him "Lefty." He hates that.

Livestock.Name: Livestock
Livestock.Text: Move your Ship one Sea closer to one of your uncompleted Adventures. Beggining with the player on your left, ant player may discard 2 cards from their hand to cancel this action.
Livestock.Flavor Text: "They're prettier than half the crew... and smell better than all of 'em!"

Local Assistance.Name: Local Assistance
Local Assistance.Text: Act: Tack this card to target another Ship in this Sea. If you are in your Captain's Starting Sea, inflict 3 Hits on the target Ship.
Local Assistance.Flavor Text: "Castille may be battered, but she still ensures that Valoix pays a heavy price for his arrogance."

Locked in Death.Name: Locked in Death
Locked in Death.Text:
You must have a Villainous Captain to play this card.
React: Play after you inflict Hits with a Boarding Attack. Target the other Ship in the Boarding and inflicts 3 Hits on that Ship. Your ship then suffers 3 Hits.
Locked in Death.Flavor Text: "How courteous of Deanna and du Crieux to rid the world of each other's company." - The General

Log of the Black Freighter.Name: Log of the Black Freighter
Log of the Black Freighter.Text: Act: Tack one of your Crew with Fear 1 or more to target a player. Target player must discard one of their Crew (except a Captain) with an Influence cost equal to, or greater than, the Fear value of the Crew tacked to play this card.
Log of the Black Freighter.Flavor Text: A litany of the Damned is inscribed on its pages.

Long Hand.Name: Long Hand
Long Hand.Text: React: Tack Long Hand to produce 2 Adventuring when you are paying to complete an Adventure.
Long Hand.Flavor Text: "Call it infernal if you like, but the Montaigne sorcerers can get into places we could never dream of." - Guy McCormick

Long Range Cannon Volley.Name: Long Range Cannon Volley
Long Range Cannon Volley.Text: React: Target a Ship when it enters this Sea. You may immediately perform a Cannon Attack against that Ship.
Long Range Cannon Volley.Flavor Text: Reis's voice was guttural and unfeeling. "Sink it," was all he said.

Longcoat Lucy.Name: Longcoat Lucy
Longcoat Lucy.Text:
This Crew has +1 to her Swordsman trait for each Swordsman Knack she has attached.
Act: Tack this Crew to target a non-Captain sorcerer on another Ship in this Sea. Inflict a number of Hits on that sorcerer's ship equal to this Crew's Swashbuckling skill plus Swordsman trait.
Longcoat Lucy.Flavor Text: "the coat was me father's, the pistol me Mum's. She shot him with it; if you look you can still see the hole."

Look The Devil in the Eye.Name: Look The Devil in the Eye
Look The Devil in the Eye.Text:
React: Play immediately after you and another player have resolved a Duel. Both players draw 5 cards from their deck.
React: Play when you push your Captain forward to start a Boarding Attack. You may discard your entire hand and draw 7 cards from your deck.
Look The Devil in the Eye.Flavor Text: "The story's over, ye butcher!" She sank the blade into his chest. "Ye cut, ye bleed, ye die..."

Loot and Pillage.Name: Loot and Pillage
Loot and Pillage.Text: Until the end of the turn, all Crew with the Villainous trait have +1 Influence while they are in a Sea with a Port attached.
Loot and Pillage.Flavor Text: "This town and all its contents are the property of l'Empereur Leon. You disagree? Tell Theus when I send you to Him."

Lord Windamshire.Name: Lord Windamshire
Lord Windamshire.Text:
When you complete an Adventure which increases a Crew's Influence, you must attach it to Windamshire, if able.
Act: Discard 2 cards from your hand to move an Influence-increasing Attachment from Windamshire to another of your Crew.

Lord Windamshire - Exp..Name: Lord Windamshire - Exp.
Lord Windamshire - Exp..Text: Windamshire gains +1 Influence for every Adventure card attached to him.
Lord Windamshire - Exp..Flavor Text: "McCormick's quest continues, I assume. If I could show him the vistas I have found..."

Los Vagos Henchman.Name: Los Vagos Henchman
Los Vagos Henchman.Text:
This Crew inflicts 2 extra Hits during Boarding Attacks.
React: Tack when you are producing Swashbuckling (for a cost other than suffering Hits) to produce 3 Swashbuckling. This ability may only be used if this card is attached to a Los Vagos Crew.
Los Vagos Henchman.Flavor Text: "Ay chancho! You really should check that chandelier - it's going to hurt someone one of these days."

Los Vagos Membership.Name: Los Vagos Membership
Los Vagos Membership.Text: This Captain gains the Los Vagos affiliation. While you have 3 or more other Los Vagos Crew on board this Captain has the following ability: Act: Tack one of your Los Vagos Crew and target a non-Heroic, non-Captain Crew in this Sea. Play a Boarding Attack from your hand to begin a Duel between the Los Vagos Crew and the target Crew. If the target Crew is sunk the target is returned to their player's hand.

Louis Fontaine.Name: Louis Fontaine
Louis Fontaine.Text: When hiring Louis, you may pay an additional 3 Influence to give him +2 Sailing, +1 Swashbuckling and the Rower trait until the end of the game.
Louis Fontaine.Flavor Text: Louis wished to see Cabora before he died. Kheired-Din's chains were the only way to do so.

Louis Sices du Sices.Name: Louis Sices du Sices
Louis Sices du Sices.Flavor Text: "Methodical is one word. Meticulous is another. I wouldn't use either to describe Louis. I'd call him an artist before I'd call him a gunner." - Gerard

Low on Shot.Name: Low on Shot
Low on Shot.Text: Target a Crew. Until the end of the turn, that Crew's Cannon skill is always zero.
Low on Shot.Flavor Text: "Oh no. The Captain's gonna kill me." - Mortimer Snuff

Lowly Captives.Name: Lowly Captives
Lowly Captives.Text: Lowly Captives may not be placed on a Heroic Captain's Ship. When Lowly Captives tack or sink to absorb Hits, they absorb 2 extra Hits.

Loyal Castillian.Name: Loyal Castillian
Loyal Castillian.Text:
You must tack your Captain or one of your First Mate Crew to bring this card into play. Any player in this Sea may sink this card by paying 4 Swashbuckling or Cannon as an Action.
Act: Tack this card to attach it to an adjacent Sea.
React: Once per turn, if this card is in the same Sea as your Ship, instead of performing a Boarding Attack, inflict 6 Hits on the other Ship in the Boarding.
Loyal Castillian.Flavor Text: "Retreat or die, gentlemen. My cannons are waiting."

Loyal Port.Name: Loyal Port
Loyal Port.Text:
Any player may discard this card by paying 4 Cannon as an action. Any player may sink this card by paying 9 Cannon as an action.
Act: Tack this card to target a Ship in this Sea. Move the target Ship to an adjacent Sea of your choosing.
Loyal Port.Flavor Text: There will always be an Avalon...

Lt. Juan Rodriguez de Soldano.Name: Lt. Juan Rodriguez de Soldano
Lt. Juan Rodriguez de Soldano.Text: When Hiring this Crew, you may tac your Captain to reduce this Crew's Influence cost to 0.
Lt. Juan Rodriguez de Soldano.Flavor Text: The Brotherhood used him to escape San Felipe. All he got for his trouble was a rowboat home.

Lucky Lou.Name: Lucky Lou
Lucky Lou.Text: When Lou is about to be sunk, discard the top card of you deck. If the Boarding Attack on the discard is a Punch or Dagger, place Lou in your discard pile instead.
Lucky Lou.Flavor Text: "Come on, Raven. Let's see if we can't find a gambling hall. With any luck, we'll have something besides fish for dinner."
Lucky Lou.Errata: Text modified: his ability is a Trait, not a React.

Lucrezia.Name: Lucrezia
Lucrezia.Flavor Text: One day, she just appeared up there, laughin' like a storm. Since nobody's got the guts to go up and bring her down, she's been there e'er since.

Lucrezia - Exp..Name: Lucrezia - Exp.
Lucrezia - Exp..Text: React: Sink a Knack Attached to Lucrezia when paying a cancel cost to reduce the cost by 3 (minimum 0).
Lucrezia - Exp..Flavor Text: "Alesio didn't know Allende's fate after his betrayal. But I do..."

Lucrezia's Prophecy.Name: Lucrezia's Prophecy
Lucrezia's Prophecy.Cost: Tack one of your Sorcerers with Fate 1 or more.
Lucrezia's Prophecy.Trait: 1 Sea Away - Crew Attachment - Fate 1 Knack
Lucrezia's Prophecy.Text: React: Tack this card instead of performing a Boarding Attack. Target the other Ship in the Boarding. The target Ship's player must tack one of their Crew.
Lucrezia's Prophecy.Flavor Text: The crazed Fate Witch had her own agenda... and the Brotherhood had no choice but to listen.
Lucrezia's Prophecy.Errata: Precision: you target the opposing Ship. Flavor text modified.
Lucrezia's Prophecy.Changes on MRP: Cost; sepcial cost/Cancel cost modified;Text modified;Flavor text modified;Artist modified;

Luis de Rioja.Name: Luis de Rioja
Luis de Rioja.Text: Act: Tack and sink Luis to get any one Crew card from your sunk pile, and put it in your hand.
Luis de Rioja.Flavor Text: "He'll be all right. Now if you'll excuse me, I have other patients who need my attention."

Luis de Rioja - Exp..Name: Luis de Rioja - Exp.
Luis de Rioja - Exp..Text: React: Tack Rioja when you are entering a Boarding as the Defender. Any of your Crew that are sunk during this boarding as a result of absorbing Hits, may be placed in your discard pile instead of your sunk pile.
Luis de Rioja - Exp..Flavor Text: "Try to rest now. I have many more patients to look at, but I'll come back to change your bandages."

Luis Rafael Dominguez de San Angelo.Name: Luis Rafael Dominguez de San Angelo
Luis Rafael Dominguez de San Angelo.Text: When Luis inflicts Hits in a Duel, the opposing Crew in the Duel may not tack to absorb the Hits
Luis Rafael Dominguez de San Angelo.Flavor Text: "No. Not a Rose and Cross. Not anymore."
Luis Rafael Dominguez de San Angelo.Artist: Travis Moore and Dærick W. Gröss

Lumiere de l'Empereur.Name: Lumiere de l'Empereur
Lumiere de l'Empereur.Text: While you have more than 2 completed Adventures in play, your cost to discard and/or sink Sea Attachments is reduced by 3 (minimum 1)

Lumiere de l'Empereur - Foil.Name: Lumiere de l'Empereur - Foil
Lumiere de l'Empereur - Foil.Text: While you have more than 2 completed Adventures in play, your cost to discard and/or sink Sea Attachments is reduced by 3 (minimum 1)

Lyin' John Flees.Name: Lyin' John Flees
Lyin' John Flees.Text: Any player may sink this Chantey by paying 4 Cannon as an action. While this Chantey is in play, a player may not perform an action that results in a Cannon attack if he or she has already performed one during the turn.
Lyin' John Flees.Flavor Text: John Fox died as he lived: a coward. In the end, he fled his friends and shipmates rather than face the consequences of his lies. His death at Reis's hands was almost an afterthought.

Lyin' John's Fate.Name: Lyin' John's Fate
Lyin' John's Fate.Text: You may only play this card if you have an untacked Villainous Captain. Search an opponent's discard pile and target a Crew card in that discard pile. Place that Crew card in that player's sunk pile. Until the end of the turn, any player placing a Crew card in the discard pile must place that Crew in the sunk pile instead. Sink this card.
Lyin' John's Fate.Flavor Text: Reis left his message where Bonnie would find it.

Mabela.Name: Mabela
Mabela.Text: When Mabela tacks to absorb Hits, he absorbs 2 extra Hits. Mabela's Boarding Attacks that finish with a Thrust inflict 2 extra Hits.
Mabela.Flavor Text: I don't understand a word he says, but how can you hate a man who enjoys himself that much?" - Philip Gosse

Mabela - Exp..Name: Mabela - Exp.
Mabela - Exp..Text: React: Discard a card with a Thrust Boarding Attack as Mabela is being pushed forward to start a Boarding Attack to give Mabela +1 Swashbuckling until the end of the Boarding.
Mabela - Exp..Flavor Text: The skeletons swarmed from their hiding place. Mabela just smiled.

Mac Eachern Blade.Name: Mac Eachern Blade
Mac Eachern Blade.Cost: 6 Adv.; 3 if you have a Bortherhood Captain
Mac Eachern Blade.Trait: 1 Sea Away - Unique - Artifact - Crew Attachment
Mac Eachern Blade.Text:
+1 Swashbuckling. This Crew has an additional +3 Swashbuckling while there is a sorcerer with 1 or more sorcery Knacks on another Ship in this Sea.
Act: Tack to sink a Monster card in this Sea.
React: Tack when a Monster action card is being played to cancel that action.

Mad Darius McIntrick.Name: Mad Darius McIntrick
Mad Darius McIntrick.Text: You may not hire or put this Crew into play if you have an Explorers Captain. When this Crew tacks to produce Adventuring to complete an Artifact Adventure, he produces 2 extra Adventuring.
Mad Darius McIntrick.Flavor Text: "Arciniega needs fresh blood… and the Rogers produce more than enough."

Mad Jack O' Bannon.Name: Mad Jack O' Bannon
Mad Jack O' Bannon.Text:
Any player in this Sea may sink Mad Jack by tacking 2 Adventuring as an action.
Act: Tack while your ship is in this sea. You suffer 5 Hits. Draw a card.
Mad Jack O' Bannon.Flavor Text: "Do you trust him?" Allende asked. McCorley shook his head. "I trust him to be the O'Bannon and nothing more."

Mad Mario.Name: Mad Mario
Mad Mario.Text: When Mario sinks to absorb Hits, he absorbs 4 extra Hits.
Mad Mario.Changes on MRP: Cost; sepcial cost/Cancel cost modified;Boarding Attack modified;

Mad Martin's Tattoos.Name: Mad Martin's Tattoos
Mad Martin's Tattoos.Text: React: Play immediately after you tack one of your Crew to produce Adventuring to complete an Adventure. This card attaches to that Crew and gives a +1 Swashbuckling.
Mad Martin's Tattoos.Flavor Text: "If ye don't stop screamin' I'm gonna misspell it."

Mageban Cordial.Name: Mageban Cordial
Mageban Cordial.Text:
You must have 2 or more untacked Invisible College Crew to bring this card into play.
Act: Discard this card. Until the end of the turn players may not use Actions and Reactions printed on Sorcery Knacks and Sorcerers.
Mageban Cordial.Flavor Text: The witch felt the sorcery fading from her blood and the sight fading from her eyes.

Maggie Malone.Name: Maggie Malone
Maggie Malone.Text: When Maggie tacks to absorb Hits, she absorbs 1 extra Hit, except during a Boarding.
Maggie Malone.Flavor Text: McCormick found her on the Isle of Syrneth and gave her his mother's maiden name. The only reminder she has of her heritage are two strange tattoos on the bottom of her feet.

Maggie Malone - Exp..Name: Maggie Malone - Exp.
Maggie Malone - Exp..Text:
Maggie absorbs 2 extra hits when tacking or sinking to absorb Hits.
Act: Tack or discard this Crew to target a Ship in this Sea. That Ship's controller must move their Ship to an adjacent Sea of their choosing.
Maggie Malone - Exp..Flavor Text: "Who am I, Cosette? Who am I, really?"

Main Gauche.Name: Main Gauche
Main Gauche.Text: This Crew's Boarding Attacks that finish with a Dagger inflict 2 extra Hits.
Main Gauche.Flavor Text: They call the Ambrogia style dishonorable, but a second blade can mean the difference between life and death.

Major Hull Damage.Name: Major Hull Damage
Major Hull Damage.Text: React: Play this card when you are suffering Hits to absorb 8 Hits. This card attaches to your Ship as a Damage Attachment. This card counts as 2 Crew toward your Crew maximum. Your Ship's move cost is increased by 2 while this card is in play. You may sink this Attachment by tacking 6 Swashbuckling as an action. You may not sink or discard this card with other card effects.

Making of a Hero.Name: Making of a Hero
Making of a Hero.Text: May not be attached to a Villainous Crew. This Crew gains the Heroic trait.
Making of a Hero.Flavor Text: "The threads show me your future. Fire the cannon now." - Alesio

Manuel Dejavez.Name: Manuel Dejavez
Manuel Dejavez.Text: When Manuel tacks to absorb Hits, he absorbs 2 extra Hits, except during a Boarding.
Manuel Dejavez.Flavor Text: "He used to be a dancer.  Before you laugh, try balancing on a swaying mast without holding onto anything."
Manuel Dejavez.Errata: Text modified: his ability is a Trait, not a React.

Marc Pierre.Name: Marc Pierre
Marc Pierre.Text: When Marc tacks to absorb Hits, he absorbs 2 extra Hits.
Marc Pierre.Flavor Text: "I was a sewer hunter before Admiral Valoix recruited me. The high seas are nothing compared to the horrors beneath Charouse."

Marcel Entour.Name: Marcel Entour
Marcel Entour.Text: When Marcel tacks to absorb Hits, he absorbs 3 extra Hits, except during Boarding.
Marcel Entour.Flavor Text: "I see in the dark. Better that than drop a lamp and light the whole sail, oui?"

Margaretta Orduño.Name: Margaretta Orduño
Margaretta Orduño.Text: Margaretta has +2 Swashbuckling while you have Enrique Orduño in play and tacked.
Margaretta Orduño.Flavor Text: "Of course I married below my station. Doesn't every woman?"

Maria Aloise.Name: Maria Aloise
Maria Aloise.Text: While you have 3 or more other unaligned Crew with an Influence cost of 3 or more this Captain's Fate is increased by 1 and you may use the following ability: Act: Tack this Captain to draw 4 cards from your deck. You may only use this ability once per turn and only if you have no cards in your hand.

Maria Forlani.Name: Maria Forlani
Maria Forlani.Text: The completion cost of your Adventures is reduced by 1 (minimum 1).

Maria-Soledad Rivera y Aldana.Name: Maria-Soledad Rivera y Aldana
Maria-Soledad Rivera y Aldana.Text:
You may attach any number of Swordsman Knacks to this Crew.
React: When another player is about to play a Boarding Attack card to begin a Duel with one of your Crew, tack this Crew to cancel the Duel and inflict 2 Hits on that player's Ship.
Maria-Soledad Rivera y Aldana.Flavor Text: "The Vagabond has many faces. I am only one."

Marianna the Cleaner.Name: Marianna the Cleaner
Marianna the Cleaner.Text: Act: Once per turn, sink one of your Crew to give your Captain +3 Influence until the end of the turn.
Marianna the Cleaner.Flavor Text: "Is the reward dead or alive? Drat. Well, 'really badly hurt' counts as alive, doesn't it?"

Mark of the Grumfather.Name: Mark of the Grumfather
Mark of the Grumfather.Cost: Tack one of your Sorcerers with Lærdom 1 or more.
Mark of the Grumfather.Trait: 1 Sea Away - Crew Attachment - Lærdom 1 Knack
Mark of the Grumfather.Text: React: Tack this card instead of performing a Boarding Attack. The other player in the Boarding must target one of your tacked Crew. Untack the target Crew.
Mark of the Grumfather.Flavor Text: Lærdom touches those who believe in its power. The stronger the belief, the more potent the magic.
Mark of the Grumfather.Changes on MRP: Cost; sepcial cost/Cancel cost modified;Text modified;Flavor text modified;Artist modified;

Mark Scars.Name: Mark Scars
Mark Scars.Flavor Text: "Don't ask him about his scars and tattoos unless you want one yurself." - Grimey Stubbs

Mark Scars - Exp..Name: Mark Scars - Exp.
Mark Scars - Exp..Flavor Text: "I died alone and unmourned. But I swear before Legion himself that I won't be the last!"

Marker Barrel.Name: Marker Barrel
Marker Barrel.Text:
You must attach this card to an Adventure you put into play as your last action. Any player in this Sea may sink this card by tacking 1 Cannon as an action.
React: Discard this card when you are paying the completion cost of this Adventure to produce 3 Adventuring.

Marketeers.Name: Marketeers
Marketeers.Flavor Text: "Right here, Cap'n! Ya lookin' for a crew! Here's the best crew ya'll ever find on the Seven Seas! Hey, where ya goin'?"

Marooned.Name: Marooned
Marooned.Text: You may only play this card if you have a Villainous Captain. Target and discard one of your Heroic Crew to attach this card to your Captain, giving a +2 Influence.
Marooned.Flavor Text: The nasty part is, they left him with his share of the gold.

Martin Tytus.Name: Martin Tytus
Martin Tytus.Text: All Goods Adventures attached to Martin which produce Influence, produce 1 extra Influence.
Martin Tytus.Flavor Text: "I always thought the sea smelled like money, myself."

Master Allen Trel.Name: Master Allen Trel
Master Allen Trel.Text: Your Ship Attachments with the title "Treasure Hold" do not count against your Crew Maximum. Your Captain has 2 less Influence (minimum 1) while Master Allen is in play. If Master Allen is sunk or discarded, all of your Treasure Holds in play are discarded.
Master Allen Trel.Flavor Text: The head of the Sailors' Guild. He supposedly handpicked Guttormson for the job.

Master Gunner.Name: Master Gunner
Master Gunner.Flavor Text: "No! No! No! You'll get yur head blown clean off if you don't pay... Oh well. He weren't learnin' anyway."

Master of the Tops.Name: Master of the Tops
Master of the Tops.Flavor Text: He climbs like a spider, weaving a web to catch the wind.

Master of Wind and Tide.Name: Master of Wind and Tide
Master of Wind and Tide.Text:
You must be in the Frothing Sea to play this card.Any player in this Sea may discard this card by producing 12 Swashbuckling as an action. Card effects which discard or sink Sea Attachments may not target this card.
Act: Tack this card to get a Control card from your deck, show it to your opponents and put it in your hand. Shuffle your deck.

Matushka's Blessing.Name: Matushka's Blessing
Matushka's Blessing.Flavor Text: Ussara's mother-goddess grants her chosen subjects the power to become as animals.

Matushka's Gate.Name: Matushka's Gate
Matushka's Gate.Text: Any player may sink this Chantey as an action by paying 5 Adventuring while in the Mirror. Players suffering Hits in the Mirror may not tack to absorb Hits.
Matushka's Gate.Flavor Text: Ussura's Little Grandmother wants to keep the curious away from Cabora. Apparently, the risen isle frightens even her.

Maureen Leveque.Name: Maureen Leveque
Maureen Leveque.Text: React: When a Ship enters this Sea, Maureen may immediately tack to perform a Cannon Attack against that Ship.
Maureen Leveque.Flavor Text: She just makes everything on the ship run a little smoother.

Max Discher.Name: Max Discher
Max Discher.Flavor Text: "People ask me why I use knives. You ever see what a misfired pistol can do to your hands?"

Maximillian.Name: Maximillian
Maximillian.Text: Act: Tack and discard Maximillian. Until the end of the turn, your Boarding Attacks against a Ship with a Villainous Captain, inflict 1 extra Hit and your Cannon Attacks targeting a Ship with a Villainous Captain inflict 1 extra Hit.
Maximillian.Flavor Text: "There's more than one way to find the Spear. Have you ever heard of the Eyes of Reason?"

McCormick's Compass.Name: McCormick's Compass
McCormick's Compass.Trait: Explorer Captain Attachment - Unique - Signature Item
McCormick's Compass.Text:
Act: Sink this card to untack your Captain.
Act: Tack this card to target one of your other Explorer Crew to give that Crew +2 to all of that Crew's skills that are greater than 1.
React: Tack this card when you are paying an Adventuring cost for an action to play, discard or sink a Control card to give your Captain +4 Adventuring until after the action.

McCormick's Quest.Name: McCormick's Quest
McCormick's Quest.Text: Target another player's uncompleted Adventure. Move that Adventure to any Sea. This card's cost is reduced to zero if you have an Explorers Captain.
McCormick's Quest.Flavor Text: "He said it held a clue to his wife's location, so he wants us to hide it good." - Cosette

Melinda Gosse.Name: Melinda Gosse
Melinda Gosse.Text: React: Tack Melinda when you are putting Andre Braudel into play from your hand to reduce his Influence cost by 5.
Melinda Gosse.Flavor Text: "If you boys can't wait your turn, I'll have to kill you all at once."

Meraldo Avalos.Name: Meraldo Avalos
Meraldo Avalos.Text: Act: Once per turn, target one of your uncompleted Adventures in play. Move your ship one Sea towards the Sea containing the target Adventure. You may only use this ability if you have Felipe Jose de Granjero on board.
Meraldo Avalos.Flavor Text: "Margaretta isn't the only one looking for her husband. There are a lot of people who wants to know what happened to the Admiral… and the ship he was on."

Merchant Quarter.Name: Merchant Quarter
Merchant Quarter.Text: Any player in this Sea may sink this card by tacking 2 Cannon as an action. The completion costs of your Goods Adventures are reduced by 1 (minimum 1).
Merchant Quarter.Flavor Text: "Can ye spare a guilder, sir? Spare a guilder fer..twerp."

Merchant Ship.Name: Merchant Ship
Merchant Ship.Text:
When the Merchant Ship is put into play, it attaches to Forbidden Sea.
Act: Tack this card to attach it to a Sea adjacent to this Sea.
Act: Tack this card while it is in the Frothing Sea to untack one of your crew with an influence cost of 3 or less. This card then attaches to Forbidden Sea.

Mermaids.Name: Mermaids
Mermaids.Text: Target any Ship with more than five Crew cards. That Ship suffers 1 Hit for every crew card on board.
Mermaids.Flavor Text: "Don't be fooled by the stories, lad. They don't sing to lure men to their deaths. They only sing when they're feeding."

Message from Margaretta.Name: Message from Margaretta
Message from Margaretta.Text: This Crew absorbs 2 extra Hits when tacking to absorb Hits.
Message from Margaretta.Flavor Text: "My mistress begs you to save her husband from certain doom. She says that a single shot revealed your character, and that only a man of honor can help her. Do you understand ?"

Message From the Grave.Name: Message From the Grave
Message From the Grave.Text: Any player may sink this Chantey by producing 6 Swashbuckling as an Action. All players must tack or discard one of their non-Captain Crew during each Draw Cards Phase.
Message From the Grave.Flavor Text: As Thomas approached, Gosse drew the saber the Rose and Cross had given him. "Theus forgive me for what I am about to do..."

Michael Fitzhugh.Name: Michael Fitzhugh
Michael Fitzhugh.Text: When Michael tacks to absorb Hits, he absorbs 1 extra Hit.
Michael Fitzhugh.Flavor Text: "Aye, Cap'n, useful he may be, but how much longer does ya think ya can trust him?"

Michél Rois et Reines.Name: Michél Rois et Reines
Michél Rois et Reines.Text: React: Tack when your Ship moves to a different Sea. Target a Sea Attachment in the new Sea. That Attachment is discarded.
Michél Rois et Reines.Flavor Text: "Well, that depends, are you referring to the Church Meridian, or the Pirate Meridian? The Pirate Meridian is 13 degrees to the east."

Michél Rois et Reines - Exp..Name: Michél Rois et Reines - Exp.
Michél Rois et Reines - Exp..Text: Act: Tack Michél to untack up to two of your Ally cards.
Michél Rois et Reines - Exp..Flavor Text: His navigational skills finally paid off - with a promotion to le Prédateur des Mers.

Midgebrain Murphy.Name: Midgebrain Murphy
Midgebrain Murphy.Text:
When this Crew sinks to absorb hits, he absorbs 3 extra hits. 
Act: Once per turn, discard one of your untacked Skeletal Crew from play to draw a card from your deck.

Miguel Bascalle.Name: Miguel Bascalle
Miguel Bascalle.Text: When hiring Miguel, you may pay an additional 3 Influence to give him +2 Sailing, +2 Adventuring and the Holy trait until the end of the game.
Miguel Bascalle.Flavor Text: "Theus preserve us from the wrath of Valoix."

Miguel Cortez.Name: Miguel Cortez
Miguel Cortez.Text: Miguel inflicts 2 extra Hits during a Boarding Attack when the opposing Captain is Villainous.
Miguel Cortez.Flavor Text: "That buffoon nearly made me spill my drink."

Miguel Sandoval de Castillo.Name: Miguel Sandoval de Castillo
Miguel Sandoval de Castillo.Text: React: Once per turn, immediately before the Attacker in a Boarding performs a Boarding Attack, the opposing player in the Boarding must target one of their Crew. Play a card from your hand as a Boarding Attack to begin a Duel between Miguel and the targeted Crew.
Miguel Sandoval de Castillo.Flavor Text: Sandoval's Guard has departed - all save Miguel.

Mike Fitzpatrick.Name: Mike Fitzpatrick
Mike Fitzpatrick.Text: Mike may not be placed on a Heroic Captain's Ship. Discard Mike at the end of the Action phase if he is untacked.
Mike Fitzpatrick.Flavor Text: "Someday I'll escape, and then, by Mad Jack, you'll all regret the day you captured me."

Mike Fitzpatrick - Exp..Name: Mike Fitzpatrick - Exp.
Mike Fitzpatrick - Exp..Text:
Mike may not be placed on a Villainous Captain's Ship.
React: Tack Mike instead of performing a Boarding Attack. If the opposing player has any Captive Crew in play, that player must discard one Captive Crew of their choosing.
Mike Fitzpatrick - Exp..Flavor Text: "Ye saved me life, Ms Kesler. I figure I can stick around a bit, an' help this 'General' o' yers."

Miles Valroux du Martise.Name: Miles Valroux du Martise
Miles Valroux du Martise.Text:
React: Tack this card and discard any one of your cards on board your Ship when you are tacking a Rose and Cross Crew to produce Influence to increase the Influence produced by 4.
React: Sink this card when one of your Rose and Cross is being sunk. Return that Crew to your hand.
Miles Valroux du Martise.Flavor Text: "Naturally, the Order is sympathetic to your cause. However, I need more to go than old sailor's stories."

Mind Your P's and Q's.Name: Mind Your P's and Q's
Mind Your P's and Q's.Text: React: Target a Crew as an opponent brings it into play. That Crew is returned to the player's hand.
Mind Your P's and Q's.Flavor Text: "I'll be right with ya, Cap'n. Just as soon as I teach this here scurvy pup some manners."

Minor Hull Damage.Name: Minor Hull Damage
Minor Hull Damage.Text: React: Play this card when you are suffering Hits to absorb 4 Hits. This card attaches to your Ship as a Damage attachment. This card counts as 1 Crew toward your Crew maximum. Your Ship's move cost is increased by 1 while this card is in play. You may sink this Attachment by tacking 3 Swashbuckling as an action. You may not sink or discard this card with other card effects.

Misfire.Name: Misfire
Misfire.Text: React: Play immediately after a player pays to produce a Cannon Attack, but before Hits are inflicted. That Attack inflicts 1 fewer Hit, and the attacker suffers 1 Hit from this card.
Misfire.Flavor Text: "Pool beggar ne'er knew what hit him. He was a good man. I'll never know why Theus cose to spare a dog like me instead of him."

Moaning Song of the Dead.Name: Moaning Song of the Dead
Moaning Song of the Dead.Text: You must tack one of your Crew with Fear of 1 or more to play this card. Target this Sea. Until the end of the turn, other players must tack one of their Crew (in addition to other costs) to enter this Sea.
Moaning Song of the Dead.Flavor Text: The eerie cry echoed across the waves, chilling Gosse to his bones. He'd heard that noise before...

Mohdest Mercanto.Name: Mohdest Mercanto
Mohdest Mercanto.Text: When you sink this Crew to absorb Hits, you may untack one of your non-Captain Heroic Crew.
Mohdest Mercanto.Flavor Text: "I was a Vodacce Objectionist. You might say I moved to Avalon for health reasons."

Moldy Morris.Name: Moldy Morris
Moldy Morris.Text: Morris inflicts 5 extra Hits during Boarding if an opposing Crew has pushed forward to fight Morris or vice-versa. If the opposing Crew is sunk, the number of Hits is reduced to zero.
Moldy Morris.Flavor Text: The rot grows from his flesh, infecting everything he touches.

Moldy Morris - Exp..Name: Moldy Morris - Exp.
Moldy Morris - Exp..Text: This Crew inflicts 3 extra Hits during Boarding Attacks. If one or more Crew are sunk to absorb hits inflicted by this Crew during a Boarding Attack, you may immediately hire 1 Skeletal Crew from your hand, with an Influence cost of 2 or less, without cost.

Moment of Glory.Name: Moment of Glory
Moment of Glory.Text: React: Play this card immediatly before you attach a card to one of your Crew. Treat one of your Crew with the No Attachments trait as not having that trait for the purposes of attaching the card.
Moment of Glory.Flavor Text: "I killed the pirate all by myself!" - Billy Bones

Monkey's Fist.Name: Monkey's Fist
Monkey's Fist.Text: Discard one of your Villainous Crew. Draw three cards.
Monkey's Fist.Flavor Text: "We're better off without him anyways." - Paule du Paix

Montaigne Exports.Name: Montaigne Exports
Montaigne Exports.Cost: 6 Adv.; 2 in Frothing Sea and you have The River in play
Montaigne Exports.Flavor Text: "'Tis a fine vintage, me boy. Ye coulda sold 'em fer a kings ransom - if ye'da made it te port. Har-har!"

Montaigne Marines.Name: Montaigne Marines
Montaigne Marines.Text: React: When another player performs an action that discards or sinks one of your Ally or Control cards, discard this Crew to cancel the action.
Montaigne Marines.Flavor Text: As Valoix's campaign continued, they became the terror of the Castillian coast.

Montaigne Musketeers.Name: Montaigne Musketeers
Montaigne Musketeers.Text: Montaigne Musketeers may attach Swordsman Knacks.
Montaigne Musketeers.Flavor Text: "Our Empereur has many foes, Monsieur Gosse, but none so terrible as the one you fight. With your permission, we would like one of our number to accompany you…"

Montaigne Pride.Name: Montaigne Pride
Montaigne Pride.Text: One of your Montaigne Crew gains +2 Swashbuckling until the end of the turn. That Crew gains +2 extra Swashbuckling if there is a Brotherhood Ship in play (+4 total).
Montaigne Pride.Flavor Text: "You don't have to use Porté to escape from these imbeciles; they never look up."

Montaigne Puzzle Sword.Name: Montaigne Puzzle Sword
Montaigne Puzzle Sword.Text:
A Crew may not have more than one Montaigne Puzzle Sword Attached.
React: Tack the Montaigne Puzzle Sword when this Crew plays a card for a Boarding Attack. The other player in this Boarding must discard one card from their hand.

Montaigne Ship of the Line.Name: Montaigne Ship of the Line
Montaigne Ship of the Line.Text:
Any player in this Sea may discard this card by producing 10 Swashbuckling or Cannon as an action.
Act: Tack this card to attach it to a Sea  adjacent to this Sea.
Act: Tack this card and target a Ship in this Sea. Inflict a 8 Hit Cannon Attack on the target.

Montaigne Valet.Name: Montaigne Valet
Montaigne Valet.Flavor Text: "Would you like the d'Aubertaigne or the d'Auntaigne this morning, sir?"

Mordekei's Casket.Name: Mordekei's Casket
Mordekei's Casket.Text: +1 Swashbuckling. This crew inflicts 2 extra Hits during Boarding Attacks.
Mordekei's Casket.Flavor Text: "What's in it?" I asked. "You don't want to know," responded the Kire.

Morgause Mercuri.Name: Morgause Mercuri
Morgause Mercuri.Text: When hiring Morgause you may pay 3 Cannon to reduce Morgause's Influence cost to 0.
Morgause Mercuri.Flavor Text: "My parents tried to make me marry a man like you. Do you want to know what I did, or shall I just shoot you?"

Mortis Swordsman School.Name: Mortis Swordsman School
Mortis Swordsman School.Text:
The cost of this Attachment is reduced by 3 if being attached to a Kreuzritter Crew.
Act: Tack this Crew to target another player's non-Captain Crew in this Sea with either has the Villainous trait or is a Sorcerer. Pay 3 Influence and play a Boarding Attack from your hand to begin a Duel between the target Crew and this Crew.

Mother-in-Law.Name: Mother-in-Law
Mother-in-Law.Text: You must attach this card to the Starting Sea of another Captain in play. If a Ship is in this Sea at the end of the Actions phase and that Ship's Captain has this Sea as their Starting Sea, that Captain's controller draws 1 fewer card during the Draw phase (minimum 0).
Mother-in-Law.Flavor Text: "...and I hates me the mothers-in-law..." - Grousin' George

Mountainous Mike.Name: Mountainous Mike
Mountainous Mike.Text: You may draw one card immediately before Mike starts a Boarding Attack.
Mountainous Mike.Flavor Text: "By the time I finished looking up at 'im, I was too tired to fight, so I bought 'im a drink instead" - Grimey Stubbs
Mountainous Mike.Changes on MRP: Cost; sepcial cost/Cancel cost modified;Boarding Attack modified;Text modified;

Mr. Briggs.Name: Mr. Briggs
Mr. Briggs.Text: React: When you are suffering Hits from a Boarding Attack, sink Mr. Briggs to absorb all of the Hits.
Mr. Briggs.Flavor Text: "They surrender? What do you think, Mr. Briggs?" "Awk! Kill 'em all! Kill 'em all!" "You heard what he said, boys. Kill 'em all."
