Mr. Briggs.Changes on MRP: Cost; sepcial cost/Cancel cost modified;Boarding Attack modified;Trait modified;Text modified;

Much Needed Repairs.Name: Much Needed Repairs
Much Needed Repairs.Text: Act: Target and sink a Damage Attachment attached to your Ship (overriding any text on the Damage Attachment). Sink this card.
Much Needed Repairs.Flavor Text: "Maybe I'm gettin' fergetful in me old age, but I DON'T THINK ME SHIP WAS LISTIN' LIKE THAT WHEN WE DOCKED!!!"

Multiple Barrel Artillery Piece.Name: Multiple Barrel Artillery Piece
Multiple Barrel Artillery Piece.Text:
The cost of this card is reduced by 3 if you have 1 or more Invisible College Crew in play. +2 Cannon.
React: Tack or discard this card after this Crew has inflicted Hits with a Cannon Atatck and all of those hits have been absorbed to Inflict 2 Hits to the same target of Cannon Attack.
Multiple Barrel Artillery Piece.Flavor Text: Another nasty surprise from the Invisible College

Mumblety Peg.Name: Mumblety Peg
Mumblety Peg.Text: Mumblety may not be part of your starting crew. Mumblety's Influence Cost is increased by 2 if you  have a First Mate in play.
Mumblety Peg.Flavor Text: "Aye, I seen yer wife, Mc Cormick. Same place I got me this hand..."

Mumblety Peg - Exp..Name: Mumblety Peg - Exp.
Mumblety Peg - Exp..Trait: Experienced - Unique - Loyal - First Mate - Villainous - Swordsman +2
Mumblety Peg - Exp..Text: React: When you are suffering Hits, reduce your hand size by one until the end of the game to suffer 3 fewer Hits. You may only use this ability if Mumblety Peg is untacked and your hand size is at least 2.

Musette Falisci.Name: Musette Falisci
Musette Falisci.Text: Musette has -1 Adventuring for every Fate card you attach to her. You may not attach a Fate card to Musette if her Adventuring is less than 1.
Musette Falisci.Flavor Text: "The Three are coming, Alesio. You will atone for your sins against them by betraying him..."

Musket.Name: Musket
Musket.Text: React: Instead of performing a Boarding Attack, tack the Musket to inflict 2 Hits on the other Ship in the Boarding.
Musket.Flavor Text: "If ye don't like that drink, I've got a chaser here for ye!"

Musketeers.Name: Musketeers
Musketeers.Flavor Text: "Giving young Willie here a hard time, Smithers?" The first one asked. "You wouldn't be so bold if you didn't have a sword." "Or a collar," said the second. "Or a hat," said the third. "Or pants..."

Mutiny!.Name: Mutiny!
Mutiny!.Text: Target up to three Crew on one Ship that are from a different faction than their Captain. Those Crew are tacked.
Mutiny!.Flavor Text: "Damn it all, George. Ya picked a fine time to complain."

Narrow Escape.Name: Narrow Escape
Narrow Escape.Text: React: Play when you are paying an Adventuring cost to produce 1 Adventuring.
Narrow Escape.Flavor Text: As he looked back at his trapped mates, he realized it was a bit more narrow for some than others.

Nasty Bit o' Luck.Name: Nasty Bit o' Luck
Nasty Bit o' Luck.Text: React: Play when a Ship moves into your Sea using the Ship's "Free Move." That Ship's player does not get to perform an action. Play continues to the next player.
Nasty Bit o' Luck.Flavor Text: The worst "luck" is the kind your enemies provide for you.

Natalia Ivanova.Name: Natalia Ivanova
Natalia Ivanova.Flavor Text: "You think Reis scares me? I once tied Aleski Novgorov to a tree by his tail. Funniest thing you ever saw."

Native Waters.Name: Native Waters
Native Waters.Text: This card must be attached to your Captain's Starting Sea. While another player's Ship is in this Sea and your Ship is not in this Sea, your Captain's Influence is reduced to 0. Any player in this Sea may sink this card by paying 4 Cannon or Swashbuckling as an action. While there are no other Ships in this Sea, your Captain's Influence is increased by 2.
Native Waters.Flavor Text: "Sailors never swim for pleasure. Well, almost never."

Naughty Dan.Name: Naughty Dan
Naughty Dan.Text: React: Sink this Crew when you are suffering 3 or less Hits. Redirect those Hits to another Ship in this Sea.
Naughty Dan.Flavor Text: "Dan's the signal man on la Bucca. He likes to send dirty limericks to the Castillian Navy." - Delaina Darling

Naval Sanction.Name: Naval Sanction
Naval Sanction.Trait: Castille Captain Attachment - Unique - Letter of Marque
Naval Sanction.Text: You may not put this card into play unless you have started one or more Boardings this game. While Naval Sanction is in play, your Crew each inflict 1 extra Hit during Boarding Attacks.
Naval Sanction.Flavor Text: "Soon, we will strike back at Montaigne, and reclaim our land." - Esteban Verdugo

Navigational Tools.Name: Navigational Tools
Navigational Tools.Flavor Text: "I had to pass through the Castillian front to get these... the best in all of Théah."

Near Miss.Name: Near Miss
Near Miss.Text: React: Play when you suffer Hits during Boarding. You suffer 2 fewer Hits.
Near Miss.Flavor Text: "I looked through the smoke and thought how lucky we were the shot only took the figurehead. Then, I thought twice about what I thought first..." - Gerald Höhne

Necare Swordsman School.Name: Necare Swordsman School
Necare Swordsman School.Text:
The cost of this Attachment is reduced by 3 if being attached to a Sophia's Daughter Crew.
React: Tack this card when this Crew is pushed forward to begin a Boarding Attack (not a Duel) to target a non-Captain Crew on the other Ship in the Boarding. The target must be pushed forward to fight this Crew (even if tacked). If your Boarding Attack is not reversed, the Crew must tack and sink to absorb Hits before any other Crew may absorb Hits.

Necros' Sword.Name: Necros' Sword
Necros' Sword.Trait: Black Freighter Captain Attachment - Unique - Signature Item
Necros' Sword.Text:
Act: Sink this card to untack your Captain.
Act: Tack this card to target one of your other Black Freighter Crew to give that Crew +2 to all of that Crew's skills that are greater than 1.
React: Tack this card when you are paying a Sailing cost for an action to play, discard or sink a Control card to give your Captain +4 Sailing until after the action.

Needle Nose Nye.Name: Needle Nose Nye
Needle Nose Nye.Text: Nye may not tack to absorb Hits during Boarding. Nye may be sunk to absorb 1 Hit in Boarding.
Needle Nose Nye.Flavor Text: "We calls him that because nobody can pronounce his name 'cept the Cap'n. 'Course, with 'im not speakin' Avalon and us not speakin' Castillian, I don't think he even knows what it means." - Phelan Cole

Neeman the Coward - Foil.Name: Neeman the Coward - Foil
Neeman the Coward - Foil.Text: Discard Neeman if another Ship enters your Sea.
Neeman the Coward - Foil.Flavor Text: "I assure you that my sword is only used to meet the demands of fashion. Now, if you will excuse me.."

Neither Asked Nor Given.Name: Neither Asked Nor Given
Neither Asked Nor Given.Text: Players draw 2 fewer cards after each round of a Boarding (minimum 1).
Neither Asked Nor Given.Flavor Text: "My men are Montaigne. Loyal. Courageous. Quarter from them will be neither asked nor given." -Admiral Valoix

Never Knew Him.Name: Never Knew Him
Never Knew Him.Text: React: Play this card when you are absorbing Hits. Discard a Crew card from your hand to suffer 2 fewer Hits.
Never Knew Him.Flavor Text: "Mark Scars: no family, no friends, not even a mother. Perhaps it's fer the best, then - less people hurt."

Next of Kin.Name: Next of Kin
Next of Kin.Text: React: Play immediately after you sink a Crew as a result of absorbing hits. You may immediately hire a Crew from your hand. If that Crew belongs to your Captain's Faction, reduce the Crew's Influence cost by 2 (minimum 0).
Next of Kin.Flavor Text: "I was a dancer until my brother died. His debts became mine, as did his oath to defend Castille." - Rita de Zepeda

Nibelungen Forge.Name: Nibelungen Forge
Nibelungen Forge.Trait: 2 Seas Away - Unique - Artifact - Captain Attachment
Nibelungen Forge.Text: All of your Crew Attachments which tack to inflict Hits inflict 1 extra Hit.
Nibelungen Forge.Flavor Text: "You are a foreigner, McGee, but your tale intrigues us. We will forge dracheneisen to aid your quest, if you will first perform a task for us…"

Nice Try!.Name: Nice Try!
Nice Try!.Text: React: Tack you Captain when you suffer Hits to absorb 8 Hits.
Nice Try!.Flavor Text: "Ya couldn't hit the broadside of the Queen of the Sea, ya lubber! Is that the best ya can do? I'm standin' right here! Next time, why don't ya try to hit me?"

Nicole Cowbey - Exp..Name: Nicole Cowbey - Exp.
Nicole Cowbey - Exp..Text: The title of this card is Tom Toblin for Experienced purposes. Your crew with the No Attachments trait may have one Item attachment attached.
Nicole Cowbey - Exp..Flavor Text: "So he found me out! I still fooled all of you... and I'm still twice the man any of you'll ever be."

Night of Horror.Name: Night of Horror
Night of Horror.Text: Target a Ship in the Mirror. Inflict 5 hits on that Ship.
Night of Horror.Flavor Text: Dalia spun with blinding speed, her knives flashing in the moonlight, but her frightful adversaries continued to advance...

Nightblade.Name: Nightblade
Nightblade.Text: React: Play when you are pushing this Crew forward for a Boarding Attack. Attach this card to that Crew as a Hand Attachment. This Crew inflicts 2 extra Hits during Boarding Attack and gains +1 Adventuring. The cost of this card is reduced to 0 if you attach it to a Kreuzritter Crew. A Crew may not have more than 1 Hand Attachment.

No Escape!.Name: No Escape!
No Escape!.Text: Move your Ship one Sea closer to another player's Ship. You may then perform a Cannon Attack if you are in a Sea with another Ship.
No Escape!.Flavor Text: "Steering into the shallows does ya no good if it don't get you out of the range o' their funs." - Denny La Bree

No Fun to be a Captive.Name: No Fun to be a Captive
No Fun to be a Captive.Text: Sink one of your Captive Crew to give +2 Cannon, Sailing and Adventuring to another Captive Crew until the end of the turn.
No Fun to be a Captive.Flavor Text: "I'm coming, Dalia... They can't keep you from me forever." - Espera

No Fun to Be a Captive.Name: No Fun to Be a Captive
No Fun to Be a Captive.Text: Act: Sink one of your Captive Crew to give +2 Cannon, Sailing and Adventuring to another Captive Crew until the end of the turn.
No Fun to Be a Captive.Flavor Text: "I've had enough of chains and shackles to last twenty lifetimes."- Ernesto Castillius

No Space For Luxuries.Name: No Space For Luxuries
No Space For Luxuries.Text: Target a Ship Attachment on a Ship which is currently exceeding its Crew Maximum. Sink the target Attachment and inflict 3 Hits on that Ship.
No Space For Luxuries.Flavor Text: No one know how the fire started, but it spread with unnatural speed. In moments, the Hanged Man's lower decks were completely engulfed.

No Space for Luxuries.Name: No Space for Luxuries
No Space for Luxuries.Text: Act: Target a Ship Attachment on a Ship which is exceeding its printed Crew Maximum. Sink the target Attachment and inflict 3 Hits on that Ship.
No Space for Luxuries.Flavor Text: Fire on a ship is one of the greatest threats a crew can face. Even while moored in harbor, like the Hanged Man was, a ship on fire will burn to the keel before anyone can stop it.
No Space for Luxuries.Errata: Now targets a Ship which is exceeding its printed Craw Maximum, not its Crew Maximum. Flavor text modified.

No-Leg William.Name: No-Leg William
No-Leg William.Text: William may attach up to two Leg Attachments. William gains +2 to all skills if he has two Leg Attachments attached.

No-Leg William - Exp..Name: No-Leg William - Exp.
No-Leg William - Exp..Text:
This Crew is considered to have two Leg attachments.
Act: If this Crew is untacked, pay 2 Sailing to attempt a Boarding with another Ship in this Sea (this attempt may be canceled normally).

Noah the Toady King.Name: Noah the Toady King
Noah the Toady King.Text:
This Crew has +2 Adventuring and +3 Influence while in the same Sea as one or more of your Ally or Control cards.
Act: Once per turn, target a tacked Ally card or tacked Control card in this Sea to untack that card.
Noah the Toady King.Flavor Text: He used to fawn over the guards at la Bucca like that.

Noam.Name: Noam
Noam.Text: When hiring this Crew from your hand, if there is at least one other Captain in this Sea with a greater Influence than your Captain, this Crew's Influence cost is reduced by 3.
Noam.Flavor Text: "I am not some simple savage, Théan. I understand your politics quite well. I simply choose to do without them."

Nød (Intensity).Name: Nød (Intensity)
Nød (Intensity).Text: React: Tack Nød when one of your Weather cards is inflicting Hits. That card inflicts 2 extra Hits.
Nød (Intensity).Flavor Text: "Now taste the power of a people betrayed!" - Gris Hallisdottir

Nodar the Falcon.Name: Nodar the Falcon
Nodar the Falcon.Text: React: Tack Nodar immediately after the Untack Phase to target a Sorcerer in this Sea. Tack that Crew and all Sorcery Knacks attached to that Crew.
Nodar the Falcon.Flavor Text: "Nothing compares to a sunrise from the highest tower in Pavtlow."

Northern Allies.Name: Northern Allies
Northern Allies.Text:
You must be in the Trade Sea to play this card. Any player in the Trade Sea may discard this card by producing 14 Cannon as an action. While this card is in play your hand size is increased by 1.
Act: Tack this card to get a Control card from your deck, show it to your opponents, and put it in your hand. Shuffle your deck.

Northern Trade Route.Name: Northern Trade Route
Northern Trade Route.Text: Move your Ship 2 Seas towards the Trade Sea (moving through each Sea, one at a time).
Northern Trade Route.Flavor Text: Wise mariners sought colder waters, moving north towards Vendel and Avalon. If asked, none could say why they traveled that direction. Something about the southern waters suddenly seemed… dangerous.

Not Quite Dead.Name: Not Quite Dead
Not Quite Dead.Text: React: Play when one of your non-Captain Crew is being sunk. Place that Crew in your hand. Attachments on that Crew are discarded. Sink this card.
Not Quite Dead.Flavor Text: "I would call it a miracle that he lives, but I'm not certain he would." - Luis de Rioja

Obscured by the Smoke.Name: Obscured by the Smoke
Obscured by the Smoke.Text: React: Play when your Ship is suffering more than 7 Hits from a Cannon Attack. Reduce the Hits inflicted by the attack to 7.
Obscured by the Smoke.Flavor Text: "Where are they?" he heard the Montaigne cry. "Where are they?" Domingo grinned and readied his cutlass.

Off Course.Name: Off Course
Off Course.Text: Target another player's Ship. Move that Ship to a Sea adjacent to its current location.
Off Course.Flavor Text: The Navigator and the Captain both looked at the broken compass. Then they looked at the map. Then the Captain looked at his pistol, and the Navigator started running.

Offensive Maneuvers.Name: Offensive Maneuvers
Offensive Maneuvers.Text: This Crew inflicts 2 extra hits during Boarding Attacks.
Offensive Maneuvers.Flavor Text: "Tell King Sandoval that the Montaigne blockade is no more." - Admiral Orduño

Oil of Sloth.Name: Oil of Sloth
Oil of Sloth.Text: Act: Tack this card to target a non-Captain Crew in this Sea and draw a card. Target Crew may not be pushed forward to fight in a Boarding Attack or begin a Boarding Attack without a card effect until the end of the turn. Discard this card at the end of the turn.
Oil of Sloth.Flavor Text: A dull mind makes a slow body.

Old Flame.Name: Old Flame
Old Flame.Text: You may only play this card if you have a Gosse Captain. Any player in this Sea may sink Old Flame by tacking 4 Swashbuckling as an action. While Old Flame is in play, other players may not attach Attachment cards to this Sea. Cards already attached are unaffected.
Old Flame.Flavor Text: He writes her every day, pledging to make her proud again.

One Fell Swoop.Name: One Fell Swoop
One Fell Swoop.Text: Act: Tack this Crew to discard a Chantey in play.
One Fell Swoop.Flavor Text: "San Cristobal." Valoix pointed to the spot on the map. "We take it and this war ends."

One Shot - Make it Count.Name: One Shot - Make it Count
One Shot - Make it Count.Text: Any player may sink this Chantey by paying 4 Influence as an action. Action cards are placed in the sunk pile instead of the discard pile after they have been canceled or resolved (except Action cards which become attachments).
One Shot - Make it Count.Flavor Text: Do please silence those blasted cannons, gentlemen. This isn't as easy as it looks." - Isabeau Dubois du Arrent

One with the Sails.Name: One with the Sails
One with the Sails.Text: React: Play when you are paying a Sailing cost to produce 3 Sailing.
One with the Sails.Flavor Text: "It's been nine days since we went out on the account with an act of pardon from her Grace on a small barkadeer. Hangin' here amongst the booms and fenders pulling a boot-toppin' for the Cap'n, watchin' the bully boys heave the sheets to bring a spring upon her cable." He winked at me. "Know what I mean?"
One with the Sails.Changes on MRP: Cost; sepcial cost/Cancel cost modified;Boarding Attack modified;Text modified;

Only Two Came Out.Name: Only Two Came Out
Only Two Came Out.Text:
You may only put Only Two Came Out into play if you have one or more completed Artifact Adventures in play.
React: Tack Only Two Came Out when you are paying an Influence cost to produce 3 Influence.

Orduño's Cutlass.Name: Orduño's Cutlass
Orduño's Cutlass.Trait: Castille Captain Attachment - Unique - Signature Item
Orduño's Cutlass.Text:
Act: Sink this card to untack your Captain.
Act: Tack this card to target one of your other Castillian Crew to give that Crew +2 to all of that Crew's skills that are greater than 1.
React: Tack this card when you are paying a Sailing cost for an action to play, discard or sink a Control card to give your Captain +4 Sailing until after the action.

Orduño's Folly.Name: Orduño's Folly
Orduño's Folly.Text:
Act: Target a Ship in this Sea with a tacked Castillian Captain on Board. Inflict 4 Hits on that Ship.
Act: Tack one of your Crew to draw 1 card from your Deck.
Orduño's Folly.Flavor Text: "Sign the condemnation, Margaretta." Enrique nearly wept. "Denounce me to the world, or they will burn you as well."

Orduño's Honor.Name: Orduño's Honor
Orduño's Honor.Text: Target another player's Ship which is in a Sea to which you have a Control card attached. Move the target Ship to a Sea adjacent to its current Sea.
Orduño's Honor.Flavor Text: "I will not board the General's Ship," Orduño snarled, the single shot still echoing in his ears. "Then you will be burned as a traitor," Bascalle hissed. With a wawe, his guards moved forward...

Orf Helfir.Name: Orf Helfir
Orf Helfir.Text: Act: Tack Orf to target a Ship in this or an adjacent Sea. That Ship's player must target one of his or her Crew. Play a card from your hand as a Boarding Attack to begin a Duel between Orf and the target Crew.

Orf Helfir - Exp..Name: Orf Helfir - Exp.
Orf Helfir - Exp..Trait: Experienced - Unique - Loyal - First Mate - Villainous - Swordsman +2
Orf Helfir - Exp..Text: React: Tack Orf when a player in this Sea hires a Crew. Play a card from your hand as a Boarding Attack to begin a Duel between Orf and that Crew.
Orf Helfir - Exp..Flavor Text: "To kill Yngvild, you have to think like Yngvild"

Orm Greybeard.Name: Orm Greybeard
Orm Greybeard.Text: When Orm tacks or sinks to absorb Hits, he absorbs 1 extra Hit.
Orm Greybeard.Flavor Text: "I watched my daughter die before my eyes, and could do nothing to stop it. Do not ask me again why I am here."

Otiro.Name: Otiro
Otiro.Flavor Text: "Funny lookin' fella. Could be Crescent, could be from Cathay. Can't say. But he's chasin' somethin', that's for sure."

Out of Action.Name: Out of Action
Out of Action.Text: React: Play this card when one of your Ally cards is being discarded or sunk. Place the Ally in your hand instead.
Out of Action.Flavor Text: "Your crew is abandoning you. Why should you shield them further? All you need is turn them over to General Orduño, and the Church will provide ample compensation..."

Out of Rum.Name: Out of Rum
Out of Rum.Text: Target a Crew with Swashbuckling less than 3. Tack that Crew.
Out of Rum.Flavor Text: "Check for yourselves. There isn't a drop o' rum anywhere aboard ship!" - Reputed last words of Kenneth Thyme, quartermaster

Overstocked.Name: Overstocked
Overstocked.Text: Act: Tack this card and target a Ship which is exceeding its printed Crew Maximum to inflict 3 Hits on that Ship.
Overstocked.Flavor Text: "I know it's a long voyage, captain, but where are we supposed to sleep?!"
Overstocked.Errata: No target a Ship exceding its printed Crew Maximimum, not it'sCrew Maximum.

Owl.Name: Owl
Owl.Flavor Text: Wise and all-seeing, the owl remembers what others have forgotten -- and strikes with inerring precision.

Packed Gunpowder.Name: Packed Gunpowder
Packed Gunpowder.Text: Any player may sink this Chantey by discarding one of their Gunner or Topman Crew as an action. All Captains have the following ability: React: Immediately after a Ship in this Sea has absorbed all of the Hits from a Cannon Attack that you produced, you may immediately discard two cards from your hand to target one of your untacked Gunner Crew. You may immediately tack the target Crew to perform another Cannon Attack.

Padre Alfonso.Name: Padre Alfonso
Padre Alfonso.Text: React: Tack after a Crew tacks to absorb Hits. That Crew absorbs zero Hits.
Padre Alfonso.Flavor Text: "Goodbye, my son. May Theus receive you and hold you near," the priest intoned, and then plunged his knife into the wounded man's eye.

Padre Alfonso - Exp..Name: Padre Alfonso - Exp.
Padre Alfonso - Exp..Text: React: Tack Alfonso when another Ship in this Sea is suffering Hits. When Crew on that Ship tack to absorb these Hits, they only absorb an amount of Hits equal to their printed Swashbuckling.
Padre Alfonso - Exp..Flavor Text: "The Church is Theus, my lady. The sooner you accept that, the happier you'll be."

Padre Esteban.Name: Padre Esteban
Padre Esteban.Flavor Text: "Let us give thanks to Theus for the lead you are about to receive..."

Palace Raid.Name: Palace Raid
Palace Raid.Flavor Text: "Enough money can overcome anyone's common sense... even mine." - Reggie Wilcox

Panache.Name: Panache
Panache.Text: React: Play when you are paying a Swashbuckling cost to produce 1 Swashbuckling
Panache.Flavor Text: "You have skill, my enemy," he said. "But what you lack is style."
Panache.Errata: Text modified: can now be used to inflicts Hits in Boarding and Absorb Hits.

Panzerhand.Name: Panzerhand
Panzerhand.Text: React: Tack Panzerhand as a Boarding Attack to reverse a Thrust or Slash Boarding Attack played by your opponent against this Crew. This card produces a Punch Boarding Attack. Until the end of this Boarding, this Crew's Boarding Attacks that finish with a Punch inflict 2 extra hits.

Pappy.Name: Pappy
Pappy.Text: This Crew has +2 Adventuring when you are paying the completion cost of an Adventure.
Pappy.Flavor Text: Ivanovitch’s father had sailed with him for so long, most of the crew had forgotten his real name.

Parting Shot.Name: Parting Shot
Parting Shot.Text: Target another Ship in this Sea. Tack 3 Cannon plus your Ship's move cost to inflict a 3 Hit Cannon Attack on that Ship. Immediately after this Cannon Attack is resolved, move your Ship to an adjacent Sea.
Parting Shot.Flavor Text: "We wouldn't want you leaving without something to remember us by." - Padre Esteban

Passionate Duel.Name: Passionate Duel
Passionate Duel.Text: +2 Swashbuckling. This crew inflicts 1 extra Hit during Boarding Attacks.
Passionate Duel.Flavor Text: "You duel divinely, my dear. Let us put our swords away and try a different kind of duel."

Paul Norton.Name: Paul Norton
Paul Norton.Text: Act: Once per turn, tack any number of your completed Adventures and name a skill. Until the end of the turn, this Crew gains +1 to the named skill for each Adventure you tacked.
Paul Norton.Flavor Text: He followed Berek back to the Sea Dogs but he never forgot his old crewmates.

Paule du Paix.Name: Paule du Paix
Paule du Paix.Text: While your Ship is engaged in a Boarding, Paule has a +2 Swashbuckling.
Paule du Paix.Flavor Text: Paule carries out vengence with all the reverence of a priest in prayer. Some men dig two graves before sailing out on the seas of revenge. Paule digs thirty.

Pedro Alameda.Name: Pedro Alameda
Pedro Alameda.Text: The skill cost of your Action cards titled: "Sharp Shooter" or "Sniper" are reduced to 0, while this Crew is untacked during a Boarding.
Pedro Alameda.Flavor Text: Bam! "Oops. Uh, sorry down there. Are you ok?"

Peek at the Future.Name: Peek at the Future
Peek at the Future.Text: Act: Tack this Crew to look at the top five cards of your deck. You may discard any or all of those cards. Return the remaining cards to the top of your deck in any order.
Peek at the Future.Flavor Text: "Hmm," she whispered. "What? What?" I asked. She smiled. "Oh. Nothing. Nothing at all."

Peg Leg.Name: Peg Leg
Peg Leg.Text: React: Play when you suffer Hits. Attach this card to one of your Crew to suffer 3 fewer hits. This Attachment has the Leg trait. A Crew may not have more than one Leg Attachment.
Peg Leg.Flavor Text: "Cor, that's just how I lost me own leg!"
Peg Leg.Errata: Text modified: you have to attach this card to prevent Hits. If you can't attch this card, you can't prevent Hits.

Pepin.Name: Pepin
Pepin.Text: Act: Tack Pepin to untack one of your crew.
Pepin.Flavor Text: "Pepin may be small, but he´s got a heart the size of the Mirror. And that is more than I can say for most of you." - The General

Pepin - Exp..Name: Pepin - Exp.
Pepin - Exp..Text: React: Tack Pepin, immediately before performing an Action, to untack any card in play.
Pepin - Exp..Flavor Text: "His heart is as noble as ever. If only his Admiral were worthy of that nobility." - The General

Percis d'Cassell.Name: Percis d'Cassell
Percis d'Cassell.Text: Act: Tack this Crew to target one of your Ally cards up to 2 Seas away. Move your Ship to the same Sea as the Ally card.
Percis d'Cassell.Flavor Text: "San Cristobal, eh? I might be able to make its harbor a little less perilous for you…"

Percival du Lac.Name: Percival du Lac
Percival du Lac.Text: When hiring Percival, you may pay an additional 3 Influence to give him the trait: Porté 1 and +2 Cannon until the end of the game.
Percival du Lac.Flavor Text: "Porté theory states that a hole can be any size you like, provided you have the power. How large is le Beau thinking of?"

Persuasion.Name: Persuasion
Persuasion.Text: React: Tack Persuasion when you tack a Crew to produce influence. That Crew produces 1 extra Influence.
Persuasion.Flavor Text: "There's two kinds of persuasion on the Black Dawn. I prefer Celedoine's to McGee's any day o' the week." - Phelan Cole

Pertruccio Garibaldi.Name: Pertruccio Garibaldi
Pertruccio Garibaldi.Text: Once per turn, you may untack Pertruccio immediately after you complete an Artifact adventure.
Pertruccio Garibaldi.Flavor Text: "I can smell the Syrne, McCormick. Like a bloodhound."

Pete \"Gang\" Green.Name: Pete "Gang" Green
Pete \"Gang\" Green.Text: Pete may tack to absorb Hits.
Pete \"Gang\" Green.Flavor Text: Just don't ask him to tie any knots.

Pete \"Gang\" Greene.Name: Pete "Gang" Greene
Pete \"Gang\" Greene.Text: This Crew may tack to absorb Hits.
Pete \"Gang\" Greene.Flavor Text: Just don't ask him to tie any knots.
Pete \"Gang\" Greene.Errata: Maybe Typo: e at the end of Green

Peter Silver.Name: Peter Silver
Peter Silver.Flavor Text: "Take some guns, Captain. The Hanged Man may be grateful for your help, but we're still robbin' 'em, after all."

Peter Silver - Exp..Name: Peter Silver - Exp.
Peter Silver - Exp..Text: React: Once per turn, when Peter is tacking to produce skill points, you may tack one of your other Crew to have Peter produce an extra 2 points of that skill.

Petrigal's Cordial.Name: Petrigal's Cordial
Petrigal's Cordial.Text:
You must have 2 or more Invisible College Crew to bring this card into play.
React: Sink this card instead of performing a Boarding Attack to inflict 2 Hits to the other Ship in the Boarding.
React: Discard this card instead of performing a Boarding Attack to target a Crew on the other Ship in the Boarding. That Crew's Swashbuckling is reduced by 2 until the end of the Boarding (minimum 1).

Petro Angelina.Name: Petro Angelina
Petro Angelina.Text: Act: Tack this Crew to give all of your other Rower cards +1 Sailing until the end of the turn.
Petro Angelina.Flavor Text: Petro was one of Kheired-Din's captive rowers, anonymous and abused... until Espera's escape gave him the chance to show his loyalty.

Phantom Topman.Name: Phantom Topman
Phantom Topman.Text: Discard 1 card from your hand and tack this card when paying a Sailing cost to produce Sailing equal to your Ship's move cost.
Phantom Topman.Flavor Text: "Aye, he gives me the creeps too, but he's a hard worker, and the Captain ain't gotta pay 'im."

Phelan Cole.Name: Phelan Cole
Phelan Cole.Text: React: Tack after you suffer Hits in a Boarding to end the Boarding. The other player in the Boarding may cancel this action by tacking 4 Swashbuckling.
Phelan Cole.Flavor Text: "He's a good man to have when having one's the only thing that will save your neck." - Bloody Bonnie

Phelan Cole - Exp..Name: Phelan Cole - Exp.
Phelan Cole - Exp..Text: React: Tack Phelan instead of performing a Boarding Attack to end the Boarding. Phelan then targets the other Ship that was in the Boarding and inflicts a 3 hit Cannon Attack on that Ship.
Phelan Cole - Exp..Flavor Text: "I wish he wouldn't do that. It's hard on the sails." - "Lyin''" John Fox

Philip Gosse.Name: Philip Gosse
Philip Gosse.Text: While you have four or more other Gosse Crew on your Ship, the Swashbuckling skill of your Gosse Crew is increased by 1.
Philip Gosse.Flavor Text: "I've led a good life. I hope to die a good death."

Philip Gosse - Foil.Name: Philip Gosse - Foil
Philip Gosse - Foil.Text: While you have four or more other Gosse Crew on your Ship, the Swashbuckling skill of your Gosse Crew is increased by 1.
Philip Gosse - Foil.Flavor Text: "I've led a good life. I hope to die a good death."

Philter of Champions.Name: Philter of Champions
Philter of Champions.Text: Act: Tack this card to target a Swordsman Crew in thisSea and draw a card. Target Crew gains +3 to their Swordsman trait until the end of the turn. Discard this card at th end of the turn.
Philter of Champions.Flavor Text: "Now all I need is someone worthy of it."

Phineas Flynn.Name: Phineas Flynn
Phineas Flynn.Flavor Text: I've already been a robber on the road. Time to try being a robber on the waves.

Piles of Skulls.Name: Piles of Skulls
Piles of Skulls.Text: React: Play when a player completes an Adventure. That Adventure is discarded without benefit, unless the player pays 2 Adventuring.
Piles of Skulls.Flavor Text: We were expecting the treasure of Red Bart and found his accursed bones instead.

Piotr the Badger.Name: Piotr the Badger
Piotr the Badger.Text: React: Discard this Crew when paying Adventuring to produce 3 Adventuring.
Piotr the Badger.Flavor Text: The inscriptions told him how to activate the Switch - just before sealing the room shut behind him.
Piotr the Badger.Changes on MRP: Affiliation/Nation modified;Text modified;Flavor text modified;Artist modified;

Pistol.Name: Pistol
Pistol.Text: React: Instead of performing a Boarding Attack, tack the Pistol to inflict 1 Hit on the other Ship in the Boarding.

Pistol Hand.Name: Pistol Hand
Pistol Hand.Text: React: Play when you are suffering Hits. Attach this card to one of your Crew without a Hand attachment to absorb 2 Hits. This card has the Hand trait, and gives the attached Crew +2 Cannon. A Crew may not have more than 1 Hand attachment.
Pistol Hand.Flavor Text: "It also has a file, a corkscrew, and a pair of tweezers."

Pitching Deck.Name: Pitching Deck
Pitching Deck.Text: All Swordsman bonuses are reduced to zero.
Pitching Deck.Flavor Text: The tiller swung to the side and the deck lurched beneath them. There was more than one way to even the odds.

Plague of Boca.Name: Plague of Boca
Plague of Boca.Text: Target one Sea. Discard all Sea Attachments in that Sea. This does not affect uncompleted Adventures.
Plague of Boca.Flavor Text: "Get back on the boat! This town's a ghost, and I won't be joining it today!" - Magaretta Orduño

Plague Ship.Name: Plague Ship
Plague Ship.Text:
Any player in this Sea may discard this card by tacking 4 Cannon as an action. No player, except those with Black Freighter Captains, may hire Crew in this Sea.
Act: Tack this card to attach it to a Sea adjacent to this Sea.

Pocket Money.Name: Pocket Money
Pocket Money.Text: React: Discard Pocket Money when you are paying an Influence cost to produce 2 Influence.
Pocket Money.Flavor Text: "But that's not all! You also get two years of fresh air and exercise aboard one of the finest ships to sail the seas!"

Point-Blank Cannon Volley.Name: Point-Blank Cannon Volley
Point-Blank Cannon Volley.Text: React: Play instead of performing a Boarding Attack. You inflict 4 Hits on the other Ship in this Boarding.
Point-Blank Cannon Volley.Flavor Text: Just as he lifted the brandy he'd been saving for his birthday to his lips, there was a crash and roar...and it was gone.
Point-Blank Cannon Volley.Changes on MRP: Cost; sepcial cost/Cancel cost modified;Boarding Attack modified;Text modified;

Poisoned Wine.Name: Poisoned Wine
Poisoned Wine.Text:
You may only play this card if you have a Villainous Captain.
Act: Tack one of your non-Captain Villainous Crew to target a Ship. That Ship's controller must tack one of their Holy Crew or sink one of their Crew.
Poisoned Wine.Flavor Text: "The Falisci 64 should never be quite that shade of scarlet." - Giovanni Villanova

Poor Jack.Name: Poor Jack
Poor Jack.Text: React: Play when one of your Crew is sunk. You may attach all of that Crew's Item attachments to one of your Crews which may attach them. Tack the Crew (if untacked) receiving the Items.
Poor Jack.Flavor Text: "He... he was a fine sailor." The General spoke almost grudgingly. "But there are other fine sailors here who need these more than he does."

Port Master.Name: Port Master
Port Master.Text: Act: Tack this Crew to untack one of your other Crew.
Port Master.Flavor Text: "Thirty Guilders, eh? Well then, lad. I know just the place yur lookin' for."

Porté Knowledge.Name: Porté Knowledge
Porté Knowledge.Flavor Text: There are always darker bargains to be made...

Porté Ward.Name: Porté Ward
Porté Ward.Text: React: Tack Porté Ward when a player plays a Boarding attack card during a Boarding with your Ship. That card is discarded without effect. That player may draw a card, then play a new card for their Boarding Attack.

Posh Quarters.Name: Posh Quarters
Posh Quarters.Text: Posh Quarters counts as one Crew against your crew maximum. The Influence cost of all of your Crew is reduced by 2 (minimum 1).
Posh Quarters.Flavor Text: "We are still Montaigne. We expect the very best." - Gerard Rois et Reines

Pounder.Name: Pounder
Pounder.Flavor Text: With so many missing rowers, those who remained had to labor twice as hard.

Powder Keg Tavern.Name: Powder Keg Tavern
Powder Keg Tavern.Text:
Any player in this Sea may sink this card by paying 3 Cannon as an action.
Act: Tack Powder Keg Tavern while your Ship is in this Sea to inflict 2 Hits on all Ships in this Sea, beginning with the player on your left.
Powder Keg Tavern.Flavor Text: "I told him to stop drinking from the swill barrel, but oh no, he never listened to ol' Simon."

Powder Monkeys.Name: Powder Monkeys
Powder Monkeys.Flavor Text: "I don't care if the water's over yer head! Get down there and man them cannons or I'll stick this pistol so far up yur nose yu'll be sneezin' gunpowder for a week!"
Powder Monkeys.Changes on MRP: Cost; sepcial cost/Cancel cost modified;Adv modified;Boarding Attack modified;

Power of Purity.Name: Power of Purity
Power of Purity.Text: Tack one of your Heroic or Holy Crew to target a Black Freighter Captain in this Sea. Inflict Hits on that Ship equal to the number of your Heroic and Holy Crew.
Power of Purity.Flavor Text: "Theus protects those who protect themselves." - Padre Esteban

Powering Through.Name: Powering Through
Powering Through.Text: Target a Ship in this Sea. Inflict Hits equal to your Ship's Move Cost +6 on that Ship. Then inflict Hits equal to the opposing Ship's Move Cost +2 on your Ship.
Powering Through.Flavor Text: "Ram it!" Sean shouted. The Roost turned towards the small Castillian vessel like a tidal wawe...

Prayer.Name: Prayer
Prayer.Text: React: Play when one of your Crew with the Holy trait is tacking to pay a skill cost. The Crew produces 2 extra points of the skill.
Prayer.Flavor Text: The words left Alfonso's lips, and it seemed the entire crew drew strength from them.

Predators of the Sea.Name: Predators of the Sea
Predators of the Sea.Text: Target a Ship in an adjacent Sea. Move your Ship to that Sea and begin a Boarding with that Ship.
Predators of the Sea.Flavor Text: "The killing will continue, Gosse. The seas will swell with bloated corpses… until you come to me." - Necros

Preparing for a Long Voyage.Name: Preparing for a Long Voyage
Preparing for a Long Voyage.Text:
You may only attach this card if your Ship's Crew Maximum is 8 or less. This card counts as 1 Crew toward your Crew Maximum.
React: Tack this card when paying a Sailing cost to produce 3 Sailing.
React: Discard this card when paying Adventuring to produce 2 Adventuring.
Preparing for a Long Voyage.Flavor Text: "It's in the heart of the Mirror… the Island of the Sunken Eye…"

Press Gang.Name: Press Gang
Press Gang.Text: Put into play, from you hand, a Crew with an Influence cost less than 3.
Press Gang.Flavor Text: "Rigging? Rigging? What in the blazes is rigging?"

Professor Jacinta Navarro del Garcia.Name: Professor Jacinta Navarro del Garcia
Professor Jacinta Navarro del Garcia.Text: This Crew gains +3 Influence if yu have a Los Vagos Captain and a Patron Attachment in play.
Professor Jacinta Navarro del Garcia.Flavor Text: Where do you think El Vago gets his marvelous toys?

Prosperous Ventures.Name: Prosperous Ventures
Prosperous Ventures.Text: Any player may pay the cancel cost of this card. Until the end of the turn, all Crew with one or more completed Adventures attached, gain +1 Influence.
Prosperous Ventures.Flavor Text: "For the money you're paying, mein freunde, I'll follow Guttormson, the Merchant's Guild, and Legion himself!"

Pulled From the Sea.Name: Pulled From the Sea
Pulled From the Sea.Text: React: Play this card when you are paying an Adventuring cost to produce 3 Adventuring
Pulled From the Sea.Flavor Text: As the Hanged Man approaches Alesio's coordinates, Allende's eyes widened at the half drowned form clinging the figurehead. "Jeremiah Berek..."

Pulling Through.Name: Pulling Through
Pulling Through.Text: React: Discard this card to target one of your Adventures up to a number of seas away equal to this Crews Porté. You may immediately complete that Adventure as if your Ship were in that Sea.
Pulling Through.Flavor Text: "I'd close my eyes first, if I were you." - Timothy le Beau

Purple Heaves.Name: Purple Heaves
Purple Heaves.Text: React: Play when another player untacks one of his or her Crew during the Actions phase. That Crew is discarded, unless that Crew is a Captain, in which case you inflict 5 Hits on that Ship.
Purple Heaves.Flavor Text: "You know what you boys need? A nice plate of warm pig fat…" - Grimey Stubbs

Pursue Your Enemies.Name: Pursue Your Enemies
Pursue Your Enemies.Text: React: Play after an opponent in this Sea has played an Action card that resulted in their Ship moving to another Sea, to move your Ship to the Same Sea (moving through each Sea one at a time).
Pursue Your Enemies.Flavor Text: The Rogers still haven't forgiven the Sea Dogs… and their vengeance remains as fierce as ever.

Pushing the Limits.Name: Pushing the Limits
Pushing the Limits.Text: Sink a Sorcery Knack attached to one of your Crew to untack that Crew. Sink this card.
Pushing the Limits.Flavor Text: The General pulled off the greates escape in Théan history - with the largest Porté hole ever created.

Quarantined Port.Name: Quarantined Port
Quarantined Port.Text: Any player may pay this card's Cancel Cost.Target a Sea. Until the end of the turn, players with Ships in the target Sea may not hire Crew.
Quarantined Port.Flavor Text: Valoix's task was made considerably easier by the return of the White Plague in certain quarters, which closed down the ports as effectively as any Montaigne raidnig party.

Queen Elaine.Name: Queen Elaine
Queen Elaine.Trait: Sea Dogs Captain Attachment - Unique - Patron
Queen Elaine.Text: React: Sink Queen Elaine immediately after you perform an action. You may perform another action immediately after this one.
Queen Elaine.Flavor Text: "Avalon before all else, Captain." Berek nodded. "Before all else."

Queen Eleanor.Name: Queen Eleanor
Queen Eleanor.Text: Act: If all your Crew are tacked, tack Queen Eleanor to move your Ship to the Trade Sea.
Queen Eleanor.Flavor Text: "The Beloved Queen was keeper of Avalon's lore. Bonnie wants to write us into her book...and she has to go to Bryn Bresail to ask her." - Celedoine

Queen of the Sea.Name: Queen of the Sea
Queen of the Sea.Text: Target a Ship. That Ship suffers 3 Hits.
Queen of the Sea.Flavor Text: Only three men have seen her and lived to tell the tale. And if you've seen what's left of 'em, you'd know that price they paid wasn't worth the story.

Queen of the Sidhe.Name: Queen of the Sidhe
Queen of the Sidhe.Text: Act: Tack the Queen. Until the end of the turn, any opposing Ships in or moving from the Trade Sea or Frothing Sea have their Move Costs increased by 2.
Queen of the Sidhe.Flavor Text: 35 years ago, an Explorer ship sailed into the Trade Sea searching for an island of mists. Only a young Guy McCormick returned to tell the tale. He never has.

Quick Reload.Name: Quick Reload
Quick Reload.Text: Untack one of your Crew with the Gunner trait.
Quick Reload.Flavor Text: "Quicken thy pace, sluggard!" shouted the Dolman. "Slothfulness is a demon and I shall beat it out of thee if I have to!"
Quick Reload.Changes on MRP: Cost; sepcial cost/Cancel cost modified;Boarding Attack modified;

Quick Sailing.Name: Quick Sailing
Quick Sailing.Text: Untack one of your Crew with the Topman trait.
Quick Sailing.Flavor Text: "I'm going as fast as I can, ye fat old pig," Jeremy muttered under his breath.

Quick Tack.Name: Quick Tack
Quick Tack.Text: React: Play when you suffer Hits from a Cannon Attack. You suffer 2 fewer Hits.
Quick Tack.Flavor Text: "Hard to starboard! Move, or you lads are all sleepin' in St. Rose's Grave tonight!"

Rabbit.Name: Rabbit
Rabbit.Text: React: Tack this card when you are paying an Adventuring cost to produce 3 adventuring.
Rabbit.Flavor Text: No beast in the field is more fleet of foot or can find so many hidden corners.

Rabbit's Foot.Name: Rabbit's Foot
Rabbit's Foot.Text: React: Discard this card after you discard the top card of your deck to change the Boarding Attack on the discard to be the Boarding Attack of your choice.
Rabbit's Foot.Flavor Text: "I ain't dead yet, so it must be workin'." - Grimey Stubbs

Rachel Milligan.Name: Rachel Milligan
Rachel Milligan.Text: When this Crew is in a Duel, the opposing Crew inflicts 2 less Hits (minimum 0).
Rachel Milligan.Flavor Text: "You have to accept that you're going to fall. Someday, somehow, you're going to plummet straight to the cobblestones. Once you realize that, you'll never be afraid of heights again."

Rafael de St. Theresa.Name: Rafael de St. Theresa
Rafael de St. Theresa.Text: Rafael's Boarding Attacks that finish with a Thrust inflict 1 extra Hit.
Rafael de St. Theresa.Flavor Text: He moved calmly across the deck, whispering a prayer under his breath, and leaving a trail of blood in his wake.

Ramford Riddick.Name: Ramford Riddick
Ramford Riddick.Text: The title of this card is "Red Scarves" for Experienced purposes. All of your other Crew cards with the title "Red Scarves" have +2 Cannon and +1 Adventuring.
Ramford Riddick.Flavor Text: "Better my red scarf than your red guts, little man."

Ramming Spike.Name: Ramming Spike
Ramming Spike.Text: Act: Target a Ship in this Sea. Tack the Ramming Spike and pay your Ship's move cost in Sailing to inflict Hits on that Ship equal to your Ship's move cost. The target may pay their Ship's move cost in Sailing to cancel this action.
Ramming Spike.Flavor Text: "The Old Empire used to sink pirates in this manner. Sometimes, the old ways are best." - Don Deanna

Rats in the Hold.Name: Rats in the Hold
Rats in the Hold.Text: Any player in this Sea may tack 6 Swashbuckling as an action to sink the Rats in the Hold. The controller of this Ship has their hand size reduced by 1.
Rats in the Hold.Flavor Text: "Tell Gaspar we're fishin fer dinner tonight."

Rats!.Name: Rats!
Rats!.Text: Any player in this Sea may sink Rats by tacking 3 Swashbuckling as an action. Any player in this Sea that wishes to put into play or complete a Goods Adventure must tack 2 Adventuring to do so, in addition to any other costs.
Rats!.Flavor Text: Billy heard the skittering sounds and double-checked his pocket. Only three matches left...

Raze the Village.Name: Raze the Village
Raze the Village.Text: +1 Swashbuckling. This Crew inflicts 1 extra Hit during Boarding Attacks.
Raze the Village.Flavor Text: "Today we have collected only a few of the blood debts the Vendel owe us. Soon enough, the merchants will pay in full."

Reaper's Grip.Name: Reaper's Grip
Reaper's Grip.Text: This Crew inflicts 3 extra Hits during Boarding Attacks.
Reaper's Grip.Flavor Text: An evil heart calls them... and they know how to claim their own...

Reclusive Backers.Name: Reclusive Backers
Reclusive Backers.Text:
Any player may sink this card by paying 3 Influence as an action.
React: Tack this card when you are in this Sea and paying an Influence cost to produce 2 Influence.
Act: Tack this card to target and untack one of your Ally Attachments.
Reclusive Backers.Flavor Text: "There are those in Castille who will try to stop you. If my name ever comes up, their number will double."
Reclusive Backers.Errata: Trait Patron added. New ability. Flavor text modified

Red.Name: Red
Red.Flavor Text: You ask her name! The last fella that did that couldn't sit for a week.

Red Fox.Name: Red Fox
Red Fox.Flavor Text: The cunning fox can locate all manner of treasure, no matter how deeply buried.

Red Scarves.Name: Red Scarves
Red Scarves.Text: When Red Scarves tack to absorb Hits, they absorb 1 extra Hit.
Red Scarves.Flavor Text: "Look out lads! Reis is lookin' for a new cannon crew!"
Red Scarves.Changes on MRP: Cost; sepcial cost/Cancel cost modified;Boarding Attack modified;Trait modified;Text modified;

Red Skies at Morning.Name: Red Skies at Morning
Red Skies at Morning.Text: Target a Ship. Until the end of this turn, any time that Ship pays a Sailing cost, the cost is increased by 2 Sailing.

Red Skies at Night.Name: Red Skies at Night
Red Skies at Night.Text: Target a Ship. That Ship's Move Cost is decreased by 1 (minimum 1) until the end of the turn.

Red the Adventurer.Name: Red the Adventurer
Red the Adventurer.Text: Red gains +1 Adventuring for each Attachment card attached to her.
Red the Adventurer.Flavor Text: "I collect things that's all. Trouble is, all the best things take a lot to get a hold of."

Red Thorfild.Name: Red Thorfild
Red Thorfild.Trait: Unique - Loyal - Villainous - First Mate - Swordsman +2
Red Thorfild.Text: React: Target the other Ship when Red tacks to absorbs Hits during Boarding. Inflict 3 Hits to that ship.

Red Thorfild - Exp..Name: Red Thorfild - Exp.
Red Thorfild - Exp..Trait: Experienced - Unique - Villainous - Loyal - First Mate - Swordsman +2
Red Thorfild - Exp..Text:
Red has a Hand attachment.
React: Once per turn, instead of performing a Boarding Attack, reduce Red's Swashbuckling by 3 to add +6 ro Red's Swordsman Bonus until the end of the Boarding.

Reggie Wilcox.Name: Reggie Wilcox
Reggie Wilcox.Text: Act: Tack Reggie and target a Ship in this Sea. That player must tack one of his or her Crew.
Reggie Wilcox.Flavor Text: "I canno' climb a wall o' glass, Cap'n. No' for free, anyways."

Reggie Wilcox - Exp..Name: Reggie Wilcox - Exp.
Reggie Wilcox - Exp..Text: Act: Tack Reggie and pay 2 Adventuring to target a player with a Ship in this Sea. That player must discard one of their non-Captain Crew.
Reggie Wilcox - Exp..Flavor Text: "Since when does stealin' a ship mean climbin' a wall an' kidnappin' a bloody harbor master?"

Regrouping.Name: Regrouping
Regrouping.Text:
Act: Tack your Captain or First Mate Crew and attach any number of your Ally cards in play to the same Sea as your Ship.
React: Play before performing an action. Target one of your untacked Ally cards attached to an adjacent Sea to attach that Ally to the same Sea as your Ship.
Regrouping.Flavor Text: The  Corsairs knew that sooner or later, Kheired-Din would reappear. They intended to be ready for him.

Reinheart the Ripper.Name: Reinheart the Ripper
Reinheart the Ripper.Text: Act: Tack this Crew and your Ship to move your Ship to a Sea that contains another Ship.
Reinheart the Ripper.Flavor Text: He had strangled on his own sail line and his crew let him hang there for three days before throwing him to the sharks. He's a trifle upset about it.

Reis.Name: Reis
Reis.Text: While you have four or more other Crimson Roger Crew on your Ship, all of your Crew have a +1 Cannon skill.
Reis.Flavor Text: Mortimer looked at Reis, then at the mermaids down below. He decided to take his chances with the mermaids.
Reis.Changes on MRP: Cost; sepcial cost/Cancel cost modified;Text modified;

Reis - Foil.Name: Reis - Foil
Reis - Foil.Text: While you have four or more other Crimson Roger Crew on your Ship, all of your Crew have a +1 Cannon skill.
Reis - Foil.Flavor Text: Mortimer looked at Reis, then at the mermaids down below. He decided to take his chances with the mermaids.

Reis' Brides.Name: Reis' Brides
Reis' Brides.Text:
The cost of Reis' Brides is zero if you have a Crimson Roger Captain.
React: Tack Reis' Brides when a Crew is discarded or sunk in this Sea to give your Captain +2 Influence, until the end of the turn.
Reis' Brides.Flavor Text: The sirens followed the Roger on its course, feeding on their "bridegroom's" victims.

Reis' Fury.Name: Reis' Fury
Reis' Fury.Text: React: Tack Reis' Fury when this Crew inflicts Hits with a Boarding Attack. Heroic Crew may not tack to absorb these Hits.
Reis' Fury.Flavor Text: "Hello Johnathan. I have a message I need you to deliver for me…"

Reis' Legacy.Name: Reis' Legacy
Reis' Legacy.Text: Any player who cancels this Chantey must discard 1 random card from their hand (if they have any in their hand). The Influence cost of all Crew being Hired is reduced to 0.
Reis' Legacy.Flavor Text: "The man may be gone, but we still have the legend. And true evil never really dies…" - Riant Gaucher

Reis' Scythe.Name: Reis' Scythe
Reis' Scythe.Trait: Crimson Roger Captain Attachment - Unique - Signature Item
Reis' Scythe.Text:
Act: Sink this card to untack your Captain.
Act: Tack this card to target one of your other Crimson Roger Crew to give that Crew +2 to all of that Crew's skills that are greater than 1.
React: Tack this card when you are paying a Cannon cost for an action to play, discard or sink a Control card to give your Captain +4 Cannon until after the action.

Reise (Journey).Name: Reise (Journey)
Reise (Journey).Text: Act: Tack Reise to move your Ship to an adjacent Sea. You may not use this ability to move into or out of a Sea where another Ship is currently located.
Reise (Journey).Flavor Text: "To the Mirror, my brothers. Valhalla and our destiny await." - Yngvild Olafssdottir

Renfeld Throckmorton.Name: Renfeld Throckmorton
Renfeld Throckmorton.Text: Act: Tack Renfeld and another of your Crew to untack your Ship.
Renfeld Throckmorton.Flavor Text: "No one ever noticed me - watching, hiding remembering. Thank the Prophets people pay for such skills."

Renzo Raymondi.Name: Renzo Raymondi
Renzo Raymondi.Text: React: When another player sinks one of their Heroic crew, you may immediately draw a card from your deck. You may only use this ability once per sunk Crew.
Renzo Raymondi.Flavor Text: "The Rogers pay well. Everything else is secondary."

Reporting Drunk.Name: Reporting Drunk
Reporting Drunk.Text: React: Play when another player hires a Crew card. Target and tack that Crew.
Reporting Drunk.Flavor Text: "Izh not drinkin'... izh more uv a drownin', actually..."

Respect of your Men.Name: Respect of your Men
Respect of your Men.Text: Act: Tack to target one of your Crew. That Crew gains +1 to all of their skills until the end of the turn.
Respect of your Men.Flavor Text: "Now if I could just get them to wear a clean shirt..."

Responsive Helm.Name: Responsive Helm
Responsive Helm.Text:
This card may only be attached to a Ship with a printed Move Cost of 2 or less.
React: When you suffer Hits, except during Boarding, tack this card to reduce the Hits suffered by 2 (minimum 0).
Responsive Helm.Flavor Text: "Don't touch it. You'll break it." - "Long Tall" Harry

Retired Smuggler.Name: Retired Smuggler
Retired Smuggler.Text:
Any player in this Sea may sink this card by tacking 2 Influence as an action.
Act: Tack Retired Smuggler to get one Item card from your discard pile and move it to your hand.
Retired Smuggler.Flavor Text: "He's an old salt, but he gets what I need when I need it." - Jeremiah Berek

Retirement.Name: Retirement
Retirement.Text: Act: If you have 6 or more completed Prize Adventures in play than any other player, you win the game.
Retirement.Flavor Text: “One day I would like to retire, perhaps to the East through the sands, where there are forces more powerful than steel or gold...” - J. Berek

Retribution.Name: Retribution
Retribution.Text: React: Play when you are suffering 4 or more Hits. Target the Ship that inflicted those Hits. Inflict 2 Hits on the target Ship.

Rewrite the Rules.Name: Rewrite the Rules
Rewrite the Rules.Text: Instead of drawing three cards at the end of the turn, players must draw cards from their deck until they reach their maximum hand size. All Captains have the following ability: Act: Discard all cards in your hand.
Rewrite the Rules.Flavor Text: "My husband might have gone back to defend San Cristobal, but we wouldn't want to emulate such a heretic, would we?" - Margaretta Orduño

Reynaldo Lucani.Name: Reynaldo Lucani
Reynaldo Lucani.Text: When tacking this Crew to hire non-Captive Crew this Crew produces 3 additional Influence.
Reynaldo Lucani.Flavor Text: "Better here than back in Vodacce. At least, here, I have a chance of escape."

Reynaldo Pasado.Name: Reynaldo Pasado
Reynaldo Pasado.Text: This Crew may not be placed on a Heroic Captain's Ship, unless that Captain is a Crimson Rogers Captain. Your hand size is increased by 1 while there is a Heroic Captain in play.
Reynaldo Pasado.Flavor Text: "I used to belong to the Inquisition, Captian Reis. I assure you, I have the stomach for this kind of work."
Reynaldo Pasado.Errata: Can now be put on a Heroic Captain's Ship if this Captain is Crimson Rogers.

Reynard Fornier.Name: Reynard Fornier
Reynard Fornier.Text: When this Crew tacks or sink to absorb Hits you may discard one card from your hand to have him absorb 2 extra Hits (you may not discard multiple cards for extra Hits).
Reynard Fornier.Flavor Text: "I lost my blades, Musketeer, but the Freighter gave me some new ones…"
Reynard Fornier.Artist: Travis Moore and Dærick W. Gröss

Riant Gaucher.Name: Riant Gaucher
Riant Gaucher.Text: React: When you are paying an Influence cost, tack Riant and sink one of your Crew to produce 5 Influence.
Riant Gaucher.Flavor Text: "There's nothing so lovely as the read and white of a man's back flayed open to the bone."

Riant Gaucher - Exp..Name: Riant Gaucher - Exp.
Riant Gaucher - Exp..Text: Riant has +4 Influence while you have 3 or more Crew in your Sunk Pile.
Riant Gaucher - Exp..Flavor Text: His cruelty is as sharp as ever, but he has tempered his violent outbursts with a predator's cunning. The quiet shift has not escaped his Captain's attention.

Ricardo Ramos.Name: Ricardo Ramos
Ricardo Ramos.Text: When Ricardo tacks to produce Cannon for a Cannon Attack, the target Ship's controller may cancel the attack by paying Sailing equal to his Ship's move cost.
Ricardo Ramos.Flavor Text: "Once again, Castillian ingenuity rears its ugly head." - Admiral Valoix

Richter Hoffmann.Name: Richter Hoffmann
Richter Hoffmann.Text: React: When you are paying an influence cost, tack an Item Attachment attached to this Crew to produce 1 Influence.
Richter Hoffmann.Flavor Text: "Cosette needs a map if she's to survive the western seas. But she doesn't need to know where it comes from."

Rigged for Speed.Name: Rigged for Speed
Rigged for Speed.Text: This card may only be attached to Ships with a move cost less than 3. While Rigged for Speed is attached to your Ship, you have +8 Sailing for the purposes of determining Initiative.
Rigged for Speed.Flavor Text: "Let's see that Brotherhood dog outflank this." - The General

Riggers.Name: Riggers
Riggers.Text: When Riggers tack to absorb Hits they absorb 1 extra Hit, unless your Ship is in a Boarding.
Riggers.Flavor Text: "You take his legs and I'll take his arms." "Blast it, I always get the legs!"

Rilasciare Membership.Name: Rilasciare Membership
Rilasciare Membership.Text: This Captain gains the Rilasciare affiliation. While you have 3 or more other Rilasciare Crew on board this Captain has the following ability: Act: Target a non-Captain Crew on a Ship with more Crew on board than your Ship. Tack one of your Rilasciare Crew and discard the top card of your deck. If that card is a Crew with an Influence cost greater than target Crew, the target Crew is sunk or the Crew revealed enters play on your Ship, ingnoring any and all restrictions, including crew maximum (the choice is made by the target's Crew controller).

Ring of Honor.Name: Ring of Honor
Ring of Honor.Trait: Unique - 1 Sea Away - Artifact - Heroic Crew Attachment
Ring of Honor.Text: Tack Ring of Honor when one of your Heroic Crew is tacking to absorb Hits during Boarding to absorb 3 Hits.

Ring of Villainy.Name: Ring of Villainy
Ring of Villainy.Trait: Unique - 1 Sea Away - Artifact - Villainous Crew Attachment
Ring of Villainy.Text: React: Tack Ring of Villany when one of your Villainous Crew inflicts Hits during a Boarding. Inflict 3 extra Hits.

Riposte.Name: Riposte
Riposte.Text: Riposte can be played as a Boarding Attack, reversing any type of Boarding Attack played by your opponent. This card produces a Dagger Boarding Attack.
Riposte.Flavor Text: "I remember Dalia using a similar technique. It's as good as a shield... and shields can't cut you in two." - Ernesto Castillius

Rita Del Zepeda.Name: Rita Del Zepeda
Rita Del Zepeda.Text: Act: Tack to attach a card with the title "Musket" to this Crew from your hand (without cost) if she does not have a Musket attached.
Rita Del Zepeda.Flavor Text: "I don't belong on board a ship. Castille is in my blood and I cannot live unless I feel her beneath my toes."
Rita Del Zepeda.Errata: Secret Society added. Flavor text modified.

Rita del Zepeda.Name: Rita del Zepeda
Rita del Zepeda.Text: Act: Tack to attach a Musket to Rita from your hand (without cost) if she does not have a Musket attached.
Rita del Zepeda.Flavor Text: "I watch the shore so that Orduño may watch the sea. The Montaigne invasion cannot be overturned by ships alone."

Roald Andreasson.Name: Roald Andreasson
Roald Andreasson.Text: Roald may not be part of your starting Crew unless you have a Villainous Captain. You may not hire Roald unless you have more than one Villainous Crew in play. When Roald tacks to absorb Hits he absorbs 1 extra Hit.

Roberta Estrada.Name: Roberta Estrada
Roberta Estrada.Text: React: Tack Roberta when a player in this Sea performs an Action that sinks one of their own Crew. That player must sink an additional Crew or that Action is canceled (and the first Crew remains sunk).
Roberta Estrada.Flavor Text: "I was with Allende when we stormed the walls at la Bucca. Tell me how I can free him and it will be so."

Roberta Estrada - Exp..Name: Roberta Estrada - Exp.
Roberta Estrada - Exp..Text: Act: Tack Roberta to get an Adventure from your discard pile and put it into play, uncompleted. You may immediately move your Ship one Sea towards that Adventure.
Roberta Estrada - Exp..Flavor Text: The keys to Allende's cell. You would think they'd be keen to hold on such a trinket.

Robin Goodfellow.Name: Robin Goodfellow
Robin Goodfellow.Text: React: Tack this card when this Crew or a card attached to this Crew inflicts Hits on another player's Ship. The Ship suffers 3 additional Hits.
Robin Goodfellow.Flavor Text: "A bow he held within his hands, and arrows keen and bright…" - Montgomery Peerson, The Archer's Ballad

Rodrigo the Righteous.Name: Rodrigo the Righteous
Rodrigo the Righteous.Text: Villainous crew in this Sea produce 1 fewer Influence when tacking to produce Influence (min 0).
Rodrigo the Righteous.Flavor Text: “Theus guids my sword and he has brought me to you, Señor.”

Roger Gaffrin.Name: Roger Gaffrin
Roger Gaffrin.Text: React: Tack instead of performing a Boarding Attack. Until the end of this Boarding, your Sea Dogs Crew inflict 1 extra Hit during Boarding Attacks.
Roger Gaffrin.Flavor Text: "I do not understand why Avalons insist on having a shantyman aboard. Seems a waste of deck space to me." - The General

Roger Gaffrin - Exp..Name: Roger Gaffrin - Exp.
Roger Gaffrin - Exp..Text: All of your Sea Dog Crew inflicts inflict 1 extra Hit during Boarding Attacks.
Roger Gaffrin - Exp..Flavor Text: "One day, not far from now, another shantyman will be singing about the voyage we're taking now."

Roger School.Name: Roger School
Roger School.Text: React: Tack Rogers School when this Crew inflicts Hits with a Boarding Attack. This attack inflicts 3 extra Hits.
Roger School.Flavor Text: "Pirates learn to fight, same as gentlemen. We just don't brag about it as much."

Rognvald Brandson.Name: Rognvald Brandson
Rognvald Brandson.Text: Rognvald gains +1 Influence for every completed Adventure you have in play.
Rognvald Brandson.Flavor Text: "Once, long ago, in the land of snow and ice, a pretty maid was held prisoner by the King of the Giants...."

Romantic Captive.Name: Romantic Captive
Romantic Captive.Text: You must tack your Captain to put Romantic Captive into play. +1 Swashbuckling
Romantic Captive.Flavor Text: "She sure don't look like she's bein' held against her will," Wilcox mumbled.

Rope Descending Device.Name: Rope Descending Device
Rope Descending Device.Trait: 1 Sea Away - Hand - Invisible Colege Crew Attachment
Rope Descending Device.Text: React: Tack this card when you are paying an Adventuring cost to produce 1 Adventuring.

Rosa Maria de Barcino.Name: Rosa Maria de Barcino
Rosa Maria de Barcino.Text: Rosa has +1 Influence while in la Boca.
Rosa Maria de Barcino.Flavor Text: "Come, come, gentlemen. I am armed, but then again, what could a woman know about using a sword?"

Rosa Maria de Barcino - Exp..Name: Rosa Maria de Barcino - Exp.
Rosa Maria de Barcino - Exp..Text: React: After you have reversed a Boarding Attack with any one of your Crew, tack Rosa to tack the opposing Crew involved in the Boarding Attack.
Rosa Maria de Barcino - Exp..Flavor Text: "Did you think Margaretta was the only one who could fight?"

Rosamaria Falisci.Name: Rosamaria Falisci
Rosamaria Falisci.Text: React: Tack Rosamaria immediately after another player draws cards during the Actions phase other than during a Boarding, to end the Actions phase
Rosamaria Falisci.Flavor Text: "Sometimes, rushing your fate is the best way to make it not happen."

Rosamonde du Montaigne.Name: Rosamonde du Montaigne
Rosamonde du Montaigne.Text: React: Tack when you tack one of your Crew to produce Influence. That Crew produces 3 extra Influence.
Rosamonde du Montaigne.Flavor Text: "We are here to ensure l'Empereur's fleet is performing exactly as it ought to be." "A bloody waste of deck space if you ask me," the General grumbled to himself.

Rosamonde du Montaigne - Exp..Name: Rosamonde du Montaigne - Exp.
Rosamonde du Montaigne - Exp..Text: React: Discard one card from your hand when you bring an Ally into play. You may attach that Ally to any Sea.
Rosamonde du Montaigne - Exp..Flavor Text: "You saved the captain's life, Rosamonde. Think on that before you judge yourself too harshly." - Gerard Rois et Reines

Rose & Cross Apprentice.Name: Rose & Cross Apprentice
Rose & Cross Apprentice.Text: +1 Swashbuckling. This Crew inflicts 1 extra Hit during Boarding Attacks.
Rose & Cross Apprentice.Flavor Text: "A common sailor wearing the Seal of the Rose and Cross? Let's see what you're made of, lad."

Rose and Cross Membership.Name: Rose and Cross Membership
Rose and Cross Membership.Text: This Captain gains the Rose and Cross affiliation. While you have 3 or more other Rose and Cross Crew on board this Captain has the following ability: Act: once per turn, draw and reveal the top card of your deck, if it is not a Patron card, discard the card and draw another card. Repeat until you shuffle your deck or you draw a Patron card. Place the Patron card in your hand.

Rose Thornne.Name: Rose Thornne
Rose Thornne.Text: You may not hire this Crew if you have a Captain with the Villainous trait.
Rose Thornne.Flavor Text: "I quite like the pseudonym, though I haven't used it in awhile. Were these gentlemen conscious, I'm sure they would agree."

Rosenkreuz's Secret.Name: Rosenkreuz's Secret
Rosenkreuz's Secret.Text: You must tack a Rose and Cross Crew to bring this card into play. This Crew gains +2 to their highest printed skill. If there is a tie, the Crew gains +1 to all skills that are of the greatest value.
Rosenkreuz's Secret.Flavor Text: "Valroux speaks of it, but the body of our founder - the body supposedly in that tomb - has been missing for some time."

Rough Voyage.Name: Rough Voyage
Rough Voyage.Text: Target a Ship. That Ship suffers 2 Hits.
Rough Voyage.Flavor Text: "One hand for the ship - one hand for yourself." - Sailor's Proverb

Rough Waters.Name: Rough Waters
Rough Waters.Text: Any player in this Sea may sink Rough Waters by tacking 4 Adventuring as an action. While a Ship is in this Sea or moving out of it, its Move Cost is increased by 1.
Rough Waters.Flavor Text: "Hey Cap'n. I gots me some fine rotten onions here. Great for a sad stomach, they are!"

Ruby Earring.Name: Ruby Earring
Ruby Earring.Flavor Text: "Talk back to me again, and you'll lose more than just your earlobe." - The General

Rum Flask.Name: Rum Flask
Rum Flask.Text:
+1 Swashbuckling.
React: Discard this card when suffering Hits during a Boarding to absorb 4 Hits.
Rum Flask.Flavor Text: "It's a good place to find a backbone as any." - "Log Tall" Harry

Rum Runners.Name: Rum Runners
Rum Runners.Text:
When this card enters play, attach it to La Boca.
Act: Tack this card to attach it to an adjacent Sea.
Act: Tack this card while it is in the Trade Sea to give all of your Crew currently in play +1 Swashbuckling until the end of the turn. Attach this card to La Boca.
Act: Tack this card while it is in The Mirror to give all of your Crew currently in play +2 Adventuring until the end of the turn. Attach this card to La Boca.

Run 'im Through!.Name: Run 'im Through!
Run 'im Through!.Text: React: Play when one of your Crew inflicts Hits with a Boarding Attack. The Boarding Attack inflicts 2 extra Hits.
Run 'im Through!.Flavor Text: "I don't want the cargo. I want them dead." - Reis

Rune Knowledge.Name: Rune Knowledge
Rune Knowledge.Flavor Text: "All that power in her hands - magic from the Vesten's mightest ancestors - and Yngvild couldn't even see the traitor beneath her nose." - Admiral Valoix

Runed Ship's Wheel.Name: Runed Ship's Wheel
Runed Ship's Wheel.Trait: Unique - 1 Sea Away - Artifact - Ship Attachment
Runed Ship's Wheel.Text: React: Tack the Ship's Wheel when you are targeted by a Weather card. Cancel the effects of that card.

Rupella Lagrippe.Name: Rupella Lagrippe
Rupella Lagrippe.Text: Act: Tack Rupella to untack one of your Crew with the First Mate trait.
Rupella Lagrippe.Flavor Text: "Don't worry about it sir. I'll take care of it. Really."

Sabine Montjoy.Name: Sabine Montjoy
Sabine Montjoy.Text: React: Tack Sabine when another Ship attempts a Boarding with your Ship to cancel the Boarding attempt.
Sabine Montjoy.Flavor Text: She's the bravest and most daring Knight I've ever known. Of course, she's also crazy as a bedbug...

Sabira Mallah.Name: Sabira Mallah
Sabira Mallah.Text: Act: Tack this Crew to target a player in this Sea. That player may place any action cards face up on the table. Until the end of the turn, the target player may only play action cards that are placed face up on the table with this ability. This effect ends when a Boarding begins. When this effect ends the cards are returned to the player's hand.
Sabira Mallah.Flavor Text: The Daughter's need the wicked as well as the righteous.

Sabotaged Sails.Name: Sabotaged Sails
Sabotaged Sails.Text: React: Play when a player tacks a Crew to produce Sailing. That Crew produces no Sailing. That Crew's controller may pay 2 Swashbuckling to prevent this effect.
Sabotaged Sails.Flavor Text: Sneakin' one saboteur aboard in the middle of the night costs a lot less than five tons o' cannon shot. That's more for us at the end o' the day!

Safe Harbor.Name: Safe Harbor
Safe Harbor.Text: When you are revealing Starting Crew, you may reveal and attach this card. Your Ship begins play tacked. This card may not be brought into play oterwise. Players in this Sea may not attempt a Boarding Attack without a card effect or perform a Cannon Attack without a card effect unless they have 3 or more Crew with an Influence cost of 3 or more.
Safe Harbor.Flavor Text: "Home again," Cosette smiled at the Carleon docks.

Safe Path.Name: Safe Path
Safe Path.Text: React: Tack Safe Path when you are paying a cancel cost to produce 4 points toward its cost.
Safe Path.Flavor Text: "Don't look. Just keep rowing." - Andres Donovich

Sailing Under the Jolly Roger.Name: Sailing Under the Jolly Roger
Sailing Under the Jolly Roger.Text: Get any one Adventure card from your deck or discard pile. Show it to your opponent, then place it in your hand. Shuffle your deck.
Sailing Under the Jolly Roger.Flavor Text: "It's one of the blessings of St. Rogers that a ship that flies his colors will always find a bit of adventure to spice up their voyage."

Sails Don't Bleed.Name: Sails Don't Bleed
Sails Don't Bleed.Text: React: Play when one of your Crew with the Topman trait tacks to absorb Hits. The Topman absorbs 4 extra Hits. You may not play this card during a Boarding.
Sails Don't Bleed.Flavor Text: "You can sew the cloth. Domingo can't be repaired so easily." - Manuel Dejavez

Sails of Wind.Name: Sails of Wind
Sails of Wind.Trait: Unique - 3 Seas Away - Artifact - Captain Attachment
Sails of Wind.Text: React: Tack Sails of Wind after your Ship has moved to an adjacent Sea to move again at no cost.

Salted Meat.Name: Salted Meat
Salted Meat.Text: Act: Discard this card to increase this Crew's Swashbuckling by 2 until the end of the turn.
Salted Meat.Flavor Text: "Don't worry. The blood helps keep it fresh."

Salvador Bernoulli.Name: Salvador Bernoulli
Salvador Bernoulli.Text: Salvador inflicts an additional 4 Hits during Boarding Attacks when the other Ship in the Boarding has a Villainous Captain on Board.
Salvador Bernoulli.Artist: Travis Moore and Dærick W. Gröss

Samuel Sanderson.Name: Samuel Sanderson
Samuel Sanderson.Text: When Samuel tacks to absorb Hits, he absorbs 2 extra Hits.
Samuel Sanderson.Flavor Text: "It never hurts to improvise a bit during a fight."

Samuel Smitts.Name: Samuel Smitts
Samuel Smitts.Text: Samuel uses his Cannon skill instead of his Swashbuckling when inflicting Hits in a Boarding Attack.
Samuel Smitts.Flavor Text: Long ago, Smitts tried to steal a pearl from Reis' treasure trove. When the Captain caught him, he let him keep it.

Samuel Smitts - Exp..Name: Samuel Smitts - Exp.
Samuel Smitts - Exp..Text: This Crew inflicts 3 extra Hits during Boarding Attacks.
Samuel Smitts - Exp..Flavor Text: "No one ever faced Reis an' lived, but plenty of us faced 'im an' died. Very soon, he's gonna find out how many…"

San Cristobal.Name: San Cristobal
San Cristobal.Trait: La Boca Attachement - Unique - Control - Port
San Cristobal.Text: You must be in La Boca to play this card. Any player in La Boca may discard San Cristobal by tacking one of their Crew with Sailing greater than 6, as an action. When you are in an adjacent Sea, and tacking to pay for a Control card, your Captain produces 3 extra skill points.
San Cristobal.Flavor Text: The ancient seaside capital of Castille

San Cristobal Under Siege.Name: San Cristobal Under Siege
San Cristobal Under Siege.Text: Any player in this Sea may sink this Attachment by paying 3 Swashbuckling as an action. Players in this Sea during the untack phase must sink the top card of their deck and the top card of their discard pile.
San Cristobal Under Siege.Flavor Text: The Montaigne fleet opened fire. Their cannons would not fall silent for a long, long time.

Sandoval's Guard.Name: Sandoval's Guard
Sandoval's Guard.Flavor Text: Steel is the best sword. Honor is the best shield.

Santino Medrano.Name: Santino Medrano
Santino Medrano.Text: Instead of performing a Boarding Attack, Santino may tack to inflict 2 Hits on the other Ship in the Boarding.
Santino Medrano.Flavor Text: "My father was Vodacce, but don't hold that against me."

Santos de los Puentes.Name: Santos de los Puentes
Santos de los Puentes.Text:
The title of this card is "Sandoval's Guard" for Experienced purposes.
React: Discard one of your Crew cards with the title "Sandoval's Guard" instead of performing a Boarding Attack to inflict 3 Hits on the other Ship in the Boarding.
Santos de los Puentes.Flavor Text: "Run, my child. Tell them that Legion has come for San Cristobal."

Savage Storm.Name: Savage Storm
Savage Storm.Text: Any player may pay 1 Adventuring as an action to attach this card to a Sea adjacent to this Sea. Any player may pay 5 Adventuring as an action to discard this card. All Ships in, or moving from, this Sea have their move costs increased by 2.

Save the Princess.Name: Save the Princess
Save the Princess.Flavor Text: "Please. She's all I have." "Aye, an' when yur done payin' us for savin' her, that'll be doubly true!"
Save the Princess.Changes on MRP: Cost; sepcial cost/Cancel cost modified;Boarding Attack modified;

Scar.Name: Scar
Scar.Trait: Start: Trade Sea - Heroic - Villainous - Lærdom 1 - Swordsman +2
Scar.Text: While you have 4 or more other Vesten Crew on board, your Loyal Crew have +1 Adventuring and you may use the following ability: React: When you push one of your Crew forward to start a Boarding Attack, you may draw one card and then play that card as the  Boarding Attack for that Crew. You may use this ability once per crew pushed forward.

Scarlet Gem of Death.Name: Scarlet Gem of Death
Scarlet Gem of Death.Trait: 2 Seas Away - Artifact - Unique - Captain Attachment
Scarlet Gem of Death.Flavor Text: The gate to Legion has more than one key.
Scarlet Gem of Death.Changes on MRP: Faction modified;Cost; sepcial cost/Cancel cost modified;Trait modified;

Scarlet Hook of Madness.Name: Scarlet Hook of Madness
Scarlet Hook of Madness.Text: React: Play when you suffer Hits. You suffer 1 fewer Hit, and this card attaches to your Captain. This Attachment has the Hand trait. A Crew may not have more than one Hand Attachment. While this card is attached, once per turn as an action you may Sink one of your Crew to untack the Captain.

Scarlet Launch.Name: Scarlet Launch
Scarlet Launch.Text: React: Tack Scarlet Launch when a Sea Attachment targets one of your cards. Negate the effects of that Sea Attachment.
Scarlet Launch.Flavor Text: The crew of the Revensj doesn't punish their prisoners - they feed them to the sirens.

Scary Tattoo.Name: Scary Tattoo
Scary Tattoo.Text: You may draw one card immediately before this Crew starts a Boarding Attack.
Scary Tattoo.Flavor Text: "Don't worry; the real ones are much, much worse."

Scatter Pistol.Name: Scatter Pistol
Scatter Pistol.Text: React: Tack and discard the Scatter Pistol immediately before the first round of Boarding. If you are the Defender, inflict 2 Hits on the other ship in the Boarding.
Scatter Pistol.Flavor Text: "I got it in Freiburg. Best money I ever spent."

Scott Jay.Name: Scott Jay
Scott Jay.Text: React: When you are paying an Influence cost, once per turn, you may discard 2 cards from your hand to produce 2 Influence.
Scott Jay.Flavor Text: He used to collect artifacts for the Explorers. Now he collects Guilders for the highest bidder.

Scott Preston.Name: Scott Preston
Scott Preston.Text: Act: Tack Scott. Until the end of the turn, other Ships have their Move Costs increased by 2 when attempting to start a Boarding against your ship.
Scott Preston.Flavor Text: "Red found him in some wharf-side island. He's crazy in love with her, so he does whatever she says." - Arturo Rodriguez

Scraping the Bottom.Name: Scraping the Bottom
Scraping the Bottom.Flavor Text: "Oh no. Hard tack and water again!" - Mortimer Snuff

Scrying Bowl.Name: Scrying Bowl
Scrying Bowl.Trait: Crew Attachment - Unique - Item - Scry 1 Knack
Scrying Bowl.Text: Act: Tack this card to look at the top 3 cards of any deck. If this deck is your own, you may discard an Action card from your hand to take an Action card from the 3 cards, show it to the other players, and add it tou your hand. If the deck belongs to another player, you may discard an Action card to reveal one of the card to all players and sink it. Regardless, discard the remaining cards.

Scurvy.Name: Scurvy
Scurvy.Text: Target a Ship. Until the end of this turn, all Crew on that Ship have a -1 Swashbuckling (minimum 1).
Scurvy.Flavor Text: That's what I likes to see on me crew: smilin' faces!

Scurvy Dogs.Name: Scurvy Dogs
Scurvy Dogs.Text: This Crew counts as two Crew against your Crew Maximum. This Crew tacks to absorb Hits, it absorbs 5 extra Hits.
Scurvy Dogs.Flavor Text: "Hey you! C'mere, you gotta see this! Harvey does the greatest thing with his knife…"

Sea Chantey.Name: Sea Chantey
Sea Chantey.Text: React: Play when you tack 2 or more of your Crew to produce Sailing. Untack one of the Crew which just tacked to produce Sailing.
Sea Chantey.Flavor Text: "Now you lot in the back: 'row, row, row your boat..."

Sea Dog Pride.Name: Sea Dog Pride
Sea Dog Pride.Text: One of your Sea Dog Crew gains +2 Swashbuckling until the end of the turn. That Crew gains +2 extra Swashbuckling if there is a Crimson Roger Ship in play (+4 total).
Sea Dog Pride.Flavor Text: John Fox sniffed out the stolen Cross like a bloodhound. But only Berek had the guts to take it.

Seal of the Sun King.Name: Seal of the Sun King
Seal of the Sun King.Trait: Montaigne Captain Attachment - Unique - Letter of Marque
Seal of the Sun King.Text:
You may not put this card into play if any other player has more Influence than you.
Act: Tack the Seal and target any one Ship in Frothing Sea. You inflict 3 Hits on that Ship.
Seal of the Sun King.Flavor Text: Every time the General sees it, he winces and mumbles his ship's name and a curse for the man who wrote the bloody thing.

Sean Garloise.Name: Sean Garloise
